 742+ 7167
 743+ 7167              UpdateCompassPlanet:    MMUSelectPlanet
 743+ 7167 ED 91 56 54 >                     nextreg PlanetMMU,         BankPlanetData
 744+ 716B CD C7 6F                             call    ScalePlanetPos              ; get as 7 bit signed
 745+ 716E C5 E5 D5                             push    bc,,hl,,de                  ; save to stack Y, Z, X and copy of X scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 746+ 7171 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 747+ 7172 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 748+ 7173 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 749+ 7175 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 750+ 7177 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 751+ 7178 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 752+ 7179 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 753+ 717B EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 754+ 717C D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; get saved from stack 2
 755+ 717D 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 756+ 717E ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 757+ 7180 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; hl = x^2 + y^2 + z^2
 758+ 7181 09                                   add     hl,bc
 759+ 7182 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 760+ 7183 CD F2 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 761+ 7186                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 762+ 7186 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 763+ 7187 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 764+ 7189 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; hl x scaled
 765+ 718A 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 766+ 718B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 767+ 718D 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 768+ 718E C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 769+ 718F 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 770+ 7190 CD CE 9C                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 771+ 7193 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 772+ 7194                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 772+ 7194 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 772+ 7196 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 772+ 7198 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 772+ 7199 19          >                        add     hl,de
 772+ 719A 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 772+ 719B 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 772+ 719C 19          >                        add     hl,de
 772+ 719D 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 773+ 719E 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 774+ 719F C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 775+ 71A0 FE 00                                cp      0
 776+ 71A2 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                ; in case we end up with - 0
 777+ 71A4 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 778+ 71A6 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 779+ 71A8 ED 44                                neg
 780+ 71AA DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 781+ 71AC FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 782+ 71AE E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl y scaled
 783+ 71AF 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 784+ 71B0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 785+ 71B2 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 786+ 71B3 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 787+ 71B4 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 788+ 71B5 CD CE 9C                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; .
 789+ 71B8 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 790+ 71B9                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 790+ 71B9 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 790+ 71BB 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 790+ 71BD 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 790+ 71BE 19          >                        add     hl,de
 790+ 71BF 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 790+ 71C0 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 790+ 71C1 19          >                        add     hl,de
 790+ 71C2 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 791+ 71C3 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 792+ 71C4 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 793+ 71C5 FE 00                                cp      0
 794+ 71C7 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                 ; in case we end up with - 0
 795+ 71C9 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 796+ 71CB 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 797+ 71CD ED 44                                neg                                 ;
 798+ 71CF 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; result from Y
 799+ 71D0 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; x = saved X
 800+ 71D2              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 800+ 71D2 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 801+ 71D6 CD 7D E2                             call    compass_station_move
 802+ 71D9 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)
 803+ 71DC CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 804+ 71DE 20 04                                jr      nz,.PlanetBehind
 805+ 71E0 CD 98 E3     .PlanetInfront:         call    show_compass_station_infront
 806+ 71E3 C9                                   ret
 807+ 71E4 CD A3 E3     .PlanetBehind:          call    show_compass_station_behind
 808+ 71E7 C9                                   ret
 809+ 71E8
 810+ 71E8              UpdatePlanetSun:        MMUSelectPlanet
 810+ 71E8 ED 91 56 54 >                     nextreg PlanetMMU,         BankPlanetData
 811+ 71EC                                      Shift24BitScan  P_BnKyhi, P_BnKylo
 811+ 71EC 2A 14 C0    >                        ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)
 811+ 71EF 44          >                        ld      b,h
 811+ 71F0 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 811+ 71F1 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 811+ 71F3 67          >                        ld      h,a
 811+ 71F4 3A 13 C0    >                        ld      a,(P_BnKylo)
 811+ 71F7 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 71F9 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 71FB CB 14       >                        rl      h
 811+ 71FD CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 71FF CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 7201 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 811+ 7203 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 7205 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 7207 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 811+ 7209 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 720B CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 720D CB 14       >                        rl      h
 811+ 720F CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 7211 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 7213 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 811+ 7215 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 811+ 7217 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 811+ 7219 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 812+ 721B 3A 12 C0     .IsItInRange:           ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)                ; if the high byte is not
 813+ 721E 21 15 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKysgn                 ; a sign only
 814+ 7221 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; then its too far away
 815+ 7222 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
 816+ 7225 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass
 817+ 7226 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ;
 818+ 7228 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
 819+ 7229 2A 16 C0     .ItsInRange:            ld      hl,(P_BnKzlo)                ; we will get unsigned values
 820+ 722C ED 5B 10 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKxlo)
 821+ 7230 ED 4B 13 C0                          ld      bc,(P_BnKylo)
 822+ 7234 7C                                   ld      a,h
 823+ 7235 B2                                   or      d
 824+ 7236 B0                                   or      b
 825+ 7237 E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 826+ 7239 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 827+ 723A 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 828+ 723D CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 829+ 723F 28 04                                jr      z,.absXHi
 830+ 7241                                      NegD
 830+ 7241 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 830+ 7242 ED 44       >                    neg
 830+ 7244 57          >                    ld      d,a
 831+ 7245 7A           .absXHi:                ld      a,d
 832+ 7246 C6 80                                add     ScannerX
 833+ 7248 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; store adjusted X in ixh
 834+ 724A CB 3C        .ProcessZCoord:         srl     h
 835+ 724C CB 3C                                srl     h
 836+ 724E 3A 18 C0     .MakeZ2Compliment:      ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)
 837+ 7251 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 838+ 7253 28 04                                jr      z,.absZHi
 839+ 7255                                      NegH
 839+ 7255 7C          >                    ld      a,h
 839+ 7256 ED 44       >                    neg
 839+ 7258 67          >                    ld      h,a
 840+ 7259 3E AB        .absZHi:                ld      a,ScannerY
 841+ 725B 94                                   sub     h
 842+ 725C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; make iyh adjusted Z = row on screen
 843+ 725E CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2
 844+ 7260 20 0B                                jr      nz,.StickHasLength
 845+ 7262 FD 7C        .Stick0Length:          ld      a,iyh                       ; abs stick end is row - length
 846+ 7264 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 847+ 7266                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 847+ 7266 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 848+ 726A C3 95 72                             jp      .NoStick
 849+ 726D 3A 15 C0     .StickHasLength:        ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)                ; if b  =  0 then no line
 850+ 7270 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 851+ 7272 28 04                                jr      z,.absYHi
 852+ 7274                                      NegB
 852+ 7274 78          >                    ld      a,b
 852+ 7275 ED 44       >                    neg
 852+ 7277 47          >                    ld      b,a
 853+ 7278 FD 7C        .absYHi:                ld      a,iyh
 854+ 727A 90           .SetStickPos:           sub     b
 855+ 727B                                      JumpIfALTNusng ScannerBottom, .StickOnScreen
 855+ 727B FE BE       >                        cp      ScannerBottom
 855+ 727D DA 82 72    >                        jp		c, .StickOnScreen
 856+ 7280 3E BE                                ld      a,ScannerBottom
 857+ 7282 FD 6F        .StickOnScreen:         ld      iyl,a                       ; iyh is again stick end point
 858+ 7284 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 859+ 7286 FD 44                                ld      b,iyh                       ; from row
 860+ 7288 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; from col
 861+ 728A FD 55                                ld      d,iyl                       ; to row
 862+ 728C 1E B4                                ld      e,L2SunScanner
 863+ 728E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 863+ 728E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 864+ 7292 CD 55 E5                             call    l2_draw_vert_line_to
 865+ 7295 FD 45        .NoStick:               ld      b,iyl                       ; row
 866+ 7297 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; col
 867+ 7299 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 868+ 729B CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 869+ 729E FD 45                                ld      b,iyl
 870+ 72A0 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh
 871+ 72A2 0C                                   inc     c
 872+ 72A3 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 873+ 72A5 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 874+ 72A8 C9                                   ret

 876+ 72A9 ED 91 57 00 >					 nextreg ShipModelMMU,	    0

 879+ 72B0 C5 D5 E5 D5                          push    bc,,de,,hl,,de              ; save to stack Y, Z, X and copy of X scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 880+ 72B4 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 881+ 72B5 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 882+ 72B6 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 883+ 72B8 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 884+ 72BA 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 885+ 72BB 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 886+ 72BC ED 30                                mul                                 ; .

 888+ 72BF D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; get saved from stack 2
 889+ 72C0 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 890+ 72C1 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 891+ 72C3 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; hl = x^2 + y^2 + x^2
 892+ 72C4 09                                   add     hl,bc
 893+ 72C5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 894+ 72C6 CD F2 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 895+ 72C9                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 896+ 72C9 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 897+ 72CA FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 898+ 72CC E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; hl x scaled
 899+ 72CD 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 900+ 72CE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 901+ 72D0 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 902+ 72D1 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 903+ 72D2 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 904+ 72D3 CD CE 9C                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 905+ 72D6 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 906+ 72D7                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 906+ 72D7 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 906+ 72D9 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 906+ 72DB 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 906+ 72DC 19          >                        add     hl,de
 906+ 72DD 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 906+ 72DE 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 906+ 72DF 19          >                        add     hl,de
 906+ 72E0 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 907+ 72E1 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 908+ 72E2 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 909+ 72E3 FE 00                                cp      0
 910+ 72E5 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                 ; in case we end up with - 0
 911+ 72E7 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 912+ 72E9 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 913+ 72EB ED 44                                neg
 914+ 72ED DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 915+ 72EF FD 55        .NormaliseZ:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 916+ 72F1 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl z scaled
 917+ 72F2 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 918+ 72F3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 919+ 72F5 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 920+ 72F6 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 921+ 72F7 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; e = a /q * 96
 922+ 72F8 CD CE 9C                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; .
 923+ 72FB 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 924+ 72FC                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 924+ 72FC 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 924+ 72FE 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 924+ 7300 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 924+ 7301 19          >                        add     hl,de
 924+ 7302 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 924+ 7303 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 924+ 7304 19          >                        add     hl,de
 924+ 7305 29          >                        add     hl,hl

 926+ 7307 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 927+ 7308 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value

1031+ 7442 21 15 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKysgn                 ; a sign only
1032+ 7445 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; then its too far away
1033+ 7446 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
1034+ 7449 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass

1036+ 744C C0                                   ret     nz                          ;

1061+ 7482 CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2

   3+ 7595              ResetMessageQueue:      ZeroA
   3+ 7595 AF          >                        xor a
   4+ 7596 32 A1 7E                             ld      (MessageCount),a
   5+ 7599 32 A2 7E                             ld      (MessageCurrent),a
   6+ 759C 21 A5 7E                             ld      hl,MessageQueue
   7+ 759F 11 A3 7E                             ld      de,MessageIndex
   8+ 75A2 06 05                                ld      b,5
   9+ 75A4 7D           .ClearMessageIndexs:    ld      a,l                                 ; Wipe out the indexes to all the data
  10+ 75A5 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  11+ 75A6 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  12+ 75A7 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
  13+ 75A8 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  14+ 75A9 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  15+ 75AA 3E 21                                ld      a,MESSAGESIZE                       ;
  16+ 75AC ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ;
  17+ 75AE 10 F4                                djnz    .ClearMessageIndexs                 ;
  18+ 75B0 21 A5 7E     .ClearText:             ld      hl,MessageQueue
  19+ 75B3 11 AA 00                             ld      de,(MAXMESSAGES * MESSAGESIZE) + MAXMESSAGES    ; MessageQueue + MessageTimeout
  20+ 75B6 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  21+ 75B8 CD 13 7E                             call	memfill_dma
  22+ 75BB C9                                   ret
  23+ 75BC
  24+ 75BC              ; Message to enqeue is a string held at DE that must be terminated in \0
  25+ 75BC              ;                                       IYH = timer for message
  26+ 75BC 3A A1 7E     EnqueMessage:           ld      a,(MessageCount)                    ; Maximum message count check
  27+ 75BF                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    MAXMESSAGES            ; we do not enque if queue is full
  27+ 75BF FE 05       >                        cp    MAXMESSAGES
  27+ 75C1 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  28+ 75C2 3C                                   inc     a
  29+ 75C3 32 A1 7E                             ld      (MessageCount),a                    ; get ready for next message
  30+ 75C6 4F           .AddMessage:            ld      c,a
  31+ 75C7 3A A2 7E                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)                  ; a = current message id + count + 1
  32+ 75CA 81                                   add     c                                   ;
  33+ 75CB                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToAdd     ; a = a modulus 5 (note we can only hit 5 messages
  33+ 75CB FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  33+ 75CD DA D2 75    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToAdd
  34+ 75D0 D6 05        .CircularQueue:         sub     MAXMESSAGES                         ; so only need 1 cycle of modulus
  35+ 75D2 21 4A 7F     .ReadyToAdd:            ld      hl,MessageTimeout                   ; write out message display time
  36+ 75D5 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; as some may be brief messages
  37+ 75D7 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
  38+ 75D8 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                               ;
  39+ 75DA 77                                   ld      (hl),a                              ;
  40+ 75DB 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back index
  41+ 75DC 21 A3 7E                             ld      hl,MessageIndex
  42+ 75DF                                      HLEquAddrAtHLPlusA                          ; hl = target location for message
  42+ 75DF CB 27       >                    sla         a
  42+ 75E1 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  42+ 75E3 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
  42+ 75E4 23          >                    inc         hl
  42+ 75E5 66          >                    ld          h,(hl)
  42+ 75E6 6F          >                    ld          l,a
  43+ 75E7 EB                                   ex      de,hl                               ; de = destination, hl = message
  44+ 75E8                                      ldCopyTextAtHLtoDE                          ; copy over text as we have done the rest
  44+ 75E8 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld      a,(hl)
  44+ 75E9 12          >                        ld      (de),a
  44+ 75EA FE 00       >                        cp      0
  44+ 75EC CA F3 75    >                        jp      z,.DoneCopy
  44+ 75EF 23          >                        inc     hl
  44+ 75F0 13          >                        inc     de
  44+ 75F1 18 F5       >                        jr      .CopyLoop
  44+ 75F3             >.DoneCopy:
  45+ 75F3 C9                                   ret
  46+ 75F4
  47+ 75F4 3A A2 7E     UpdateMessageTimer:     ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  48+ 75F7 21 4A 7F                             ld      hl,MessageTimeout
  49+ 75FA ED 31                                add     hl,a
  50+ 75FC 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  51+ 75FD 3D                                   dec     a
  52+ 75FE 28 02                                jr      z,.UpdateQueue
  53+ 7600 77           .UpdateTimer            ld      (hl),a
  54+ 7601 C9                                   ret
  55+ 7602 77           .UpdateQueue:           ld      (hl),a
  56+ 7603 21 A1 7E                             ld      hl,MessageCount
  57+ 7606 35                                   dec     (hl)
  58+ 7607 3A A2 7E                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  59+ 760A 23                                   inc     hl
  60+ 760B                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToUpdate
  60+ 760B FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  60+ 760D DA 11 76    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToUpdate
  61+ 7610              .CircularQueue:         ZeroA
  61+ 7610 AF          >                        xor a
  62+ 7611 32 A2 7E     .ReadyToUpdate          ld      (MessageCurrent),a
  63+ 7614 C9                                   ret

 102+ 76A1 3E 20       >                        ld      a,32
 102+ 76A3 77          >.ClearLoop:             ld      (hl),a
 102+ 76A4 23          >                        inc     hl
 102+ 76A5 10 FC       >                        djnz    .ClearLoop
 103+ 76A7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 104+ 76A8 21 F4 67                             ld      hl,Hyp_charging
 105+ 76AB                                      ldCopyTextAtHLtoDE
 105+ 76AB 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld      a,(hl)
 105+ 76AC 12          >                        ld      (de),a
 105+ 76AD FE 00       >                        cp      0
 105+ 76AF CA B6 76    >                        jp      z,.DoneCopy
 105+ 76B2 23          >                        inc     hl
 105+ 76B3 13          >                        inc     de
 105+ 76B4 18 F5       >                        jr      .CopyLoop
 105+ 76B6             >.DoneCopy:
 106+ 76B6 AF                                   xor     a
 107+ 76B7 32 62 68                             ld      (Hyp_centeredEol2),a
 108+ 76BA 2A 4A 81     .UpdateHyperCountdown:  ld      hl,(InnerHyperCount)    ; Update inner loop of counter
 109+ 76BD 2D                                   dec     l                       ;
 110+ 76BE 20 26                                jr      nz,.decHyperInnerOnly   ; if its only inner loop updated the no display update
 111+ 76C0 25                                   dec     h                       ; if its outer loop counter
 112+ 76C1 FA EA 76                             jp      m,.HyperCountDone       ; abort once complete
 113+ 76C4 2E 0B        .resetHyperInner:       ld      l,$0B                   ; else display
 114+ 76C6 E5                                   push    hl
 115+ 76C7 16 0C                                ld      d,12
 116+ 76C9 3E 06                                ld      a,L1ColourPaperBlack | L1ColourInkYellow
 117+ 76CB CD 9A E0                             call    l1_attr_cls_2DlinesA
 118+ 76CE 16 60                                ld      d,12 * 8
 119+ 76D0 CD 83 E0                             call    l1_cls_2_lines_d
 120+ 76D3 11 00 60                             ld      de,$6000
 121+ 76D6 21 01 68                             ld      hl,Hyp_centeredTarget
 122+ 76D9 CD D7 E0                             call    l1_print_at
 123+ 76DC 11 00 68                             ld      de,$6800
 124+ 76DF 21 42 68                             ld      hl,Hyp_centeredCharging
 125+ 76E2 CD D7 E0                             call    l1_print_at
 126+ 76E5 E1                                   pop     hl
 127+ 76E6 22 4A 81     .decHyperInnerOnly:     ld      (InnerHyperCount),hl
 128+ 76E9 C9                                   ret
 129+ 76EA 21 00 00     .HyperCountDone:        ld      hl,0
 130+ 76ED 22 4A 81                             ld      (InnerHyperCount),hl
 131+ 76F0 16 0C                                ld      d,12
 132+ 76F2 3E 00                                ld      a,L1ColourPaperBlack | L1ColourInkBlack
 133+ 76F4 CD 9A E0                             call    l1_attr_cls_2DlinesA
 134+ 76F7 16 60                                ld      d,12 * 8
 135+ 76F9 CD 83 E0                             call    l1_cls_2_lines_d
 136+ 76FC                                      ForceTransition ScreenHyperspace                            ; transition to hyperspace
 136+ 76FC 3E 0E       >                        ld      a,ScreenHyperspace
 136+ 76FE 32 82 6A    >                        ld      (ScreenTransitionForced), a
 137+ 7701 C9                                   ret

   1+ 7702              ; LaserTypeTable
   2+ 7702              ; laser type = id of laser
   3+ 7702              ; laser pulse pause = time before next pulse
   4+ 7702              ; laser pulse duration = time laser is on per shot
   5+ 7702              ; laser damage output
   6+ 7702              ;
   7+ 7702              ; LaserType
   8+ 7702              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
   9+ 7702              ; LaserPulseOnTime                        ; cycles laser is on for
  10+ 7702              ; LaserPulseOffTime                       ; cycles laser is off for
  11+ 7702              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0 (i.e cooldown)
  12+ 7702              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  13+ 7702              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  14+ 7702              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
  15+ 7702              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
  16+ 7702              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
  17+ 7702              ; LaserInMarkets                          ; can this laser be purchased 0 = yes 1 = no
  18+ 7702              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from

 118+ 793C CD 74 DC     .PrepLines:             call    PrepLines
 119+ 793F                                      ;break
 120+ 793F                      IFDEF LATECLIPPING
 121+ 793F CD 48 D9     .DrawLines:             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
 122+ 7942                                      ;break
 123+ 7942                      ELSE
 124+ 7942 ~            .DrawLines:             call    DrawLines
 125+ 7942                      ENDIF
 126+ 7942 01 01 01     .Drawbox:               ld		bc,$0101
 127+ 7945 11 FD 7F                             ld		de,$7FFD
 128+ 7948 3E C0                                ld		a,$C0
 129+ 794A                                      ;break
 130+ 794A                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 130+ 794A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 131+ 794E CD F9 E3                             call	l2_draw_box
 132+ 7951 CD 97 E2     .DoubleBuffer:          call    l2_flip_buffers
 133+ 7954 3A 3A 78     .UpdateZPosIfReady:     ld      a,(AttractCounter)
 134+ 7957                                      ;break
 135+ 7957 A7                                   and     a
 136+ 7958 CA 6A 79                             jp      z,.DoneIM2
 137+ 795B 3D                                   dec     a
 138+ 795C 32 3A 78                             ld      (AttractCounter),a
 139+ 795F 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl, (UBnkzlo)
 140+ 7962 11 08 00     .UpdatePos:             ld      de, $0008
 141+ 7965 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 142+ 7967 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnkzlo),hl
 143+ 796A 3A EA 78     .DoneIM2:               ld      a,(AttractStep)
 144+ 796D 3C                                   inc     a
 145+ 796E FE 03                                cp      3
 146+ 7970 32 EA 78                             ld      (AttractStep),a
 147+ 7973 C0                                   ret     nz
 148+ 7974                                      ZeroA

1153  79B9                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 79B9              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 79B9              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 79B9              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 79B9              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 79B9 ED 4B A7 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 79BD 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 79BE 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 79BF 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 79C0 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 79C1 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 79C2 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 79C4 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 79C6 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 79C7 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 79C9 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 79CA E5           		push	hl
  17+ 79CB 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 79CD 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 79CE 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 79CF CD BD 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 79D2 22 54 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 79D5 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 79D7 32 5B 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 79DA E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 79DB              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 79DB ED 4B A9 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 79DF 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 79E0 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 79E1 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 79E2 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 79E3 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 79E4 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 79E5 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 79E7 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 79E9 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 79EA E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 79EC 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 79ED E5           		push	hl
  39+ 79EE 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 79F0 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 79F1 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 79F2 CD BD 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 79F5 22 56 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 79F8 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 79FA 32 5A 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 79FD E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 79FE              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 79FE ED 4B AB C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 7A02 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 7A03 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 7A04 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 7A05 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 7A06 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 7A07 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 7A08 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 7A0A DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 7A0C 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 7A0D E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 7A0F 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 7A10 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 7A12 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 7A13 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 7A14 CD BD 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 7A17 22 58 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 7A1A DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 7A1C 32 5C 7E     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 7A1F              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 7A1F 2A 54 7E     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 7A22 ED 5B 56 7E  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 7A26 ED 4B 5A 7E  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 7A2A              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 7A2A 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 7A2B 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 7A2C AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 7A2D 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 7A2E 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 7A2F CD 12 90     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 7A32 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 7A33 3A 5C 7E     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 7A36 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 7A37 ED 5B 58 7E  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 7A3B 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 7A3C 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 7A3E CD 12 90     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 7A41 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 7A42              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 7A42
  88+ 7A42              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 7A42              ;...X cell
  90+ 7A42 21 7A C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 7A45 CD B9 79             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 7A48 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 7A49 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 7A4A B0           		or		b
  95+ 7A4B 32 AE C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 7A4E 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 7A4F 32 AD C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 7A52              ;...Y cell
  99+ 7A52 21 82 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1

 107+ 7A5F 32 AF C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 7A62              ;...Z cell
 109+ 7A62 21 8A C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1

 117+ 7A6F 32 B1 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for

1156  7B11                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7B11              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7B11                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7B11 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7B11 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7B11 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7B11 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7B11 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7B11 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7B11 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7B11 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7B11 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7B11 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7B11 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7B11 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7B11 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7B11 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7B11 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7B11 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7B11 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7B11 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7B11 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7B11 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7B11 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7B11 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7B11 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7B11 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7B11 ~                                    ret
  28+ 7B11                      ELSE
  29+ 7B11 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7B13 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7B15 21 62 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7B18 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7B19 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7B1A 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7B1B 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7B1C 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7B1D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7B1F DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7B21                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7B21 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7B23 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7B25 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7B26 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7B27 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7B28 CD 3D 97                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7B2B E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7B2C 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7B2D 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7B2E 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7B2F                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7B2F                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7B2F DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7B31 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7B32 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7B33 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7B34 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7B36 C9                                   ret
  56+ 7B37                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
1157  7B37
1158  7B37                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7B37              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7B37              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7B37              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7B37              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7B37
   6+ 7B37              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7B37              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7B37
   9+ 7B37 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7B38 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7B3B EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7B3C F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7B3E 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7B3F E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7B41 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7B42 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7B43 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7B44 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7B47 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7B48 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7B49 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7B4B B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7B4C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7B4D 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7B4E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7B4F CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  27+ 7B52 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7B53 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7B55 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7B56 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7B57 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7B59 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7B5A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7B5B CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  35+ 7B5E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7B5F 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7B60 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7B62 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7B63 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7B64 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7B65 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7B66 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  43+ 7B69 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7B6A F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7B6C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7B6D 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7B6E F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7B70 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7B72 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7B73 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7B74 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7B75
  53+ 7B75 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7B76 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  55+ 7B79 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7B7B CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7B7D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7B7E E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7B80 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7B81 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7B83 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7B84 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7B85 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7B86 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  65+ 7B89 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7B8A 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7B8B E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7B8D B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7B8E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7B8F 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7B90 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7B91 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  73+ 7B94 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7B96 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7B98 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7B99 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7B9B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7B9C 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7B9D E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7B9F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7BA0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7BA1 CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  83+ 7BA4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7BA5 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7BA6 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7BA8 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7BA9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7BAA 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7BAB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7BAC CD 2F 85                             call    doRND
  91+ 7BAF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 7BB0 F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 7BB2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7BB3 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7BB4 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7BB6 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7BB8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7BB9 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7BBA C9                                   ret
 100+ 7BBB
 101+ 7BBB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7BBB 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7BBD 21 A8 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7BC0 CD 37 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7BC3 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7BC5 C9                                   ret
 107+ 7BC6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7BC6 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7BC8 21 A8 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7BCB CD 75 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7BCE 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7BD0 C9                                   ret
 113+ 7BD1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7BD1 FD 21 A8 80  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7BD5 DD 21 92 80                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7BD9 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7BDB FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7BDE 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7BDF E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7BE1                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7BE1 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7BE3 C2 EC 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7BE6 C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7BE8 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7BE9 C3 F1 7B                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7BEC 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7BED 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7BEF 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7BF0 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7BF1 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7BF4 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7BF5 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7BF7                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7BF7 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7BF9 C2 02 7C    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7BFC C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7BFE 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7BFF C3 07 7C                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7C02 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7C03 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7C05 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7C06 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7C07 DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7C0A DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7C0D DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7C0F DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7C11 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7C14 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7C16 ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7C18 E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7C1B 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7C1D C9                                   ret
 149+ 7C1E
 150+ 7C1E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7C1E 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7C20 FD 21 A8 80                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7C24 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7C25 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7C28 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7C29 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7C2B 3A 7C 7F                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7C2E                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7C2E A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7C2F C2 33 7C    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7C32 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7C33 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7C34 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7C36 CD C9 97                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7C39                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7C39 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7C3B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7C3D                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7C3D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7C3F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7C41 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7C42 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7C44 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7C46 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7C4A 66 05
 169+ 7C4C ED 5B 7D 7F                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7C50 CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7C53                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7C53 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7C55 C2 AA 7D    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7C58 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7C5C 74 05
 173+ 7C5E FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7C62 66 01
 174+ 7C64 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7C65 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7C67 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7C68 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7C6A ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7C6C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7C6D E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7C6F B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7C70 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7C71 CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7C74 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7C75 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7C77                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7C77 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7C79 D2 AA 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7C7C FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7C80 74 01
 188+ 7C82 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7C86 66 03
 189+ 7C88 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7C89 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7C8B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7C8C DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7C8E ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7C90 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7C91 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7C93 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7C94 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7C95 CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7C98 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7C99 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7C9B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7C9B FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7C9D D2 AA 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7CA0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7CA1 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7CA3 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7CA5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7CA6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7CA6 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7CA8 D2 AA 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7CAB FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7CAF 74 03
 208+ 7CB1              ; Now roll
 209+ 7CB1              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7CB1 3A 9C 7E     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7CB4 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7CB6 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7CB8                                   ;   break
 214+ 7CB8 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7CB9 3A 9E 7E                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7CBC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7CBE 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7CBF E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7CC0 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7CC1 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7CC2 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7CC5 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7CC6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7CC8 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7CC9 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7CCA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7CCC 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7CCD ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7CCF 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7CD0 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7CD1 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7CD2 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7CD3 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7CD7 66 01
 234+ 7CD9 CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7CDC FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7CE0 74 01
 236+ 7CE2              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7CE2              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7CE2 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7CE3 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7CE4 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7CE5 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7CE8 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7CE9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7CEB 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7CEC 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7CED E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7CEF 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7CF0 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7CF2 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7CF3 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7CF4 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7CF5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7CF6 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7CFA 66 03
 254+ 7CFC CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7CFF FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7D03 74 03
 256+ 7D05 3A 90 7E     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7D08 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7D0A 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7D0C              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7D0C 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7D0D FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7D10 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7D11 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7D13 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7D14 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7D16                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7D16 CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7D18 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7D1A 3A 91 7E                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7D1D B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7D1E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7D1F FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7D23 66 03
 271+ 7D25 CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7D28 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7D2C 74 03
 273+ 7D2E              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7D2E              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7D2E              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7D2E              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7D2E               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7D2E                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7D2E              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7D2E FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7D31 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7D32 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7D34                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7D34 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7D36 C2 3F 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7D39 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7D3B 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7D3C C3 44 7D                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7D3F 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7D40 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7D42 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7D43 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7D44 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7D47 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7D48 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7D4A                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7D4A CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7D4C C2 55 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7D4F C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7D51 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7D52 C3 5A 7D                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7D55 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7D56 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7D58 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7D59 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7D5A 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7D5C C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7D5D              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7D5D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7D61 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7D64 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7D67 C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7D68                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7D68 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7D6A D2 9A 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7D6D 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7D6F 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7D70 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7D71                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7D71 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7D75 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7D78 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7D7B C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7D7C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7D7C FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7D7E D2 9A 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7D81 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7D83 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7D84 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7D85                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7D85 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7D89 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7D8C FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7D8F C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7D90 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7D92 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7D93                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7D93 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7D97 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7D9A C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7D9B FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7D9D E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7D9E ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7DA2 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7DA3 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7DA5 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7DA6 C2 24 7C                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7DA9 C9                                   ret
 337+ 7DAA C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7DAB FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7DAD E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7DAE CD 37 7B                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7DB1 C3 9B 7D                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7DB4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7DB4 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7DB7 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7DBA 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7DBB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7DBD 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7DBE CD 54 97                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7DC1 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7DC2                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7DC2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7DC4 C2 CF 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7DC7              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7DC7 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7DC9 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7DCB 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7DCC C3 D6 7D                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7DCF              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7DCF 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7DD1 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7DD3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7DD3 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7DD4 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7DD6              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7DD6 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7DD7 32 00 81                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7DDA C9                                   ret
 365+ 7DDB
 366+ 7DDB FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7DDE FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7DE1 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7DE2 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7DE4 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7DE5 CD 54 97                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7DE8 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7DE9                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7DE9 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7DEB C2 F6 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7DEE                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7DEE 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7DF0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7DF0 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7DF1 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7DF3 C3 FB 7D                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7DF6              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7DF6 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7DF8 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7DFA 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7DFB              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7DFB 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7DFC 32 01 81                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7DFF C9                                   ret
 387+ 7E00
 388+ 7E00
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
