1165  7E00                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7E00
   2+ 7E00 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7E01 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7E05 7D
   4+ 7E06 00 7E        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7E08 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7E0A 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7E0D 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7E0F 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7E13              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7E13
  11+ 7E13              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7E13              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7E13              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7E13 32 00 7E     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7E16              .set_target:
  16+ 7E16 22 0D 7E     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7E19              .set_length:
  18+ 7E19 ED 53 08 7E  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7E1D              .write_dma:
  20+ 7E1D 21 01 7E     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7E20 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7E22 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7E24 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7E26 C9           	ret
  25+ 7E27
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1166  7E27                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7E27
   2+ 7E27 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7E2B 7D
   3+ 7E2C 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7E2E 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7E30 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7E33 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7E35 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7E39              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7E39
  10+ 7E39              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7E39              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7E39              .set_target:
  13+ 7E39 22 33 7E     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7E3C              .set_source:
  15+ 7E3C ED 53 2C 7E  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7E40              .set_length:
  17+ 7E40 ED 43 2E 7E  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7E44              .write_dma:
  19+ 7E44 21 27 7E     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7E47 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7E49 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7E4B ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7E4D C9           	ret
  24+ 7E4E

 205+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen

 213+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
 214+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 215+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
 216+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
 217+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
 218+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
 219+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
 220+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
 221+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
 222+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
 223+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
 224+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder

 227+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
 228+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
 229+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
 230+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
 231+ 7E5D              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is

 236+ 7E5D              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
 237+ 7E5D              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
 238+ 7E5D              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
 239+ 7E5D              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
 240+ 7E5D              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
 241+ 7E5D              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
 242+ 7E5D              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.

1177  7E5D                  INCLUDE "./Variables/general_variables.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/general_variables.asm
   1+ 7E5D                  IFNDEF LASER_V2
   2+ 7E5D ~                DEFINE  LASER_V2    1
   3+ 7E5D                  ENDIF
   4+ 7E5D              ; Debugging data
   5+ 7E5D 00 00 00...  failureDiag DS  10              ; 10 bytes to log data before a failure
   6+ 7E67
   7+ 7E67              LogFailure:     MACRO messageAddress
   8+ 7E67 ~                            ld      hl,messageAddress
   9+ 7E67 ~                            ld      de,failureDiag
  10+ 7E67 ~                            ld      bc,10
  11+ 7E67 ~                            ldir
  12+ 7E67                              ENDM
  13+ 7E67
  14+ 7E67
  15+ 7E67 00 00        varAxis1	DW 	0				; address of first axis in a rotation action
  16+ 7E69 00 00        varAxis2	DW	0				; address of 2nd axis in a roation action
  17+ 7E6B              ; Variables to simulate 6502 registers until code fixed
  18+ 7E6B              ; These must be here in this order as reading Y and X can then be a 16 bit read
  19+ 7E6B 00           regX		DB	0               ; using 16 bit read into BC this would go into C
  20+ 7E6C 00           regY		DB	0               ; using 16 bit read into BC this would go into B
  21+ 7E6D 00           regA		DB	0
  22+ 7E6E
  23+ 7E6E
  24+ 7E6E 00           varGPLoopA	DB	0				; General Purpose innermost loop variable
  25+ 7E6F 00 00        INF			DW	0				; page 0 &20 Used to get address from UNIV array
  26+ 7E71 00 00        INF28		DW	0				; page 0 &20 Used to get address from UNIV array
  27+ 7E73
  28+ 7E73
  29+ 7E73
  30+ 7E73              ;XX16		DS	16				; 16 byte Matrix
  31+ 7E73

 372+ 817D              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 373+ 817D              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 374+ 817D              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 375+ 817D              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 376+ 817D              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 377+ 817D              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 378+ 817D              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 379+ 817D              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 380+ 817D              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 381+ 817D              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 382+ 817D              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 383+ 817D              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 384+ 817D              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 385+ 817D              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 386+ 817D
 387+ 817D
 388+ 817D
 389+ 817D              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save
 390+ 817D              ; Now MissionData VarTP					DB	0				; 0358 TP? The Plan  \ mission uses lower 4 bits
 391+ 817D              											; Bit mask XXXX10XX - Thargoid plan mission
 392+ 817D

 423+ 8207 00           CompassY				DB	0				; 03A9

 425+ 8208              ; $FF no missile targettting enabled
 426+ 8208              ; $FE missile targetting, no target selected
 427+ 8208              ; bit 7 set then tagetting and lower nibble holds missile target and launching
 428+ 8208              ; bit 7 clear launch at selected target in lower nibble

 436+ 821A              ; LaserType

 438+ 821A              ; LaserPulsePause                         ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
 439+ 821A              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0
 440+ 821A              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
 441+ 821A              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
 442+ 821A              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
 443+ 821A              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
 444+ 821A              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit

 446+ 821A              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from

 452+ 821E 00           CurrLaserPulseOffTime   DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on

 139+ 83E6 3A 08 82     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 83E9 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 83EB 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 83ED E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 83EF CA F4 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 83F2                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 83F2 B7          >                        or a

 146+ 83FB CA 01 84    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0

  53+ 8438 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  54+ 8439 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  55+ 843B 21 56 81                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  56+ 843E 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  57+ 8440 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c
  58+ 8441 BA                                   cp      d
  59+ 8442 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  60+ 8444 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  61+ 8446 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  62+ 8447 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  63+ 8448 23                                   inc     hl
  64+ 8449 10 F5                                djnz    .fillLoop
  65+ 844B C9                                   ret
  66+ 844C
  67+ 844C 21 56 81     ClearSlotA:             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

  79+ 8461 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)

  87+ 8471 32 2C 80    >                        ld      (JunkCount),a

  91+ 8479 C3 6C 84                             jp      .DoneIteration
  92+ 847C
  93+ 847C

1181  852E                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 852E              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 852E              doRND2:
   3+ 852E A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 852F              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 852F              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 852F              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 852F              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 852F 3A 77 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 8532 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 8534 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 8535 21 79 7E     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 8538 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 8539 32 77 7E     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 853C 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 853D 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 853E 32 79 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 8541 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 8542 3A 78 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 8545 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 8546 21 7A 7E     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 8549 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 854A 32 78 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 854D 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 854E 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 854F 32 7A 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 8552 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 8553                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 8553 C9                                   ret
  29+ 8554
  30+ 8554 21 77 7E     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed

  33+ 855D ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 855F ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 8561 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 8563 ED A0                                ldi

  16+ 859D 21 1E 80     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 85A0 11 12 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 85A3 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 85A5
  20+ 85A5 21 12 80     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 85A8 11 1E 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 85AB 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 85AD
  24+ 85AD 21 12 80     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 85B0 11 FA 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 85B3 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 85B5
  28+ 85B5 21 FA 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 85B8 11 12 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 85BB 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 85BD
  32+ 85BD              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 85BD CD C0 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 85C0              .NextStep:
  35+ 85C0 CD C3 85     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 85C3              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 85C3 3A FA 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 85C6 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 85C7 21 FC 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 85CA 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 85CB 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 85CC 3A FB 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 85CF 21 FD 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 85D2 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 85D3 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 85D4 3A FC 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 85D7 32 FA 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 85DA 3A FD 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 85DD 32 FB 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 85E0 3A FF 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 85E3 32 FD 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 85E6 3A FE 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 85E9 32 FC 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 85EC B7           		or		a
  55+ 85ED 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 85EE 21 FC 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 85F1 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 85F2 32 FE 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 85F5 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 85F6 21 FD 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 85F9 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 85FA 32 FF 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 85FD C9           		ret
  64+ 85FE
  65+ 85FE              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 85FE CD 01 86     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 8601              .NextStep:
  68+ 8601 CD 04 86     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8604              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8604              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8604 3A 12 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8607 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8608 21 14 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 860B 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 860C 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 860D              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 860D 3A 13 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 8610 21 15 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 8613 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 8614 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 8615 3A 14 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8618 32 12 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 861B 3A 15 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 861E 32 13 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 8621 3A 17 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 8624 32 15 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8627 3A 16 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 862A 32 14 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 862D B7           		or		a
  90+ 862E 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 862F 21 14 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 8632 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 8633 32 16 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 8636 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8637 21 15 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 863A 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 863B 32 17 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 863E C9           		ret
  99+ 863F

 101+ 8640 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 8641 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 8642
 104+ 8642 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 8643 32 87 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 8646 3A FB 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 8649 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 864A 3A 25 80     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 864D 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 864E 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 864F 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 8650 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 8652 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 8654 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 8656 32 41 86     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 8659 ED 5B 3F 86                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 865D BA                                   cp		d

 126+ 866C 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 866E ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8670 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8671 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8672 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8674 3A 41 86     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 8677 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 8678 ED 43 3F 86                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 867C C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 867D CD B5 85                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8680 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8681 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8682 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8683 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8684 CD BD 85     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8687 3A 87 7F                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 868A 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 868B FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 868D C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 868E 32 87 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8691 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8693
 148+ 8693              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8693 3A 13 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8696 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 8698 32 3F 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 869B 3A 14 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 869E CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 86A0 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 86A2 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 86A4 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 86A6 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 86A8 32 40 80     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 86AB CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 86AD FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 86AF 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 86B1              .Fedual:
 163+ 86B1 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 86B4 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 86B6 32 3F 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 86B9              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 86B9 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 86BC EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 86BE 32 41 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 86C1 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 86C2 3A 15 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 86C5 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 86C7 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 86C8 32 41 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 86CB 3A 40 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 86CE CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 86D0 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 86D1 3A 41 80     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 86D4 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 86D5 32 41 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 86D8 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 86DA CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 86DC 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 86DD 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 86E0 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 86E1 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 86E2 3A 40 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 86E5 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 86E6 32 42 80     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 86E9 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 86EC EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 86EE C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 86F0 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 86F1 3A 40 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 86F4 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 86F6 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 86F7 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 86F9 3A 42 80     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 86FC 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 86FD ED 30        		mul
 201+ 86FF CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 8701 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8703 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8705 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8707 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8709 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 870B ED 53 44 80  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 870F              .DoRadius:
 209+ 870F 3A 15 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 8712 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 8713 3A 17 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8716 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8718 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 871A 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 871B ED 43 48 80  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 871F C9           		ret
 217+ 8720
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  52+ 887C
  53+ 887C              getTableText:
  54+ 887C              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 887C              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 887C D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 887D ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 887F ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 8881 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 8882 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 8883 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 8884 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8885 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8886 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 8887
  66+ 8887
  67+ 8887              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 8887              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 8887              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 8887              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 8887              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 8887              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 8887              getRankIndex:
  74+ 8887              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 8887              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 8887 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 8888 B3           	or		e
  78+ 8889 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 888B C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 888C AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 888D 21 C5 87     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 8890              .testLoop:
  83+ 8890 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 8891 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 8892 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8893 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8894 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8895 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8896 CD D1 9A     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 8899 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 889B              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 889B E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 889C 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 889D 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 889E 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 889F 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 88A1              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 88A1 E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 88A2 C9           	ret
 100+ 88A3
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 227+ 8EBD 7A 8E 7D 8E  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 227+ 8EC1 83 8E 80 8E
 227+ 8EC5 8C 8E 86 8E
 227+ 8EC9 89 8E 8F 8E
 228+ 8ECD 92 8E        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23

 230+ 8ED3 9E 8E        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 231+ 8ED5 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 232+ 8EF6
 233+ 8EF6              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8EF6              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8EF6
 236+ 8EF6              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8EF6              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8EF6              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8EF6 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8EF7 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8EF8 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8EFA C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8EFB FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8EFD 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8EFF FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8F01 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8F03              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8F03 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8F05 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8F06 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 251+ 8F08
 252+ 8F08 21 EF 8D     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8F0B C3 11 8F                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8F0E
 255+ 8F0E 21 21 8D     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8F11 ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8F13 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8F15 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8F16 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8F17 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8F18 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8F19 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8F1A D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8F1B C9                                   ret
 265+ 8F1C
 266+ 8F1C
 267+ 8F1C              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8F1C              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 269+ 8F1C 21 9F 8E     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 270+ 8F1F CD 7C 88     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8F22 11 D5 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8F25              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8F25 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8F26 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8F28 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8F2A E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8F2B D5           	push	de
 278+ 8F2C 21 21 8D     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8F2F CD 7C 88     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8F32 D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8F33              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8F33 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8F34 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8F36 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8F38              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8F38 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8F39 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8F3A 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8F3B 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8F3D              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8F3D 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8F3F 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8F40 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8F41 E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8F42 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8F43 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8F45              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8F45 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8F46 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8F47 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8F48 C9           	ret
 302+ 8F49
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

  12+ 8FC2              NamingLoop:

  15+ 8FC7 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ 8FC9 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase

  37+ 8FE3              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,ixl                      ;
  38+ 8FE3              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeSigns             ; and do calc again
  39+ 8FE3              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.HLDEWasNegative:       pop     hl                         ; get back hl swap values and try again
  40+ 8FE3              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  41+ 8FE3              ; example
  42+ 8FE3              ; bhl - 00 00 06 CDE - 80 00 0B so equates to 000006 + (-00000B) or -000005 or 800005
  43+ 8FE3
  44+ 8FE3              ; Adds DE to HL, in form S15 result will also be S15 rather than 2's C
  45+ 8FE3 7C           AddDEtoHLSigned:        ld      a,h                         ; extract h sign to b
  46+ 8FE4 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; hl = abs (hl)
  47+ 8FE6 47                                   ld      b,a
  48+ 8FE7 7C                                   ld      a,h
  49+ 8FE8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  50+ 8FEA 67                                   ld      h,a
  51+ 8FEB 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; extract d sign to c
  52+ 8FEC E6 80                                and     $80                         ; de = abs (de)
  53+ 8FEE 4F                                   ld      c,a
  54+ 8FEF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  55+ 8FF0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  56+ 8FF2 57                                   ld      d,a
  57+ 8FF3 78                                   ld      a,b
  58+ 8FF4 A9                                   xor     c
  59+ 8FF5 C2 FD 8F                             jp      nz,.OppositeSigns
  60+ 8FF8 19           .SameSigns              add     hl,de                       ; same signs so just add
  61+ 8FF9 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; and bring in the sign from b
  62+ 8FFA B4                                   or      h                           ; note this has to be 15 bit result
  63+ 8FFB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; but we can assume that
  64+ 8FFC C9                                   ret
  65+ 8FFD              .OppositeSigns:         ClearCarryFlag
  65+ 8FFD B7          >                        or a
  66+ 8FFE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  67+ 9000 38 04                                jr      c,.OppsiteSignInvert
  68+ 9002 78           .OppositeSignNoInvert:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  69+ 9003 B4                                   or      h
  70+ 9004 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  71+ 9005 C9                                   ret
  72+ 9006              .OppsiteSignInvert:     NegHL                              ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  72+ 9006 AF          >                    xor a
  72+ 9007 95          >                    sub l
  72+ 9008 6F          >                    ld l,a
  72+ 9009 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  72+ 900A 94          >                    sub h
  72+ 900B 67          >                    ld h,a
  73+ 900C 78                                   ld      a,b
  74+ 900D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit               ; flip sign bit
  75+ 900F B4                                   or      h
  76+ 9010 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  77+ 9011 C9                                   ret
  78+ 9012
  79+ 9012 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  80+ 9013 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  81+ 9015 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  82+ 9016                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  82+ 9016 FA 24 90    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  83+ 9019 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  84+ 901A B1                                   or      c
  85+ 901B                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  85+ 901B FA 20 90    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  86+ 901E 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  87+ 901F C9                                   ret
  88+ 9020 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  89+ 9021 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ 9022                                                          DISPLAY "TODO: don't bother with overflow for now"
  91+ 9022 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  92+ 9023 C9                                   ret
  93+ 9024              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  93+ 9024 B7          >                        or a
  94+ 9025 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  95+ 9027 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  96+ 9029 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  97+ 902A C9                                   ret
  98+ 902B              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  98+ 902B AF          >                    xor a
  98+ 902C 95          >                    sub l
  98+ 902D 6F          >                    ld l,a
  98+ 902E 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  98+ 902F 94          >                    sub h
  98+ 9030 67          >                    ld h,a
  99+ 9031 78                                   ld      a,b
 100+ 9032 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 101+ 9034 C9                                   ret
 102+ 9035
 103+ 9035 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
 104+ 9036 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 105+ 9038 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 106+ 9039 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 107+ 903A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 107+ 903A FA 52 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 108+ 903D 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 109+ 903E B2                                   or      d
 110+ 903F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 110+ 903F FA 44 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 111+ 9042 19                                   add     hl,de
 112+ 9043 C9                                   ret
 113+ 9044 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 114+ 9045 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 115+ 9047 67                                   ld      h,a
 116+ 9048 7A                                   ld      a,d
 117+ 9049 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 118+ 904B 57                                   ld      d,a
 119+ 904C 19                                   add     hl,de
 120+ 904D 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 121+ 904F                                                      DISPLAY "TODO:  dont bother with overflow for now"
 122+ 904F B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 123+ 9050 67                                   ld      h,a
 124+ 9051 C9                                   ret
 125+ 9052 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 126+ 9053 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 127+ 9055 67                                   ld      h,a
 128+ 9056 7A                                   ld      a,d
 129+ 9057 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 130+ 9059 57                                   ld      d,a
 131+ 905A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 131+ 905A B7          >                        or a
 132+ 905B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 133+ 905D 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 134+ 905F 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 135+ 9060 B4                                   or      h
 136+ 9061 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 137+ 9062 C9                                   ret
 138+ 9063              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 138+ 9063 AF          >                    xor a
 138+ 9064 95          >                    sub l
 138+ 9065 6F          >                    ld l,a
 138+ 9066 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 138+ 9067 94          >                    sub h
 138+ 9068 67          >                    ld h,a
 139+ 9069 78                                   ld      a,b
 140+ 906A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 141+ 906C B4                                   or      h
 142+ 906D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 143+ 906E C9                                   ret
 144+ 906F
 145+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
 146+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         jr      nz,.noneghl
 147+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16hl
 148+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED .noneghl:               bit     7,d
 149+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         jr      nz,.nonegde
 150+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16de
 151+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
 152+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         xor     a                           ; assume positive
 153+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         bit     7,h
 154+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
 155+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         call    negate16hl
 156+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         ld      a,$FF
 157+ 906F              ;;;NOT USED                         ret

 169+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de

 177+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
 178+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         add     hl,a
 179+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 180+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
 181+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
 182+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ld      d,0
 183+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ClearCarryFlag

 185+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
 186+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         SetSignBit      h
 187+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 188+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 189+ 906F              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret

 193+ 906F              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 194+ 906F                      DISPLAY "TODO: AddAusngToHLsng not used"
 195+ 906F              ;;;AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 196+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      e,h

 200+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      a,d

 202+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      a,e

 205+ 906F              ;;;                        ret
 206+ 906F              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 207+ 906F              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 208+ 906F                      DISPLAY "TODO: HLEequAusngMinusHLsng not used"
 209+ 906F              ;;;HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 210+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 211+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      a,b
 212+ 906F              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 906F              ;;;                        jr      nz,.DoAdd
 214+ 906F              ;;;.DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 215+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 216+ 906F              ;;;                        ld      l,c
 217+ 906F              ;;;                        ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 906F              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 219+ 906F              ;;;                        ret
 220+ 906F              ;;;.DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 221+ 906F              ;;;                        add hl,a
 222+ 906F              ;;;                        ret
 223+ 906F              ;tested mathstestsun2
 224+ 906F              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 225+ 906F 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 226+ 9070 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 227+ 9071 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 228+ 9073 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 229+ 9075 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 230+ 9076 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 231+ 9078 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 232+ 907A 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 233+ 907B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 234+ 907D 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 235+ 907E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 236+ 907F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 237+ 9081 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 238+ 9082 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 239+ 9083 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 240+ 9084 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 241+ 9085 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 242+ 9086 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 243+ 9087 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 244+ 9088 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 245+ 9089 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 246+ 908A FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 247+ 908C 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 248+ 908D C9                                   ret                         ; done
 249+ 908E 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 250+ 908F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 251+ 9091 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 252+ 9093 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 253+ 9094 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 254+ 9095 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 255+ 9097 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 256+ 9099 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 257+ 909A E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 258+ 909B 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 259+ 909D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 260+ 909F E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 261+ 90A0 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 262+ 90A2 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 263+ 90A4 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 264+ 90A5                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 264+ 90A5 BD          >                        cp      l
 264+ 90A6 DA B0 90    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 265+ 90A9 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 266+ 90AB              ; The same so its just zero
 267+ 90AB AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 268+ 90AC 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 269+ 90AD 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 270+ 90AE 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 271+ 90AF C9                                   ret                        ; .
 272+ 90B0              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 273+ 90B0 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 274+ 90B1 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 275+ 90B2 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 276+ 90B3 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 277+ 90B4 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 278+ 90B5 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 279+ 90B6 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 280+ 90B7 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 281+ 90B8 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 282+ 90B9 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 283+ 90BB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 284+ 90BD B2                                   or      d                  ;
 285+ 90BE 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 286+ 90BF C9                                   ret
 287+ 90C0 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 288+ 90C1 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 289+ 90C2 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 290+ 90C3 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 291+ 90C4 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 292+ 90C5 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 293+ 90C6 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 294+ 90C7 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 295+ 90C8 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 296+ 90C9 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 297+ 90CB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 298+ 90CD B2                                   or      d                  ;
 299+ 90CE 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 300+ 90CF C9                                   ret
 301+ 90D0
 302+ 90D0              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 303+ 90D0              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 304+ 90D0                      DISPLAY "TODO: AddAHLtoDEsigned not used"
 305+ 90D0              ;;;AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 306+ 90D0              ;;;                        ld      c,d                     ; .
 307+ 90D0              ;;;                        xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 308+ 90D0              ;;;                        res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 309+ 90D0              ;;;                        jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 310+ 90D0              ;;;                        add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 311+ 90D0              ;;;                        ret                             ; return
 312+ 90D0              ;;;.OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 313+ 90D0              ;;;                        ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 314+ 90D0              ;;;                        add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 315+ 90D0              ;;;                        ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 316+ 90D0              ;;;                        and     a                       ;      reset carry
 317+ 90D0              ;;;                        sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 318+ 90D0              ;;;                        ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 319+ 90D0              ;;;                        ret                             ;      ret

 321+ 90D0
 322+ 90D0              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 323+ 90D0              ; a = value to add
 324+ 90D0              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 325+ 90D0              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 326+ 90D0              ; NOT USED addINWKbasigned:
 327+ 90D0              ; NOT USED 		ld 		hl,UBnkxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 328+ 90D0              ; NOT USED 		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 329+ 90D0              ; NOT USED 		ld		a,b
 330+ 90D0              ; NOT USED 		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 331+ 90D0              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 332+ 90D0              ; NOT USED         and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 333+ 90D0              ; NOT USED         ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 334+ 90D0              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 335+ 90D0              ; NOT USED         and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 336+ 90D0              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 337+ 90D0              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 338+ 90D0              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 339+ 90D0              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 340+ 90D0              ; NOTUSEDaddhlcsigned:
 341+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 342+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 343+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      d,(hl)
 344+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 345+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 346+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 347+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 348+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 349+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        jr      z,.postivecalc
 350+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED.negativecalc:
 351+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,h
 352+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 353+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 354+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 355+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 356+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        sbc     hl,bc
 357+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 358+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 359+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 360+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 361+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 362+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 363+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 364+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a
 365+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 366+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 367+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 368+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 369+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 370+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 371+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED.nocarry:
 372+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 373+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        or      b                           ; b is still varT
 374+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 375+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 376+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 377+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 378+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 379+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 380+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 381+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ret
 382+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED.postivecalc:
 383+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b
 384+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0
 385+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        add     hl,de
 386+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl
 387+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 388+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 389+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 390+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 391+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 392+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 393+ 90D0              ; NOTUSED        ret
 394+ 90D0
 395+ 90D0              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 396+ 90D0              ;MVT1
 397+ 90D0              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 398+ 90D0              ;    A = sign bit => T
 399+ 90D0              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 400+ 90D0              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 401+ 90D0              ;
 402+ 90D0              ;        and h, 7F
 403+ 90D0              ;        b = 0
 404+ 90D0              ;        c = varS
 405+ 90D0              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 406+ 90D0              ;        retain carry
 407+ 90D0              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 408+ 90D0              ;        and 7F
 409+ 90D0              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 410+ 90D0              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 411+ 90D0              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 412+ 90D0              ;
 413+ 90D0              ;    else
 414+ 90D0              ;MV10.
 415+ 90D0              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 416+ 90D0              ;        or      sign bit
 417+ 90D0
 418+ 90D0
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
1189  90D0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_subtract.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
   1+ 90D0              ;...subtract routines
   2+ 90D0              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
   3+ 90D0 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
   4+ 90D1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   5+ 90D3 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
   6+ 90D4 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ 90D5                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
   7+ 90D5 FA 03 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
   8+ 90D8 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
   9+ 90D9 B2                                   or      d
  10+ 90DA                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ 90DA FA E4 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  11+ 90DD                                      ClearCarryFlag
  11+ 90DD B7          >                        or a
  12+ 90DE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  13+ 90E0                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  13+ 90E0 FA F7 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  14+ 90E3 C9                                   ret
  15+ 90E4 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  16+ 90E5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  17+ 90E7 67                                   ld      h,a
  18+ 90E8 7A                                   ld      a,d
  19+ 90E9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ 90EB 57                                   ld      d,a
  21+ 90EC                                      ClearCarryFlag
  21+ 90EC B7          >                        or a
  22+ 90ED ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  23+ 90EF                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  23+ 90EF FA F7 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  24+ 90F2                                                          DISPLAY "TODO:  don't bother with overflow for now"
  25+ 90F2 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  26+ 90F3 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  27+ 90F5 67                                   ld      h,a
  28+ 90F6 C9                                   ret
  29+ 90F7              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  29+ 90F7 AF          >                    xor a
  29+ 90F8 95          >                    sub l
  29+ 90F9 6F          >                    ld l,a
  29+ 90FA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  29+ 90FB 94          >                    sub h
  29+ 90FC 67          >                    ld h,a
  30+ 90FD 78                                   ld      a,b
  31+ 90FE EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  32+ 9100 B4                                   or      h
  33+ 9101 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  34+ 9102 C9                                   ret
  35+ 9103 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  36+ 9104 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  37+ 9105 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  38+ 9107 67                                   ld      h,a
  39+ 9108 7A                                   ld      a,d
  40+ 9109 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  41+ 910B 57                                   ld      d,a
  42+ 910C 19                                   add     hl,de
  43+ 910D 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  44+ 910E B4                                   or      h
  45+ 910F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  46+ 9110 C9                                   ret
  47+ 9111
  48+ 9111
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
1190  9111                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ 9111              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 9111 2A E2 84     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 9114 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 9115 22 E2 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 9118 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 911B 2A E4 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 911E ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 9120 22 E4 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 9123 C9                                   ret
  10+ 9124
  11+ 9124 2A E2 84     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 9127 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 9128 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 9129 2A E4 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 912C B4                                   or      h
  16+ 912D B5                                   or      l
  17+ 912E C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 912F B7                                   or      a
  19+ 9130 2A E2 84                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 9133 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 9135 22 E2 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 9138 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 913B 2A E4 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 913E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 9140 22 E4 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 9143                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 9143 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 9145 C2 49 91    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 9148 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9149 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 914C 22 E2 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 914F 22 E4 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 9152 C9                                   ret
  32+ 9153
