1191  9153                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 9153              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 9153              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 9153 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 9154 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 9155 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 9157 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 9159 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 915A AF                                   xor a
   9+ 915B 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 915C 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 915D DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 915F CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 9161 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 9163 17                                   rla
  15+ 9164 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 9165 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 9167 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 9169 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 916B 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 916C 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 916E ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 9170 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 9171 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 9173 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 9174 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 9175 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 9176 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 9178 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 9179 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 917A DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 917C D1                                   pop de
  32+ 917D C9                                   ret
  33+ 917E
  34+ 917E FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 9180 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9182 CD 53 91                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 9185 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 9186 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 9188 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 918A B1                                   or      c
  41+ 918B 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 918C F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 918D C9                                   ret
  44+ 918E
  45+ 918E                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 918E FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 9190 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9191 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 9193 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 9195 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 9196 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 9198 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 9199 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 919B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 919D CD 53 91                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 91A0 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 91A2 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 91A4 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 91A5 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 91A7 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 91A8 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 91AA C9                                   ret
  63+ 91AB
  64+ 91AB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 91AB              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 91AB              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 91AB              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 91AB 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 91AC 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 91AE 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 91B0 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 91B3 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 91B4 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 91B7 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 91B8 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 91BA CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 91BC 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 91BD ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 91BF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 91C1 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 91C3 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 91C4 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 91C5 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 91C7 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 91C8 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 91CB C9                                   ret
  87+ 91CC
  88+ 91CC
  89+ 91CC
  90+ 91CC
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
1192  91CC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ 91CC              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 91CC 2A 83 7F                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 91CF 3A 82 7F                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 91D2 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 91D4 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 91D7 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 91D8                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 91D8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 91DA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 91DC CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 91DE 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 91E0 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 91E1 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 91E2 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 91E3              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 91E3 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 91E5 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 91E7 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 91E9 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 91EB 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 91ED EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 91EE D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 91F0 C9                                   ret
  20+ 91F1
  21+ 91F1              ; FMLTU - A = A * Q / 256
  22+ 91F1 57           AequAmulQdiv256usgn:    ld      d,a
  23+ 91F2 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 91F5 5F                                   ld      e,a
  25+ 91F6              asm_defmutl:
  26+ 91F6              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
  27+ 91F6 ED 30        AequDmulEdiv256usgn:    mul     de
  28+ 91F8 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  29+ 91F9 C9                                   ret
  30+ 91FA
  31+ 91FA
  32+ 91FA              ; muliptiply S7d ny S7e signed
  33+ 91FA              ; used A and B registers
  34+ 91FA              ; result in DE
  35+ 91FA 7A           mulDbyESigned:          ld      a,d
  36+ 91FB AB                                   xor     e
  37+ 91FC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  38+ 91FE 47                                   ld      b,a
  39+ 91FF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  40+ 9200 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  41+ 9202 57                                   ld      d,a
  42+ 9203 7B                                   ld      a,e
  43+ 9204 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 9206 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9207 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9209 7A                                   ld      a,d
  47+ 920A B0                                   or      b
  48+ 920B 57                                   ld      d,a
  49+ 920C C9                                   ret
  50+ 920D
  51+ 920D
  52+ 920D
  53+ 920D              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  54+ 920D ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  55+ 920D ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  56+ 920D ~                                    ld      e,a
  57+ 920D ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  58+ 920D ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  59+ 920D ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  60+ 920D ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  61+ 920D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  62+ 920D ~                                    ld      d,a
  63+ 920D ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  64+ 920D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  65+ 920D ~                                    ld      e,a
  66+ 920D ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  67+ 920D ~                                    ld      a,d
  68+ 920D ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  69+ 920D ~                                    ld      d,a
  70+ 920D                                      ENDM
  71+ 920D
  72+ 920D
  73+ 920D
  74+ 920D                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  75+ 920D              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  75+ 920D 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  75+ 920E 3A 82 7F    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  75+ 9211 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  75+ 9212 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  75+ 9213 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  75+ 9215 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  75+ 9216 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  75+ 9217 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 9219 57          >                        ld      d,a
  75+ 921A 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  75+ 921B E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 921D 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  75+ 921E ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  75+ 9220 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  75+ 9221 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  75+ 9222 57          >                        ld      d,a
  76+ 9223 2A 83 7F                             ld		hl,(varR)
  77+ 9226 CD 4E 92                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  78+ 9229 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  79+ 922A                                      ClearCarryFlag
  79+ 922A B7          >                        or a
  80+ 922B DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  81+ 922D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  82+ 922E C9                                   ret
  83+ 922F
  84+ 922F              madDEequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  84+ 922F 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  84+ 9230 3A 82 7F    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  84+ 9233 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  84+ 9234 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  84+ 9235 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  84+ 9237 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  84+ 9238 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  84+ 9239 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  84+ 923B 57          >                        ld      d,a
  84+ 923C 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  84+ 923D E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  84+ 923F 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  84+ 9240 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  84+ 9242 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  84+ 9243 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  84+ 9244 57          >                        ld      d,a
  85+ 9245 2A 83 7F                             ld		hl,(varR)
  86+ 9248 CD 4E 92                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  87+ 924B EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  88+ 924C                                      ClearCarryFlag
  88+ 924C B7          >                        or a
  89+ 924D C9                                   ret
  90+ 924E
  91+ 924E 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  92+ 924F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  93+ 9251 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  94+ 9252 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  95+ 9253                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  95+ 9253 FA 6B 92    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  96+ 9256 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  97+ 9257 B2                                   or      d
  98+ 9258                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  98+ 9258 FA 5D 92    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  99+ 925B 19                                   add     hl,de
 100+ 925C C9                                   ret
 101+ 925D 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 102+ 925E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 103+ 9260 67                                   ld      h,a
 104+ 9261 7A                                   ld      a,d
 105+ 9262 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 106+ 9264 57                                   ld      d,a
 107+ 9265 19                                   add     hl,de
 108+ 9266 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 109+ 9268 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 110+ 9269 67                                   ld      h,a
 111+ 926A C9                                   ret
 112+ 926B 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 113+ 926C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 114+ 926E 67                                   ld      h,a
 115+ 926F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 116+ 9270 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 117+ 9272 57                                   ld      d,a
 118+ 9273 B7                                   or      a
 119+ 9274 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 120+ 9276 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 121+ 9278 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 122+ 9279 B4                                   or      h
 123+ 927A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 124+ 927B C9                                   ret
 125+ 927C              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 125+ 927C AF          >                    xor a
 125+ 927D 95          >                    sub l
 125+ 927E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 125+ 927F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 125+ 9280 94          >                    sub h
 125+ 9281 67          >                    ld h,a
 126+ 9282 78                                   ld      a,b
 127+ 9283 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 128+ 9285 B4                                   or      h
 129+ 9286 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 130+ 9287 C9                                   ret
 131+ 9288
 132+ 9288
 133+ 9288                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 134+ 9288                  ;
 135+ 9288                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 136+ 9288                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 137+ 9288                  ;
 138+ 9288                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 139+ 9288                  ;         carry reset
 140+ 9288                  ;
 141+ 9288                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 142+ 9288 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 143+ 9289 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 144+ 928A ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 145+ 928C EB                                   ex de,hl
 146+ 928D ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 147+ 928F
 148+ 928F 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 149+ 9290 85                                   add a,l
 150+ 9291 57                                   ld  d,a
 151+ 9292 EB                                   ex de,hl
 152+ 9293
 153+ 9293 7A                                   ld  a,d
 154+ 9294 CE 00                                adc a,0
 155+ 9296 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9297
 157+ 9297 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 158+ 9298 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 159+ 9299 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 160+ 929B EB                                   ex      de,hl
 161+ 929C C9                                   ret
 162+ 929D
 163+ 929D                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 164+ 929D                 ;
 165+ 929D                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 166+ 929D                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 167+ 929D                 ;
 168+ 929D                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 169+ 929D                 ;         carry reset
 170+ 929D                 ;
 171+ 929D                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 172+ 929D
 173+ 929D
 174+ 929D
 175+ 929D 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 176+ 929E 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 177+ 929F 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 178+ 92A0 6A                                   ld l,d
 179+ 92A1 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 180+ 92A2 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 181+ 92A3              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 182+ 92A3 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 183+ 92A5 EB                                   ex de,hl
 184+ 92A6 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 185+ 92A8
 186+ 92A8 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 187+ 92A9 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 188+ 92AA 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 189+ 92AB
 190+ 92AB 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 191+ 92AC 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 192+ 92AD ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 193+ 92AF
 194+ 92AF 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 195+ 92B0 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 196+ 92B1
 197+ 92B1 7A                                   ld a,d
 198+ 92B2 85                                   add a,l
 199+ 92B3 67                                   ld h,a
 200+ 92B4 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 201+ 92B5
 202+ 92B5 D1                                   pop de
 203+ 92B6 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 204+ 92B8
 205+ 92B8 EB                                   ex de,hl
 206+ 92B9 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 207+ 92BB EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 208+ 92BC
 209+ 92BC C9                                   ret
 210+ 92BD
 211+ 92BD              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 212+ 92BD              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 213+ 92BD              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 214+ 92BD              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 215+ 92BD              ;         carry reset
 216+ 92BD              ; maths is
 217+ 92BD              ;        hl = y , de= x
 218+ 92BD              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 219+ 92BD              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 220+ 92BD              ;
 221+ 92BD              ;
 222+ 92BD              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 223+ 92BD C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 224+ 92BE 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 225+ 92BF 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 226+ 92C0 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 227+ 92C1 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 228+ 92C2 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 229+ 92C3 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 230+ 92C5 EB                                   ex de,hl
 231+ 92C6 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 232+ 92C8 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 233+ 92C9 59                                   ld e,c
 234+ 92CA 50                                   ld d,b
 235+ 92CB ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 236+ 92CD 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 237+ 92CE 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 238+ 92CF 67                                   ld h,a
 239+ 92D0 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 240+ 92D1                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 241+ 92D1 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 242+ 92D2 C1                                   pop     bc
 243+ 92D3 C9                                   ret
 244+ 92D4
 245+ 92D4              ; multiplication of 16-bit numbers by 8-bit product
 246+ 92D4              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 247+ 92D4              ;          l = 8-bit multiplicand
 248+ 92D4              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 249+ 92D4              ;         carry reset
 250+ 92D4              ; maths is
 251+ 92D4              ;        hl = y , de= x
 252+ 92D4              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 253+ 92D4              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 254+ 92D4              ;
 255+ 92D4              ;
 256+ 92D4              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 257+ 92D4 C5 E5 D5     mulDEbyLSigned:         push    bc,,hl,,de
 258+ 92D7 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 259+ 92D8 16 00                                ld d,0                      ; d = yh = 0
 260+ 92DA 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 261+ 92DB 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 262+ 92DC 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 263+ 92DD              ;                        mul                         ; yh * xl which will always be 0
 264+ 92DD EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = xh yl
 265+ 92DE ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 266+ 92E0 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; hl = xh * yl
 267+ 92E1              ;                        add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 268+ 92E1 59                                   ld e,c                      ; de = yl xl
 269+ 92E2 50                                   ld d,b                      ; .
 270+ 92E3 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 271+ 92E5 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 272+ 92E6 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 273+ 92E7 67                                   ld h,a
 274+ 92E8 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 275+ 92E9 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 276+ 92EA C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get de for sign
 277+ 92EB 78                                   ld      a,b
 278+ 92EC C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get hl for sign
 279+ 92ED A8                                   xor     b
 280+ 92EE E6 80                                and     $80                 ; so we now have the sign bit
 281+ 92F0 B4                                   or      h                   ; so set the sign
 282+ 92F1 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 283+ 92F2 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; clear up stack
 284+ 92F3 C9                                   ret
 285+ 92F4
 286+ 92F4                  DISPLAY "TODO: TEST"
 287+ 92F4 7A           mulDEbyHLSigned:        ld  a,d                     ; de = abs de
 288+ 92F5 47                                   ld  b,a                     ;
 289+ 92F6 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 290+ 92F8 57                                   ld  d,a                     ; .
 291+ 92F9 7C                                   ld  a,h                     ; hl = abs hl
 292+ 92FA 4F                                   ld  c,a                     ; .
 293+ 92FB E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 294+ 92FD 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 295+ 92FE 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; ixl = target sign of de * hl
 296+ 92FF AA                                   xor     d                   ;
 297+ 9300 E6 80                                and     $80                 ;
 298+ 9302 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a               ;
 299+ 9304 CD BD 92                             call    mulDEbyHL           ; calculate ABS(DE) * ABS(HL)
 300+ 9307 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; recover sign bit
 301+ 9308 DD B5                                or      ixl
 302+ 930A 67                                   ld      h,a
 303+ 930B C9                                   ret
 304+ 930C
 305+ 930C              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 306+ 930C              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 307+ 930C 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 308+ 930D AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 309+ 930E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 310+ 9310 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 311+ 9312 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 312+ 9313 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 313+ 9315 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 314+ 9316 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 315+ 9317 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 316+ 9319              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 9319 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 318+ 931A 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 319+ 931B ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 320+ 931D 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 321+ 931E 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 322+ 931F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 323+ 9320 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 324+ 9321 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 325+ 9322 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 326+ 9323 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 327+ 9325 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 328+ 9326 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 329+ 9327 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 330+ 9328 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 331+ 9329 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 332+ 932A 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 333+ 932B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 334+ 932C ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 335+ 932E 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 336+ 932F 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 337+ 9330 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 338+ 9332 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 339+ 9333 C9                                   ret
 340+ 9334
 341+ 9334              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 342+ 9334              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 343+ 9334              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 344+ 9334              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 345+ 9334              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 346+ 9334              ;mult3
 347+ 9334              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 348+ 9334              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 349+ 9334              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 350+ 9334              ; Algorithm
 351+ 9334              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 352+ 9334              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 353+ 9334              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 354+ 9334              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 355+ 9334              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 356+ 9334              ;
 357+ 9334              ;
 358+ 9334 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 359+ 9335 AC                                   xor     h
 360+ 9336 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 361+ 9338 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 362+ 933A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 363+ 933B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 364+ 933D 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 365+ 933F              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 365+ 933F AF          >                    xor a
 365+ 9340 95          >                    sub l
 365+ 9341 6F          >                    ld l,a
 365+ 9342 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 365+ 9343 94          >                    sub h
 365+ 9344 67          >                    ld h,a
 366+ 9345 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 367+ 9346 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 368+ 9348 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 369+ 934A              .DENegative:            NegDE
 369+ 934A AF          >                    xor a
 369+ 934B 93          >                    sub e
 369+ 934C 5F          >                    ld e,a
 369+ 934D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 369+ 934E 92          >                    sub d
 369+ 934F 57          >                    ld d,a
 370+ 9350 CD BD 92     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 371+ 9353 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 372+ 9355 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 373+ 9356 C8                                   ret     z
 374+ 9357
 375+ 9357
 376+ 9357              ; Mulitply HLE by D leading Sign
 377+ 9357              ; used IY A BC
 378+ 9357              ; result it loaded to DELC
 379+ 9357 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 380+ 9358 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 381+ 9359 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 382+ 935B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 383+ 935D 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 384+ 935E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 385+ 9360 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 386+ 9361 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 387+ 9362 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 388+ 9364 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 389+ 9365 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 390+ 9366 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 391+ 9368 7C                                   ld      a,h
 392+ 9369 B5                                   or      l
 393+ 936A B3                                   or      e
 394+ 936B 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 395+ 936D              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 396+ 936D 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 397+ 936E ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 398+ 9370 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 399+ 9371 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 400+ 9373 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 401+ 9374 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 402+ 9375 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 403+ 9377 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 404+ 9379 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 405+ 937A 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 406+ 937B FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 407+ 937D 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 408+ 937E 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 409+ 937F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 410+ 9381 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 411+ 9383 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 412+ 9384 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 413+ 9385 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 414+ 9386 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 415+ 9388 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 416+ 938A 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 417+ 938B C9                                   ret
 418+ 938C 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 419+ 938F                                      ZeroA
 419+ 938F AF          >                        xor a
 420+ 9390 4F                                   ld      c,a
 421+ 9391 6F                                   ld      l,a
 422+ 9392 C9                                   ret
 423+ 9393
 424+ 9393              ;;;
 425+ 9393              ;;;
 426+ 9393              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 427+ 9393              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 428+ 9393              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 429+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 430+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 431+ 9393              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 432+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 433+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 434+ 9393              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 435+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 436+ 9393              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 437+ 9393              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 438+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 439+ 9393              ;;;                        or      l
 440+ 9393              ;;;                        or      e
 441+ 9393              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 442+ 9393              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 443+ 9393              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 444+ 9393              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 445+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 446+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 447+ 9393              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 448+ 9393              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 449+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 450+ 9393              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 451+ 9393              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 452+ 9393              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 453+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 454+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 455+ 9393              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 456+ 9393              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 457+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 458+ 9393              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 459+ 9393              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 460+ 9393              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 461+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 462+ 9393              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 463+ 9393              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 464+ 9393              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 465+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 466+ 9393              ;;;                        ret
 467+ 9393              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 468+ 9393              ;;;                        ZeroA
 469+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 470+ 9393              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 471+ 9393              ;;;                        ret
 472+ 9393
 473+ 9393              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 474+ 9393              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 475+ 9393              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 476+ 9393              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 477+ 9393              ;         carry reset
 478+ 9393              ;
 479+ 9393              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 480+ 9393 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 481+ 9394 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 482+ 9395 32 93 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 483+ 9398 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 484+ 9399 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 485+ 939C 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 486+ 939E E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 487+ 93A0 57                                   ld      d,a
 488+ 93A1 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 489+ 93A3 32 93 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 490+ 93A6 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 491+ 93A7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 492+ 93AA 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 493+ 93AC E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 494+ 93AE 67                                   ld      h,a
 495+ 93AF 3A 93 93                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 496+ 93B2 EE 80                                xor     $80
 497+ 93B4 32 93 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 498+ 93B7 CD BD 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 499+ 93BA 3A 93 93     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 500+ 93BD ED 27 80                             test    $80
 501+ 93C0 C8                                   ret     z
 502+ 93C1 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 503+ 93C2 95                                   sub 	l
 504+ 93C3 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 505+ 93C4 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 506+ 93C5 94                                   sub 	h
 507+ 93C6 67                                   ld 		h,a
 508+ 93C7 C9                                   ret
 509+ 93C8
 510+ 93C8 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 511+ 93C9 32 93 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 512+ 93CC 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 513+ 93CD ED 27 80                             test    $80
 514+ 93D0 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 515+ 93D2 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 516+ 93D4 57                                   ld      d,a
 517+ 93D5 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 518+ 93D7 32 93 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 519+ 93DA CD BD 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 520+ 93DD 3A 93 93     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 521+ 93E0 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 522+ 93E3 C8                                   ret     z
 523+ 93E4 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 524+ 93E5 95                                   sub 	l
 525+ 93E6 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 526+ 93E7 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 527+ 93E8 94                                   sub 	h
 528+ 93E9 67                                   ld 		h,a
 529+ 93EA C9                                   ret

1193  93EB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 93EB              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 93EB              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 93EB
   4+ 93EB              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 93EB ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 93EB ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 93EB ~            			mul
   8+ 93EB              			ENDM
   9+ 93EB
  10+ 93EB              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 93EB ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 93EB ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 93EB ~            			mul
  14+ 93EB ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 93EB              			ENDM

1194  93EB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 93EB              ;- MACROS
   2+ 93EB              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 93EB ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 93EB ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 93EB ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 93EB                                      ENDM
   7+ 93EB
   8+ 93EB              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 93EB              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 93EB 21 94 94    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 93EE ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 93F0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 93F1 C9                                   ret
  11+ 93F2

1195  93F2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 93F2              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 93F2              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 93F2              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 93F2              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 93F2              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 93F2              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 93F2 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 93F5 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 93F6 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 93F7              .sqrloop:
  11+ 93F7 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 93F9 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 93FB 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 93FC EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 93FD ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 93FF 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 9401 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9402 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9403 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9405              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9405 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 9406 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 9407 B7           	or a
  24+ 9408 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 940A              .sqrfi:
  26+ 940A CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 940C CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 940E CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 9410 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 9412 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 9414 C9           	ret
  32+ 9415
  33+ 9415
  34+ 9415              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 9415 3A 82 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 9418 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 9419 3A 83 7F     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 941C 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 941D CD F2 93     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 9420 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 9421 32 82 7F     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 9424 C9           	ret
  43+ 9425
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1196  9425                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 9425              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 9425              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 9425              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 9425              ;
   5+ 9425              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 9425 3A 82 7E     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 9428 21 82 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 942B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 942C 32 7F 7E                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 942F 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 9432 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 9433 CA 75 94                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 9436 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 9438 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 943B 3A 82 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 943E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 9440 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 9443 21 82 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 9446 BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 9447 D2 59 94                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 944A CD 81 94                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 944D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 944D B7          >                        or a
  23+ 944E 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 944F 3A 7F 7E                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 9452 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 9453 A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 9454 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 9455 FA 78 94                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 9458 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 9459              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 9459              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 9459 3A 82 7F     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 945C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 945D 3A 82 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 9460 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 9463 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 9464 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 9467 CD 81 94                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 946A 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 946D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 946E 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 9470                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 9470 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 9471 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 9472 C3 4E 94                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 9475              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 9475 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 9477 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 9478              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 9478 32 9E 7F     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 947B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 947C 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 947E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 947E B7          >                        or a
  53+ 947F 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 9480 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 9481              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 9481 CD FA A2     ARS1:                   call    LL28Amul256DivQ_6502        ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 9484 3A 83 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 9487 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 9489 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 948B CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 948D 21 B4 94                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 9490 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 9492 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 9493 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 9494
  66+ 9494              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 9494              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 9494              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 9494              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 9494              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 9494              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 9494              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 9494              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 9494              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 9494              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 9494              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 9494              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 9494              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 9494              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 9494              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 9494              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 9494              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 9494              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 9494              ;;;		ret
  89+ 9494              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 9494              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 9494              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 9494              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 9494              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 9494              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 9494              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 9494              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 9494              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 9494              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 9494              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 9494              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 9494              ;;;		ret
 105+ 9494              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 9494              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 9494              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 9494              ;;;		ret
 110+ 9494              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 9494              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 9494              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 9494              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 9494              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 9494              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 9494              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 9494              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 9494              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 9494              ;;;		ret
 121+ 9494
 122+ 9494
 123+ 9494
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm

   1+ 94D4              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 94D4              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 94D4                      ; Input:
   4+ 94D4                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 94D4                      ; Output:
   6+ 94D4                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 94D4                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 94D4                      ;       AF
   9+ 94D4                      ;
  10+ 94D4              negate16:
  11+ 94D4 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 94D5 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 94D6 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 94D7 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 94D8 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 94D9 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 94DA C9                               ret
  18+ 94DB
  19+ 94DB AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 94DC 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 94DD 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 94DE 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 94DF 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 94E0 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 94E1 C9                               ret
  26+ 94E2
  27+ 94E2 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 94E3 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 94E4 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 94E5 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 94E6 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 94E7 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 94E8 C9                               ret
  34+ 94E9

1200  94E9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 94E9              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 94E9              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 94E9
   4+ 94E9              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 94E9 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 94ED 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 94F0
   8+ 94F0                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 94F0              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 94F0              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 94F0
  12+ 94F0              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 94F0              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 94F0 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 94F2 DA 07 95                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 94F5                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 94F5 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 94F6                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 94F6 B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 94F7 DA FC 94    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 94FA                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 94FA 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 94FB                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 94FB B7          >                        or a
  21+ 94FC              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 94FC 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 94FD CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 94FF DA F0 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 9502 78                                   ld      a,b

  25+ 9503 32 00 00                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 9506 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division

  28+ 9508                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 9508 37          >                        scf

  30+ 950B DA F0 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
