  32+ 950F 32 00 00                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 9512 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 9513 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 9515 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 9518 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 9519                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 9519 37          >                        scf
  38+ 951A C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 951B
  40+ 951B
  41+ 951B 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 951C
  43+ 951C 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 951D 32 EB 94                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 9520 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 9521 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 9523 32 EA 94                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 9526 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 9527 E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 9529 32 E9 94                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 952C C3 32 95                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 952F              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 952F              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 952F 32 84 7E     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 9532                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 9532                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 9532                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 9532                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 9532                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 9532                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 9532              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 9532 3A 82 7E     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 9535 F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 9537 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 953A              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 953A 3A 84 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 953D 21 84 7F                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 9540 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 9541 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 9543 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 9546              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 9546 3A 82 7F     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 9549 21 83 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 954C B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 954D C2 55 95                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 9550 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 9552 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 9555              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 9555 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 9557 3A 84 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 955A E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 955C              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 955C              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 955C                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 955C              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 955C FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 955E D2 6F 95                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 9561 21 82 7E                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 9564 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 9566 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 9567 CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 9569 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 956B 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 956C C3 5C 95                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 956F              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 956F 32 84 7E     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 9572 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 9575 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 9577                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 9577              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 9577              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 9577              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 9577              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 9577 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 9578 21 82 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 957B CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 957D 21 83 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 9580 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 9582 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 9584 F2 77 95                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 9587              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 9587              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 9587 32 82 7F     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 958A 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 958B 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 958C 32 1B 95                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 958F              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 958F 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 9591 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 9594 3A 84 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 9597 CD F0 94                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 959A              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 959A                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 959A AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 959B 32 96 7F                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 959E 32 97 7F                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 95A1 32 98 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 95A4 3A 1B 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 95A7 B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 95A8 CA D3 95                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 95AB F2 DE 95                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 95AE              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 95AE                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 95AE 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 95AF 3A 1B 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 95B2 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 95B3 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 95B4                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 95B4 CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 95B6 21 96 7F                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 95B9 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 95BB 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 95BC CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 95BE 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 95BF CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 95C1 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 95C2 C2 B4 95                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 95C5 32 95 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 95C8 3A 98 7F                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 95CB 21 9E 7F                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 95CE B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 95CF 32 98 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 95D2 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 95D3              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 95D3 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 95D4 32 95 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 95D7 3A 9E 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 95DA 32 98 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 95DD C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 95DE              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 95DE              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 95DE              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 95DE              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 95DE                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 95DE 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 95DF 3A 1B 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 95E2 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 95E3 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 95E4 CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 95E6 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 95E7 C2 E4 95                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 95EA 32 95 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 95ED 3A 9E 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 95F0 32 98 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 95F3 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 95F4              ;
 176+ 95F4              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 95F4              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 95F4              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 95F4              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 95F4              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 95F4              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 95F4              ;           else
 183+ 95F4
 184+ 95F4              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 95F4              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 95F4              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 95F4              ;
 188+ 95F4              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 95F4              ;
 190+ 95F4              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 95F4              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 95F4
 193+ 95F4 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 95F5 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 95F8 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 95F9 3A 82 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 95FC 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 95FD                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 95FD 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 95FE B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 95FF 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 9601 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 9602 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 9603 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 9605 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 9606 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 9607 E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 9609 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 960A 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 960C 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 960E                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 960E CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 9610 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 9612 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 9614 CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 9616 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 9618                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 9618 B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 9619 DA 1F 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 961C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 961C B7          >                        or a
 217+ 961D 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 961E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 961E B7          >                        or a
 219+ 961F 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 9620 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 9622 CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 9624 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 9625 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 9627 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 9628 B5                                   or      l
 226+ 9629 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 962A C9                                   ret
 228+ 962B              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 962B AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 962C 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 962D C9                                   ret
 231+ 962E 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 9630 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 9631 C9                                   ret
 234+ 9632
 235+ 9632 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 9633 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 9636 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 9638 3A 82 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 963B 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 963C                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 963C 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 963D B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 963E 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 9640 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 9641 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 9642 E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 9644 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 9645 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 9647 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 9649                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 9649 CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 964B CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 964D CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 964F CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 9651 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 9653                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 9653 B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 9654 DA 5A 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 9657                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 9657 B7          >                        or a
 256+ 9658 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 9659                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 9659 B7          >                        or a
 258+ 965A 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 965B CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 965D CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 965F 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 9660 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 9662 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 9663 B5                                   or      l
 265+ 9664 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 9665 C9                                   ret
 267+ 9666              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 9666 AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 9667 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 9668 C9                                   ret
 270+ 9669
 271+ 9669 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 966A 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 966B 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 966D 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 966F 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 9671 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 9672 B3                                   or      e
 278+ 9673 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 9675 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 9676 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 9677 CD C9 97                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 967A                                      ZeroA
 282+ 967A AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 967B EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 967C 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 967E 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 967F C9                                   ret
 287+ 9680 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 9681 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 9682 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 9683 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 9684 C9                                   ret
 292+ 9685 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 9687 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 9688 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 9689                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 9689 37          >                        scf
 296+ 968A C9                                   ret
 297+ 968B
 298+ 968B              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 968B                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 968B ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 968B ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 968B ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 968B ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 968B ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 968B ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 968B ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 968B ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 968B ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 968B ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 968B ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 968B ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 968B ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 968B ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 968B ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 968B ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 968B ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 968B ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 968B ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 968B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 968B ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 968B ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 968B ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 968B ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 968B ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 968B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 968B ~                                    ret
 327+ 968B ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 968B ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 968B ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 968B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 968B ~                                    ret
 332+ 968B ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 968B ~                                    ret
 334+ 968B                          ENDIF
 335+ 968B
 336+ 968B BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 968C 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 968E 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 9690 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 9692 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 9694 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 9696                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 9696 BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 9697 DA 9C 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 969A 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 969B                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 969B B7          >                        or a
 345+ 969C              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 969C 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 969D CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 969F 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 96A1 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 96A2 C9                                   ret
 350+ 96A3 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 96A4                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 96A4 37          >                        scf
 352+ 96A5 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 96A7 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 96A9 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 96AA C9                                   ret
 356+ 96AB 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 96AD C9                                   ret
 358+ 96AE 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 96B0 C9                                   ret
 360+ 96B1
 361+ 96B1              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 96B1              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 96B1              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 96B1              ;
 365+ 96B1              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 96B1              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 96B1              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 96B1              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 96B1              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 96B1              ;;;    rla
 371+ 96B1              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 96B1              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 96B1              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 96B1              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 96B1              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 96B1              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 96B1              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 96B1              ;;;    rla
 379+ 96B1              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 96B1              ;;;    ret
 381+ 96B1
 382+ 96B1              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 96B1              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 96B1              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 96B1              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 96B1              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 96B1              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 96B1              ;140 bytes
 389+ 96B1              ;145cc
 390+ 96B1
 391+ 96B1              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 96B1 ~                                rla
 393+ 96B1 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 96B1 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 96B1 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 96B1 ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 96B1                                  ENDM
 398+ 96B1
 399+ 96B1 AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 400+ 96B2 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 401+ 96B4 7A                               ld a,d
 402+ 96B5                                  MacroDEDivBC
 402+ 96B5 17          >                    rla
 402+ 96B6 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 402+ 96B8 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 402+ 96BA 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 402+ 96BC 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 403+ 96BD                                  MacroDEDivBC
 403+ 96BD 17          >                    rla
 403+ 96BE ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 403+ 96C0 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 403+ 96C2 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 403+ 96C4 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 404+ 96C5                                  MacroDEDivBC
 404+ 96C5 17          >                    rla
 404+ 96C6 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 404+ 96C8 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 404+ 96CA 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 404+ 96CC 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 405+ 96CD                                  MacroDEDivBC

 405+ 96D0 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 405+ 96D2 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3

 406+ 96D8 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 406+ 96DA 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 406+ 96DC 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 407+ 96E0 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 407+ 96E2 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 407+ 96E4 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 419+ 971E 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 419+ 9720 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 420+ 9721                                  MacroDEDivBC
 420+ 9721 17          >                    rla
 420+ 9722 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 420+ 9724 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 420+ 9726 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 420+ 9728 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 421+ 9729                                  MacroDEDivBC
 421+ 9729 17          >                    rla
 421+ 972A ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 421+ 972C ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 421+ 972E 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 421+ 9730 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 422+ 9731                                  MacroDEDivBC
 422+ 9731 17          >                    rla
 422+ 9732 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 422+ 9734 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 422+ 9736 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 422+ 9738 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 423+ 9739 17                               rla
 424+ 973A 2F                               cpl
 425+ 973B 5F                               ld e,a
 426+ 973C C9                               ret
 427+ 973D              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 973D              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 973D              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 973D              ; Our use
 431+ 973D              ; BC = A0
 432+ 973D              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 973D              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 973D              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 973D B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 973E D2 69 97    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 9741 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 9742 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 9743 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 9745 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 9747 C3 54 97                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 974A 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 974B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 974D 21 82 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 9750 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 9751 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 9753 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 9754              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 9754 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 9757 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 9758 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 975A CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 975C 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 975D ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 975F ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 9761 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 9763 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 9764 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 9765 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 9767 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 9768 C9                                   ret
 460+ 9769 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 976C C9                                   ret
 462+ 976D              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 976D              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 976D 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 976F AF                                   xor a
 466+ 9770 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 9772 17                                   rla
 468+ 9773 BA                                   cp d
 469+ 9774 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 9776
 470+ 9776 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 9777 92                                   sub d
 472+ 9778 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 977A C9                                   ret
 474+ 977B              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 977B 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 977D AF                                   xor a
 477+ 977E CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 9780 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 9782              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 9782 17                                   rla
 481+ 9783 B9                                   cp c
 482+ 9784 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 9786 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 9787 91                                   sub c
 485+ 9788 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 978A C9                                   ret
 487+ 978B              ;
 488+ 978B              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 978B              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 978B              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 978B              ;
 492+ 978B              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 978B ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 978B ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 978B ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 978B ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 978B ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 978B ~            1:
 499+ 978B ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 978B                                      ENDM
 501+ 978B
 502+ 978B              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 503+ 978B ~                                    rl  e
 504+ 978B ~                                    rla
 505+ 978B ~                                    sub c
 506+ 978B ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 507+ 978B ~                                    add a,c
 508+ 978B ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 509+ 978B                                      ENDM
 510+ 978B
 511+ 978B              ; Switch to a logarithm version
 512+ 978B              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 513+ 978B              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 513+ 978B AF          >                        xor a
 514+ 978C                                      EDivC_Iteration
 514+ 978C CB 13       >                        rl  e
 514+ 978E 17          >                        rla
 514+ 978F 91          >                        sub c

 514+ 9792 81          >                        add a,c

 515+ 9795 17          >                        rla

 515+ 9797 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 515+ 9799 81          >                        add a,c

 516+ 97A0 81          >                        add a,c

 528+ 97C9
 529+ 97C9              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 97C9 ~                                    rla
 531+ 97C9 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 97C9 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 533+ 97C9 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 534+ 97C9 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 535+ 97C9 ~            1:

 537+ 97C9
 538+ 97C9
 539+ 97C9              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 97C9              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 97C9              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 97C9              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 97C9              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 97C9              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 97C9              ;144 bytes
 546+ 97C9 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 97CA 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 97CB 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 97CC 93                                   sub e
 550+ 97CD 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 97CE 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 97CF 92                                   sub d
 553+ 97D0 57                                   ld d,a
 554+ 97D1 78                                   ld a,b
 555+ 97D2                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 555+ 97D2 17          >                        rla
 555+ 97D3 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 555+ 97D5 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 555+ 97D6 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 555+ 97D8 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 555+ 97DA             >1:
 556+ 97DA                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 556+ 97DB ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 556+ 97DD 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 556+ 97DE 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 556+ 97E0 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 556+ 97E2             >1:
 557+ 97E2                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 573+ 9855             >1:
 574+ 9855 17                                   rla
 575+ 9856 4F                                   ld c,a
 576+ 9857 C9                                   ret
 577+ 9858 78           Floor_DivQSigned:       ld      a,b             ; save resultant sign
 578+ 9859 AA                                   xor     d               ;
 579+ 985A E6 80                                and     $80             ;
 580+ 985C DD 67                                ld      ixh,a           ;
 581+ 985E 78                                   ld      a,b
 582+ 985F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 583+ 9861 47                                   ld      b,a
 584+ 9862 7A                                   ld      a,d
 585+ 9863 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 586+ 9865 57                                   ld      d,a
 587+ 9866 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
 588+ 9869 78                                   ld      a,b
 589+ 986A DD B4                                or      ixh
 590+ 986C 47                                   ld      b,a
 591+ 986D C9                                   ret
 592+ 986E
 593+ 986E
 594+ 986E
 595+ 986E              ; BC = BC / DE
 596+ 986E              ; HL = BC % DE
 597+ 986E              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 598+ 986E 78           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,b
 599+ 986F B1                                   or      c
 600+ 9870 28 26                                jr      z, .divide0By   ; if bc is zero just return as result will be zero
 601+ 9872 7A                                   ld      a,d
 602+ 9873 B3                                   or      e
 603+ 9874 28 26                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 604+ 9876 D5                                   push    de
 605+ 9877 CD C9 97     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 606+ 987A D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 607+ 987B CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 608+ 987D C2 8D 98                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 609+ 9880 7A                                   ld      a,d
 610+ 9881 B3                                   or      e
 611+ 9882 CA 8D 98                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 612+ 9885 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 613+ 9887 C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 614+ 9888 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 615+ 9889                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 615+ 9889 B7          >                        or a
 616+ 988A ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 617+ 988C C9                                   ret
 618+ 988D CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 619+ 988F C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 620+ 9890 7C                                   ld      a,h
 621+ 9891 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 622+ 9892 C8                                   ret     z
 623+ 9893 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 624+ 9894                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 624+ 9894 B7          >                        or a
 625+ 9895 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 626+ 9897 C9                                   ret
 627+ 9898 21 00 00     .divide0By:             ld      hl,0            ; hl = 0, bc is already 0
 628+ 989B C9                                   ret
 629+ 989C 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 630+ 989F 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 631+ 98A2 C9                                   ret
 632+ 98A3
 633+ 98A3
 634+ 98A3              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 635+ 98A3 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 636+ 98A3 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 637+ 98A3 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 638+ 98A3 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 639+ 98A3 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 640+ 98A3 ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 641+ 98A3 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 642+ 98A3 ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 643+ 98A3 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 644+ 98A3 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 645+ 98A3 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 646+ 98A3 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 647+ 98A3 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 648+ 98A3 ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 649+ 98A3 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 650+ 98A3 ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 651+ 98A3                                      ENDM

 659+ 993B CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 659+ 993F EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 659+ 9940 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 659+ 9943 D2 47 99    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 659+ 9946 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 659+ 9947 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 659+ 9948 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 659+ 994C EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 659+ 994D CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 659+ 9951 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 659+ 9952 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 659+ 9955 D2 59 99    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 659+ 9958 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 659+ 9959 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 660+ 995A                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 660+ 995A CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 660+ 995E EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 660+ 995F CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 660+ 9963 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 660+ 9964 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 660+ 9967 D2 6B 99    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 660+ 996A 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 660+ 996B 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 660+ 996C CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 660+ 9970 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 660+ 9971 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 660+ 9975 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 660+ 9976 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 660+ 9979 D2 7D 99    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 660+ 997C 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 660+ 997D 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 661+ 997E                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 661+ 997E CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 661+ 9982 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 661+ 9983 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 661+ 9987 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 661+ 9988 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 661+ 998B D2 8F 99    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 661+ 998E 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 661+ 998F 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 661+ 9990 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 661+ 9994 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 661+ 9995 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 661+ 9999 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 661+ 999A B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 661+ 999D D2 A1 99    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 661+ 99A0 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 661+ 99A1 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 662+ 99A2                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 662+ 99A2 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 662+ 99A6 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 662+ 99A7 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 662+ 99AB EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 662+ 99AC B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 662+ 99AF D2 B3 99    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 662+ 99B2 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 662+ 99B3 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 662+ 99B4 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 662+ 99B8 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 662+ 99B9 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 662+ 99BD EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 662+ 99BE B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 662+ 99C1 D2 C5 99    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 662+ 99C4 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 662+ 99C5 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 663+ 99C6 CB 13 CB 12                          rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 664+ 99CA EB                                   ex      de,hl           ;dividend<>remainder
 665+ 99CB C9                                   ret
 666+ 99CC
 667+ 99CC
 668+ 99CC
 669+ 99CC
 670+ 99CC 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 671+ 99CF              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 671+ 99CF CB 25       >			   sla l
 671+ 99D1 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 672+ 99D3 7C                                   ld      a,h
 673+ 99D4 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 674+ 99D6                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 674+ 99D6 B9          >                        cp      c
 674+ 99D7 DA E2 99    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 675+ 99DA 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 676+ 99DB 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 677+ 99DC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 678+ 99DD 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 679+ 99DE DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 680+ 99E0 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 681+ 99E1 3F                                   ccf
 682+ 99E2              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 682+ 99E2 CB 13       >               rl  e
 682+ 99E4 CB 12       >               rl  d
 683+ 99E6 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 684+ 99E8 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 685+ 99E9 C9                                   ret
 686+ 99EA
 687+ 99EA
 688+ 99EA AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 689+ 99EB 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 690+ 99ED 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 691+ 99EE 17                                   rla
 692+ 99EF 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 693+ 99F1 B9                                   cp	c
 694+ 99F2 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 695+ 99F4 91                                   sub	c
 696+ 99F5 2C                                   inc	l
 697+ 99F6 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 698+ 99F8 C9                                   ret
 699+ 99F9              ;l_div, signed division
 700+ 99F9              ; comes in with DE and HL
 701+ 99F9              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 702+ 99F9 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 703+ 99FA 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 704+ 99FB C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 705+ 99FC 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 706+ 99FD 7A                                   ld      a,d
 707+ 99FE B7                                   or      a
 708+ 99FF F2 08 9A                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 709+ 9A02              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 709+ 9A02 AF          >					xor 	a
 709+ 9A03 93          >                    sub 	e
 709+ 9A04 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 709+ 9A05 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 709+ 9A06 92          >                    sub 	d
 709+ 9A07 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 710+ 9A08 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 711+ 9A09 B7                                   or      a
 712+ 9A0A F2 13 9A                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 713+ 9A0D                                      macronegate16bc
 713+ 9A0D AF          >					xor 	a
 713+ 9A0E 91          >                    sub 	c
 713+ 9A0F 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 713+ 9A10 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 713+ 9A11 90          >                    sub 	b
 713+ 9A12 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 714+ 9A13 CD A3 98     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 715+ 9A16                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 716+ 9A16 C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 717+ 9A17 78                                   ld      a,b
 718+ 9A18 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 719+ 9A19 F2 22 9A                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 720+ 9A1C                                      macronegate16hl
 720+ 9A1C AF          >					xor 	a
 720+ 9A1D 95          >					sub 	l
 720+ 9A1E 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 720+ 9A1F 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 720+ 9A20 94          >					sub 	h
 720+ 9A21 67          >					ld 		h,a
 721+ 9A22 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 722+ 9A23 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 723+ 9A24 F0                                   ret     p
 724+ 9A25                                      macronegate16de
 724+ 9A25 AF          >					xor 	a
 724+ 9A26 93          >                    sub 	e
 724+ 9A27 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 724+ 9A28 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 724+ 9A29 92          >                    sub 	d
 724+ 9A2A 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 725+ 9A2B C9                                   ret
 726+ 9A2C
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1201  9A2C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9A2C              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9A2C              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9A2C              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9A2C F5           	push af
   5+ 9A2D E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 9A2F 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 9A30 3A 82 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 9A33 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 9A34 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 9A35 BB           	cp e
  11+ 9A36 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 9A38 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 9A3A ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 9A3C EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9A3D 3A 82 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 9A40 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 9A41 CD 7B 97     	call asm_div16
  18+ 9A44 F1           	pop af
  19+ 9A45 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 9A47 B5           	or l
  21+ 9A48 C9           	ret
  22+ 9A49              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 9A49 F1           	pop af
  24+ 9A4A E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 9A4C F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 9A4E C9           	ret
  27+ 9A4F
  28+ 9A4F
  29+ 9A4F              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 9A4F              squareregfx:
  31+ 9A4F 3A A7 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 9A52 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 9A53 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 9A54 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 9A56 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 9A57              squareregfy:
  37+ 9A57 3A A9 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 9A5A 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 9A5B 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 9A5C ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9A5E 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9A5F              squareregfz:
  43+ 9A5F 3A AB C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9A62 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 9A63 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 9A64 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 9A66 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 9A67 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 9A68              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 9A68 CD F2 93     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9A6B E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9A6C E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9A6D E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9A6E              normfx:
  55+ 9A6E 3A A7 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9A71 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9A72 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9A73 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 9A74 CD 2C 9A     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 9A77 32 A7 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9A7A              normfy:
  62+ 9A7A 3A A9 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9A7D E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9A7E 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9A7F 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9A80 CD 2C 9A     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9A83 32 A9 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 9A86              normfz:
  69+ 9A86 3A AB C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9A89 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9A8A 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9A8B 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9A8C CD 2C 9A     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9A8F 32 AB C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9A92              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9A92 C9           	ret
  77+ 9A93
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1202  9A93                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9A93              ; Input:
   2+ 9A93              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9A93              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9A93              ; Output:
   5+ 9A93              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9A93              ;
   7+ 9A93              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9A93              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9A93              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9A93              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9A93              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9A93              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9A93              ;
  14+ 9A93
  15+ 9A93
  16+ 9A93 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 9A94 A7                               and     a
  18+ 9A95 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9A97 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 9A99 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9A9A C9                               ret
  22+ 9A9B
  23+ 9A9B E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9A9C A7                               and     a
  25+ 9A9D 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9A9F ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9AA1 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9AA2 C9                               ret
  29+ 9AA3
  30+ 9AA3
  31+ 9AA3              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9AA3              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9AA3 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 9AA4 AA                               xor d
  35+ 9AA5 FA AF 9A                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 9AA8 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9AAA 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9AAC 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9AAD                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9AAD 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9AAE C9                               ret
  41+ 9AAF CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9AB1 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9AB3              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9AB3 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 9AB4 C9                               ret
  45+ 9AB5 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 9AB6                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 9AB6 B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9AB7 C9                               ret
  48+ 9AB8              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 9AB8 37          >                        scf
  49+ 9AB9 C9                               ret
  50+ 9ABA
  51+ 9ABA              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9ABA 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 9ABB BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9ABC C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9ABD 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9ABE BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9ABF C9                               ret
  58+ 9AC0
  59+ 9AC0
  60+ 9AC0
  61+ 9AC0 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9AC1 A8                               xor b
  63+ 9AC2 FA CB 9A                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9AC5 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9AC7 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 9AC9              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 9AC9 37          >                        scf
  67+ 9ACA C9                               ret
  68+ 9ACB CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 9ACD 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 9ACF              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9ACF B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9AD0 C9                               ret

  76+ 9AD3 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9AD5 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 9AD6 C9                               ret
  79+ 9AD7              CompareHLBCSigned:

  81+ 9AD8 A7                               and     a
  82+ 9AD9 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 9ADB E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 9ADC C9                               ret
  85+ 9ADD
  86+ 9ADD              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 9ADD              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 9ADD
  89+ 9ADD E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 9ADF 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 9AE0 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 9AE2 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 9AE3 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 9AE4 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 9AE6 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9AE7 A7                               and     a
  97+ 9AE8 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
