1203  9AED                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9AED              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9AED              ; Tested and works with signed numbers
   3+ 9AED DD 7E 01     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+1)			; Vector X high
   4+ 9AF0 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = abs X high
   5+ 9AF2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; hl = abs X ^ 2
   6+ 9AF3 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
   7+ 9AF4 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
   8+ 9AF6 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
   9+ 9AF7 DD 7E 03                             ld		a,(ix+3)			; vector = Y high
  10+ 9AFA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  11+ 9AFC 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Y ^ 2
  12+ 9AFD 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  13+ 9AFE ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  14+ 9B00 19                                   add     hl,de               ; hl = x^2 + y ^2
  15+ 9B01 DD 7E 05                             ld		a,(ix+5)			; vector = Z high
  16+ 9B04 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  17+ 9B06 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Z ^ 2
  18+ 9B07 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  19+ 9B08 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  20+ 9B0A 19                                   add     hl,de               ; de = x^2 + y ^2 + z ^ 2
  21+ 9B0B EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  22+ 9B0C CD F2 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt de
  23+ 9B0F DD 7E 01     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  24+ 9B12 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  25+ 9B13 CD 4D 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8    ; does not use HL so we can retain it
  26+ 9B16 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  27+ 9B17 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  28+ 9B19 DD 71 00 DD                          ld		(ix+0),bc           ; .
  28+ 9B1D 70 01
  29+ 9B1F DD 7E 03     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+3)
  30+ 9B22 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  31+ 9B23 CD 4D 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  32+ 9B26 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  33+ 9B27 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  34+ 9B29 DD 71 02 DD                          ld		(ix+2),bc           ; .
  34+ 9B2D 70 03
  35+ 9B2F DD 7E 05     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+5)
  36+ 9B32 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  37+ 9B33 CD 4D 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8 	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  38+ 9B36 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  39+ 9B37 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  40+ 9B39 DD 71 04 DD                          ld		(ix+4),bc           ; .
  40+ 9B3D 70 05
  41+ 9B3F C9                                   ret
  42+ 9B40
  43+ 9B40              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  44+ 9B40 3A A7 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  45+ 9B43 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  46+ 9B45 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  47+ 9B47              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  47+ 9B47 5F          >			ld	e,a
  47+ 9B48 57          >			ld  d,a
  47+ 9B49 ED 30       >			mul
  48+ 9B4B 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  49+ 9B4C 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  50+ 9B4D 3A A8 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  51+ 9B50 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  52+ 9B52 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  53+ 9B54                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  53+ 9B54 5F          >			ld	e,a
  53+ 9B55 57          >			ld  d,a
  53+ 9B56 ED 30       >			mul
  54+ 9B58 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  55+ 9B59 3A A9 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  56+ 9B5C FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  57+ 9B5E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  58+ 9B60                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  58+ 9B60 5F          >			ld	e,a
  58+ 9B61 57          >			ld  d,a
  58+ 9B62 ED 30       >			mul
  59+ 9B64 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  60+ 9B65 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  61+ 9B66 CD F2 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  62+ 9B69 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  63+ 9B6C E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ 9B6E 4F                                   ld		c,a
  65+ 9B6F 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ 9B70 CD 03 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ 9B73 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  68+ 9B74 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  69+ 9B76 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  70+ 9B78 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  71+ 9B79 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  72+ 9B7C 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  73+ 9B7F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  74+ 9B81 4F                                   ld		c,a
  75+ 9B82 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  76+ 9B83 CD 03 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  77+ 9B86 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  78+ 9B87 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  79+ 9B89 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  80+ 9B8B B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  81+ 9B8C 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  82+ 9B8F 3A A9 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  83+ 9B92 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  84+ 9B94 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ 9B95 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  86+ 9B96 CD 03 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  87+ 9B99 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9B9A FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  89+ 9B9C E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  90+ 9B9E B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  91+ 9B9F 32 A9 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  92+ 9BA2 C9                                   ret
  93+ 9BA3
  94+ 9BA3              ; Normalise vector
  95+ 9BA3              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  96+ 9BA3              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  97+ 9BA3              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  98+ 9BA3              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  99+ 9BA3
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1204  9BA3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9BA3              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9BA3              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9BA3              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9BA3              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9BA3              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9BA3              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9BA3              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9BA3 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9BA6 CD BC 9B     	call	Num1
  10+ 9BA9 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9BAC CD BC 9B     	call	Num1
  12+ 9BAF 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9BB2 CD BC 9B     	call	Num1
  14+ 9BB5 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9BB7 CD BC 9B     	call	Num1
  16+ 9BBA 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9BBC              Num1:
  18+ 9BBC 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9BBE              .Num2:
  20+ 9BBE 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9BBF 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9BC0 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9BC2 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9BC4 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9BC5 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9BC6 C9           	ret
  27+ 9BC7
  28+ 9BC7              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9BC7 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9BC9 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9BCA C3 A3 9B     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9BCD
  33+ 9BCD              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9BCD 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9BCF 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9BD0 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9BD3 CD E3 9B     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9BD6 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9BD8 CD BC 9B     	call	Num1
  40+ 9BDB 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9BDD                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9BDD 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9BDE 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9BDF 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 9BE1 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 9BE3              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 9BE3 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9BE5              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9BE5 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9BE6 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9BE7 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9BE9 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9BEB 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9BED              .Blank:
  55+ 9BED 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9BEF              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9BEF ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 9BF1 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 9BF2 13           	inc	de
  60+ 9BF3 C9           	ret
  61+ 9BF4
  62+ 9BF4              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 9BF4 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9BF6 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 9BF8 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 9BFA 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 9BFB 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9BFE CD 0A 9C     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 9C01 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 9C03 CD 0A 9C     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9C06 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 9C08 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 9C0A              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 9C0A 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 9C0C              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 9C0C 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 9C0D 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9C0E 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 9C10 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 9C12 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 9C14              .Blank:
  82+ 9C14 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9C16              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9C16 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 9C18 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 9C19 13           	inc	de
  87+ 9C1A C9           	ret
  88+ 9C1B              .NoStock:
  89+ 9C1B 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 9C1D 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9C1E 13           	inc	de
  92+ 9C1F 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 9C20 13           	inc	de
  94+ 9C21 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 9C23 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 9C24 13           	inc de
  97+ 9C25 C9           	ret
  98+ 9C26
  99+ 9C26
 100+ 9C26              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 9C26              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 9C26              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 9C26              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 9C26 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 9C2A 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 9C2E 64 00 00 00
 104+ 9C32 E8 03 00 00
 104+ 9C36 10 27 00 00
 105+ 9C3A A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 105+ 9C3E 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 9C42 80 96 98 00
 105+ 9C46 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 9C4A 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 9C4E 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 9C52
 108+ 9C52              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 9C52 CD 61 9C     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 9C55 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 9C58 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 9C5B 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 9C5D FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 9C60 C9                                   ret
 115+ 9C61
 116+ 9C61 DD 22 4E 9C  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 117+ 9C65 ED 53 50 9C                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 118+ 9C69 DD 21 4A 9C                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 119+ 9C6D 06 09                                ld b,9
 120+ 9C6F 0E 00                                ld c,0
 121+ 9C71 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 122+ 9C73 B7                                   or a
 123+ 9C74 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 124+ 9C77 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 125+ 9C7A 2A 4E 9C                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 126+ 9C7D ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 9C7F 22 4E 9C                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 9C82 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 9C85 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 9C88 2A 50 9C                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 9C8B ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 9C8D 22 50 9C                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 133+ 9C90 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 134+ 9C92 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9C93 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9C94 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9C96 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 138+ 9C99 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 139+ 9C9C 2A 4E 9C                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 140+ 9C9F 19                                   add hl,de
 141+ 9CA0 22 4E 9C                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9CA3 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9CA6 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9CA9 2A 50 9C                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9CAC ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9CAE 22 50 9C                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9CB1 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9CB4 DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9CB6 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9CB7 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9CB8 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9CBA FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9CBD FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9CBF 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9CC1 3A 4E 9C                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9CC4 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9CC6 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9CC9 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9CCD C9                                   ret
 160+ 9CCE
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1205  9CCE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9CCE              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9CCE BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9CCF D2 EA 9C    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9CD2 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9CD4 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9CD6                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9CD6 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9CD7 DA ED 9C    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9CDA 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9CDB 37                                   scf
   7+ 9CDC CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9CDE 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9CE0 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9CE1 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9CE3 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9CE5 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9CE6 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9CE8 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9CE9 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9CEA 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9CEC C9                                   ret
  18+ 9CED B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9CEE CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9CF0 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9CF2 C3 E0 9C                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9CF5
  23+ 9CF5
  24+ 9CF5              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9CF5              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9CF5              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9CF5 CB 7F        	bit			        7,a
  28+ 9CF7 28 04        	jr			        z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9CF9 ED 44        	neg			        							; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9CFB CB FF        	set			        7,a
  31+ 9CFD              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9CFD              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9CFD              TIS2:
  34+ 9CFD 4F                                   ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9CFE 3A 82 7F                             ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9D01 57                                   ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9D02 79                                   ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9D03 4F           AequAdivDmul967Bit:     ld          c,a
  39+ 9D04 7A                                   ld          a,d
  40+ 9D05 CB 27                                sla         a       ; wipe sign bit
  41+ 9D07 C8                                   ret         z       ; quick exit if dividing 0 as a will have the result of 0
  42+ 9D08 30 10                                jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9D0A B7           .ScaleDown:             or          a       ; clear carry bit
  44+ 9D0B CB 3A                                srl         d       ; d >> 1 to get back to 7 bit value
  45+ 9D0D 79                                   ld          a,c
  46+ 9D0E E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit
  47+ 9D10 CB 3F                                srl         a
  48+ 9D12 47                                   ld          b,a
  49+ 9D13 79                                   ld          a,c
  50+ 9D14 E6 80                                and         $80
  51+ 9D16 B0                                   or          b
  52+ 9D17 C3 1B 9D                             jp          AequAdivDmul96
  53+ 9D1A 79           .OKToDivide:            ld          a,c
  54+ 9D1B 4F           AequAdivDmul96:         ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  55+ 9D1C E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  56+ 9D1E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  56+ 9D1E BA          >                        cp     d
  56+ 9D1F D2 3F 9D    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  57+ 9D22 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  58+ 9D24              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  59+ 9D24 CB 27                                sla			a
  60+ 9D26                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  60+ 9D26 BA          >                        cp      d
  60+ 9D27 DA 45 9D    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  61+ 9D2A 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  62+ 9D2B 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  63+ 9D2C CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  64+ 9D2E 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  65+ 9D30 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  66+ 9D31 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  67+ 9D33 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  68+ 9D35 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
  69+ 9D36 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  70+ 9D38 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  71+ 9D39 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  72+ 9D3A 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  73+ 9D3B E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  74+ 9D3D B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  75+ 9D3E C9                                   ret
  76+ 9D3F              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  77+ 9D3F 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
  78+ 9D40 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  79+ 9D42 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  80+ 9D44 C9                                   ret
  81+ 9D45              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  81+ 9D45 B7          >                        or a
  82+ 9D46 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  83+ 9D48 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  84+ 9D4A C3 30 9D                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  85+ 9D4D
  86+ 9D4D
  87+ 9D4D
  88+ 9D4D              ; as per AequAdivDmul967Bit but Q is an 8 bit unsigned
  89+ 9D4D              ; a = a(S7)/Q(8u)*96
  90+ 9D4D 4F           AequAdivDmul96Q8:       ld          c,a                         ; c = a
  91+ 9D4E 7A           .CheckDivide0:          ld          a,d                         ; check if its a / 0
  92+ 9D4F A7                                   and         a                           ; .
  93+ 9D50 CA 77 9D                             jp          z,.TIS2AccGTEQ              ; .
  94+ 9D53 79           .NotDivide0:            ld          a,c                         ; get back value of A
  95+ 9D54 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit                ; and make it abs, so a = abs(a) c = original a
  96+ 9D56                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  96+ 9D56 BA          >                        cp     d
  96+ 9D57 D2 77 9D    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  97+ 9D5A 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  98+ 9D5C              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  99+ 9D5C CB 27                                sla			a
 100+ 9D5E                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
 100+ 9D5E BA          >                        cp      d
 100+ 9D5F DA 7D 9D    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
 101+ 9D62 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
 102+ 9D63 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
 103+ 9D64 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 104+ 9D66 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 105+ 9D68 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
 106+ 9D69 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 107+ 9D6B CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 108+ 9D6D 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
 109+ 9D6E CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
 110+ 9D70 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
 111+ 9D71 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
 112+ 9D72 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
 113+ 9D73 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit    			; recover sign only
 114+ 9D75 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
 115+ 9D76 C9                                   ret
 116+ 9D77              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
 117+ 9D77 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
 118+ 9D78 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
 119+ 9D7A F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
 120+ 9D7C C9                                   ret
 121+ 9D7D              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
 121+ 9D7D B7          >                        or a
 122+ 9D7E CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 123+ 9D80 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 124+ 9D82 C3 68 9D                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
 125+ 9D85
 126+ 9D85
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1206  9D85                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9D85              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9D85              fmltu:
   3+ 9D85 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9D86 3A 82 7F                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9D89 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9D8A ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9D8C 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9D8D C9                                   ret
   9+ 9D8E
  10+ 9D8E 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9D8F ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9D91 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9D92 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9D93
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1207  9D93                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9D93              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9D93              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9D93 21 2E 81     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9D96 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9D98 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9D9A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9D9B C3 A7 9D     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9D9E              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9D9E 21 2E 81     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9DA1 3A 6C 7E     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9DA4 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9DA6 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9DA7              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9DA7 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9DA8 3A 7C 7F     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9DAB              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9DAB 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9DAD CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9DAF 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9DB0 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9DB1              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9DB1 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9DB3 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9DB5 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9DB6 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9DB8              DV8:
  27+ 9DB8 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9DB9 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9DBA              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9DBA CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9DBC 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9DBE              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9DBE              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9DBE 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9DC0 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9DC1              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9DC1 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9DC3 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9DC5 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9DC6 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9DC8              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9DC8 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9DC9              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9DC9 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9DCB 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9DCD 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9DCE 32 83 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9DD1 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9DD2 32 82 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9DD5 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9DD6              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9DD6 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9DD7 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9DD8 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9DDA 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9DDC 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9DDD 32 83 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9DE0 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9DE1 32 82 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9DE4 C9           		ret
  61+ 9DE5              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9DE5 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9DE7 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9DE8 32 83 7F     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9DEB 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9DEC 32 82 7E     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9DEF C9           		ret
  68+ 9DF0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1208  9DF0              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm" Moved to general multiply code
1209  9DF0
1210  9DF0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9DF0              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9DF0              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9DF0              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9DF0 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9DF2 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9DF4 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9DF5 3A 82 7F     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9DF8 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9DF9 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9DFB 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9DFD AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9DFE E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9E00 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9E01 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9E02 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9E04 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9E05 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9E06 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9E08 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9E09 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9E0B 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9E0C 32 82 7E     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9E0F 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9E10 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9E11 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9E12 C9           	ret
  27+ 9E13              .mul0:
  28+ 9E13 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9E14 32 82 7E     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9E17 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9E18 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9E19 C9           	ret
  33+ 9E1A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1211  9E1A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9E1A              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9E1A              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9E1A              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9E1A              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9E1A              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9E1A              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9E1A              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9E1A              LL38:
   9+ 9E1A              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9E1A              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9E1A              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9E1A              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9E1A              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9E1A              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9E1A              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9E1A              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9E1A              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9E1A              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9E1A              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9E1A              ;	ret
  21+ 9E1A              ; calculation table
  22+ 9E1A              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9E1A              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9E1A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9E1A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9E1A              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9E1A              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9E1A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9E1A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9E1A              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9E1A
  32+ 9E1A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9E1A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9E1A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9E1A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9E1A
  37+ 9E1A
  38+ 9E1A              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9E1A 21 84 7F     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9E1D AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9E1E FA 29 9E     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9E21 3A 82 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9E24 21 83 7F     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9E27 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9E28 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9E29              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9E29 3A 83 7F     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9E2C 21 82 7F     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9E2F              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9E2F              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9E2F B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9E30 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9E31 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9E33              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9E33              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9E33              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9E33 C9           	ret
  57+ 9E34              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9E34 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9E36 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9E38 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9E3A 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9E3B 3A 84 7F     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9E3E EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9E40 32 84 7F     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9E43 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9E44                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9E44 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9E45 C9           	ret
  68+ 9E46              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9E46 32 84 7F         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9E49                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9E49 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9E4A C9               ret
  72+ 9E4B              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9E4B              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9E4B              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9E4B              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9E4B              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9E4B              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9E4B              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9E4B              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9E4B              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9E4B              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9E4B              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9E4B              ;--	ret
  84+ 9E4B
  85+ 9E4B              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9E4B              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9E4B              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9E4B              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9E4B              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9E4B              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9E4B              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9E4B              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9E4B              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9E4B              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9E4B              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9E4B              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9E4B              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9E4B              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9E4B              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9E4B              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9E4B              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9E4B              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9E4B              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9E4B              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9E4B              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9E4B              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9E4B              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9E4B              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9E4B              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9E4B              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9E4B              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9E4B              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9E4B              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9E4B              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9E4B              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9E4B
 142+ 9E4B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1212  9E4B              ;;DEFUNCT    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
1213  9E4B
1214  9E4B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9E4B              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9E4B              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9E4B              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9E4B              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9E4B              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9E4B              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9E4B              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9E4B              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9E4B              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9E4B              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9E4B              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9E4B              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9E4B              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9E4B              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9E4B              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9E4B              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9E4B              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9E4B              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9E4B              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9E4B              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9E4B              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9E4B              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9E4B              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9E4B              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9E4B              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9E4B              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9E4B              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9E4B              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9E4B              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9E4B
  40+ 9E4B              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9E4B 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9E4C 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9E4D 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9E4F              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9E4F 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9E50 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9E51 C8             ret z
  48+ 9E52 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9E55 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9E57              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9E57 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9E59 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9E5A 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9E5C C9             ret
  55+ 9E5D
  56+ 9E5D              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9E5D              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9E5D              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9E5D              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9E5D 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9E5F AF                   xor a
  62+ 9E60              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9E60 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9E61 17                   rla
  65+ 9E62 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9E63 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9E65 91                   sub c
  68+ 9E66 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9E67              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9E67 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9E69 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9E6A 32 83 7F             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9E6D C9                   ret
  74+ 9E6E
  75+ 9E6E
  76+ 9E6E
  77+ 9E6E              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9E6E              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9E6E              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9E6E F5           		push	af
  81+ 9E6F 3A 82 7F     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9E72 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9E73 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9E74 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9E76 CA 8D 9E     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9E79              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9E79 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9E7B 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9E7C              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9E7C 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9E7E AF           		xor a
  92+ 9E7F              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9E7F 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9E80 17           		rla
  95+ 9E81 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9E82 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9E84 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9E85 91           		sub c
  99+ 9E86              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9E86 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9E88 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9E89 32 83 7F     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9E8C C9           		ret
 104+ 9E8D              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9E8D 32 83 7F     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9E90 C9           		ret
 107+ 9E91              ;	push	af
 108+ 9E91              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9E91              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9E91              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9E91              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9E91              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9E91              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9E91              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9E91              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9E91              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9E91              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9E91              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9E91              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9E91              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9E91              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9E91              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9E91              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9E91              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9E91              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9E91              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9E91              ;	scf
 128+ 9E91              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9E91              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9E91              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9E91              ;LL2:
 132+ 9E91              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9E91              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9E91              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9E91              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9E91              ;	ret
 137+ 9E91
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1215  9E91                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9E91              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9E91              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9E91              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9E91 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9E92 3A 82 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9E95 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9E97 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9E99 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9E9A 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9E9C AF               xor a
  11+ 9E9D              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9E9D CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9E9F 17               rla
  14+ 9EA0 BA               cp d
  15+ 9EA1 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9EA3 0C               inc c
  17+ 9EA4 92               sub d
  18+ 9EA5              LL64:
  19+ 9EA5 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9EA7 32 81 7F     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9EAA 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9EAB 32 83 7F     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9EAE C9               ret
  24+ 9EAF              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9EAF 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9EB1 32 83 7F     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9EB4 32 81 7F     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9EB7 C9           	ret
  29+ 9EB8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
1216  9EB8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9EB8              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9EB8              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9EB8              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9EB8 CD F0 9D     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9EBB 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9EBC 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9EBD 32 84 7F     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9EC0 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9EC1 32 83 7F     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9EC4 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9EC5 C9           	ret
  12+ 9EC6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
