1220  9F56                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ 9F56              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9F56              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ 9F56              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ 9F56              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9F56              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ 9F56              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14
   7+ 9F56              ;rotmap1xLo: DB	0				; INWK +15
   8+ 9F56              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ 9F56              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ 9F56              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ 9F56              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ 9F56              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ 9F56              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ 9F56              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ 9F56              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ 9F56              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ 9F56              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ 9F56              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26
  19+ 9F56              ;
  20+ 9F56              ;rotmatFx	equ	rotmat0xHi
  21+ 9F56              ;rotmatFy	equ	rotmat0yHi
  22+ 9F56              ;rotmatFz	equ	rotmat0zHi
  23+ 9F56              ;rotmatUx	equ	rotmat1xHi
  24+ 9F56              ;rotmatUy	equ	rotmat1yHi
  25+ 9F56              ;rotmatUz	equ	rotmat1zHi
  26+ 9F56              ;
  27+ 9F56              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ 9F56
  29+ 9F56                  IFDEF USE_NORMALISE_IX
  30+ 9F56 ~
  31+ 9F56 ~            ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4 b = vector 5
  32+ 9F56 ~            ; performs (d*e + h*l) / b and puts the result in de where e is 0
  33+ 9F56 ~            TidyCalc:       push    bc
  34+ 9F56 ~                            call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  35+ 9F56 ~                            ex      hl,de                   ; get hl into de and save result of de
  36+ 9F56 ~                            call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  37+ 9F56 ~                            call    AddDEtoHLSigned         ; BC = HL = HL + DE
  38+ 9F56 ~                            pop     de                      ; DE = BC saved from earlier
  39+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,h                     ; check for result 0
  40+ 9F56 ~                            or      l                       ; .
  41+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.ZeroResult           ; .
  42+ 9F56 ~                            ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  43+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,d                     ; check for divide by zero
  44+ 9F56 ~                            and     a                       ; .
  45+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.MaxedResult          ; .
  46+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,d                     ; now de = 0b (i.e. b register not hex value)
  47+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,0                     ;
  48+ 9F56 ~                            call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  49+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  50+ 9F56 ~                            and     $80                     ; .
  51+ 9F56 ~                            or      c                       ; bring in the value
  52+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  53+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,0                     ; .
  54+ 9F56 ~                            ret
  55+ 9F56 ~            .MaxedResult:   ld      a,b                     ; make result signed unity (i.e. 1 or 96 in our case)
  56+ 9F56 ~                            xor     $80
  57+ 9F56 ~                            or      $60
  58+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
  59+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,0
  60+ 9F56 ~                            ret
  61+ 9F56 ~            .ZeroResult:    ld      de,0
  62+ 9F56 ~                            ret
  63+ 9F56 ~            ; as per tidy calc except
  64+ 9F56 ~            ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4
  65+ 9F56 ~            ; performs (d*e - h*l) / 96 and puts the result in de where e is 0
  66+ 9F56 ~
  67+ 9F56 ~            TidySide:       call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  68+ 9F56 ~                            ex      de,hl                   ; get hl = vector 1 * vector 2
  69+ 9F56 ~                            call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  70+ 9F56 ~                            call    SubDEfromHLSigned       ; BC = HL = HL - DE
  71+ 9F56 ~                            ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  72+ 9F56 ~                            ld      de,$60                  ; now de = 96
  73+ 9F56 ~                            call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  74+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  75+ 9F56 ~                            and     $80                     ; .
  76+ 9F56 ~                            or      c                       ; bring in the value
  77+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  78+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,0                     ; .
  79+ 9F56 ~                            ret
  80+ 9F56 ~
  81+ 9F56 ~            ;; orthonormalise vector for UBnK ship vector uses IX IT
  82+ 9F56 ~                DISPLAY "TidyVectorsIX"
  83+ 9F56 ~            TidyVectorsIX:  ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  84+ 9F56 ~                            call    NormaliseIXVector       ; initially we normalise the nose vector
  85+ 9F56 ~            .CheckNoseXSize:ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)  ; a = nose x
  86+ 9F56 ~                            and     %00110000                ; if bits 7 and 6 are clear the work with nosey
  87+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z, .NoseXSmall
  88+ 9F56 ~            ;-- When nosex is large ------------------------  roofv_x =-(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
  89+ 9F56 ~            .NoseXLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)  ; a = nose x
  90+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
  91+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)  ; hl = nosev_y * roofv_y
  92+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a                     ; we already have d so only need roofY
  93+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)  ; de = nosev_z * roofv_z
  94+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a                     ; .
  95+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)  ; .
  96+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a                     ; .
  97+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  98+ 9F56 ~                            ld      b,a
  99+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidyCalc
 100+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,d
 101+ 9F56 ~                            or      e
 102+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.NoRoofXFlip
 103+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 104+ 9F56 ~                            xor     d
 105+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 106+ 9F56 ~            .NoRoofXFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
 107+ 9F56 ~                            jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 108+ 9F56 ~            .MaxedRoofX:    ld      de,$E000                ; TEST if sign is correct for all of these if was divide by zero make it -1
 109+ 9F56 ~                            ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
 110+ 9F56 ~                            jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 111+ 9F56 ~            ;-- When noseX is small ------------------------ determine if we are doign roofz or roof y
 112+ 9F56 ~            .NoseXSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 113+ 9F56 ~                            and     %01100000
 114+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.NoseYSmall
 115+ 9F56 ~            ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 116+ 9F56 ~            .NoseYLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 117+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 118+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 119+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a
 120+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 121+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a
 122+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 123+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a
 124+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 125+ 9F56 ~                            ld      b,a
 126+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidyCalc
 127+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,d
 128+ 9F56 ~                            or      e
 129+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.NoRoofZFlip
 130+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 131+ 9F56 ~                            xor     d
 132+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 133+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 134+ 9F56 ~                            xor     d
 135+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 136+ 9F56 ~            .NoRoofZFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de   ; write roofvz
 137+ 9F56 ~                            jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 138+ 9F56 ~            ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 139+ 9F56 ~            .NoseYSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 140+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 141+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 142+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a
 143+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 144+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a
 145+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 146+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a
 147+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 148+ 9F56 ~                            ld      b,a
 149+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidyCalc
 150+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,d
 151+ 9F56 ~                            or      e
 152+ 9F56 ~                            jp      z,.NoRoofYFlip
 153+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 154+ 9F56 ~                            xor     d
 155+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 156+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 157+ 9F56 ~                            xor     d
 158+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 159+ 9F56 ~            .NoRoofYFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de   ; write roofvy
 160+ 9F56 ~            .NormaliseRoofv:ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; now normalise roofv
 161+ 9F56 ~                            call    NormaliseIXVector
 162+ 9F56 ~            ; -- sidev_x = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 163+ 9F56 ~            .CalcSidevX:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 164+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 165+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 166+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a
 167+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 168+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a
 169+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 170+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a
 171+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidySide
 172+ 9F56 ~                            ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de   ; write sidevX
 173+ 9F56 ~            ; -- sidev_y = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 174+ 9F56 ~            .CalcSidevY:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 175+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 176+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 177+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a
 178+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 179+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a
 180+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 181+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a
 182+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidySide
 183+ 9F56 ~                            ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de   ; write sidevX
 184+ 9F56 ~            ; -- sidev_z = (nosev_y * roofv_x - nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 185+ 9F56 ~            .CalcSidevZ:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 186+ 9F56 ~                            ld      d,a
 187+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 188+ 9F56 ~                            ld      e,a
 189+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ 9F56 ~                            ld      h,a
 191+ 9F56 ~                            ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 192+ 9F56 ~                            ld      l,a
 193+ 9F56 ~                            call    TidySide
 194+ 9F56 ~                            ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de   ; write sidevX
 195+ 9F56 ~                        IFDEF ROUND_ROLL_AND_PITCH
 196+ 9F56 ~            .ClearLowBytes: ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 197+ 9F56 ~                            ZeroA
 198+ 9F56 ~                            ld      b,9
 199+ 9F56 ~            .WriteLoop:     ld      (hl),a
 200+ 9F56 ~                            inc     hl
 201+ 9F56 ~                            inc     hl
 202+ 9F56 ~                            djnz    .WriteLoop
 203+ 9F56 ~                        ENDIF
 204+ 9F56 ~                            ret
 205+ 9F56                  ELSE
 206+ 9F56              ;
 207+ 9F56              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
 208+ 9F56
 209+ 9F56              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
 210+ 9F56              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
 211+ 9F56              ; TESTED OK
 212+ 9F56
 213+ 9F56
 214+ 9F56 2A A7 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
 215+ 9F59 3A A9 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
 216+ 9F5C E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
 217+ 9F5E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
 218+ 9F60 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
 219+ 9F61 5F                                   ld      e,a
 220+ 9F62 ED 30                                mul     de
 221+ 9F64 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
 222+ 9F66 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
 223+ 9F67 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
 224+ 9F69 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
 225+ 9F6B 57                                   ld      d,a
 226+ 9F6C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 227+ 9F6D ED 30                                mul     de
 228+ 9F6F EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
 229+ 9F70 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
 230+ 9F71 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 231+ 9F73 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
 232+ 9F75 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
 233+ 9F76 57                                   ld      d,a
 234+ 9F77 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
 235+ 9F79 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
 236+ 9F7A 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
 237+ 9F7B EB                                   ex      de,hl
 238+ 9F7C CD F2 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 239+ 9F7F 55                                   ld      d,l
 240+ 9F80 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
 241+ 9F82 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
 242+ 9F84 CD 4D 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 243+ 9F87                                      DISPLAY "TODO: ERROR if D is > 127 then it thinkgs its -ve number and falls appart"
 244+ 9F87                                     ;TODO : Need a divison routine where D is unsigned as its sqare rooted so will always be positive
 245+ 9F87 57                                   ld      d,a
 246+ 9F88 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
 247+ 9F8B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 248+ 9F8D B2                                   or      d
 249+ 9F8E 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
 250+ 9F91 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
 251+ 9F93 55                                   ld      d,l
 252+ 9F94 CD 4D 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 253+ 9F97 57                                   ld      d,a
 254+ 9F98 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
 255+ 9F9B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 256+ 9F9D B2                                   or      d
 257+ 9F9E 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
 258+ 9FA1 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
 259+ 9FA3 55                                   ld      d,l
 260+ 9FA4 CD 4D 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 261+ 9FA7 57                                   ld      d,a
 262+ 9FA8 3A A9 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
 263+ 9FAB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 264+ 9FAD B2                                   or      d
 265+ 9FAE 32 A9 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
 266+ 9FB1 C9                                   ret
 267+ 9FB2
 268+ 9FB2              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
 269+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 270+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 271+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 272+ 9FB2                                      ENDM
 273+ 9FB2              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
 274+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 275+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 276+ 9FB2 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 277+ 9FB2                                      ENDM
 278+ 9FB2
 279+ 9FB2
 280+ 9FB2              TidyUBnk:               ;break
 281+ 9FB2                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 281+ 9FB2 CD C6 9E    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 281+ 9FB5 CD 56 9F    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 281+ 9FB8 CD FF 9E    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 282+ 9FBB 3A 37 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 283+ 9FBE E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 284+ 9FC0 C2 58 A0                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 285+ 9FC3 3A 39 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 286+ 9FC6 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 287+ 9FC8 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 288+ 9FCA              ;...roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 289+ 9FCA 3A 37 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 290+ 9FCD 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 291+ 9FD0 3A 31 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 292+ 9FD3 CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA
 293+ 9FD6 3A 3B C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 294+ 9FD9 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 295+ 9FDC 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 296+ 9FDF CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 297+ 9FE2 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 298+ 9FE3 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 299+ 9FE5 57                                   ld      d,a
 300+ 9FE6 3A 39 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 301+ 9FE9 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a
 302+ 9FEC 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 303+ 9FED E6 7F                                and     $7F
 304+ 9FEF B3                                   or      e
 305+ 9FF0 FE 00                                cp      0
 306+ 9FF2 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 307+ 9FF4                                      ZeroA
 307+ 9FF4 AF          >                        xor a
 308+ 9FF5 C3 52 A0                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 309+ 9FF8 FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 310+ 9FFA 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 311+ 9FFC 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 312+ 9FFE B2                                   or      d
 313+ 9FFF C3 52 A0                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 314+ A002 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 315+ A003 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a
 316+ A006 7A                                   ld      a,d
 317+ A007 CD F4 95                             call    DVIDT
 318+ A00A 78                                   ld      a,b
 319+ A00B 32 33 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 320+ A00E C3 9C A0                             jp      .DoneRoof
 321+ A011              ;...roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 322+ A011 3A 37 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 323+ A014 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 324+ A017 3A 31 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 325+ A01A CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA
 326+ A01D 3A 39 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 327+ A020 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 328+ A023 3A 33 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 329+ A026 CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 330+ A029 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 331+ A02A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 332+ A02C 57                                   ld      d,a
 333+ A02D 3A 3B C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 334+ A030 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a
 335+ A033 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 336+ A034 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 337+ A036 B3                                   or      e
 338+ A037 FE 00                                cp      0
 339+ A039 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 340+ A03B                                      ZeroA
 340+ A03B AF          >                        xor a
 341+ A03C C3 52 A0                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 342+ A03F FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 343+ A041 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 344+ A043 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 345+ A045 B2                                   or      d
 346+ A046 C3 52 A0                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 347+ A049 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 348+ A04A 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a
 349+ A04D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 350+ A04E CD F4 95                             call    DVIDT
 351+ A051 78                                   ld      a,b
 352+ A052 32 35 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 353+ A055 C3 9C A0                             jp      .DoneRoof
 354+ A058              ;...roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 355+ A058 3A 39 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 356+ A05B 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 357+ A05E 3A 33 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 358+ A061 CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 359+ A064 3A 3B C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 360+ A067 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 361+ A06A 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 362+ A06D CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 363+ A070 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 364+ A071 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 365+ A073 57                                   ld      d,a
 366+ A074 3A 37 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 367+ A077 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a
 368+ A07A 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 369+ A07B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 370+ A07D B3                                   or      e
 371+ A07E FE 00                                cp      0
 372+ A080 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 373+ A082                                      ZeroA
 373+ A082 AF          >                        xor a
 374+ A083 C3 52 A0                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 375+ A086 FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 376+ A088 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 377+ A08A 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 378+ A08C B2                                   or      d
 379+ A08D C3 99 A0                             jp      .SetRoofX
 380+ A090 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 381+ A091 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a
 382+ A094 7A                                   ld      a,d
 383+ A095 CD F4 95                             call    DVIDT
 384+ A098 78                                   ld      a,b
 385+ A099 32 31 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 386+ A09C              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 386+ A09C CD D9 9E    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 386+ A09F CD 56 9F    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 386+ A0A2 CD 1C 9F    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 387+ A0A5              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 388+ A0A5 3A 3B C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 389+ A0A8 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 390+ A0AA 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 391+ A0AD 3A 33 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 392+ A0B0 CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA
 393+ A0B3 3A 39 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 394+ A0B6 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 395+ A0B9 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 396+ A0BC CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 397+ A0BF CD 3C 96                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 398+ A0C2 78                                   ld      a,b
 399+ A0C3 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 400+ A0C6              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 401+ A0C6 3A 37 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 402+ A0C9 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 403+ A0CB 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 404+ A0CE 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 405+ A0D1 CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 406+ A0D4 3A 3B C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 407+ A0D7 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 408+ A0DA 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 409+ A0DD CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 410+ A0E0 CD 3C 96                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 411+ A0E3 78                                   ld      a,b
 412+ A0E4 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 413+ A0E7              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 414+ A0E7 3A 39 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 415+ A0EA EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 416+ A0EC 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 417+ A0EF 3A 35 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 418+ A0F2 CD B8 9E                             call	RSequQmulA
 419+ A0F5 3A 37 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 420+ A0F8 32 82 7F                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 421+ A0FB 3A 33 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 422+ A0FE CD 2F 92                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 423+ A101 CD 3C 96                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 424+ A104 78                                   ld      a,b
 425+ A105 32 2F C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 426+ A108                                      ZeroA
 426+ A108 AF          >                        xor a
 427+ A109 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 428+ A10C 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 429+ A10F 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 430+ A112 C9                                   ret
 431+ A113
 432+ A113
 433+ A113              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 434+ A113              		; b = regX on entry
 435+ A113              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 436+ A113 08           		ex		af,af'
 437+ A114 78           		ld		a,b
 438+ A115 32 82 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 439+ A118 08           		ex		af,af'
 440+ A119 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 441+ A11B CD 0D 92     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 442+ A11E              ; USES 				A BC E
 443+ A11E              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 444+ A11E              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 445+ A11E 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 446+ A11F E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 447+ A121 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 448+ A122 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 449+ A123 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 450+ A125 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 451+ A127              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 452+ A127 CB 27        		sla		a
 453+ A129              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 453+ A129 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 453+ A12B DA 38 A1    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 454+ A12E DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 455+ A130 37           		scf
 456+ A131 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 457+ A133 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 458+ A135              TIS1KIPCont:
 459+ A135 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 460+ A136 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 461+ A137 C9           		ret
 462+ A138              TIS1SkipSub:
 463+ A138 B7           	or			a
 464+ A139 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 465+ A13B 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 466+ A13D C3 35 A1     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 467+ A140
 468+ A140              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 469+ A140              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 470+ A140
 471+ A140
 472+ A140
 473+ A140
 474+ A140                          DISPLAY "TODO: look at note on TODO"
 475+ A140              TidyRotYSmall:
 476+ A140 CD 69 A2     		call	CalcRoofvZ
 477+ A143 32 35 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
 478+ A146 C3 7A A1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 479+ A149
 480+ A149              TidyRotXSmall:
 481+ A149 AF           		xor		a
 482+ A14A 47           		ld		b,a
 483+ A14B 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 484+ A14E E6 60        		and		%01100000
 485+ A150 CA 40 A1     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 486+ A153 3A 3B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 487+ A156 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 488+ A157 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 489+ A15A CD 2F A2     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
 490+ A15D 32 33 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
 491+ A160 C3 7A A1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 492+ A163              ; TIDY is broken
 493+ A163
 494+ A163
 495+ A163              TIDY:
 496+ A163
 497+ A163              ORTHOGALISE:
 498+ A163              ;-- NormaliseNosev
 499+ A163 CD C6 9E     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
 500+ A166 CD 40 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 501+ A169 CD FF 9E     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 502+ A16C              .CheckNXSmall:
 503+ A16C 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 504+ A16F E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 505+ A171 CA 49 A1     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 506+ A174              .RotXIsBig:
 507+ A174 CD F5 A1             call	CalcRoofvX
 508+ A177 32 31 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 509+ A17A              NormaliseRoofV:
 510+ A17A CD D9 9E     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 511+ A17D CD 40 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 512+ A180              ;calc sidev x
 513+ A180 CD 1C 9F     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 514+ A183 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 515+ A186 32 82 7F     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 516+ A189 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 517+ A18C CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA
 518+ A18F 3A 3B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 519+ A192 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 520+ A193 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 521+ A196 CD 13 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 522+ A199                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 522+ A199 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 522+ A19A CA 9F A1    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 523+ A19D EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 524+ A19F              NormSideXNoNeg:
 525+ A19F 32 2B C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 526+ A1A2              ;calc sidev y
 527+ A1A2 3A 3B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 528+ A1A5 32 82 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 529+ A1A8 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 530+ A1AB CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA
 531+ A1AE 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 532+ A1B1 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 533+ A1B2 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 534+ A1B5 CD 13 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 535+ A1B8                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 535+ A1B8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 535+ A1B9 CA BE A1    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 536+ A1BC EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 537+ A1BE              NormSideYNoNeg:
 538+ A1BE 32 39 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 539+ A1C1              ;calc sidev z
 540+ A1C1 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 541+ A1C4 32 82 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
 542+ A1C7 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 543+ A1CA CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA
 544+ A1CD 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 545+ A1D0 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 546+ A1D1 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 547+ A1D4 CD 13 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 548+ A1D7                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 548+ A1D7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 548+ A1D8 CA DD A1    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 549+ A1DB EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 550+ A1DD              NormSideZNoNeg:
 551+ A1DD 32 2D C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 552+ A1E0              .ClearLoBytes:
 553+ A1E0 21 36 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 554+ A1E3 06 09        		ld		b,9
 555+ A1E5 AF                   xor     a
 556+ A1E6              .ClearLoLoop:
 557+ A1E6 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 558+ A1E7 23           		inc		hl
 559+ A1E8 23           		inc		hl
 560+ A1E9 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 561+ A1EB CD EC 9E     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 562+ A1EE CD 40 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 563+ A1F1              ;calc sidev x
 564+ A1F1 CD 39 9F     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 565+ A1F4
 566+ A1F4 C9           		ret
 567+ A1F5
 568+ A1F5
 569+ A1F5              CalcRoofvX:
 570+ A1F5              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 571+ A1F5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 571+ A1F5 3A 3B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 571+ A1F8 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 572+ A1FB 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 573+ A1FE CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 574+ A201              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 574+ A201 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 574+ A204 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 575+ A207 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 576+ A20A CD 0D 92     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 577+ A20D 7A           		ld		a,d
 578+ A20E E6 80        		and 	$80
 579+ A210 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 580+ A212              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 581+ A212 3A 37 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 582+ A215 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 583+ A216 E6 80        		and		$80
 584+ A218 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 585+ A21A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 586+ A21C 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 587+ A21D E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 588+ A21F 42           		ld		b,d
 589+ A220 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 590+ A221 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 591+ A222 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 592+ A224 CD C9 97     		call	BC_Div_DE
 593+ A227 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 594+ A229 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 595+ A22B E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 596+ A22D B0           		or		b
 597+ A22E C9           		ret
 598+ A22F
 599+ A22F
 600+ A22F              CalcRoofvY:
 601+ A22F              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 602+ A22F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 602+ A22F 3A 3B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 602+ A232 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 603+ A235 3A 35 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 604+ A238 CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA
 605+ A23B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 605+ A23B 3A 37 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 605+ A23E 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 606+ A241 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 607+ A244 CD 0D 92     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 608+ A247 7A           		ld		a,d
 609+ A248 E6 80        		and 	$80
 610+ A24A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 611+ A24C 3A 39 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 612+ A24F 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 613+ A250 E6 80        		and		$80
 614+ A252 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 615+ A254 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 616+ A256 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 617+ A257 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 618+ A259 42           		ld		b,d
 619+ A25A 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 620+ A25B 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 621+ A25C 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 622+ A25E CD C9 97     		call	BC_Div_DE
 623+ A261 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 624+ A263 EE 80        		xor		$80
 625+ A265 E6 80        		and		$80
 626+ A267 B0           		or		b
 627+ A268 C9           		ret
 628+ A269
 629+ A269              CalcRoofvZ:
 630+ A269              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 631+ A269              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 631+ A269 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 631+ A26C 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 632+ A26F 3A 33 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 633+ A272 CD B8 9E     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 634+ A275              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 634+ A275 3A 37 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 634+ A278 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 635+ A27B 3A 31 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 636+ A27E CD 0D 92     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 637+ A281 7A           		ld		a,d
 638+ A282 E6 80        		and 	$80
 639+ A284 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 640+ A286 3A 3B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 641+ A289 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 642+ A28A E6 80        		and		$80
 643+ A28C FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 644+ A28E FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 645+ A290 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 646+ A291 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 647+ A293 42           		ld		b,d
 648+ A294 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 649+ A295 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 650+ A296 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 651+ A298 CD C9 97     		call	BC_Div_DE
 652+ A29B FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 653+ A29D EE 80        		xor		$80
 654+ A29F E6 80        		and		$80
 655+ A2A1 B0           		or		b
 656+ A2A2 C9           		ret
 657+ A2A3                  ENDIF

   1+ A2A3
   2+ A2A3              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ A2A3 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A2A4 D2 C2 A2    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ A2A7 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ A2A9 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ A2AB 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ A2AD                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ A2AD BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ A2AE DA B3 A2    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ A2B1 92                                   sub     d
   8+ A2B2                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ A2B2 B7          >                        or a
   9+ A2B3 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ A2B4 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ A2B6 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ A2B8 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ A2B9 C9                                   ret
  14+ A2BA 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ A2BB 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ A2BC CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A2BE 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A2C0 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A2C1 C9                                   ret
  20+ A2C2 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A2C4 C9                                   ret
  22+ A2C5
  23+ A2C5              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
  24+ A2C5              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
  25+ A2C5              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
  26+ A2C5              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
  27+ A2C5              ;               a     a
  28+ A2C5              ;               b     x
  29+ A2C5              ;               c     q
  30+ A2C5              ;               d     r
  31+ A2C5              ;

  35+ A2CA                                      FlipCarryFlag
  35+ A2CA 3F          >                        ccf
  36+ A2CB DA F3 A2                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  37+ A2CE 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar

  39+ A2D2 DA E7 A2                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  40+ A2D5                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  40+ A2D5 3F          >                        ccf
  41+ A2D6                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  41+ A2D6 B9          >                        cp      c

  43+ A2DA 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  44+ A2DB                                      ClearCarryFlag
  44+ A2DB B7          >                        or a

  45+ A2DC 3F          >                        ccf
  46+ A2DD CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  47+ A2DF DA D0 A2                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7

   1+ A32F              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A32F              TIS1:
   3+ A32F 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A330 3A 6B 7E     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A333 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A334 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A335              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A335 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A336 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A337 32 82 7F     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A33A 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A33B EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A33D CD 0D 92     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A340              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A340              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A340              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A340 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A341 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A343 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A344 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A345 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A347 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A349 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A34A              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A34A CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A34C FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A34E 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A350 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A352              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A352 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A354 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A356 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A357 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A358 C9           		ret
  35+ A359
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  40+ A370 35                                  dec     (hl)

  52+ A382 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  53+ A384 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  54+ A386 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  55+ A387 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  56+ A388 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  57+ A389 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;

  71+ A391              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ A391              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  73+ A391 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  74+ A391                                      ENDIF
  75+ A391 3A 10 C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  76+ A394 47                                   ld      b,a
  77+ A395 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  78+ A397 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  79+ A399 78                                   ld      a,b
  80+ A39A E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  81+ A39C 21 5D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  82+ A39F B6                                   or      (hl)
  83+ A3A0 47                                   ld      b,a
  84+ A3A1 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  85+ A3A4 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  86+ A3A6 B0                                   or      b
  87+ A3A7 47                                   ld      b,a
  88+ A3A8 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkShipAggression)
  89+ A3AB                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  89+ A3AB FE 40       >                        cp      64
  89+ A3AD DA B4 A3    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  90+ A3B0 78                                   ld      a,b
  91+ A3B1 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  92+ A3B3 47                                   ld      b,a
  93+ A3B4 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  94+ A3B5 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkShipAggression),a
  95+ A3B8 C9                                   ret
  96+ A3B9 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  97+ A3BB 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkShipAggression),a
  98+ A3BE C9                                   ret
  99+ A3BF              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 100+ A3BF              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 101+ A3BF 3A 0F C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 102+ A3C2                                      ;break
 103+ A3C2                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 103+ A3C2 3A 0E C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 103+ A3C5 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 103+ A3C7 CA E6 A3    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile

 106+ A3CF 3A 55 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data

 107+ A3D2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a

 108+ A3D5 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later

 109+ A3D6 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2

 158+ A438 AF          >                        xor a
 159+ A439 32 54 81                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a

 170+ A452              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 171+ A452              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 172+ A452 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 173+ A452 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 174+ A452 ~                                    xor     (hl)
 175+ A452 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 176+ A452 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 177+ A452 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 178+ A452 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 179+ A452 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 180+ A452 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 181+ A452 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 182+ A452 ~                                    NegHL
 183+ A452 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 184+ A452 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 185+ A452 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 186+ A452 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 187+ A452 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 188+ A452 ~                                    ld      a,l
 189+ A452 ~                                    and     a
 190+ A452 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 191+ A452                                      ENDM
 192+ A452              ;...................................................................
 193+ A452              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 194+ A452 3A 54 81     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 195+ A455                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A455 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A457 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 196+ A458 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 197+ A45A 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks

 199+ A45E                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 199+ A45E 21 56 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

 199+ A463 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 199+ A464 3C          >                        inc     a
 199+ A465 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 199+ A466 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 200+ A467 CD AE 84                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 201+ A46A D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic

 209+ A492             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 209+ A492 F2 A0 A4    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 209+ A495             >                        NegHL
 209+ A495 AF          >                    xor a

 247+ A539 AF          >                        xor a
 248+ A53A B5                                   or      l
 249+ A53B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 249+ A53B B7          >                        or a
 250+ A53C                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 250+ A53C C0          >                        ret     nz
 251+ A53D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 252+ A53E                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if z far
 252+ A53E B9          >                        cp    c
 252+ A53F D0          >                        ret	 nc

 253+ A540 37          >                        scf

 112++A6CE 47                                   ld      b,a
 113++A6CF CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 114++A6D2 22 8F A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 115++A6D5 32 91 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 116++A6D8              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 117++A6D8              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A6D8              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A6D8 2A 88 A5                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A6DB 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A6DC ED 5B 8C A5                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A6E0 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A6E1 ED 4B 90 A5                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A6E5 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A6E6                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A6E6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A6E8                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A6E8 C2 F7 A6    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A6EB B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A6EC B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A6ED B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A6EE                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A6EE C2 F7 A6    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A6F1                                      ELSE
 132++A6F1 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A6F1                                      ENDIF
 134++A6F1              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A6F1 3A 46 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnkMissileTarget)
 136++A6F4 C3 13 A4                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A6F7                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 138++A6F7              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A6F7 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A6F9             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A6F9 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A6FC                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnkECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A6FC 3A 5B C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkECMFitted)
 139++A6FF A7          >                        and     a
 139++A700 C2 1D A7    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A703                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnkEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A703 3A 59 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkEnergy)
 140++A706 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A708 DA 1D A7    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 141++A70B                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 141++A70B 3A 97 7E    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 141++A70E A7          >                        and     a
 141++A70F C2 1D A7    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 142++A712 3A 79 7E     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A715                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A715 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A717 D2 1D A7    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A71A              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A71A C3 43 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A71D              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A71D              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A71D              .NoECM:
 149++A71D                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A71D                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A71D              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A71D              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A71D                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A71D FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A71F             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A71F ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A722                                      ;break
 155++A722                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A722              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A722 ~                                        break
 158++A722                                      ENDIF
 159++A722 CD 81 AC                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A725                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A725 CD 48 AB                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A728                                      ENDIF
 163++A728              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A728 3A 89 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A72B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A72D 32 89 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A730                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A730 3A 8D A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A733 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A735 32 8D A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A738                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A738 3A 91 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A73B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A73D 32 91 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A740 CD 57 A7                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A743 C9                                   ret
 168++A744 3A 54 81     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A747                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A747 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A749 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A74A C3 38 A4     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A74D                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A74D CD 46 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A750                                      SetMemTrue  UBnkMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A750 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A751 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnkMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A754 C3 44 A7                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A757                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A757
 177++A757 CD 8D AB     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A75A 32 4A A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A75D 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A760 32 4E A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A763 CD E3 AB     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A766 32 4D A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A769 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A76C 32 4E A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A76F CD 79 A7                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A772 CD 9D A7                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A775 CD CB A7                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A778 C9                                   ret
 189++A779
 190++A779              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A779 2A 4D A5                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A77C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A77D EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A77F E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A781 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A782 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A783 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A785                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A785 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A787 D2 93 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A78A                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A78A AF          >                        xor a
 200++A78B B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A78C 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A78F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A78F 32 DA A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A792                                      ENDIF
 205++A792 C9                                   ret
 206++A793 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A795 B4                                   or      h
 208++A796 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
 209++A799                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A799 32 DA A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A79C                                      ENDIF
 212++A79C C9                                   ret
 213++A79D
 214++A79D              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A79D              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A79D              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A79D              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A79D              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A79D              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A79D              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A79D              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A79D              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A79D              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A79D
 225++A79D
 226++A79D
 227++A79D              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnkRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A79D                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A79D                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A79D CD E9 AB                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A7A0 32 50 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A7A3 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A7A4 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A7A7 32 51 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A7AA 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A7AB 3A 4E A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A7AE                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A7AE                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A7AE                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A7AE                                      ;xor $80
 241++A7AE 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A7AF 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A7B0 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A7B2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A7B2 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A7B4 D2 C0 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A7B7                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A7B7 AF          >                        xor a
 246++A7B8 B0                                   or      b
 247++A7B9 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 248++A7BC                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A7BC 32 D8 A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A7BF                                      ENDIF
 251++A7BF C9                                   ret
 252++A7C0 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A7C2 B4                                   or      h
 254++A7C3 A8                                   xor     b
 255++A7C4 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 256++A7C7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A7C7 32 D8 A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 258++A7CA                                      ENDIF
 259++A7CA C9                                   ret
 260++A7CB
 261++A7CB 2A 4A A5     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A7CE 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A7CF A7                                   and     a
 264++A7D0 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A7D2 ED 5B 4D A5                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A7D6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A7D7                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A7D7 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A7D9 DA E5 A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A7DC 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A7DE 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A7E1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A7E1 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A7E4                                      ENDIF
 273++A7E4 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A7E5              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A7E5 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A7E7 DA F3 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A7EA 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A7EC 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 277++A7EF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A7EF 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A7F2                                      ENDIF
 280++A7F2 C9                                   ret
 281++A7F3              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A7F3 AF          >                        xor a
 282++A7F4 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 283++A7F7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A7F7 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A7FA                                      ENDIF
 286++A7FA C9                                   ret
