 288++A7FB
 289++A7FB CD 3A A8     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 290++A7FE 7C                                   ld      a,h
 291++A7FF A7                                   and     a
 292++A800 06 16                                ld      b,22
 293++A802 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 294++A804 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 295++A805                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A805 FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 295++A807 D2 0C A8    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 296++A80A 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 297++A80C 2A 4A A5     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A80F 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A810 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A812 C2 23 A8                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A815 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A816                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A816 B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A817 DA 23 A8    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A81A 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 304++A81C 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 305++A81F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A81F 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A822                                      ENDIF
 308++A822 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A823 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A824                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A824 FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A826 D2 31 A8    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 311++A829              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 311++A829 AF          >                        xor a
 312++A82A 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 313++A82D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A82D 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 315++A830                                      ENDIF
 316++A830 C9                                   ret
 317++A831 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 318++A833 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 319++A836                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 320++A836 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 321++A839                                      ENDIF
 322++A839 C9                                   ret

 329++A848 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A849 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A84A E6 7F                                and     $7F

 337++A852 19                                   add     hl,de

 338++A855 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A857                                      ShiftHLRight1

 137++A9B9 CD 8D AB                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev
 138++A9BC 47                                   ld      b,a
 139++A9BD 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 140++A9C0                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 140++A9C0 A7          >                        and     a
 140++A9C1 C2 DD A9    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 141++A9C4 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 142++A9C5                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 142++A9C5 FE 20       >                        cp      32
 142++A9C7 DA D8 A9    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot
 143++A9CA              .FireLaser:             ;break                        ;      do fire laser logic (drain energy, add beam to lines as random line from ship to a random edge of screen)
 144++A9CA 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 145++A9CB                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 145++A9CB FE 23       >                        cp     35
 145++A9CD CA D8 A9    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 146++A9D0                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 146++A9D0 FE 24       >                        cp     36
 146++A9D2 CA D8 A9    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 147++A9D5 C3 D8 A9     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 148++A9D8              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 149++A9D8 21 48 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnkAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 150++A9DB CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 151++A9DD              .TooFarForLaser:
 152++A9DD              .UpdateShip             ;break
 153++A9DD CD 91 A3                             call    CalculateAgression              ; refresh aggression levels
 154++A9E0 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzhi)
 155++A9E3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 155++A9E3 FE 03       >                        cp     3
 155++A9E5 D2 F3 A9    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway
 156++A9E8 3A 21 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkxhi)
 157++A9EB 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkyhi)
 158++A9EE B6                                   or      (hl)
 159++A9EF E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++A9F1 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 161++A9F3 3A 79 7E     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 162++A9F6                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 163++A9F6                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnkShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 163++A9F6 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkShipAggression
 163++A9F9 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++A9FA D2 19 AA    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++A9FD                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++A9FD 3A 89 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++AA00 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++AA02 32 89 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++AA05                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++AA05 3A 8D A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++AA08 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++AA0A 32 8D A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++AA0D                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++AA0D 3A 91 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++AA10 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++AA12 32 91 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++AA15 CD 1D AA                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++AA18 C9                                   ret
 169++AA19 CD 1D AA     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++AA1C                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++AA1C C9                                   ret
 172++AA1D
 173++AA1D CD 8D AB     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++AA20 32 4A A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++AA23 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++AA26 32 4E A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++AA29 CD E3 AB     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++AA2C 32 4D A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++AA2F 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++AA32 32 4E A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++AA35 CD 3F AA                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++AA38 CD 63 AA                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++AA3B CD 91 AA                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++AA3E C9                                   ret
 185++AA3F
 186++AA3F 2A 4D A5     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++AA42 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++AA43 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++AA45 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++AA47 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++AA48 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++AA49 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++AA4B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++AA4B FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++AA4D D2 59 AA    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++AA50                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++AA50 AF          >                        xor a
 195++AA51 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++AA52 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++AA55                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++AA55 32 DA A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++AA58                                      ENDIF
 200++AA58 C9                                   ret
 201++AA59 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++AA5B B4                                   or      h
 203++AA5C 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
 204++AA5F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++AA5F 32 DA A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++AA62                                      ENDIF
 207++AA62 C9                                   ret
 208++AA63
 209++AA63 CD E9 AB     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++AA66 32 50 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++AA69 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++AA6A 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++AA6D 32 51 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++AA70 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++AA71 3A 4E A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++AA74 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++AA75 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++AA76 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++AA78                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++AA78 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++AA7A D2 86 AA    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++AA7D                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++AA7D AF          >                        xor a
 221++AA7E B0                                   or      b
 222++AA7F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 223++AA82                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++AA82 32 D8 A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++AA85                                      ENDIF
 226++AA85 C9                                   ret
 227++AA86 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++AA88 B4                                   or      h
 229++AA89 A8                                   xor     b
 230++AA8A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 231++AA8D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++AA8D 32 D8 A5                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++AA90                                      ENDIF
 234++AA90 C9                                   ret
 235++AA91
 236++AA91 2A 4A A5     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++AA94 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++AA95 A7                                   and     a
 239++AA96 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++AA98 ED 5B 4D A5                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++AA9C 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++AA9D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++AA9D FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++AA9F DA AB AA    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++AAA2 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++AAA4 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++AAA7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++AAA7 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++AAAA                                      ENDIF
 248++AAAA C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++AAAB              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++AAAB FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++AAAD DA B9 AA    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++AAB0 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++AAB2 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 252++AAB5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++AAB5 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++AAB8                                      ENDIF
 255++AAB8 C9                                   ret
 256++AAB9              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++AAB9 AF          >                        xor a
 257++AABA 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 258++AABD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++AABD 32 DC A5                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++AAC0                                      ENDIF
 261++AAC0 C9                                   ret
 262++AAC1              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++AAC1              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++AAC1              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++AAC1              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++AAC1              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++AAC1              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++AAC1              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a                ; .
 274++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 277++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 278++AAC1              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++AAC1              ;;;                        or      h
 280++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
 281++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 285++AAC1

 290++AAC1              ;;;                        ret     z
 291++AAC1              ;;;                        call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 292++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 293++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 294++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .

 305++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

 307++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 308++AAC1              ;;;                        ret

 311++AAC1              ;;;                        xor     b
 312++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 313++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 315++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 316++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 317++AAC1              ;;;
 318++AAC1              ;;;ShipSpeedv2:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 319++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 320++AAC1              ;;;                        and     a
 321++AAC1              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 322++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 323++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 324++AAC1              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <

 329++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 330++AAC1              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .

 332++AAC1              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 333++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 334++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 335++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 336++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 337++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 338++AAC1              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 339++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 340++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 341++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 342++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 343++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 344++AAC1              ;;;
 345++AAC1              ;;;
 346++AAC1              ;;;
 347++AAC1              ;;;RAT2 equ    4           ; roll pitch threshold
 348++AAC1              ;;;RAT  equ    3           ; magnitude of counter
 349++AAC1              ;;;CNT2 equ    22          ; angle for ship slowdown
 350++AAC1              ;;;
 351++AAC1              ;;;
 352++AAC1              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 353++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 354++AAC1              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 355++AAC1              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 356++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 357++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 358++AAC1              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 359++AAC1              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 360++AAC1              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 361++AAC1              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 362++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a                ; .
 363++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 364++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 365++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 366++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 367++AAC1              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 368++AAC1              ;;;                        or      h
 369++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
 370++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 371++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 372++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 373++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 374++AAC1              ;;;
 375++AAC1              ;;;
 376++AAC1              ;;;                        ;
 377++AAC1              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 378++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 379++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 380++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 385++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++AAC1              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 387++AAC1              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;
 388++AAC1              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 389++AAC1              ;;;                        or      b
 390++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 391++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 392++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 393++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 394++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 395++AAC1              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++AAC1              ;;;                        or      h
 397++AAC1              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 399++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 403++AAC1              ;;;
 404++AAC1              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 405++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 406++AAC1              ;;;                        and     a
 407++AAC1              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 408++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 409++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++AAC1              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++AAC1              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++AAC1              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++AAC1              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 418++AAC1              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 419++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 420++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 421++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 422++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 423++AAC1              ;;;                        ret
 424++AAC1              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 425++AAC1              ;;;                        ld      (UBnkAccel),a
 426++AAC1              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 427++AAC1              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 428++AAC1              ;;;                        ENDIF
 429++AAC1              ;;;                        ret

 271+ AAC1
 272+ AAC1              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 273+ AAC1              ; on exit a == new roll
 274+ AAC1 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 275+ AAC3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 276+ AAC5 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 277+ AAC6 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 278+ AAC8 3A 4A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 279+ AACB C9                                   ret
 280+ AACC
 281+ AACC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 282+ AACE 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 283+ AACF 3A 4D A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 284+ AAD2                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 284+ AAD2 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 284+ AAD4 DA E1 AA    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 285+ AAD7 78                                   ld      a,b
 286+ AAD8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ AADA                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 288+ AADA                                     ; ld      a,
 289+ AADA 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 290+ AADC B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 291+ AADD 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 292+ AAE0 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 293+ AAE1 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 294+ AAE2 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a             ;
 295+ AAE5 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 296+ AAE6
 297+ AAE6 3A 4A C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnkRotZCounter)
 298+ AAE9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 299+ AAEB EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 300+ AAED F6 05                                or      5
 301+ AAEF 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 302+ AAF2 C9                                   ret
 303+ AAF3
 304+ AAF3 4F                                   ld      c,a
 305+ AAF4 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 306+ AAF6 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkRotXCounter)
 307+ AAF9 C9                                   ret
 308+ AAFA
 309+ AAFA
 310+ AAFA
 311+ AAFA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 312+ AAFC 47                                   ld      b,a
 313+ AAFD 3A 4D A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 314+ AB00                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 314+ AB00 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 314+ AB02 DA 0C AB    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 315+ AB05 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 316+ AB07 B1                                   or      c
 317+ AB08 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 318+ AB0B C9                                   ret
 319+ AB0C B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 320+ AB0D 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
 321+ AB10 C9                                   ret
 322+ AB11
 323+ AB11
 324+ AB11 21 2B C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 325+ AB14 C3 20 AB                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 326+ AB17
 327+ AB17 21 37 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 328+ AB1A C3 20 AB                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 329+ AB1D
 330+ AB1D 21 31 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 331+ AB20              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 332+ AB20 11 6B A5     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 333+ AB23 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 334+ AB24 47                                   ld      b,a
 335+ AB25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 336+ AB27 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 337+ AB28 13                                   inc     de
 338+ AB29 78                                   ld      a,b
 339+ AB2A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 340+ AB2C 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 341+ AB2D 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 342+ AB2E 23                                   inc     hl
 343+ AB2F 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 344+ AB30 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 345+ AB31 47                                   ld      b,a
 346+ AB32 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 347+ AB34 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 348+ AB35 13                                   inc     de
 349+ AB36 78                                   ld      a,b
 350+ AB37 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 351+ AB39 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 352+ AB3A 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 353+ AB3B 23                                   inc     hl
 354+ AB3C 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 355+ AB3D 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 356+ AB3E 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ AB3F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 358+ AB41 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 359+ AB42 13                                   inc     de
 360+ AB43 78                                   ld      a,b
 361+ AB44 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 362+ AB46 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 363+ AB47 C9                                   ret
 364+ AB48
 365+ AB48                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 366+ AB48              DebugTacticsCopy:
 367+ AB48 2A 2A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 368+ AB4B ED 5B 2C C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 369+ AB4F ED 4B 2E C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 370+ AB53 22 A7 A5                             ld      (TacticsSideX),hl
 371+ AB56 ED 53 AB A5                          ld      (TacticsSideY),de
 372+ AB5A ED 43 AF A5                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc
 373+ AB5E
 374+ AB5E 2A 30 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 375+ AB61 ED 5B 32 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 376+ AB65 ED 4B 34 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 377+ AB69 22 B7 A5                             ld      (TacticsRoofX),hl
 378+ AB6C ED 53 BB A5                          ld      (TacticsRoofY),de
 379+ AB70 ED 43 BF A5                          ld      (TacticsRoofZ),bc
 380+ AB74
 381+ AB74 2A 36 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 382+ AB77 ED 5B 38 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 383+ AB7B ED 4B 3A C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 384+ AB7F 22 C7 A5                             ld      (TacticsNoseX),hl
 385+ AB82 ED 53 CB A5                          ld      (TacticsNoseY),de
 386+ AB86 ED 43 CF A5                          ld      (TacticsNoseZ),bc
 387+ AB8A
 388+ AB8A C9                                   ret
 389+ AB8B                                      ENDIF
 390+ AB8B
 391+ AB8B 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 392+ AB8D CD 17 AB     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 393+ AB90 21 6B A5     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 394+ AB93 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 395+ AB94 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 396+ AB95 3A 87 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 397+ AB98 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 398+ AB99 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 399+ AB9B 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 400+ AB9C 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 401+ AB9F 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 402+ ABA0 3A 89 A5     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 403+ ABA3 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 404+ ABA4 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 405+ ABA5 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 406+ ABA6 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 407+ ABA7 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 408+ ABA8 3A 8B A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 409+ ABAB 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 410+ ABAC ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 411+ ABAE 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 412+ ABAF 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 413+ ABB1 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 414+ ABB2 3A 8D A5     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 415+ ABB5 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 416+ ABB6 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 417+ ABB7 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 418+ ABB8 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 419+ ABB9 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 420+ ABBC 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 421+ ABBE 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 422+ ABBF CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 423+ ABC2 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 424+ ABC3 22 8B AB                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 425+ ABC6 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 426+ ABC7 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 427+ ABC8 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 428+ ABC9 3A 8F A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 429+ ABCC 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 430+ ABCD ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 431+ ABCF 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 432+ ABD0 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 433+ ABD2 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 434+ ABD3 3A 91 A5     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 435+ ABD6 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 436+ ABD7 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 437+ ABD8 2A 8B AB                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 438+ ABDB CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 439+ ABDE 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 440+ ABE1 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 441+ ABE2 C9                                   ret
 442+ ABE3
 443+ ABE3 CD 1D AB     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 444+ ABE6 C3 90 AB                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 445+ ABE9
 446+ ABE9 CD 11 AB     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 447+ ABEC C3 90 AB                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 448+ ABEF
 449+ ABEF 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnkxlo
 450+ ABF2 11 77 A5                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 451+ ABF5 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 452+ ABF8 ED B0                                ldir
 453+ ABFA C9                                   ret
 454+ ABFB
 455+ ABFB 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)
 456+ ABFE 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkxsgn)
 457+ AC01                                      ;xor     $80
 458+ AC01 22 87 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 459+ AC04 32 89 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 460+ AC07
 461+ AC07 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkylo)
 462+ AC0A 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkysgn)
 463+ AC0D                                      ;xor     $80
 464+ AC0D 22 8B A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 465+ AC10 32 8D A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 466+ AC13
 467+ AC13 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)
 468+ AC16 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)
 469+ AC19                                      ;xor     $80
 470+ AC19 22 8F A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 471+ AC1C 32 91 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 472+ AC1F C9                                   ret
 473+ AC20
 474+ AC20              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 474+ AC20 AF          >                        xor a
 475+ AC21 21 77 A5                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 476+ AC24 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 477+ AC26 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 478+ AC27 23                                   inc     hl
 479+ AC28 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 480+ AC2A C9                                   ret
 481+ AC2B
 482+ AC2B CD 20 AC     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 483+ AC2E CD FB AB                             call    CopyPosToVector
 484+ AC31                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 485+ AC31                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 486+ AC31                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 487+ AC31                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 488+ AC31 C9                                   ret
 489+ AC32
 490+ AC32 ED 5B 77 A5  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 491+ AC36 3A 79 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 492+ AC39                                      FlipSignBitA
 492+ AC39 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 493+ AC3B 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 494+ AC3C 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)                        ; get missile x
 495+ AC3F 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 496+ AC42 47                                   ld      b,a
 497+ AC43 CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 498+ AC46 22 87 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 499+ AC49 32 89 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 500+ AC4C ED 5B 7A A5  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 501+ AC50 3A 7C A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 502+ AC53                                      FlipSignBitA
 502+ AC53 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 503+ AC55 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 504+ AC56 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkylo)                        ; get missile x
 505+ AC59 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 506+ AC5C 47                                   ld      b,a
 507+ AC5D CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 508+ AC60 22 8B A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 509+ AC63 32 8D A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 510+ AC66 ED 5B 7D A5  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 511+ AC6A 3A 7F A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 512+ AC6D                                      FlipSignBitA
 512+ AC6D EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 513+ AC6F 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 514+ AC70 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)                        ; get missile x
 515+ AC73 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 516+ AC76 47                                   ld      b,a
 517+ AC77 CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 518+ AC7A 22 8F A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 519+ AC7D 32 91 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 520+ AC80 C9                                   ret
 521+ AC81
 522+ AC81              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 523+ AC81              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 524+ AC81              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 525+ AC81 2A 87 A5     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 526+ AC84 ED 5B 8B A5                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 527+ AC88 ED 4B 8F A5                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 528+ AC8C 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 529+ AC8D B2                                   or      d
 530+ AC8E B0                                   or      b
 531+ AC8F 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 532+ AC91                                      ShiftHLRight1
 532+ AC91 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 532+ AC93 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 533+ AC95                                      ShiftDERight1
 533+ AC95 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 533+ AC97 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 534+ AC99                                      ShiftBCRight1
 534+ AC99 CB 38       >			   srl b
 534+ AC9B CB 19       >			   rr  c
 535+ AC9D C3 8C AC                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 536+ ACA0              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 536+ ACA0 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 536+ ACA2 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 537+ ACA4                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 537+ ACA4 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 537+ ACA6 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 538+ ACA8                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 538+ ACA8 CB 38       >			   srl b
 538+ ACAA CB 19       >			   rr  c
 539+ ACAC E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 540+ ACAF 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 541+ ACB0 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 542+ ACB2 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 543+ ACB3 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 544+ ACB4 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 545+ ACB6 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 546+ ACB7 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 547+ ACB8 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 548+ ACB9 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 549+ ACBB 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 550+ ACBC EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 551+ ACBD CD F2 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 552+ ACC0                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 553+ ACC0 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 554+ ACC1 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 555+ ACC3 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 556+ ACC4 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 557+ ACC5 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 558+ ACC6 CD 03 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 559+ ACC9 32 8F A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 560+ ACCC D1                                   pop     de
 561+ ACCD 7B                                   ld      a,e
 562+ ACCE FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ ACD0 CD 03 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ ACD3 32 8B A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 565+ ACD6 E1                                   pop     hl
 566+ ACD7 7D                                   ld      a,l
 567+ ACD8 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 568+ ACDA CD 03 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 569+ ACDD 32 87 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 570+ ACE0                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 571+ ACE0                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 572+ ACE0                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 572+ ACE0 AF          >                        xor a
 573+ ACE1 32 88 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 574+ ACE4 32 8C A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 575+ ACE7 32 90 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 576+ ACEA                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 576+ ACEA 3A 89 A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 576+ ACED E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 576+ ACEF 32 89 A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 577+ ACF2                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 577+ ACF2 3A 8D A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 577+ ACF5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 577+ ACF7 32 8D A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 578+ ACFA                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 578+ ACFA 3A 91 A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 578+ ACFD E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 578+ ACFF 32 91 A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 579+ AD02 C9                                   ret

 716+ AD03              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of types carried
 717+ AD03              ;                                              reduce ships in hanger by 1
 718+ AD03              ;                                              return
 719+ AD03              ;                      >>rock hermit>> if 22% chance
 720+ AD03              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder or Gecko
 721+ AD03              ;                                              return
 722+ AD03              ;                      >>pirate and in safe zone>> stop pirate being hostile by removing agressive and hostileflags
 723+ AD03              ;                 end case
 724+ AD03              ;         end if
 725+ AD03              ;         recharge ship energy by recharge factor (TODO as a config item on ship type but by default 1)
 726+ AD03              ; .PART 3
 727+ AD03              ;         calulcate dot product of ship nose to us
 728+ AD03              ; .PART 4
 729+ AD03              ;         2.5% change ship rill roll a noticable amount
 730+ AD03              ;         if ship has > 50% energy jump to part 6
 731+ AD03              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5
 732+ AD03              ;         if random 10% chance (i.e. ship < 1/8 energy and bails out)
 733+ AD03              ;            then launch escape pod
 734+ AD03              ;                 set AI to null
 735+ AD03              ;                 set random pitch and roll
 736+ AD03              ;                 set accelleation to 0
 737+ AD03              ;         end if
 738+ AD03              ; .PART 5
 739+ AD03              ;         if ship does not have any missilesor ECM is firing to part 6
 740+ AD03              ;            then if random > threshold for ship type (TODO as a config item on ship type)
 741+ AD03              ;                    then if tharoid ; note this means thargoids are sensitve to ECM
 742+ AD03              ;                            then launch thargon
 743+ AD03              ;                            else spawn angry missle under ship
 744+ AD03              ;                         end if
 745+ AD03              ;                 end if
 746+ AD03              ;            else return
 747+ AD03              ;         end if
 748+ AD03              ; .PART 6
 749+ AD03              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 750+ AD03              ;            then jump to part 7
 751+ AD03              ;            else if ship is pointing directly at us ( < 163 i.e. > -35)
 752+ AD03              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 753+ AD03              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 754+ AD03              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 755+ AD03              ;                         return
 756+ AD03              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 757+ AD03              ;                 end if
 758+ AD03              ;         end if
 759+ AD03              ; .PART 7#
 760+ AD03              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 761+ AD03              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 762+ AD03              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 763+ AD03              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 764+ AD03              ;                         if random < AI flag
 765+ AD03              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 766+ AD03              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 767+ AD03              ;                         end if
 768+ AD03              ;                end if
 769+ AD03              ;           end if
 770+ AD03              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 771+ AD03
 772+ AD03
 773+ AD03              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 774+ AD03              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 775+ AD03              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 776+ AD03              ; .PART 8 - new
 777+ AD03              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 778+ AD03              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 779+ AD03              ;              if chance 25%
 780+ AD03              ;                 then fire ECM
 781+ AD03              ;
 782+ AD03
 783+ AD03
 784+ AD03
 785+ AD03
 786+ AD03 2A 87 A5     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 787+ AD06 ED 5B 8B A5                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 788+ AD0A ED 4B 8F A5                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 789+ AD0E 3A 89 A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 790+ AD11 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 791+ AD13 3A 8D A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 792+ AD16 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 793+ AD18 3A 91 A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 794+ AD1B DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 795+ AD1D FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 796+ AD1F FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 797+ AD21                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 797+ AD21 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 798+ AD23 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 799+ AD25 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 800+ AD27 CB 2F                            sra     a
 801+ AD29 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 802+ AD2B CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 803+ AD2D CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 804+ AD2F FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 805+ AD31 CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 806+ AD33 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 807+ AD35 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 808+ AD37 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 809+ AD39 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 810+ AD3B CB 2F                            sra     a
 811+ AD3D DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 812+ AD3F CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 813+ AD41 CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 814+ AD43 C3 1D AD                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 815+ AD46 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 816+ AD47 B2                               or      d
 817+ AD48 B0                               or      b
 818+ AD49                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 818+ AD49 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 819+ AD4B 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 820+ AD4D              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 820+ AD4D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 820+ AD4F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 821+ AD51                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 821+ AD51 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 821+ AD53 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 822+ AD55                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 822+ AD55 CB 38       >			   srl b
 822+ AD57 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 823+ AD59 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 824+ AD5A FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 825+ AD5C 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 826+ AD5D 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 827+ AD5E FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 828+ AD60 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 829+ AD61 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 830+ AD62 DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 831+ AD64 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 832+ AD65 22 97 A5                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 833+ AD68 22 9B A5                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 834+ AD6B 22 9F A5                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 835+ AD6E C9                               ret
 836+ AD6F                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 837+ AD6F
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

 191+ AD90              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AD90              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AD90              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AD90              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AD90              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AD90              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AD90 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AD91 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AD92 E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AD93 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AD96 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AD97 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AD98 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AD99 C9                                   ret
 205+ AD9A
 206+ AD9A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AD9A              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AD9A              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AD9A              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AD9A              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AD9A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AD9A B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AD9B C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AD9C E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AD9D DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ ADA0 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ ADA1 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ ADA2 E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ ADA3 C9                                   ret
 220+ ADA4
 221+ ADA4              ; *******************************************************************************************************

 223+ ADA4              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ ADA4              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ ADA4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ ADA4 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ ADA5 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ ADA6 CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ ADA7 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ ADA8 C9                                   ret

 248+ ADA9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ ADA9              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ ADA9              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ ADA9              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ ADA9              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ ADA9              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ ADA9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ ADA9 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl

 261+ ADB2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ ADB2              ; Init the file system
 263+ ADB2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ ADB2 CD 6F AD     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ ADB5 C9                                   ret
 266+ ADB6
 267+ ADB6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ ADB6              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ ADB6              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ ADB6              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ ADB6              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ ADB6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ ADB6 CD 6F AD     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ ADB9 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ ADBC                                      ; get file size
 276+ ADBC C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ ADBF E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ ADC2 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ ADC4 CD 82 AD                             call    fOpen
 280+ ADC7 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ ADC9 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ ADCB 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ ADCD DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ ADD0 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ ADD1 CD 90 AD                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ ADD4 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ ADD6 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ ADD7 CD A4 AD                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ ADDA 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ ADDC F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ ADDF C9                                   ret
 292+ ADE0              ;
 293+ ADE0              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ ADE0              ;
 295+ ADE0 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ ADE2 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ ADE3
 298+ ADE3              .error_closing:
 299+ ADE3 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ ADE4 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ ADE5 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ ADE6 C9                                   ret
 303+ ADE7
 304+ ADE7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ ADE7              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ ADE7              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ ADE7              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ ADE7              ;		    bc = size
 309+ ADE7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ ADE7 CD 6F AD     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ ADEA C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ ADED E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ ADF0 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ ADF2 CD 82 AD                             call    fOpen
 315+ ADF5 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ ADF7 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ ADF9 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ ADFB DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ ADFE F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ ADFF CD 9A AD                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AE02 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AE04 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AE05 CD A4 AD                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AE08 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AE09              ;
 326+ AE09              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AE09              ;
 328+ AE09 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AE0C C9                                   ret
 330+ AE0D
 331+ AE0D 00           DefaultDrive:	        DB	0
 332+ AE0E 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ AE0F 00           CardFlags               DB  0
 334+ AE10 00 00        TargetSize              DW  0
 335+ AE12 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ AE14 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data
 337+ B014 00           FilereadsPerformed      DB  0
 338+ B015 00 00        FilemapBlockCount       DW  0
 339+ B017 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ B019 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0
 341+ B01B 00 00 00...  FilemapBuffer           DS  FILEMAP_BLOCK_SIZE * FILEMAP_SIZE        ; expecting 60 to be overkill as most should be 1
 342+ B0DB
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  21+ B188              ;;DEFUNCTBoilerTextLoop:

  25+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b

  28+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  29+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  31+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data

  38+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B188              ;;DEFUNCT	ret
  40+ B188
  41+ B188
  42+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT print_boiler_text:
  43+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value

  47+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl

  49+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl

  51+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  52+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  54+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data

  62+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ B188              ;:DEFUNCT 	ret
