 101+ E968
 102+ E968              ; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius in Leading sign magnitude
 103+ E968
 104+ E968              ;EliteCheckOnSM:     ld
 105+ E968              ;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius in 2's compliment
 106+ E968              ;;EliteCheckOn2c:
 107+ E968              ;;.CheckXOffLeft:     ld      hl,ix               ; if x position + radius is < 0 then its off screen
 108+ E968              ;;                    ld      c,d                 ; use c as a temporary holding
 109+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,0                 ;
 110+ E968              ;;                    ld      e,c                 ;
 111+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 112+ E968              ;;                    adc     hl,de               ;
 113+ E968              ;;                    jp      m, .NotOnScreen     ;
 114+ E968              ;;.CheckXOffRight:    ld      hl,ix               ; if x position - radius > 255 then its off screen
 115+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 116+ E968              ;;                    sbc     hl,de               ;
 117+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,h                 ;
 118+ E968              ;;                    and     a
 119+ E968              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen
 120+ E968              ;;.CheckXOffLeft:     ld      hl,iy               ; if y position + radius is < 0 then its off screen
 121+ E968              ;;                    ld      c,d                 ; use c as a temporary holding
 122+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,0                 ;
 123+ E968              ;;                    ld      e,c                 ;
 124+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 125+ E968              ;;                    adc     hl,de               ;
 126+ E968              ;;                    jp      m, .NotOnScreen     ;
 127+ E968              ;;.CheckXOffRight:    ld      hl,iy               ; if y position - radius > 255 then its off screen
 128+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ; if y position - radius > 127 then also off screen
 129+ E968              ;;                    sbc     hl,de               ;
 130+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,h                 ;
 131+ E968              ;;                    and     a                   ;
 132+ E968              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen     ;
 133+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,l                 ;
 134+ E968              ;;                    and     $80                 ;
 135+ E968              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen     ;
 136+ E968              ;;.OnScreen:          ClearCarryFlag
 137+ E968              ;;                    ret
 138+ E968              ;;.NotOnScreen:       SetCarryFlag
 139+ E968              ;;                    ret
 140+ E968
 141+ E968
 142+ E968              ;;CircleRadius        DB      0
 143+ E968              ;;CircleStep          DB      0
 144+ E968              ;;CircleFlag          DB      0
 145+ E968              ;;CircleCounter       DB      0
 146+ E968              ;;; EliteCircle, uses lines as per original elite
 147+ E968              ;;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius, e = colour x and y are 2's compliment not leading sign
 148+ E968              ;;EliteCircle:        push    de                      ; save radius
 149+ E968              ;;                    call    EliteCheckOn2c          ; if its off screen carry will be set to
 150+ E968              ;;                    ret     c                       ;
 151+ E968              ;;                    pop     de                      ; set X (or in our case circle radius) to radius
 152+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,d                     ;
 153+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleRadius),a        ;
 154+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,8
 155+ E968              ;;                    JumpIfALTNusng  d,.DoneRadius   ; If the radius < 8, skip to PL89
 156+ E968              ;;                    srl     d                       ; Halve d so d = 4
 157+ E968              ;;                    JumpifALTNusng  60,.DoneRadius  ; If the radius < 60, skip to PL89
 158+ E968              ;;                    srl     d                       ; Halve d so d = 2
 159+ E968              ;;.DoneRadius:        ld      a,d                     ; Now store value in d into step
 160+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleStep),a
 161+ E968              ;;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, CircleRadius = radius, CircleStep = step value based on radius, must be on screen
 162+ E968              ;;EliteCircle2:       ld      a,$FF                   ; set flag for first plot
 163+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleFlag),a
 164+ E968              ;;                    inc     a                       ; set counter to 0 (goes to 64)
 165+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleCounter),a
 166+ E968              ;;.CircleLoop:        ld      a,(CircleCounter)       ; Set A = CNT
 167+ E968              ;;
 168+ E968              ;; JSR FMLTU2             \ Call FMLTU2 to calculate:
 169+ E968              ;;                        \
 170+ E968              ;;                        \   A = K * sin(A)
 171+ E968              ;;                        \     = K * sin(CNT)
 172+ E968              ;;
 173+ E968              ;; LDX #0                 \ Set T = 0, so we have the following:
 174+ E968              ;; STX T                  \
 175+ E968              ;;                        \   (T A) = K * sin(CNT)
 176+ E968              ;;                        \
 177+ E968              ;;                        \ which is the x-coordinate of the circle for this count
 178+ E968              ;;
 179+ E968              ;; LDX CNT                \ If CNT < 33 then jump to PL37, as this is the right
 180+ E968              ;; CPX #33                \ half of the circle and the sign of the x-coordinate is
 181+ E968              ;; BCC PL37               \ correct
 182+ E968              ;;
 183+ E968              ;; EOR #%11111111         \ This is the left half of the circle, so we want to
 184+ E968              ;; ADC #0                 \ flip the sign of the x-coordinate in (T A) using two's
 185+ E968              ;; TAX                    \ complement, so we start with the low byte and store it
 186+ E968              ;;                        \ in X (the ADC adds 1 as we know the C flag is set)
 187+ E968              ;;
 188+ E968              ;; LDA #&FF               \ And then we flip the high byte in T
 189+ E968              ;; ADC #0
 190+ E968              ;; STA T
 191+ E968              ;;
 192+ E968              ;; TXA                    \ Finally, we restore the low byte from X, so we have
 193+ E968              ;;                        \ now negated the x-coordinate in (T A)
 194+ E968              ;;
 195+ E968              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag so we can do some more addition below
 196+ E968              ;;
 197+ E968              ;;.PL37
 198+ E968              ;;
 199+ E968              ;; ADC K3                 \ We now calculate the following:
 200+ E968              ;; STA K6                 \
 201+ E968              ;;                        \   K6(1 0) = (T A) + K3(1 0)
 202+ E968              ;;                        \
 203+ E968              ;;                        \ to add the coordinates of the centre to our circle
 204+ E968              ;;                        \ point, starting with the low bytes
 205+ E968              ;;
 206+ E968              ;; LDA K3+1               \ And then doing the high bytes, so we now have:
 207+ E968              ;; ADC T                  \
 208+ E968              ;; STA K6+1               \   K6(1 0) = K * sin(CNT) + K3(1 0)
 209+ E968              ;;                        \
 210+ E968              ;;                        \ which is the result we want for the x-coordinate
 211+ E968              ;;
 212+ E968              ;; LDA CNT                \ Set A = CNT + 16
 213+ E968              ;; CLC
 214+ E968              ;; ADC #16
 215+ E968              ;;
 216+ E968              ;; JSR FMLTU2             \ Call FMLTU2 to calculate:
 217+ E968              ;;                        \
 218+ E968              ;;                        \   A = K * sin(A)
 219+ E968              ;;                        \     = K * sin(CNT + 16)
 220+ E968              ;;                        \     = K * cos(CNT)
 221+ E968              ;;
 222+ E968              ;; TAX                    \ Set X = A
 223+ E968              ;;                        \       = K * cos(CNT)
 224+ E968              ;;
 225+ E968              ;; LDA #0                 \ Set T = 0, so we have the following:
 226+ E968              ;; STA T                  \
 227+ E968              ;;                        \   (T X) = K * cos(CNT)
 228+ E968              ;;                        \
 229+ E968              ;;                        \ which is the y-coordinate of the circle for this count
 230+ E968              ;;
 231+ E968              ;; LDA CNT                \ Set A = (CNT + 15) mod 64
 232+ E968              ;; ADC #15
 233+ E968              ;; AND #63
 234+ E968              ;;
 235+ E968              ;; CMP #33                \ If A < 33 (i.e. CNT is 0-16 or 48-64) then jump to
 236+ E968              ;; BCC PL38               \ PL38, as this is the bottom half of the circle and the
 237+ E968              ;;                        \ sign of the y-coordinate is correct
 238+ E968              ;;
 239+ E968              ;; TXA                    \ This is the top half of the circle, so we want to
 240+ E968              ;; EOR #%11111111         \ flip the sign of the y-coordinate in (T X) using two's
 241+ E968              ;; ADC #0                 \ complement, so we start with the low byte in X (the
 242+ E968              ;; TAX                    \ ADC adds 1 as we know the C flag is set)
 243+ E968              ;;
 244+ E968              ;; LDA #&FF               \ And then we flip the high byte in T, so we have
 245+ E968              ;; ADC #0                 \ now negated the y-coordinate in (T X)
 246+ E968              ;; STA T
 247+ E968              ;;
 248+ E968              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag so we can do some more addition below
 249+ E968              ;;
 250+ E968              ;;.PL38
 251+ E968              ;;
 252+ E968              ;; JSR BLINE              \ Call BLINE to draw this segment, which also increases
 253+ E968              ;;                        \ CNT by STP, the step size
 254+ E968              ;;
 255+ E968              ;; CMP #65                \ If CNT >= 65 then skip the next instruction
 256+ E968              ;; BCS P%+5
 257+ E968              ;;
 258+ E968              ;; JMP PLL3               \ Jump back for the next segment
 259+ E968              ;;
 260+ E968              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag to indicate success
 261+ E968              ;;
 262+ E968              ;; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 263+ E968              ;;; ">L2_draw_circle16 bit" ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius, e = colour
 264+ E968              ;;; draw using minium squared algorithm
 265+ E968              ;;;
 266+ E968              ;;CircleCurrentX      DB      0
 267+ E968              ;;CircleCurrentY      DB      0
 268+ E968              ;;CircleCurrentError  DW      0
 269+ E968              ;;l2_draw_circle16bit:ld
 270+ E968              ;;.ConvertIXto2sC
 271+ E968              ;;.ConvertIYto2sC
 272+ E968              ;;.ZeroCurrentError
 273+ E968              ;;.SetCurrentXRadius:
 274+ E968              ;;.ZeroCurrentY
 275+ E968              ;;.DrawPixels:
 276+ E968              ;;
 277+ E968              ;;                    MMUSelectLayer2
 278+ E968              ;;.PlotLoop:
 279+ E968              ;;.Plot1:
 280+ E968              ;;
 281+ E968              ;;.Plot2:
 282+ E968              ;;
 283+ E968              ;;.Plot3:
 284+ E968              ;;
 285+ E968              ;;.Plot3:
 286+ E968              ;;
 287+ E968              ;;.Plot5:
 288+ E968              ;;
 289+ E968              ;;.Plot6:
 290+ E968              ;;
 291+ E968              ;;.Plot7:
 292+ E968              ;;
 293+ E968              ;;.Plot8:
 294+ E968              ;;
 295+ E968              ;;
 296+ E968              ;;
 297+ E968              ;;
 298+ E968              ;;
 299+ E968              ;;
 300+ E968              ;;
 301+ E968              ;;
 302+ E968              ;;
 303+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,(CurrentX)    ; if x <= y then break loop
 304+ E968              ;;                    ld      hl,CurrentY     ; .
 305+ E968              ;;                    cp      (hl)            ; .
 306+ E968              ;;                    ret     z               ; . X = Y
 307+ E968              ;;                    ret     c               ; . X < Y
 308+ E968              ;;.UpdateError:       ld      a,(CurrentY)    ; e += 2*y + 1
 309+ E968              ;;                    ld      e,a
 310+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,0
 311+ E968              ;;                    ShiftDELeft1
 312+ E968              ;;                    inc     de
 313+ E968              ;;                    ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 314+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag
 315+ E968              ;;                    adc     hl,de
 316+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleCurrentError),hl
 317+ E968              ;;.NextCurrentY:      ld      hl,CircleCurrentY
 318+ E968              ;;                    inc     (hl)
 319+ E968              ;;.CheckEgtX:         ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 320+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,(CircleCurrentX)
 321+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,0
 322+ E968              ;;                    ld      e,0
 323+ E968              ;;                    cpHLDE
 324+ E968              ;;                    jp      z,.AdjustError
 325+ E968              ;;                    jp      nc,.PlotLoop
 326+ E968              ;;.AdjustError:       ld      a,(CircleCurrentX)
 327+ E968              ;;                    ld      d,0
 328+ E968              ;;                    ld      e,a
 329+ E968              ;;                    ShiftDELeft1
 330+ E968              ;;                    ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 331+ E968              ;;                    inc     hl
 332+ E968              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag
 333+ E968              ;;                    sbc     hl,de
 334+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,e
 335+ E968              ;;                    dec     a
 336+ E968              ;;                    ld      (CircleCurrentX),a
 337+ E968              ;;                    jp      .PlotLoop
 338+ E968              ;;;plot pixel at x = de y = bc
 339+ E968              ;;.PlotPixelBCDE:     ld		a,0                     ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 340+ E968              ;;                    push	de,,bc,,hl
 341+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,d                     ; if d is not zero then it must be -ve or > 255 to skip
 342+ E968              ;;                    and     a                       ;
 343+ E968              ;;                    ret     nz                      ;
 344+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,b                     ; if b is not zero then it must be -ve or > 255 to skip
 345+ E968              ;;                    and     a
 346+ E968              ;;                    ret     nz
 347+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,c                     ; but also check if y > 127 and if so skip
 348+ E968              ;;                    and     $80
 349+ E968              ;;                    ret     nz
 350+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,c                     ; so we can now plot
 351+ E968              ;;                    call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 352+ E968              ;;                    ld      h,a
 353+ E968              ;;                    ld      l,e
 354+ E968              ;;                    ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 355+ E968              ;;                    ld      (hl),a
 356+ E968              ;;                    pop		de,,bc,,hl
 357+ E968              ;;                    ret
 358+ E968              ;;
 359+ E968
 360+ E968              ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 361+ E968              ; ">l2_draw_circle BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"
 362+ E968 7B           l2_draw_circle:     ld		a,e
 363+ E969 32 0F EA                         ld		(.PlotPixel+1),a
 364+ E96C 7A                               ld		a,d								; get radius
 365+ E96D A7                               and		a
 366+ E96E C8                               ret		z
 367+ E96F FE 01                            cp		1
 368+ E971 CA 26 EA                         jp		z,CircleSinglepixel
 369+ E974 ED 43 9E E9                      ld		(.Plot1+1),bc	        ; save origin into cXcY reg in code
 370+ E978 DD 67                            ld		ixh,a			        ; ixh =  x = raidus
 371+ E97A DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0			        ; iyh =  y = 0
 372+ E97D 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0
 373+ E97F 6F                               ld		l,a
 374+ E980 29                               add		hl,hl			        ; hl = r * 2
 375+ E981 EB                               ex		de,hl			        ; de = r * 2
 376+ E982 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3
 377+ E985 A7                               and		a
 378+ E986 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de			        ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 379+ E988 44                               ld		b,h
 380+ E989 4D                               ld		c,l				        ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 381+ E98A 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1
 382+ E98D 16 00                            ld		d,0
 383+ E98F DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl
 384+ E991 A7                               and		a
 385+ E992 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de
 386+ E994 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1
 387+ E997 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:        ld		a,ixh
 388+ E999 DD BD                            cp		ixl
 389+ E99B D8                               ret		c
 390+ E99C D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx
 391+ E99D 11 00 00     .Plot1:             ld		de,0                    ; de = cXcY
 392+ E9A0 7B                               ld		a,e                     ; c = cY + error
 393+ E9A1 DD 85                            add		a,ixl                   ;
 394+ E9A3 4F                               ld		c,a                     ;
 395+ E9A4 7A                               ld		a,d                     ; b = xY+radius
 396+ E9A5 DD 84                            add		a,ixh                   ;
 397+ E9A7 47                               ld		b,a                     ;
 398+ E9A8 CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX+X,CY+Y
 399+ E9AB 7B           .Plot2:             ld 		a,e
 400+ E9AC DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 401+ E9AE 4F                               ld 		c,a
 402+ E9AF 7A                               ld 		a,d
 403+ E9B0 DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 404+ E9B2 47                               ld		b,a
 405+ E9B3 CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX-X,CY+Y
 406+ E9B6 7B           .Plot3:             ld 		a,e
 407+ E9B7 DD 85                            add		a,ixl
 408+ E9B9 4F                               ld 		c,a
 409+ E9BA 7A                               ld 		a,d
 410+ E9BB DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 411+ E9BD 47                               ld 		b,a
 412+ E9BE CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX+X,CY-Y
 413+ E9C1 7B           .Plot4:             ld 		a,e
 414+ E9C2 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 415+ E9C4 4F                               ld 		c,a
 416+ E9C5 7A                               ld 		a,d
 417+ E9C6 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 418+ E9C8 47                               ld 		b,a
 419+ E9C9 CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX-X,CY-Y
 420+ E9CC 7A           .Plot5:	            ld 		a,d
 421+ E9CD DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
 422+ E9CF 47                               ld 		b,a
 423+ E9D0 7B                               ld 		a,e
 424+ E9D1 DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 425+ E9D3 4F                               ld 		c,a
 426+ E9D4 CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY+X,CX+Y
 427+ E9D7 7A           .Plot6:	            ld 		a,d
 428+ E9D8 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 429+ E9DA 47                               ld 		b,a
 430+ E9DB 7B                               ld 		a,e
 431+ E9DC DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 432+ E9DE 4F                               ld 		c,a
 433+ E9DF CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY-X,CX+Y
 434+ E9E2 7A           .Plot7:	            ld 		a,d
 435+ E9E3 DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
 436+ E9E5 47                               ld 		b,a
 437+ E9E6 7B                               ld 		a,e
 438+ E9E7 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 439+ E9E9 4F                               ld 		c,a
 440+ E9EA CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY+X,CX-Y
 441+ E9ED 7A           .Plot8:	            ld 		a,d
 442+ E9EE DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 443+ E9F0 47                               ld		b,a
 444+ E9F1 7B                               ld 		a,e
 445+ E9F2 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 446+ E9F4 4F                               ld 		c,a
 447+ E9F5 CD 0E EA                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY-X,CX-Y
 448+ E9F8 D9                               exx
 449+ E9F9 CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h				        ; Check for Hl<=0
 450+ E9FB 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 451+ E9FD 19                               add hl,de			            ; Delta=Delta+D1
 452+ E9FE 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		;
 453+ EA00 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc			        ; Delta=Delta+D2
 454+ EA01 03                               inc     bc
 455+ EA02 03                               inc     bc				        ; D2=D2+2
 456+ EA03 DD 25                            dec     ixh				        ; Y=Y-1
 457+ EA05 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc bc				            ; D2=D2+2
 458+ EA06 03                               inc bc
 459+ EA07 13                               inc de				            ; D1=D1+2
 460+ EA08 13                               inc de
 461+ EA09 DD 2C                            inc ixl				            ; X=X+1
 462+ EA0B C3 97 E9                         jp      .CircleLoop
 463+ EA0E 3E 00        .PlotPixel:         ld		a,0                     ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 464+ EA10 D5 C5 E5                         push	de,,bc,,hl
 465+ EA13                                  l2_plot_macro; call 	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 465+ EA13 78          >                        ld      a,b
 465+ EA14             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 465+ EA14 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 465+ EA16 D2 22 EA    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 465+ EA19 69          >                        ld      l,c
 465+ EA1A CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 465+ EA1D 67          >                        ld      h,a
 465+ EA1E 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 465+ EA21 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 465+ EA22             >.NoPlot:
 466+ EA22 E1 C1 D1                         pop		de,,bc,,hl
 467+ EA25 C9                               ret
 468+ EA26 7B           CircleSinglepixel:  ld		a,e
 469+ EA27                                  l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 469+ EA27 78          >                        ld      a,b
 469+ EA28             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 469+ EA28 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 469+ EA2A D2 36 EA    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 469+ EA2D 69          >                        ld      l,c
 469+ EA2E CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 469+ EA31 67          >                        ld      h,a
 469+ EA32 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 469+ EA35 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 469+ EA36             >.NoPlot:
 470+ EA36 C9                               ret
 471+ EA37
 472+ EA37              CalcNewPointMacro:  MACRO reg1, oper, reg2
 473+ EA37 ~                                ClearCarryFlag
 474+ EA37 ~                                ld      b,0
 475+ EA37 ~                                ld      c,reg2
 476+ EA37 ~                                oper    hl,bc
 477+ EA37                                  ENDM
 478+ EA37
 479+ EA37              ; ">l2_draw_clipped_circle HL = Center X 2's c, DE = Center Y 2's , c = radius, b = colour"
 480+ EA37              l2_draw_clipped_circle:
 481+ EA37 78                               ld      a,b                     ; save Colour
 482+ EA38 32 69 EB                         ld		(.PlotColour+1),a
 483+ EA3B 79                               ld		a,c								; get radius
 484+ EA3C                                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 484+ EA3C A7          >                        and     a
 484+ EA3D C8          >                        ret     z
 485+ EA3E                                  JumpIfAEqNusng  1, .circleSinglepixel
 485+ EA3E FE 01       >                        cp     1
 485+ EA40 CA 83 EB    >                        jp      z,.circleSinglepixel
 486+ EA43 ED 53 70 EA                      ld		(.Plot1Y+1),de					; save origin into DE and HL
 487+ EA47 22 73 EA                         ld      (.Plot1X+1),hl                  ; .
 488+ EA4A                                  DISPLAY "TODO : IXH and IXL need to be 16 bit and in IX and IY"
 489+ EA4A DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = x = raidus
 490+ EA4C DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = y = error
 491+ EA4F 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0                             ; hl = radius
 492+ EA51 6F                               ld		l,a                             ; raidius is still in a at this point
 493+ EA52 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
 494+ EA53 EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
 495+ EA54 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 496+ EA57                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 496+ EA57 B7          >                        or a
 497+ EA58 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; .
 498+ EA5A 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 499+ EA5C 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1                            ; hl = 1
 500+ EA5F 16 00                            ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl (error)
 501+ EA61 DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl                           ;
 502+ EA63                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 502+ EA63 B7          >                        or a
 503+ EA64 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - error
 504+ EA66 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1                            ; de = 1
 505+ EA69              .CircleLoop:        ReturnIfRegLTNusng ixh, ixl             ; if radius > ixl counter
 505+ EA69 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
 505+ EA6B DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 505+ EA6D D8          >                        ret	    c
 506+ EA6E D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx                                     ; save all bc,de,hl registers
 507+ EA6F              ;--- CX+X,CY+Y ---------------------------------------------;
 508+ EA6F 11 00 00     .Plot1Y:            ld		de,0                            ; this is Y coord
 509+ EA72 21 00 00     .Plot1X:            ld      hl,0                            ; this is x coord
 510+ EA75 E5 D5                            push    hl,,de
 511+ EA77                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 511+ EA77             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 511+ EA77 B7          >                        or a
 511+ EA78 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 511+ EA7A DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 511+ EA7C ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 512+ EA7E EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = x coord calculated, hl =y center Y
 513+ EA7F                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 513+ EA7F             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 513+ EA7F B7          >                        or a
 513+ EA80 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 513+ EA82 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 513+ EA84 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 514+ EA86 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	            		; CX+X,CY+Y using DE = x and hl = y *** Note if we order plot 1 to 8 we can selectivley jump past many on elimiation check
 515+ EA89 D1 E1        .Plot1Done:         pop     hl,,de                          ; get de (y) and hl (x) back but reversed as the next plot expected the to be reversed from the ex de,hl above  + 0
 516+ EA8B              ;--- CX+X,CY-Y ---------------------------------------------;
 517+ EA8B E5 D5        .Plot2:             push    hl,,de                          ; e.g  do all CX + X first, so plot1, plot3 and just one check for cx + x off screen
 518+ EA8D                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 518+ EA8D             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 518+ EA8D B7          >                        or a
 518+ EA8E 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 518+ EA90 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 518+ EA92 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 519+ EA94                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot2Done        ;
 519+ EA94 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 519+ EA95 A7          >                        and     a
 519+ EA96 C2 A4 EA    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot2Done
 520+ EA99 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = calculated x
 521+ EA9A                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 521+ EA9A             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 521+ EA9A B7          >                        or a
 521+ EA9B 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 521+ EA9D DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 521+ EA9F ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 522+ EAA1 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX-X,CY+Y
 523+ EAA4 D1 E1        .Plot2Done:         pop     hl,,de
 524+ EAA6              ;--- CX-X,CY-Y ---------------------------------------------; bollocksC
 525+ EAA6 E5 D5        .Plot3:             push    hl,,de
 526+ EAA8                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 526+ EAA8             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 526+ EAA8 B7          >                        or a
 526+ EAA9 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 526+ EAAB DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 526+ EAAD ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 527+ EAAF                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot3Done        ;
 527+ EAAF 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 527+ EAB0 A7          >                        and     a
 527+ EAB1 C2 BF EA    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot3Done
 528+ EAB4 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = calculated x
 529+ EAB5                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 529+ EAB5             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 529+ EAB5 B7          >                        or a
 529+ EAB6 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 529+ EAB8 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 529+ EABA ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 530+ EABC CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX+X,CY-Y
 531+ EABF D1 E1        .Plot3Done:         pop     hl,,de
 532+ EAC1              ;--- CX-X,CY+Y ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 533+ EAC1 E5 D5        .Plot4:             push    hl,,de
 534+ EAC3                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 534+ EAC3             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 534+ EAC3 B7          >                        or a
 534+ EAC4 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 534+ EAC6 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 534+ EAC8 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 535+ EACA                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot4Done
 535+ EACA 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 535+ EACB A7          >                        and     a
 535+ EACC C2 DA EA    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot4Done
 536+ EACF EB                               ex      de,hl
 537+ EAD0                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 537+ EAD0             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 537+ EAD0 B7          >                        or a
 537+ EAD1 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 537+ EAD3 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 537+ EAD5 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 538+ EAD7 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX-X,CY-Y
 539+ EADA D1 E1        .Plot4Done:         pop     hl,,de
 540+ EADC              ;--- CX+Y,CY+X ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 541+ EADC E5 D5        .Plot5:             push    hl,,de
 542+ EADE                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 542+ EADE             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 542+ EADE B7          >                        or a
 542+ EADF 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 542+ EAE1 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 542+ EAE3 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 543+ EAE5                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot5Done
 543+ EAE5 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 543+ EAE6 A7          >                        and     a
 543+ EAE7 C2 F5 EA    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot5Done
 544+ EAEA EB                               ex      de,hl
 545+ EAEB                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 545+ EAEB             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 545+ EAEB B7          >                        or a
 545+ EAEC 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 545+ EAEE DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 545+ EAF0 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 546+ EAF2 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ;CY+X,CX+Y
 547+ EAF5 D1 E1        .Plot5Done:         pop     hl,,de
 548+ EAF7              ;--- CX+Y,CX-X ---------------------------------------------;bollocks
 549+ EAF7 E5 D5        .Plot6:             push    hl,,de
 550+ EAF9                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 550+ EAF9             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 550+ EAF9 B7          >                        or a
 550+ EAFA 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 550+ EAFC DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 550+ EAFE ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 551+ EB00                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot6Done
 551+ EB00 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 551+ EB01 A7          >                        and     a
 551+ EB02 C2 10 EB    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot6Done
 552+ EB05 EB                               ex      de,hl
 553+ EB06                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 553+ EB06             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 553+ EB06 B7          >                        or a
 553+ EB07 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 553+ EB09 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 553+ EB0B ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 554+ EB0D CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY-X,CX+Y
 555+ EB10 D1 E1        .Plot6Done:         pop     hl,,de
 556+ EB12              ;--- CX-Y,CY-X ---------------------------------------------;bollocksC
 557+ EB12 E5 D5        .Plot7:             push    hl,,de
 558+ EB14                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 558+ EB14             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 558+ EB14 B7          >                        or a
 558+ EB15 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 558+ EB17 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 558+ EB19 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 559+ EB1B                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot7Done
 559+ EB1B 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 559+ EB1C A7          >                        and     a
 559+ EB1D C2 2B EB    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot7Done
 560+ EB20 EB                               ex      de,hl
 561+ EB21                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 561+ EB21             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 561+ EB21 B7          >                        or a
 561+ EB22 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 561+ EB24 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 561+ EB26 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 562+ EB28 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY+X,CX-Y
 563+ EB2B D1 E1        .Plot7Done:         pop     hl,,de
 564+ EB2D              ;--- CX-Y,CY+X ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 565+ EB2D E5 D5        .Plot8:             push    hl,,de
 566+ EB2F                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 566+ EB2F             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 566+ EB2F B7          >                        or a
 566+ EB30 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 566+ EB32 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 566+ EB34 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 567+ EB36                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot8Done
 567+ EB36 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 567+ EB37 A7          >                        and     a
 567+ EB38 C2 46 EB    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot8Done
 568+ EB3B EB                               ex      de,hl
 569+ EB3C                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 569+ EB3C             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 569+ EB3C B7          >                        or a
 569+ EB3D 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 569+ EB3F DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 569+ EB41 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 570+ EB43 CD 5E EB                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY-X,CX-Y
 571+ EB46 D1 E1        .Plot8Done:         pop     hl,,de
 572+ EB48 D9           .PlotDone:          exx
 573+ EB49 CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
 574+ EB4B 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 575+ EB4D 19                               add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
 576+ EB4E 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		;
 577+ EB50 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
 578+ EB51 03                               inc     bc
 579+ EB52 03                               inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
 580+ EB53 DD 25                            dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
 581+ EB55 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
 582+ EB56 03                               inc     bc
 583+ EB57 13                               inc     de				; D1=D1+2
 584+ EB58 13                               inc     de
 585+ EB59 DD 2C                            inc     ixl				; X=X+1
 586+ EB5B C3 69 EA                         jp      .CircleLoop
 587+ EB5E 7A           .PlotPixel:         ld      a,d             ; filter x> 256 or negative
 588+ EB5F A7                               and     a
 589+ EB60 C0                               ret     nz
 590+ EB61 7C                               ld      a,h             ; filter y > 256 or negative
 591+ EB62 A7                               and     a
 592+ EB63 C0                               ret     nz
 593+ EB64 7D                               ld      a,l             ; filter y > 127
 594+ EB65 E6 80                            and     $80
 595+ EB67 C0                               ret     nz
 596+ EB68 3E 00        .PlotColour:        ld		a,0             ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 597+ EB6A D5 C5 E5                         push	de,,bc,,hl
 598+ EB6D 45                               ld      b,l             ; At this point de = x and hl = y
 599+ EB6E 4B                               ld      c,e
 600+ EB6F                                  l2_plot_macro; call 	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 600+ EB6F 78          >                        ld      a,b
 600+ EB70             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 600+ EB70 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 600+ EB72 D2 7E EB    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 600+ EB75 69          >                        ld      l,c
 600+ EB76 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 600+ EB79 67          >                        ld      h,a
 600+ EB7A 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 600+ EB7D 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 600+ EB7E             >.NoPlot:
 601+ EB7E E1 C1 D1                         pop		de,,bc,,hl
 602+ EB81                                  ClearCarryFlag
 602+ EB81 B7          >                        or a
 603+ EB82 C9                               ret
 604+ EB83 7C           .circleSinglepixel: ld      a,h             ; as its 1 pixel if h or d are non zero then its off screen
 605+ EB84 B2                               or      d
 606+ EB85 C0                               ret     nz
 607+ EB86 CB 7B                            bit     7,e             ; and if Y is > 127 then off screen , bit is 8 states like ld a,e and a
 608+ EB88 C0                               ret     nz
 609+ EB89 78                               ld      a,b             ; a = colour
 610+ EB8A 43                               ld      b,e             ; b = y
 611+ EB8B 4D                               ld      c,l             ; c = x
 612+ EB8C CD B6 E2                         call    l2_plot_pixel
 613+ EB8F C9                               ret

   5+ EB92              ; ">l2_draw_circle_fill BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"
   6+ EB92              ; Note this code currently does not process BC
   7+ EB92 7B           l2_draw_circle_fill:    ld		a,e
   8+ EB93 32 29 EC                             ld		(.LineColour+1),a
   9+ EB96 7A                                   ld		a,d								; get radius
  10+ EB97 A7                                   and		a
  11+ EB98 C8                                   ret		z
  12+ EB99 FE 01                                cp		1
  13+ EB9B CA 26 EA                             jp		z,CircleSinglepixel

  15+ EBA2 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = raidus (x)

  18+ EBA9 6F                                   ld		l,a

  20+ EBAB EB                                   ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
  21+ EBAC 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3

  23+ EBB0 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
  24+ EBB2 44                                   ld		b,h
  25+ EBB3 4D                                   ld		c,l								; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
  26+ EBB4 21 01 00     .calcdelta              ld		hl,1

  36+ EBC7 11 00 00     .Line1:                 ld		de,0
  37+ EBCA 7B                                   ld 		a,e
  38+ EBCB DD 95                                sub 	ixl
  39+ EBCD 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  40+ EBCE 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  41+ EBCF DD 84                                add 	a,ixh

  43+ EBD2                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: add double x calc"
  44+ EBD2                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE X CALC

  52+ EBDE 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  53+ EBDF 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  54+ EBE0 DD 94                                sub 	ixh

  65+ EBF0 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  66+ EBF1 DD 85                                add 	a,ixl

  72+ EBF9 CD 24 EC                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-Y,CY+x
  73+ EBFC D1                                   pop		de
  74+ EBFD 7B           .Line4:	                ld 		a,e
  75+ EBFE DD 94                                sub		ixh
  76+ EC00 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  77+ EC01 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  78+ EC02 DD 95                                sub 	ixl
  79+ EC04 47                                   ld 		b,a
  80+ EC05                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE Y CALC

  82+ EC06 DD 54                                ld		d,ixh
  83+ EC08 CB 22                                sla		d
  84+ EC0A CD 24 EC                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-Y,CY+x
  85+ EC0D D1                                   pop		de
  86+ EC0E D9                                   exx
  87+ EC0F CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit 7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
  88+ EC11 28 03                                jr z,.draw_circle_1
  89+ EC13 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
  90+ EC14 18 05                                jr .draw_circle_2		;
  91+ EC16 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
  92+ EC17 03                                   inc bc
  93+ EC18 03                                   inc bc				; D2=D2+2
  94+ EC19 DD 25                                dec ixh				; Y=Y-1
  95+ EC1B 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				; D2=D2+2
  96+ EC1C 03                                   inc bc
  97+ EC1D 13                                   inc de				; D1=D1+2
  98+ EC1E 13                                   inc de
  99+ EC1F DD 2C                                inc ixl				; X=X+1
 100+ EC21 C3 C1 EB                             jp .CircleLoop
 101+ EC24 D5 C5 E5 F5  .PlotLine:              push	de,,bc,,hl,,af
 102+ EC28 3E 00        .LineColour:	        ld		a,0         ; circle colur
 103+ EC2A 5F                                   ld      e,a

 107+ EC33
 108+ EC33              ; ">l2_draw_clipped_circle HL = Center X 2's c, DE = Center Y 2's , c = radius, b = colour"
 109+ EC33              l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled:
 110+ EC33 78                               ld      a,b                             ; save Colour
 111+ EC34 32 2E ED                         ld		(.PlotColour+1),a
 112+ EC37 79                               ld		a,c								; get radius
 113+ EC38                                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 113+ EC38 A7          >                        and     a
 113+ EC39 C8          >                        ret     z
 114+ EC3A                                  JumpIfAEqNusng  1, .circleSinglepixel
 114+ EC3A FE 01       >                        cp     1
 114+ EC3C CA 34 ED    >                        jp      z,.circleSinglepixel
 115+ EC3F ED 53 6C EC                      ld		(.Plot1Y+1),de					; save origin into DE and HL
 116+ EC43 22 6F EC                         ld      (.Plot1X+1),hl                  ; .
 117+ EC46                                  DISPLAY "TODO : IXH and IXL need to be 16 bit and in IX and IY"
 118+ EC46 DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = x = raidus
 119+ EC48 DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = y = error
 120+ EC4B 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0                             ; hl = radius
 121+ EC4D 6F                               ld		l,a                             ; raidius is still in a at this point
 122+ EC4E 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
 123+ EC4F EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
 124+ EC50 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 125+ EC53                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 125+ EC53 B7          >                        or a
 126+ EC54 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; .
 127+ EC56 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 128+ EC58 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1                            ; hl = 1
 129+ EC5B 16 00                            ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl (error)
 130+ EC5D DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl                           ;
 131+ EC5F                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 131+ EC5F B7          >                        or a
 132+ EC60 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - error
 133+ EC62 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1                            ; de = 1
 134+ EC65              .CircleLoop:        ReturnIfRegLTNusng ixh, ixl             ; if radius > ixl counter
 134+ EC65 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
 134+ EC67 DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 134+ EC69 D8          >                        ret	    c
 135+ EC6A D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx                                     ; save all bc,de,hl registers
 136+ EC6B              ; For line drawing we can go from left to right in a single call
 137+ EC6B              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY+Y -------------------------------;
 138+ EC6B 11 00 00     .Plot1Y:            ld		de,0                            ; this is Y coord
 139+ EC6E 21 00 00     .Plot1X:            ld      hl,0                            ; this is x coord
 140+ EC71 E5 D5        .Plot1:             push    hl,,de                          ; push X then Y  on top Stack+2
 141+ EC73                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ; hl = CX - X
 141+ EC73             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 141+ EC73 B7          >                        or a
 141+ EC74 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 141+ EC76 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 141+ EC78 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 142+ EC7A EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = CX - X
 143+ EC7B ED 53 9F EC                      ld      (.LoadDEXStart1+1),de           ; save it for Plot 2 as well
 144+ EC7F                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ; hl = CY + Y
 144+ EC7F             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 144+ EC7F B7          >                        or a
 144+ EC80 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 144+ EC82 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 144+ EC84 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 145+ EC86 06 00                            ld      b,0                             ; Now we have calculated D is bc
 146+ EC88 DD 4C                            ld      c,ixh                           ;
 147+ EC8A                                  ShiftBCLeft1                            ;
 147+ EC8A CB 21       >			   sla c
 147+ EC8C CB 10       >			   rl  b
 148+ EC8E ED 43 A2 EC                      ld      (.LoadBCLength1+1),bc            ; self modifying to optimise laod on line 2
 149+ EC92 CD F3 EC                         call	.PlotLine               		; de = start X, hl= Y line, bc = length
 150+ EC95 E1           .Plot1Done:         pop     hl                              ; Stack+1 get cy from stack into hl to save an ex as we have pre calculated x positions
 151+ EC96              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY-Y -------------------------------;
 152+ EC96 E5           .Plot2:             push    hl                              ; Stack+2 put cy back on stack so it holds cy stack already holds cx
 153+ EC97                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ; now we have CY-Y in hl
 153+ EC97             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 153+ EC97 B7          >                        or a
 153+ EC98 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 153+ EC9A DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 153+ EC9C ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 154+ EC9E 11 00 00     .LoadDEXStart1:     ld      de,0                            ; de is loaded from above via self modiying code with start X
 155+ ECA1 01 00 00     .LoadBCLength1:     ld      bc,0                            ; bc is loaded from above via self modifying code with length
 156+ ECA4 CD F3 EC                         call	.PlotLine                       ;
 157+ ECA7 D1 E1        .Plot2Done:         pop     hl,,de                          ; Stack+0 now hl = cx, de = cy
 158+ ECA9              ;--- from CX-Y to CX+Y, CY+X -------------------------------;
 159+ ECA9 D5           .Plot3:             push    de                              ; Stack + 1 we need cy for final plot calculation
 160+ ECAA                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ; hl = CX - Y
 160+ ECAA             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 160+ ECAA B7          >                        or a
 160+ ECAB 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 160+ ECAD DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 160+ ECAF ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 161+ ECB1 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = CX - Y
 162+ ECB2 ED 53 D5 EC                      ld      (.LoadDEXStart2+1),de             ; save it for Plot 2 as well
 163+ ECB6                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ; hl = CY + X
 163+ ECB6             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 163+ ECB6 B7          >                        or a
 163+ ECB7 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 163+ ECB9 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 163+ ECBB ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 164+ ECBD 06 00                            ld      b,0                             ; Now we have calculated D is bc
 165+ ECBF DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl                           ;
 166+ ECC1                                  ShiftBCLeft1                            ;
 166+ ECC1 CB 21       >			   sla c
 166+ ECC3 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 167+ ECC5 ED 43 D8 EC                      ld      (.LoadBCLength2+1),bc            ; self modifying to optimise laod on line 2
 168+ ECC9 CD F3 EC                         call	.PlotLine               		; de = start X, hl= Y line, bc = length
 169+ ECCC E1           .Plot3Done:         pop     hl                              ; Stack + 0 get cy from stack into hl to save an ex as we have pre calculated x positions
 170+ ECCD              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY-Y -------------------------------;
 171+ ECCD              .Plot4a:            CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ; now we have CY-X in hl
 171+ ECCD             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 171+ ECCD B7          >                        or a
 171+ ECCE 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 171+ ECD0 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 171+ ECD2 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 172+ ECD4 11 00 00     .LoadDEXStart2:     ld      de,0                            ; de is loaded from above via self modiying code with start X
 173+ ECD7 01 00 00     .LoadBCLength2:     ld      bc,0                            ; bc is loaded from above via self modifying code with length
 174+ ECDA CD F3 EC                         call	.PlotLine                       ;
 175+ ECDD D9           .PlotDone:          exx                                     ; get back data from alternate registers
 176+ ECDE CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h			                  	; Check for Hl<=0
 177+ ECE0 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 178+ ECE2 19                               add hl,de			                    ; Delta=Delta+D1
 179+ ECE3 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		            ;
 180+ ECE5 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc		                    ; Delta=Delta+D2
 181+ ECE6 03                               inc     bc
 182+ ECE7 03                               inc     bc			                    ; D2=D2+2
 183+ ECE8 DD 25                            dec     ixh			                    ; Y=Y-1
 184+ ECEA 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc     bc			                    ; D2=D2+2
 185+ ECEB 03                               inc     bc
 186+ ECEC 13                               inc     de			                    ; D1=D1+2
 187+ ECED 13                               inc     de
 188+ ECEE DD 2C                            inc     ixl			                    ; X=X+1
 189+ ECF0 C3 65 EC                         jp      .CircleLoop
 190+ ECF3              ;-- PERFORM THE LINE DRAW ----------------------------------;
 191+ ECF3              ; comes in with de = left x , hl = y, bc = length
 192+ ECF3              ; Note bc must be +ve < 32768
 193+ ECF3              .PlotLine:
 194+ ECF3 7C           .IsYOnScreen:       ld      a,h                             ; if y > 255 or < 0 then no line to draw
 195+ ECF4 A7                               and     a                               ;
 196+ ECF5 C0                               ret     nz                              ;
 197+ ECF6 7D                               ld      a,l                             ;
 198+ ECF7 A7                               and     a                               ;
 199+ ECF8 F8                               ret     m                               ; if m set then y must be > 127
 200+ ECF9              ;-- now check X coordinate, if X < 256 then skip x position clip
 201+ ECF9 7A           .IsXOffRight:       ld      a,d                             ; if x >255
 202+ ECFA A7                               and     a
 203+ ECFB 28 19                            jr      z,.NoLeftClip                   ; if high is not set then no X clip
 204+ ECFD              ;-- if X > 255 then off screen so just skip line
 205+ ECFD F0           .LeftClip:          ret     p                               ; if its > 255 then no line
 206+ ECFE              ;-- if its off the left then add distance, if this is < 0 then off screen skip
 207+ ECFE E5           .IsTotallyOffLeft:  push    hl                              ; if X pos + length <0 then no line
 208+ ECFF 62 6B                            ld      hl,de                           ; .
 209+ ED01                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 209+ ED01 B7          >                        or a
 210+ ED02              ;    but also this calculation gives us the line length if x is clipped to 90
 211+ ED02 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc                           ; .
 212+ ED04 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; save the result in HL as this is also line length from hl = 0
 213+ ED06 E1                               pop     hl                              ; .
 214+ ED07 F8                               ret     m                               ; if x + distance < 0 then off screen skip
 215+ ED08              ;-- now as its on screen but clipped x < 0 we can just draw a line from 0 to x+d, maxed at x+d = 255
 216+ ED08 11 00 00     .ClippedSpanX:      ld      de,0                            ; if off left X = 0, bc already calcualted above in ADC
 217+ ED0B 78                               ld      a,b                             ; if bc < 255 then good
 218+ ED0C A7                               and     a
 219+ ED0D CA 2A ED                         jp      z,.NoPopPlotColour              ;
 220+ ED10 01 FF 00                         ld      bc,255                          ; max length
 221+ ED13 C3 2A ED                         jp      .NoPopPlotColour                ; we can now just draw
 222+ ED16              ;-- No left side clipping needed so we just need to work out if x + d > 255
 223+ ED16 E5           .NoLeftClip:        push    hl                              ; STACK+1 if corrected x + length < 256 then
 224+ ED17 62 6B                            ld      hl,de                           ; just plot
 225+ ED19 09                               add     hl,bc
 226+ ED1A 7C                               ld      a,h
 227+ ED1B B7                               or      a
 228+ ED1C E1                               pop     hl
 229+ ED1D CA 2A ED                         jp      z,.NoPopPlotColour
 230+ ED20              ;-- x + d > 255 so we plot from x to distance 255 - x
 231+ ED20 E5           .LengthClip:        push    hl
 232+ ED21 21 FF 00                         ld      hl,255
 233+ ED24                                  ClearCarryFlag
 233+ ED24 B7          >                        or a
 234+ ED25 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de                           ; now hl = corrected length
 235+ ED27 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl
 236+ ED29              ;-- This entry point is if there is hl on the stack
 237+ ED29 E1           .PopHLPlotColour:   pop     hl
 238+ ED2A 51           .NoPopPlotColour:   ld      d,c             ; d = length
 239+ ED2B 4B                               ld      c,e             ; c = start X
 240+ ED2C 45                               ld      b,l             ; b = row Y
 241+ ED2D 1E 00        .PlotColour:        ld		e,0             ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 242+ ED2F CD 77 E4                         call    l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
 243+ ED32                                  ClearCarryFlag
 243+ ED32 B7          >                        or a
 244+ ED33 C9                               ret
 245+ ED34 7C           .circleSinglepixel: ld      a,h             ; as its 1 pixel if h or d are non zero then its off screen
 246+ ED35 B2                               or      d
 247+ ED36 C0                               ret     nz
 248+ ED37 CB 7B                            bit     7,e             ; and if Y is > 127 then off screen , bit is 8 states like ld a,e and a
 249+ ED39 C0                               ret     nz
 250+ ED3A 78                               ld      a,b             ; a = colour
 251+ ED3B 43                               ld      b,e             ; b = y
 252+ ED3C 4D                               ld      c,l             ; c = x
 253+ ED3D CD B6 E2                         call    l2_plot_pixel
 254+ ED40 C9                               ret
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle_fill.asm
1424  ED41                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
   1+ ED41
   2+ ED41 FF FF        starty                  DW     $FFFF
   3+ ED43 FF FF        endy                    DW     $FFFF
   4+ ED45 CF           traingleColor           DB     $CF
   5+ ED46 00 00 00...  SaveArrayS1             DS     128*2
   6+ EE46 00 00 00...  SaveArrayS2             DS     128*2
   7+ EF46
   8+ EF46                      IFDEF Add_l2_drawHorzClipY
   9+ EF46 ~            l2_drawHorzClipY:
  10+ EF46 ~            .ClipY:                 ex      de,hl                       ; get X1 into de
  11+ EF46 ~            .ClipDE:                bit     7,d
  12+ EF46 ~                                    jr      z,.DEPositive
  13+ EF46 ~            .DENegative:            ld      de,0
  14+ EF46 ~                                    jp      .ClipDEDone
  15+ EF46 ~            .DEPositive:            ld      a,d
  16+ EF46 ~                                    and     a
  17+ EF46 ~                                    jp      z,.ClipDE127
  18+ EF46 ~            .ClipDE256:             ld      de,127
  19+ EF46 ~                                    jp      .ClipDEDone
  20+ EF46 ~            .ClipDE127:             bit     7,e
  21+ EF46 ~                                    jp      z,.ClipDEDone
  22+ EF46 ~                                    ld      de,127
  23+ EF46 ~            .ClipDEDone:
  24+ EF46 ~            .AdjustStartY:          ld      hl,(starty)
  25+ EF46 ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn           ; if de < HL
  26+ EF46 ~                                    jr      z,.AdjustEndY               ;
  27+ EF46 ~                                    jr      c,.AdjustEndY               ;
  28+ EF46 ~            .ClipStartY:            ld      (starty),de                 ; .
  29+ EF46 ~            .AdjustEndY:            ld      hl,(endy)                   ; is endy still uninitialised
  30+ EF46 ~            .InitEndY:              ld      a,h                         ;
  31+ EF46 ~                                    and     l                           ;
  32+ EF46 ~                                    cp      $FF                         ;
  33+ EF46 ~                                    jr      z,.ForceEndYSet
  34+ EF46 ~            .CheckEndY:             call    CompareHLDESgn           ; if de < HL
  35+ EF46 ~                                    ret     z
  36+ EF46 ~                                    ret     nc
  37+ EF46 ~            .ForceEndYSet:          ld      (endy),de
  38+ EF46 ~                                    ret
  39+ EF46                      ENDIF

  42+ EF46 2A CE EF     l2_drawVertClip:        ld      hl,(y1)
  43+ EF49 ED 5B D2 EF                          ld      de,(y2)
  44+ EF4D CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn

  49+ EF58 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0

  51+ EF5C A7                                   and     a
  52+ EF5D CA 65 EF                             jp      z,.y2lt255
  53+ EF60 1E 7F                                ld      e,127
  54+ EF62 C3 6C EF                             jp      .y2Clipped
  55+ EF65 CB 7B        .y2lt255:               bit     7,e
  56+ EF67 CA 6C EF                             jp      z,.y2Clipped
  57+ EF6A 1E 7F                                ld      e,127
  58+ EF6C ED 4B CC EF  .y2Clipped:             ld      bc,(x1)
  59+ EF70 45                                   ld      b,l
  60+ EF71 53                                   ld      d,e
  61+ EF72 1E BF                                ld      e,$BF
  62+ EF74 C3 55 E5                             jp      l2_draw_vert_line_to                ; ">bc = row col d = to position, e = color"
  63+ EF77
  64+ EF77
  65+ EF77 2A CC EF     l2_drawHorzClip:        ld      hl,(x1)
  66+ EF7A ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)
  67+ EF7E CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn
  68+ EF81 30 01                                jr      nc,.x1ltex2
  69+ EF83 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  70+ EF84 CB 7C        .x1ltex2:               bit     7,h
  71+ EF86 CA 8C EF                             jp      z,.x1Positive
  72+ EF89 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
  73+ EF8C 7A           .x1Positive             ld      a,d
  74+ EF8D A7                                   and     a
  75+ EF8E CA 93 EF                             jp      z,.x2Clipped
  76+ EF91 1E FF                                ld      e,255
  77+ EF93 ED 4B CE EF  .x2Clipped:             ld      bc,(y1)
  78+ EF97 41                                   ld      b,c
  79+ EF98 4D                                   ld      c,l
  80+ EF99 53                                   ld      d,e
  81+ EF9A 1E BF                                ld      e,$BF
  82+ EF9C C3 BD E4                             jp      l2_draw_horz_line_to                ; "bc = left side row,col, d right pixel, e = color"
  83+ EF9F
  84+ EF9F                      IFDEF Add_l2_drawVertClipY
  85+ EF9F ~            l2_drawVertClipY:       bit     7,d                     ; i = (py1<0?0:py1);
  86+ EF9F ~                                    jr      z,.PYIsOK
  87+ EF9F ~            .SetPYTo0:              ld      de,0
  88+ EF9F ~            .PYIsOK:                ld      hl,(starty)
  89+ EF9F ~                                    IsHLEqu255
  90+ EF9F ~                                    jp      z,.UpdateStartY
  91+ EF9F ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn       ; or starty > py
  92+ EF9F ~                                    jr      nc,.UpdateStartY        ;
  93+ EF9F ~                                    jp      .PrepareUpdateArray
  94+ EF9F ~            .UpdateStartY:          ld      (starty),de
  95+ EF9F ~            .PrepareUpdateArray:    JumpIfRegLTE c, 127, .UpdateCounters ; we loop from
  96+ EF9F ~                                    ld      c,127
  97+ EF9F ~            .UpdateEndY:            ld      (endy),bc               ; save BC to endy y as its now clamped, thsi frees up BC regsiters
  98+ EF9F ~            .UpdateCounters:        ld      hl,ix                   ; get target array index and set it to
  99+ EF9F ~                                    add     hl,de                   ; targetArray[de]
 100+ EF9F ~                                    add     hl,de                   ; .
 101+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,c                     ; now set up B as an iterator
 102+ EF9F ~                                    sub     b                       ; for py2 - py1 + 1 entries
 103+ EF9F ~                                    inc     a                       ; .
 104+ EF9F ~                                    ld      b,a                     ; .
 105+ EF9F ~                                    ld      de,ix                   ; we don't need de anymore to move ix for faster instructions
 106+ EF9F ~            .UpdateArray:           ld      (hl),de                 ; use sjasm fake as it does (hl)=e,inc hl, (hl)=d,inc hl
 107+ EF9F ~                                    inc     a                       ; use a as a counter for the end when we update EndY
 108+ EF9F ~                                    djnz    .UpdateArray            ; .
 109+ EF9F ~                                    ret                             ; we are now done
 110+ EF9F                      ENDIF
 111+ EF9F
 112+ EF9F
 113+ EF9F              ; ">l2_draw_any_line, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color: determines if its horizontal, vertical or diagonal then hands off the work"
 114+ EF9F              ; b - y0 c - x0, d - y1 e - x1 a - colour
 115+ EF9F 08           l2_draw_any_line:       ex		af,af'              ; save colour into a'
 116+ EFA0 79                                   ld		a,c                 ; if x and e are the same its horizontal
 117+ EFA1 BB                                   cp		e
 118+ EFA2 28 08                                jr		z,.HorizontalLineCheck
 119+ EFA4 78                                   ld		a,b                 ; if b and d are the same its vertica;
 120+ EFA5 BA                                   cp		d
 121+ EFA6 28 0E                                jr		z,.VerticalLine
 122+ EFA8              ; use jp and get a free ret instruction optimisation
 123+ EFA8 08           .DiagonalLine:		    ex		af,af'			     ; get colour back into a
 124+ EFA9 C3 74 E7                             jp		l2_draw_diagonal
 125+ EFAC
 126+ EFAC 78           .HorizontalLineCheck:   ld      a,b
 127+ EFAD BA                                   cp      d
 128+ EFAE 28 0B                                jr      z, .SinglePixel
 129+ EFB0 08           .HorizontalLine:        ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
 130+ EFB1 53                                   ld		d,e				    ; set d as target right pixel
 131+ EFB2 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
 132+ EFB3 C3 BD E4                             jp		l2_draw_horz_line_to
 133+ EFB6 08           .VerticalLine:          ex		af,af'
 134+ EFB7 5F                                   ld		e,a				    ; e holds colour on this call
 135+ EFB8 C3 55 E5                             jp		l2_draw_vert_line_to
 136+ EFBB 08           .SinglePixel:           ex		af,af'              ; get colour back into a
 137+ EFBC                                      l2_plot_macro; jp      l2_plot_pixel
 137+ EFBC 78          >                        ld      a,b
 137+ EFBD             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 137+ EFBD FE C0       >                        cp     192
 137+ EFBF D2 CB EF    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 137+ EFC2 69          >                        ld      l,c
 137+ EFC3 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 137+ EFC6 67          >                        ld      h,a
 137+ EFC7 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 137+ EFCA 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 137+ EFCB             >.NoPlot:
 138+ EFCB C9                                   ret
 139+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;......................................................
 140+ EFCC              ;-*-*-; hl'hl = x1y1 de'de = x3y3 , does not save, just plots points
 141+ EFCC              ;-*-*-Layer2_draw_ClipY_Line:
 142+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Eliminte totally off screen first
 143+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1HighTest:            IsHLGT127                       ; if y1 and y2 > 127
 144+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Y1HighLTE127        ; .
 145+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y2HighTest:            IsDEGT127                       ; .
 146+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                       ;   return
 147+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1HighLTE127:
 148+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1LowTest:             bit     7,h                     ; if y1 and y2 < 0
 149+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.YTestPass            ; .
 150+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,d                     ; .
 151+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                      ;   return
 152+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.YTestPass:             exx                             ; hl hl' = x1y1 de de' = x2y2
 153+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,h                     ; if x1 and x2 < 0 or > 255
 154+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        and     a                       ; then in either scenario high
 155+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XTestPass            ; byte will not be zero
 156+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,d                     ; .
 157+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        and     a                       ; .
 158+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     nz                      ;   return
 159+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XTestPass:                                             ;
 160+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Check for horizontal and vertical exceptions
 161+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.CheckForVertical:      call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if x1 = x2 then vertical line
 162+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, l2_drawVertClipY     ;    goto vertical and use its ret as a free exit
 163+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.CheckForHorizontal:    exx                             ; hl'hl = x1y1 de'de = x2y2
 164+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if y1 = y2 then horizonal line
 165+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, l2_drawHorzClipY     ; goto  horizontal and use its ret as a free exit
 166+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ; hl hl' = x1y1 de de' = x2y2
 167+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Now we can draw diagnoal, note we are pre-sorting Y so no need to do sort logic
 168+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Check if X1 > X2 and set sign, X1 x2 and clip accordingly
 169+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SetupMinMaxX:          call    CompareHLDESigned       ; If x1 > x2
 170+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      c, .x1LTx2              ; . (else jump to x1 < x2 as we have already handled x1 = x2)
 171+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.x1GTEx2:               ld      a,$FF                   ;   sign_x = -1 (also iyh)
 172+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (sign_x),a              ;   .
 173+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      iyh,a
 174+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;   x1 = - x1
 175+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegDE                           ;   x2 = - x2
 176+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        xor     a                       ;   xmax = 0
 177+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax),a           ;   .
 178+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax+1),a         ;   .
 179+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     a                       ;   xmin = -255 ($FF01)
 180+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin),a           ;   .
 181+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,$FF
 182+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin+1),a         ;   .
 183+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .DoneSignSetup          ; else
 184+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       if X1<X2 then set up sign as 1, clip, we don't need to change X1 and X2
 185+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.x1LTx2:                ld      a,1                     ;   sign_x = 1 (also iyh)
 186+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (sign_x),a              ;   .
 187+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      iyh,a                   ;   .
 188+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ZeroA                           ;   clip_xmin = 0
 189+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin),a           ;   .
 190+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmin+1),a         ;   .
 191+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax+1),a         ;   clip_xmax = 255
 192+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        dec     a                       ;   .
 193+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (clip_xmax),a           ;   .
 194+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.DoneSignSetup:
 195+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta x = x2 - x1
 196+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.CalcDeltas:            ex      de,hl                   ; de = x1 hl = x2
 197+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        push    hl                      ; save x2                       Stack+1
 198+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; delta_x = x2 - x1
 199+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 200+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x),hl            ; .
