 201+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta X step
 202+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; multiply by 2
 203+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ; .
 204+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x_step),hl       ; delta_x_step = delta x * 2
 205+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        pop     hl                      ; Restore X2                     Stack+0
 206+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ; now hl = x2 and de = x1
 207+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta y = y2 - y1
 208+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.CalcDeltaY:            exx                             ; hl = y1 de = y2, we don't save hl,de as we will load later
 209+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y1Work),hl             ; y1Work = y1
 210+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        push    hl                      ; save y1 so that it can be loaded to HL later
 211+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y2Work),de             ; y2Work = y2
 212+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ; set de to y2Work and hl to y1Work
 213+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; delta_y = y2 - y1
 214+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 215+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_y),hl            ; .
 216+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Set up Delta Y step
 217+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; multiply by 2
 218+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ; .
 219+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_y_step),hl       ; delta_y_step = delta y * 2
 220+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ; now hl = y1 de = y2
 221+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       x_pos = x1, y_pos = y1
 222+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SavePositions:         exx                             ; de = x1 hl = x2
 223+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x1Work),de             ; x1Work = x1
 224+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x2Work),hl             ; x2Work = x2
 225+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ;ex      de,hl                   ; hl = x1 de = x2
 226+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        pop     hl                      ; y_pos = hl = y1   = y_pos     Stack+0
 227+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),de              ; .
 228+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),hl              ; .
 229+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Check for Delta X >= Delta Y and do respective code version
 230+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.CheckDeltaXGTEDeltaY:  ld      hl,(delta_x)            ; hl = delta x
 231+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ; de = delta y
 232+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned       ; if data x < deltay
 233+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      c, DeltaXltDeltaY
 234+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 235+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       this is where dx >= dy
 236+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Delta X >= DeltaY ---------------------------------;    error = delta y_step - delta x
 237+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       Error = delta Y Step - Delta X and set Exit false
 238+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2DeltaXgteDeltaY:      ErrorEquStepMinusDelta delta_y_step, delta_x ; this also sets de to delta x
 239+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        SetExitFalse                    ;    set exit = false
 240+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;---                    if y < 0 then set y = 0 & save X pos to targetArray[0]..;
 241+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsY1TL0:               IsAxisLT0 (y1Work)              ;    if y1 < 0
 242+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp     z,.Y1IsNotLT0           ;    .
 243+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = 2 * (-y1) -1 * delta X
 244+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1IsLT0:               ex      de,hl                   ;       de = delta x
 245+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;       temp = (2 * (0 - y1) - 1) * delta_x; Note from entering de = delta_x
 246+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;       .      (0-y1 also equals negate y1)
 247+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .
 248+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        adc     hl,hl                   ;       .      (y1 = y1 * 2)
 249+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        dec     hl                      ;       .      (y1 = y1 -1)
 250+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;       .      (multiply by de which is delta x)
 251+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;       .      (and save to linetemp)
 252+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .  (set BC to divq floor bc/de)
 253+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;       msd = floor_divq (temp, delta_y_step)
 254+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor (temp , delta y step)
 255+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;       .
 256+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos += msd
 257+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;       x pos += msd (move msd to de)
 258+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;       .            (pull in x1temp and add de)
 259+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .
 260+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;       .            (store result in x_pos)
 261+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 262+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTClipXMax:      ld      de,(clip_xmax)          ;       if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 263+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ;       .
 264+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XPosLTEXMax         ;       .
 265+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     nc                      ;       .
 266+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XPosLTEXMax:
 267+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... if x_pos > clip_xmin
 268+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTEClipXmin:     ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ;       if x_pos >= clip_xmin
 269+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ;       .
 270+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XposLTClipXmin       ;       .
 271+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      c,.XposLTClipXmin       ;
 272+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... then rem = temp - msd * delta y step
 273+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XposGTEClipXMin:       ld      hl,(msd)                ;          rem = temp - msd * delta_y_step
 274+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;          .     (de =  delta_y_step)
 275+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;          .     (hl = msd * delta y step)
 276+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;          .     (de = hl)
 277+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(linetemp)           ;          .     (hl = linetemp)
 278+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;          .
 279+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;          .     (hl = hl = de)
 280+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (rem),hl                ;          .     (rem = result)
 281+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... y pos = 0
 282+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        xor     a                       ;          y_pos = 0
 283+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),a               ;          .
 284+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos+1),a             ;          .
 285+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... error = error - (rem + delta x)
 286+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x)            ;          error -= rem + delta_x
 287+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;          .      (hl = (rem still) (de = delta x) )
 288+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;          .      (move result into de)
 289+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;          .      (get error into hl)
 290+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;          .      (error - de)
 291+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;          .
 292+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;          .      (save in hl)
 293+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... if rem > 0
 294+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        IsMem16GT0JumpFalse rem, .remNotGT0 ;      if (rem > 0)
 295+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... ... xpos ++
 296+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.remGT0:                ld      hl,x_pos                ;              x_pos += 1
 297+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     (hl)                    ;              .
 298+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... ... error += delta y step
 299+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ErrorPlusStep delta_y_step      ;              error += delta_y_step
 300+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... set exit true
 301+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.remNotGT0:             ld      a,$FF                   ;          set_exit = true
 302+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (set_exit),a            ;          .
 303+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ...  set target array [0] to xpos
 304+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;          targetArray[0] = x_pos
 305+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (ix+0),l                ;          .  (targetArray is pointed to by ix)
 306+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (ix+1),h                ;          .
 307+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1IsNotLT0:
 308+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       x pos end = x2
 309+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XposLTClipXmin:        ld      hl,(x2Work)             ;    x_pos_end = x2
 310+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;    .
 311+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       if y2 > 127
 312+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsY2GT127:             ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;    if (y2 > 127)
 313+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        IsHLGT127                       ;    .
 314+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Y2LTE127            ;    .
 315+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = delta x step * (127 - y1) + delta x
 316+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y2GT127:               ld      de,(y1Work)             ;       temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x
 317+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,127                  ;       .      (de = y1work)
 318+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .      (hl = 127 )
 319+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;       .      (hl - de)
 320+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;       .      (de = delta x step)
 321+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;       .      (hl = hl * de)
 322+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x)            ;       .      (de = delta x)
 323+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .      (hl + de)
 324+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;       .      (and save to line temp)
 325+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       de = delta y step
 326+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;       de = linetemp hl = delta y step
 327+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor_divq (temp, delta y step)
 328+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;       msd = floor_divq(temp,delta_y_step); (hl=de/hl)
 329+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,hl                   ;       save off msd as we will need it again
 330+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(x1Work)             ;
 331+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos_end = x1 + msd
 332+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 333+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;
 334+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... if (temp - msd * delta y step)) == 0
 335+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,bc                   ;       if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end;
 336+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .    (hl = msd * delta_y_step)
 337+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;       .
 338+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;       .    (hl = linetemp - hl
 339+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(linetemp)           ;       .
 340+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;       .
 341+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;       .
 342+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.Calc1NotZero        ;       .
 343+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... x pos end minus 1
 344+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,x_pos_end            ;           then -- x_pos_end
 345+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        dec     (hl)                    ;           .
 346+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Calc1NotZero:
 347+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       if sign_x == -1
 348+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y2LTE127:              break
 349+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        IsMemNegative8JumpFalse sign_x, .SignXNotNegative ; just check if its negative
 350+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos = - xpos
 351+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SignXNegative:         ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;       x_pos = -x_pos
 352+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;       .
 353+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;       .
 354+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos end = - xpos end
 355+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos_end)          ;       x_pos_end = -x_pos_end
 356+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                           ;       .
 357+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos_end),hl          ;       .
 358+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        dec     (hl)                    ;       .
 359+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       delta x step = delta x step - delta y step
 360+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SignXNotNegative:      ld      hl,(delta_x_step)       ;    delta_x_step -= delta_y_step
 361+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;    .
 362+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;    .
 363+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;    .
 364+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (delta_x_step),hl       ;    .
 365+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 366+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- DxFTEDyNotLongest while loop ----------------------;
 367+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2DxGTEDy:                ld      bc,(x_pos)              ;    while (x_pos != x_pos_end) loading bc with xppos an de as x_pos_end
 368+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(x_pos_end)          ;    .
 369+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,ix                   ;    load hl as target array
 370+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(y_pos)               ;    by this point y pos must be 8 bit
 371+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    So we are setting up hl as targetArray pointer
 372+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    .
 373+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 374+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Version where longest is not saved ----------------;
 375+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;      switch to alternate registers
 376+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;      load up stepping into alternate registers
 377+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;      .
 378+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,(delta_y_step)       ;      .
 379+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;      .
 380+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(sign_x)              ;      Self modify inc of y_pos
 381+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        and     $80                     ;
 382+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.SetWhileInc          ;
 383+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SetWhileDec:           ld      a,InstrDECBC
 384+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction), a
 385+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 386+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SetWhileInc:           ld      a,InstrINCBC
 387+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction), a
 388+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Update Loop ---------------------------------------;
 389+ EFCC              ;-*-*-; In loop hl  = target array pointer bc = x_pos,       de = x_pos_end, (we don't need to reatin Y_pos)
 390+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;         hl' = error                bc'= delta_y_step de'=delta_x_step
 391+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.WhileLoop:             call    CompareBCDESigned       ;      while x_pos != x_pos_end
 392+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     z                       ;      .
 393+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    L2_plotAtRowLColC       ;        targetArray[y_pos] = x_pos
 394+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;        if error >= 0
 395+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,h                     ;        .
 396+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.ErrorNegative       ;        .
 397+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.ErrorPositive:         ClearCarryFlag                  ;             error -= delta_x_step
 398+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ;             .
 399+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 400+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl                      ;             y pos for target Array index +2
 401+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl                      ;             as its 16 bit
 402+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileIncInstuction     ;             .
 403+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,bc                   ;        else error += delta y step
 404+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 405+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     bc                      ;       x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 406+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 407+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 408+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- ELSE ----------------------------------------------;
 409+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- DX < DY -------------------------------------------;
 410+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 411+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       error = delta x_step - delta y
 412+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2DeltaXltDeltaY:       ErrorEquStepMinusDelta delta_x_step, delta_y
 413+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       set exit false
 414+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        SetExitFalse                    ; set exit = false
 415+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       if x1 < xmin && y pos > 127 then exit early
 416+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsY1TL0:               ld      hl,(x1Work)             ; if x1 < clip xmin
 417+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ; .
 418+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ; .
 419+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, .X1gteClipMin        ; .
 420+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      c, .X1ltClipMin         ; and y_pos > 127
 421+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;
 422+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.X1gteClipMin:          ReturnIfHLGT127                 ;    then return
 423+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       if y1 work < 0
 424+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.X1ltClipMin:           IsAxisLT0 (y1Work)              ; if y1 < 0             ;
 425+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.Y1IsNotLT0           ; .
 426+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = delta x step * (-y1)
 427+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1IsLT0:               ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;    temp = (0 - y1) * delta_x_step;
 428+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    . (0 - y1 also equals negate HL)
 429+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;    .
 430+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;    .
 431+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;    .
 432+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;    .
 433+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor_divq (temp, delta y step)
 434+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;    msd = floor_divq (temp, delta_y_step);
 435+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... rem calculation now done in floor macro above into de
 436+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;    .
 437+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (rem),de                ;    As DE = reminder we can do rem = temp % delta_y_step; for free
 438+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos = xpos + msd
 439+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;    x pos += msd (move msd to de)
 440+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    .            (pull in x1temp and add de)
 441+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 442+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .            (store result in x_pos)
 443+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... if xpos > xmax
 444+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTClipXMax:      ld      de,(clip_xmax)          ;    if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 445+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 446+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ...    or (pos = xmax && rem >= delta y) then return
 447+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XPosLTEXMax          ;    .
 448+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     nc                      ;    .
 449+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XPosLTEXMax:           ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ;    if x_pos == clip_xmin
 450+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 451+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.XneClipMax          ;    and rem >= deltay
 452+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(rem)                ;    .
 453+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 454+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 455+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     c                       ;    then return
 456+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... save rem and set y pos to 0
 457+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    save rem
 458+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,0                    ;    y_pos = 0
 459+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... error = error + rem
 460+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),hl              ;    error += rem
 461+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;    .
 462+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 463+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;    .
 464+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... if rem >= delta y
 465+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    if (rem >= delta_y)
 466+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 467+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 468+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.RemGTEDeltaY         ;    .
 469+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.RemGTEDeltaY        ;    .
 470+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... x pos = x pos + 1
 471+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,x_pos                ;       ++x_pos
 472+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     (hl)                    ;       .
 473+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       error += delta_y_step
 474+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .
 475+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .
 476+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;       .
 477+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.RemGTEDeltaY:
 478+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y1IsNotLT0:
 479+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.XneClipMax:            ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;  y_pos_end = y2
 480+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 481+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,127                  ;  y_pos_end = (y_pos_end < 127)?y_pos_end+1:128
 482+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;  .
 483+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.YPosEndlt127        ;  .
 484+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,128                  ;  .
 485+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .DoneXneClipMax         ;  .
 486+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.YPosEndlt127:          inc     hl                      ;  .
 487+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.DoneXneClipMax:        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 488+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                                                        ; if sign_x == -1
 489+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.Y2LTE127:              IsMemNegative8JumpFalse sign_x, .SignXNotNegative
 490+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SignXNegative:         ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    x_pos = -x_pos
 491+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    .
 492+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .
 493+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;    x_pos_end = -x_pos_end
 494+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SignXNotNegative:      ld      hl,(delta_y_step)       ; delta_y_step -= delta_x_step
 495+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 496+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; .
 497+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 498+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 499+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 500+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Dx < Dy Longest while loop ------------------------;
 501+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2DxLTDy:               ld      hl,(y_pos)              ;       starty=y_pos
 502+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (starty),hl             ;       .
 503+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Version where longest issaved ---------------------;
 504+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.LoadAlternateRegs:     ld      bc,(y_pos)              ;       we already have IY so just need xpos and end
 505+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(y_pos_end)
 506+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      iy,(x_pos)
 507+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,ix                   ;    load hl as target array
 508+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,c                     ;    by this point y pos must be 8 bit
 509+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    So we are setting up hl as targetArray pointer
 510+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a
 511+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       switch to alternate registers
 512+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       load up stepping into alternate registers
 513+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;       and error
 514+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,(delta_y_step)       ;
 515+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       and then switch back to main registers
 516+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(sign_x)              ;       if Sign x is -1
 517+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        and     $80                     ;       .
 518+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.SetWhileInc          ;       .
 519+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SetWhileDec:           ld      a,InstrDECIY
 520+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; set self modifying to dec and 2 byte instruction
 521+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop:             ;       .
 522+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.SetWhileInc:           ld      a,InstrINCIY
 523+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; else set to inc
 524+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;--- Update Loop ---------------------------------------;
 525+ EFCC              ;-*-*-; In loop hl  = target array pointer bc = x_pos,       de = x_pos_end, (we don't need to reatin Y_pos)
 526+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;         hl' = error                bc'= delta_y_step de'=delta_x_step
 527+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;- we coudl optimise by setting bc to y_pos_end - y_pos +1 and just doing djnz
 528+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.WhileLoop:             call    CompareBCDESigned       ;      while y_pos != y_pos_end
 529+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret     z                       ;      .
 530+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyl
 531+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    L2_plotAtRowLColA       ; targetArray[y_pos] = x_pos
 532+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 533+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyh
 534+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      (hl),a
 535+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 536+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;        if error >= 0
 537+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,h                     ;        .
 538+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.ErrorNegative       ;        .
 539+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     iy                      ;             x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 540+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.ErrorPositive:         ClearCarryFlag                  ;             error -= delta_y_step
 541+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,bc                   ;             .
 542+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .LoopEnd                ;             .
 543+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,de                   ;        else error += delta x step
 544+ EFCC              ;-*-*-.LoopEnd:               exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 545+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        inc     bc                      ;        ++y_pos
 546+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 547+ EFCC              ;-*-*-
 548+ EFCC              ;-*-*-
 549+ EFCC              ;-*-*-;---------------------------------
 550+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColC:      ld      a,c
 551+ EFCC              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColA:      push    bc,,de,,hl,,af
 552+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 553+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        push    af
 554+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 555+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      b,l
 556+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      c,a
 557+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,$FF                   ; white for now
 558+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        call    l2_plot_pixel
 559+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        pop     af
 560+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 561+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,af
 562+ EFCC              ;-*-*-                        ret
 563+ EFCC              ;-*-*-
 564+ EFCC
 565+ EFCC 00 00        x1                      dw 0
 566+ EFCE 00 00        y1                      dw 0
 567+ EFD0 00 00        x2                      dw 0
 568+ EFD2 00 00        y2                      dw 0
 569+ EFD4 00 00        savex1                  dw 0
 570+ EFD6 00 00        savey1                  dw 0
 571+ EFD8 00 00        savex2                  dw 0
 572+ EFDA 00 00        savey2                  dw 0
 573+ EFDC 00 00        temp                    dw 0
 574+ EFDE 00           longest:                DB 0
 575+ EFDF 00 00        x1Work:                 DW 0
 576+ EFE1 00 00        y1Work:                 DW 0
 577+ EFE3 00 00        x2Work:                 DW 0
 578+ EFE5 00 00        y2Work:                 DW 0
 579+ EFE7 00 00        x_pos:                  DW 0
 580+ EFE9 00 00        y_pos:                  DW 0
 581+ EFEB 00 00        x_pos_end:              DW 0
 582+ EFED 00 00        y_pos_end:              DW 0
 583+ EFEF 00 00        clip_xmax:              DW 0
 584+ EFF1 00 00        clip_xmin:              DW 0
 585+ EFF3 00 00        sign_x                  DW 0
 586+ EFF5 00           sign_y                  DB 0
 587+ EFF6 00 00        delta_x                 DW 0
 588+ EFF8 00 00        delta_y                 DW 0
 589+ EFFA 00 00        delta_y_x               DW 0 ; holds the compressed version for elite line draw
 590+ EFFC 00 00        delta_x_step            DW 0
 591+ EFFE 00 00        delta_y_step            DW 0
 592+ F000 00 00        linetemp                DW 0
 593+ F002 00 00        gradient                DW 0
 594+ F004 00 00        tSlope                  DW 0
 595+ F006 00 00        msd                     DW 0
 596+ F008 00 00        error                   DW 0
 597+ F00A 00           set_exit                DB 0
 598+ F00B 00 00        rem                     DW 0
 599+ F00D              InstrDECBC              equ $0B
 600+ F00D              InstrINCBC              equ $03
 601+ F00D              InstrDECIY              equ $2B
 602+ F00D              InstrINCIY              equ $23
 603+ F00D
 604+ F00D              MACROAequBMinusC16:     MACRO   pA, pB, pC
 605+ F00D ~                                    ld      hl,(pB)                         ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 606+ F00D ~                                    ld      de,(pC)                         ; .
 607+ F00D ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 608+ F00D ~                                    sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 609+ F00D ~                                    ld      (pA),hl
 610+ F00D                                      ENDM
 611+ F00D              ;--- Swaps point 1 and point 2 around (i.e x1 y1 <--> x2 y2)
 612+ F00D 2A CE EF     SwapCoords:             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       then swap point 1 and point 2
 613+ F010 ED 5B D2 EF                          ld      de,(y2)                         ;       .
 614+ F014 ED 53 CE EF                          ld      (y1),de                         ;       .
 615+ F018 22 D2 EF                             ld      (y2),hl                         ;       .
 616+ F01B 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 617+ F01E ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;       .
 618+ F022 ED 53 CC EF                          ld      (x1),de                         ;       .
 619+ F026 22 D0 EF                             ld      (x2),hl                         ;       .
 620+ F029 C9                                   ret
 621+ F02A
 622+ F02A                      ; DEFINE SPLITLINE 1
 623+ F02A
 624+ F02A                      DEFINE CLIPPED_LINEX 1
 625+ F02A                      DEFINE SPLITORLINEX  1
 626+ F02A                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 626+ F02A ~
 627+ F02A ~            l2_draw_clipped_line:
 628+ F02A                      ENDIF
 629+ F02A                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 629+ F02A
 630+ F02A              l2_draw_clipped_lineX:
 631+ F02A                      ENDIF
 632+ F02A                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 633+ F02A 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 634+ F02D ED 5B D2 EF                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 635+ F031 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 636+ F034 DA 3A F0                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 637+ F037 CD 0D F0     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 638+ F03A              .NoSwapCoords:
 639+ F03A ED 5B CE EF  .CalcDX:                ld      de,(y1)                         ; Calculate |dy|
 640+ F03E 2A D2 EF                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ; .
 641+ F041                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 641+ F041 B7          >                        or a
 642+ F042 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 643+ F044 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ; iy = |dy|
 644+ F047 ED 5B CC EF  .CalcDy:                ld      de,(x1)                         ; Calculate |dx|
 645+ F04B 2A D0 EF                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ; .
 646+ F04E 06 00                                ld      b,0                             ; assume x1 < x2 and assume no negate needed
 647+ F050 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;
 648+ F053 D2 58 F0                             jp      nc,.DxNoSwap                     ;
 649+ F056 EB           .DxSwap:                ex      de,hl                           ; swap just x over
 650+ F057 04                                   inc     b                               ; and flag that we had to do it
 651+ F058              .DxNoSwap:              ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 651+ F058 B7          >                        or a
 652+ F059 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;
 653+ F05B E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl                           ; ix = |dx|
 654+ F05E DD 7C        .CheckForHuge:          ld      a,ixh                           ; if either dx or dy > 255 then split line
 655+ F060 FD B4                                or      iyh                             ; .
 656+ F062 C2 76 F0                             jp      nz, .BreakNeeded                ; .
 657+ F065 DD 7D        .ChecktGT180:           ld      a,ixl
 658+ F067 FE B4                                cp      180
 659+ F069 D2 76 F0                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 660+ F06C FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 661+ F06E FE B4                                cp      180
 662+ F070 D2 76 F0                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 663+ F073 C3 DA F0                             jp      .noBreakNeeded
 664+ F076              .BreakNeeded:           ldCopy2Byte y1, savey1                  ;       savey1 = y1                     create savey1 (y1) to savey2 (y break)
 664+ F076 2A CE EF    >                        ld       hl,(y1)
 664+ F079 22 D6 EF    >                        ld       (savey1),hl
 665+ F07C                                      ShiftIYRight1                           ;       savey2 = y1 + (work_dy/2)
 665+ F07C FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 665+ F07E CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 665+ F080 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 665+ F082 FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 665+ F084 1F          >			   rra
 665+ F085 FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 666+ F087 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       .
 667+ F08A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 667+ F08A B7          >                        or a
 668+ F08B FD 54 FD 5D                          ld      de,iy
 669+ F08F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 670+ F091 22 DA EF                             ld      (savey2),hl                     ;       .
 671+ F094 22 CE EF                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       y1     = savey2, y2 untouched   create y1 (break) to y2
 672+ F097 05                                   dec     b                               ;       if b was 1 then decb would set z flag so we know that x1 > x2
 673+ F098 C2 9E F0                             jp      nz,.X1gtX2
 674+ F09B CD 0D F0     .X1lteX2:               call    SwapCoords
 675+ F09E              .X1gtX2:                ldCopy2Byte x1, savex1                  ;       savex1 = x1                     create savex1 (x1) to savex2 (x break)
 675+ F09E 2A CC EF    >                        ld       hl,(x1)
 675+ F0A1 22 D4 EF    >                        ld       (savex1),hl
 676+ F0A4                                      ShiftIXRight1                           ;       savex2 = x1 + (work_dx/2)
 676+ F0A4 DD 7C       >			   ld 	a,ixh
 676+ F0A6 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 676+ F0A8 DD 67       >			   ld	ixh,a
 676+ F0AA DD 7D       >			   ld 	a,ixl
 676+ F0AC 1F          >			   rra
 676+ F0AD DD 6F       >			   ld	ixl,a
 677+ F0AF 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 678+ F0B2                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 678+ F0B2 B7          >                        or a
 679+ F0B3 DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 680+ F0B7 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 681+ F0B9 22 D8 EF                             ld      (savex2),hl                     ;       .
 682+ F0BC 22 CC EF                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       x1     = savex1, x2 untouched  create x1 (break to x2)
 683+ F0BF                      ENDIF
 684+ F0BF                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 685+ F0BF ~                                    call    l2_draw_short_line              ;       drawshortLine
 686+ F0BF                      ENDIF
 687+ F0BF                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 688+ F0BF CD DA F0                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line
 689+ F0C2                      ENDIF
 690+ F0C2                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 691+ F0C2                                      ldCopyWord savex1,x1
 691+ F0C2             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex1, x1
 691+ F0C2 2A D4 EF    >                        ld       hl,(savex1)
 691+ F0C5 22 CC EF    >                        ld       (x1),hl
 692+ F0C8                                      ldCopyWord savey1,y1
 692+ F0C8             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey1, y1
 692+ F0C8 2A D6 EF    >                        ld       hl,(savey1)
 692+ F0CB 22 CE EF    >                        ld       (y1),hl
 693+ F0CE                                      ldCopyWord savex2,x2
 693+ F0CE             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex2, x2
 693+ F0CE 2A D8 EF    >                        ld       hl,(savex2)
 693+ F0D1 22 D0 EF    >                        ld       (x2),hl
 694+ F0D4                                      ldCopyWord savey2,y2
 694+ F0D4             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey2, y2
 694+ F0D4 2A DA EF    >                        ld       hl,(savey2)
 694+ F0D7 22 D2 EF    >                        ld       (y2),hl
 695+ F0DA              .noBreakNeeded:         // Falls straight into l2_draw_short_line
 696+ F0DA                      ENDIF
 697+ F0DA                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 697+ F0DA ~
 698+ F0DA ~            l2_draw_short_line:     ; check out of bounds
 699+ F0DA                      ENDIF
 700+ F0DA                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 701+ F0DA              l2_draw_clipped_line:
 702+ F0DA                      ENDIF
 703+ F0DA                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 704+ F0DA 2A CC EF     CheckForOnScreen:       ld      hl,(x1)
 705+ F0DD ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)
 706+ F0E1 CB 7C        .X1X2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 707+ F0E3 28 03                                jr      z,.X1X2NotNegative
 708+ F0E5 CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 709+ F0E7 C0           .X1X2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 710+ F0E8 7C           .X1X2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 711+ F0E9 AA                                   xor     d
 712+ F0EA FA F5 F0                             jp      m,.X1X2SpanScreen
 713+ F0ED 7C           .X1X2BothPositive:      ld      a,h                             ; if x1 or x2 high is zero then at least one pixel is on screen
 714+ F0EE A7                                   and     a
 715+ F0EF CA F5 F0                             jp      z,.X1X2SpanScreen
 716+ F0F2 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if x1 was > 255 then if x2 > 255 bail out
 717+ F0F3 A7                                   and     a
 718+ F0F4 C0                                   ret     nz
 719+ F0F5 2A CE EF     .X1X2SpanScreen:        ld      hl,(y1)
 720+ F0F8 ED 5B D2 EF                          ld      de,(y2)
 721+ F0FC CB 7C        .Y1Y2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 722+ F0FE 28 03                                jr      z,.Y1Y2NotNegative
 723+ F100 CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 724+ F102 C0           .Y1Y2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 725+ F103 7C           .Y1Y2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 726+ F104 AA                                   xor     d
 727+ F105 FA 17 F1                             jp      m,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 728+ F108 01 80 00     .Y1Y2BothPositive:      ld      bc,128                          ; if they are both positive and at least one is < 128 then carry on
 729+ F10B CD D7 9A                             call    CompareHLBC
 730+ F10E 38 07                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 731+ F110 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; save y1 into de
 732+ F111 CD D7 9A                             call    CompareHLBC
 733+ F114 38 01                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 734+ F116 C9                                   ret
 735+ F117              .Y1Y2SpanScreen:
 736+ F117 CD BA 9A     CheckForHorizontal:     call    CompareHLDESame                 ; de = saved y1 , hl = y2
 737+ F11A CA 46 EF                             jp      z, l2_drawVertClip
 738+ F11D 2A CC EF     CheckForVertical:       ld      hl,(x1)
 739+ F120 ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)
 740+ F124 CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame
 741+ F127 CA 77 EF                             jp      z, l2_drawHorzClip
 742+ F12A                                      ; Need horizontal and vertical optimisation code in at thispoint
 743+ F12A 2A CE EF     CheckForSwap:           ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 744+ F12D ED 5B D2 EF                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 745+ F131 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 746+ F134 DA 3A F1                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 747+ F137 CD 0D F0     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 748+ F13A                                      ; Default in sign and clip ranges, sign 16 bit for now
 749+ F13A 21 00 00     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,0                            ; clip_xmin = 0;
 750+ F13D 22 F1 EF                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ; .
 751+ F140 2E FF                                ld      l,255                           ; clip xmax = 255;
 752+ F142 22 EF EF                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ; .
 753+ F145 21 01 00                             ld      hl,1                            ; sign_x = 1
 754+ F148 22 F3 EF                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ; .
 755+ F14B                                      ; if moving right to left then swap signs and clip
 756+ F14B 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 > x2
 757+ F14E ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; .
 758+ F152 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 759+ F155 38 2C                                jr      c,.X1tlX2                       ; .
 760+ F157 21 FF FF     .X1gteX2:               ld      hl, -1                          ;        sign_x = 01
 761+ F15A 22 F3 EF                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ;        .
 762+ F15D 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        x1 = -x1;
 763+ F160                                      macronegate16hl                         ;        .
 763+ F160 AF          >					xor 	a
 763+ F161 95          >					sub 	l
 763+ F162 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 763+ F163 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 763+ F164 94          >					sub 	h
 763+ F165 67          >					ld 		h,a
 764+ F166 22 CC EF                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;        .
 765+ F169 ED 5B D0 EF                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;        x2 = -x2;
 766+ F16D                                      macronegate16de                         ;        .
 766+ F16D AF          >					xor 	a
 766+ F16E 93          >                    sub 	e
 766+ F16F 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 766+ F170 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 766+ F171 92          >                    sub 	d
 766+ F172 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 767+ F173 ED 53 D0 EF                          ld      (x2),de                         ;        .
 768+ F177 21 01 FF                             ld      hl,-255                         ;        clip_xmin =-255;
 769+ F17A 22 F1 EF                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ;        .
 770+ F17D 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;        clip_xmax = 0;
 771+ F180 22 EF EF                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ;        .
 772+ F183              .X1tlX2:                                                        ;
 773+ F183                                      ; calculate deltas
 774+ F183 2A D0 EF     .DxEquX2MinusX1:        ld      hl,(x2)                         ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
 775+ F186 ED 5B CC EF                          ld      de,(x1)                         ; .
 776+ F18A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 776+ F18A B7          >                        or a
 777+ F18B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 778+ F18D 22 F6 EF                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; .
 779+ F190 2A D2 EF     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,(y2)                         ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
 780+ F193 ED 5B CE EF                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; .
 781+ F197                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 781+ F197 B7          >                        or a
 782+ F198 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 783+ F19A 22 F8 EF                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
 784+ F19D ED 5B F6 EF  .ScaleDeltaXY:          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ; we already have delta y but x could be negative
 785+ F1A1 06 00                                ld      b,0
 786+ F1A3 CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 787+ F1A5 CA AF F1                             jp      z,.DeltaYABSDone                ; de = | de |, b = 1 to denote negative needs resetting
 788+ F1A8 04                                   inc     b
 789+ F1A9                                      macronegate16de
 789+ F1A9 AF          >					xor 	a
 789+ F1AA 93          >                    sub 	e
 789+ F1AB 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 789+ F1AC 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 789+ F1AD 92          >                    sub 	d
 789+ F1AE 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 790+ F1AF              .DeltaYABSDone:
 791+ F1AF ~            /*.ScaleHighLoop:         ld      a,d
 792+ F1AF ~                                    or      h
 793+ F1AF ~                                    jr      z,.HighScaleDone
 794+ F1AF ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 795+ F1AF ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 796+ F1AF ~                                    jp      .ScaleHighLoop
 797+ F1AF ~            .HighScaleDone:
 798+ F1AF ~            .LowScaleLoop:          ld      a,e
 799+ F1AF ~                                    or      l
 800+ F1AF ~                                    and     $80
 801+ F1AF ~                                    jr      z,.LowScaleDone
 802+ F1AF ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 803+ F1AF ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 804+ F1AF ~                                    jp      .LowScaleLoop
 805+ F1AF ~            .LowScaleDone:          bit     0,b
 806+ F1AF ~                                    jr      z,.DeltaDone
 807+ F1AF ~            .SortDXSign:            macronegate16de
 808+ F1AF ~            .DeltaDone:             ld      (delta_x),de
 809+ F1AF ~                                    ld      (delta_y),hl*/
 810+ F1AF 2A F6 EF     .DeltaXStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_x)
 811+ F1B2                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_x_step = 2 * delta_x;
 811+ F1B2 B7          >                        or a
 812+ F1B3 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 813+ F1B5 22 FC EF                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ; .
 814+ F1B8 2A F8 EF     .DeltaYStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_y)
 815+ F1BB                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_y_step = 2 * delta_y;
 815+ F1BB B7          >                        or a
 816+ F1BC ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 817+ F1BE 22 FE EF                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ; .
 818+ F1C1 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x_pos = x1;
 819+ F1C4 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ; .
 820+ F1C7 ED 5B CE EF                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; y_pos = y1;
 821+ F1CB ED 53 E9 EF                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ; .
 822+ F1CF                                      ; check if we are workign on dx or dy
 823+ F1CF 2A F6 EF     .CompareDxDy:           ld      hl,(delta_x)                    ; if (delta_x >= delta_y)
 824+ F1D2 ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)
 825+ F1D6 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn
 826+ F1D9 DA 20 F4                             jp      c, LineDrawDxLTDy
 827+ F1DC              ;.......................DxGteDy branch.............................................................................................
 828+ F1DC 2A FE EF     LineDrawDxGteDy:        ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 829+ F1DF ED 5B F6 EF                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;       .
 830+ F1E3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 830+ F1E3 B7          >                        or a
 831+ F1E4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;       .
 832+ F1E6 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;       .
 833+ F1E9                                      ZeroA                                   ;       set exit false (0 == false)
 833+ F1E9 AF          >                        xor a
 834+ F1EA 32 0A F0                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;       .
 835+ F1ED                                      ; clipping of negative y1
 836+ F1ED 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       if (y1 < 0)
 837+ F1F0 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;       .
 838+ F1F2 CA 8A F2                             jp      z,.y1GTE0                       ;       .
 839+ F1F5 2A CE EF     .y1LT0:                 ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (0 - y1) - 1) * delta_x;
 840+ F1F8                                      macronegate16hl                         ;               hl = |y1|
 840+ F1F8 AF          >					xor 	a
 840+ F1F9 95          >					sub 	l
 840+ F1FA 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 840+ F1FB 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 840+ F1FC 94          >					sub 	h
 840+ F1FD 67          >					ld 		h,a
 841+ F1FE                                      ClearCarryFlag
 841+ F1FE B7          >                        or a
 842+ F1FF ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2 * |y1|)
 843+ F201 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 * |y1| - 1)
 844+ F202 ED 5B F6 EF                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               hl = hl * delta_x
 845+ F206 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 846+ F209 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               save to temp
 847+ F20C 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_y_step
 848+ F20E ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 849+ F212 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 850+ F215 ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 851+ F219 2A E7 EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            x_pos += msd
 852+ F21C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 852+ F21C B7          >                        or a
 853+ F21D ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
 854+ F21F 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;            .
 855+ F222 ED 5B EF EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmax)
 856+ F226 CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
 857+ F229 CA 30 F2                             jp      z,.xposLTEClipxmax              ;            .
 858+ F22C CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 859+ F22F D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
 860+ F230 2A E7 EF     .xposLTEClipxmax:       ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmin)
 861+ F233 ED 5B F1 EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;            .
 862+ F237 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 863+ F23A DA 8A F2                             jp      c,.xposLTxmin                   ;            .
 864+ F23D 2A 06 F0     .xposGTExmin:           ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_y_step) (its really IY from floor_divq)
 865+ F240 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_y_step
 866+ F244 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 867+ F247 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 868+ F248 2A DC EF                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
 869+ F24B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 869+ F24B B7          >                        or a
 870+ F24C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 871+ F24E 22 0B F0                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
 872+ F251 11 00 00                             ld      de,0                            ;               y_pos = 0
 873+ F254 ED 53 E9 EF                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ;               .
 874+ F258 ED 5B 0B F0                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_x
 875+ F25C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 875+ F25C B7          >                        or a
 876+ F25D ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
 877+ F25F EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 878+ F260 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
 879+ F263                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 879+ F263 B7          >                        or a
 880+ F264 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 881+ F266 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   write to error
 882+ F269 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
 883+ F26C 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 884+ F26D B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 885+ F26E CA 85 F2                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
 886+ F271 2A E7 EF     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   x_pos += 1;
 887+ F274 23                                   inc     hl                              ;                   .
 888+ F275 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 889+ F278 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
 890+ F27B ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   .
 891+ F27F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 891+ F27F B7          >                        or a
 892+ F280 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 893+ F282 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
 894+ F285 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
 895+ F287 32 0A F0                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
 896+ F28A              .xposLTxmin:
 897+ F28A 3A 0A F0     .y1GTE0:                ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;           if (!set_exit && x1 < clip_xmin)
 898+ F28D A7                                   and     a                               ;           .
 899+ F28E C2 1E F3                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;           .   Exit if set_exit is true
 900+ F291 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;           .
 901+ F294 ED 5B F1 EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;           .   Exit if x1 > xmin
 902+ F298 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 903+ F29B D2 1E F3                             jp      nc,.exit_false                  ;           .
 904+ F29E EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 905+ F29F ED 5B CC EF                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   (clip_xmin - x1) (already have clip_xmin in de)
 906+ F2A3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 906+ F2A3 B7          >                        or a
 907+ F2A4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 908+ F2A6 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 909+ F2AA CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 910+ F2AD 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;                   .
 911+ F2B0 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;               msd = temp / delta_x_step
 912+ F2B2 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                  BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 913+ F2B6 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;                  .
 914+ F2B9 ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;                  .
 915+ F2BD E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;                  save BC%DE into HL (temp % delta x step0
 916+ F2C0 2A E9 EF     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               y_pos += msd
 917+ F2C3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   bc already is msd
 917+ F2C3 B7          >                        or a
 918+ F2C4 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;                   hl += bc
 919+ F2C6 22 E9 EF                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 920+ F2C9 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy                           ;               rem = temp % delta_x_step (which is in IY)
 921+ F2CC 22 0B F0                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;               .
 922+ F2CF 2A E9 EF                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;           if ((y_pos > 127) || (y_pos == 127 && rem >= delta_x))
 923+ F2D2 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 924+ F2D5 CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if y_pos != clipxmax skip the abort test
 925+ F2D8 20 0B                                jr      nz,.YPosNotClipymax             ;           .
 926+ F2DA 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
 927+ F2DD ED 5B F6 EF                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;           .
 928+ F2E1 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 929+ F2E4 D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
 930+ F2E5 EB           .YPosNotClipymax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
 931+ F2E6 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
 932+ F2E9 D8                                   ret     c
 933+ F2EA 2A F1 EF     .yposLT127:             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin;
 934+ F2ED 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;               .
 935+ F2F0 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               error += rem
 936+ F2F3 ED 5B 0B F0                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               .
 937+ F2F7                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 937+ F2F7 B7          >                        or a
 938+ F2F8 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;               .
 939+ F2FA 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;               .
 940+ F2FD 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem >= delta_x)
 941+ F300 ED 5B F6 EF                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               .
 942+ F304 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;               .
 943+ F307 DA 1E F3                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaX                  ;               .
 944+ F30A 2A E9 EF     .remGTEDeltaX:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos++
 945+ F30D 23                                   inc     hl
 946+ F30E 22 E9 EF                             ld      (y_pos),hl
 947+ F311 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                    error -= delta_x_step;
 948+ F314 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                    .
 949+ F318                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                    .
 949+ F318 B7          >                        or a
 950+ F319 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                    .
 951+ F31B 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                    .
 952+ F31E              .remLTDeltaX:
 953+ F31E 2A D0 EF     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           x_pos_end = x2;
 954+ F321 22 EB EF                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
 955+ F324 2A D2 EF                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           if (y2 > 127)
 956+ F327 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 957+ F32A CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .   if y2 is zero fails check
 958+ F32D CA 84 F3                             jp      z,.y2LTE127                     ;           .
 959+ F330 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .   if y2 < 127 then there is carry so fails check
 960+ F333 DA 84 F3                             jp      c,.y2LTE127                      ;           .
 961+ F336 21 7F 00     .y2GT127:               ld      hl,127                          ;               temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x;
 962+ F339 ED 5B CE EF                          ld      de,(y1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
 963+ F33D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 963+ F33D B7          >                        or a
 964+ F33E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 965+ F340 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (127-y1)
 966+ F344 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 967+ F347 ED 5B F6 EF                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;                   hl += delta_x
 968+ F34B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 968+ F34B B7          >                        or a
 969+ F34C ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 970+ F34E 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl
 971+ F351 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 972+ F353 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta y step
 973+ F357 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 974+ F35A ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 975+ F35E 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;               x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 976+ F361                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 976+ F361 B7          >                        or a
 977+ F362 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
 978+ F364 22 EB EF                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
 979+ F367 2A 06 F0                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end
 980+ F36A ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               .
 981+ F36E CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 982+ F371 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
 983+ F372 2A DC EF                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
 984+ F375                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 984+ F375 B7          >                        or a
 985+ F376 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
 986+ F378 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 987+ F379 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 988+ F37A C2 84 F3                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
 989+ F37D 2A EB EF     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
 990+ F380 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
 991+ F381 22 EB EF                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
 992+ F384              .NotTheSame:
