 993+ F384 2A EB EF     .y2LTE127:              ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           x_pos_end = min (x_pos_end,clip_xmax) + 1
 994+ F387 ED 5B EF EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
 995+ F38B CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 996+ F38E D2 9B F3                             jp      nc,.xposgtexmax                 ;           .
 997+ F391 2A EB EF     .xposltxmax:            ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           .
 998+ F394 23                                   inc     hl                              ;               x_pos_end+1
 999+ F395 22 EB EF                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1000+ F398 C3 A0 F3                             jp      .DoneXposAdjust                 ;               .
1001+ F39B 13           .xposgtexmax:           inc     de                              ;               else
1002+ F39C ED 53 EB EF                          ld      (x_pos_end),de                  ;               clip_xmax+1
1003+ F3A0 3A F3 EF     .DoneXposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1004+ F3A3 3C                                   inc     a
1005+ F3A4 C2 BF F3                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1006+ F3A7 2A E7 EF     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1007+ F3AA                                      macronegate16hl
1007+ F3AA AF          >					xor 	a
1007+ F3AB 95          >					sub 	l
1007+ F3AC 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1007+ F3AD 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1007+ F3AE 94          >					sub 	h
1007+ F3AF 67          >					ld 		h,a
1008+ F3B0 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1009+ F3B3 2A EB EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1010+ F3B6                                      macronegate16hl
1010+ F3B6 AF          >					xor 	a
1010+ F3B7 95          >					sub 	l
1010+ F3B8 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1010+ F3B9 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1010+ F3BA 94          >					sub 	h
1010+ F3BB 67          >					ld 		h,a
1011+ F3BC 22 EB EF                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1012+ F3BF              .y2LTE27:
1013+ F3BF              .SignNotMinus1:
1014+ F3BF ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;        delta_x_step -= delta_y_step;
1015+ F3C3 2A FC EF                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;        .
1016+ F3C6                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1016+ F3C6 B7          >                        or a
1017+ F3C7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1018+ F3C9 22 FC EF                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ;        .
1019+ F3CC 2A E7 EF     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;        while (x_pos != x_pos_end)
1020+ F3CF ED 5B EB EF                          ld      de,(x_pos_end)                  ;        .
1021+ F3D3 CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;        .
1022+ F3D6 C8                                   ret     z                               ;        .
1023+ F3D7 2A E7 EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1024+ F3DA 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ;               .
1025+ F3DB 2A E9 EF                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               .
1026+ F3DE 45                                   ld      b,l                             ;               .
1027+ F3DF 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF                           ;               .
1028+ F3E1 CD B6 E2     .PlotPixel:             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               .
1029+ F3E4 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1030+ F3E7 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;               .
1031+ F3E9 C2 03 F4                             jp      nz,.errorLT0                    ;               .
1032+ F3EC 2A E9 EF     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   ++y_pos;
1033+ F3EF 23                                   inc	    hl                              ;                   .
1034+ F3F0 22 E9 EF                             ld	    (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
1035+ F3F3 2A 08 F0                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_x_step;
1036+ F3F6 ED 5B FC EF                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   .
1037+ F3FA                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1037+ F3FA B7          >                        or a
1038+ F3FB ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de                           ;                   .
1039+ F3FD 22 08 F0                             ld	    (error),hl                      ;                   .
1040+ F400 C3 10 F4                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust                ;                   .
1041+ F403 2A 08 F0     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
1042+ F406 ED 5B FE EF                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1043+ F40A                                      ClearCarryFlag
1043+ F40A B7          >                        or a
1044+ F40B ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1045+ F40D 22 08 F0                             ld	    (error),hl
1046+ F410 ED 5B F3 EF  .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      de,(sign_x)
1047+ F414 2A E7 EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1048+ F417                                      ClearCarryFlag
1048+ F417 B7          >                        or a
1049+ F418 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1050+ F41A 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1051+ F41D C3 CC F3                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1052+ F420              ;.......................DxGltDy branch.............................................................................................
1053+ F420              LineDrawDxLTDy:         ;ret
1054+ F420 2A FC EF                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;       error = delta_x_step - delta_y;
1055+ F423 ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)
1056+ F427                                      ClearCarryFlag
1056+ F427 B7          >                        or a
1057+ F428 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1058+ F42A 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl
1059+ F42D                                      ZeroA                                   ;        set exit false (0 == false)
1059+ F42D AF          >                        xor a
1060+ F42E 32 0A F0                             ld      (set_exit),a
1061+ F431 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        if (x1 < clip_xmin)
1062+ F434 ED 5B F1 EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;        .
1063+ F438 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;        .
1064+ F43B D2 CF F4                             jp      nc,.x1GTEClipXmin               ;        .
1065+ F43E ED 5B CC EF  .x1LTClipXmin:          ld      de,(x1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (cllp_xmin - x1) - 1) * delta_y;
1066+ F442 2A F1 EF                             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               hl = clip_xmin - x1
1067+ F445                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1067+ F445 B7          >                        or a
1068+ F446 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1069+ F448                                      ClearCarryFlag
1069+ F448 B7          >                        or a
1070+ F449 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2* hl)
1071+ F44B 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 *  hl - 1)
1072+ F44C ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;               hl = hl  * delta_y
1073+ F450 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1074+ F453 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               .
1075+ F456 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_x_step
1076+ F458 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1077+ F45C CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1078+ F45F ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1079+ F463 2A E9 EF                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            y_pos += msd
1080+ F466                                      ClearCarryFlag
1080+ F466 B7          >                        or a
1081+ F467 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
1082+ F469 22 E9 EF                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;            .
1083+ F46C 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;            if (y_pos >= 127)
1084+ F46F CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
1085+ F472 CA 79 F4                             jp      z,.yposGT127                    ;            .
1086+ F475 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
1087+ F478 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
1088+ F479 2A E9 EF     .yposGT127:             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            if (y_pos >= 0)
1089+ F47C CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1090+ F47E C2 CF F4                             jp      nz,.yposLT0
1091+ F481 2A 06 F0     .yposGT0:               ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_x_step)
1092+ F484 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_x_step
1093+ F488 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1094+ F48B EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1095+ F48C 2A DC EF                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
1096+ F48F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1096+ F48F B7          >                        or a
1097+ F490 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1098+ F492 22 0B F0                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
1099+ F495 ED 5B F1 EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin
1100+ F499 ED 53 E7 EF                          ld      (x_pos),de                      ;               .
1101+ F49D ED 5B 0B F0                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_y
1102+ F4A1                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1102+ F4A1 B7          >                        or a
1103+ F4A2 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
1104+ F4A4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1105+ F4A5 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
1106+ F4A8                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1106+ F4A8 B7          >                        or a
1107+ F4A9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1108+ F4AB 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
1109+ F4AE 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
1110+ F4B1 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1111+ F4B2 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1112+ F4B3 CA CA F4                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
1113+ F4B6 2A E9 EF     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos += 1;
1114+ F4B9 23                                   inc     hl
1115+ F4BA 22 E9 EF                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1116+ F4BD 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1117+ F4C0 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)
1118+ F4C4                                      ClearCarryFlag
1118+ F4C4 B7          >                        or a
1119+ F4C5 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1120+ F4C7 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl
1121+ F4CA 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
1122+ F4CC 32 0A F0                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
1123+ F4CF
1124+ F4CF              .yposLT0:
1125+ F4CF 3A 0A F0     .x1GTEClipXmin:         ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;        if (!set_exit && y1 < 0)
1126+ F4D2 A7                                   and     a                               ;        .
1127+ F4D3 C2 5D F5                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;        .  if exit is 1 then its true so exit branch
1128+ F4D6 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;        .  if y1 is positive (including 0) then exit branch
1129+ F4D9 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;        .
1130+ F4DB CA 5D F5                             jp      z,.exit_false                   ;        .
1131+ F4DE 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = delta_x_step * (0 - y1)
1132+ F4E1                                      macronegate16hl                         ;           .
1132+ F4E1 AF          >					xor 	a
1132+ F4E2 95          >					sub 	l
1132+ F4E3 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1132+ F4E4 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1132+ F4E5 94          >					sub 	h
1132+ F4E6 67          >					ld 		h,a
1133+ F4E7 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;           .       hl = delta_x_step * (- y1)
1134+ F4EB CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;           .
1135+ F4EE 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;           .
1136+ F4F1 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;           msd = temp / delta_y_step
1137+ F4F3 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1138+ F4F7 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1139+ F4FA ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1140+ F4FE E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;               same remainders (which is also mod result)
1141+ F501 22 0B F0                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;           rem = temp % delta_y_step (swapped from being after x_pos += msd)
1142+ F504 2A E7 EF     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           x_pos += msd
1143+ F507                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .   bc already is msd
1143+ F507 B7          >                        or a
1144+ F508 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;           .   hl += bc
1145+ F50A 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;           .
1146+ F50D 2A E7 EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           if ((x_pos > clip_xmax) || (x_pos == clip_xmax && rem >= delta_y))
1147+ F510 ED 5B EF EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1148+ F514 CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if xpos != clipxmax skip the abort test
1149+ F517 20 0B                                jr      nz,.XPosNotClipxmax             ;           .
1150+ F519 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
1151+ F51C ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1152+ F520 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1153+ F523 D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
1154+ F524 EB           .XPosNotClipxmax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
1155+ F525 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
1156+ F528 D8                                   ret     c
1157+ F529 21 00 00     .xposLT127:             ld      hl,0                            ;           y_pos = 0;
1158+ F52C 22 E9 EF                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;           .
1159+ F52F 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;           error += rem
1160+ F532 ED 5B 0B F0                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;           .
1161+ F536                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .
1161+ F536 B7          >                        or a
1162+ F537 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;           .
1163+ F539 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;           .
1164+ F53C 2A 0B F0                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           if (rem >= delta_y)
1165+ F53F ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1166+ F543 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1167+ F546 DA 5D F5                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaY                  ;           .
1168+ F549 2A E7 EF     .remGTEDeltaY:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                x_pos++
1169+ F54C 23                                   inc     hl
1170+ F54D 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1171+ F550 2A 08 F0                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                error -= delta_y_step;
1172+ F553 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                .
1173+ F557                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                .
1173+ F557 B7          >                        or a
1174+ F558 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                .
1175+ F55A 22 08 F0                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                .
1176+ F55D              .remLTDeltaY:
1177+ F55D 2A D2 EF     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           y_pos_end = y2;
1178+ F560 22 ED EF                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1179+ F563 2A D0 EF                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           if (x2 > clip_xmax)
1180+ F566 ED 5B EF EF                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1181+ F56A CD BA 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .
1182+ F56D CA C4 F5                             jp      z,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1183+ F570 CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1184+ F573 DA C4 F5                             jp      c,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1185+ F576 2A EF EF     .x2GTclipxmax:          ld      hl,(clip_xmax)                  ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmax - x1) + delta_y;
1186+ F579 ED 5B CC EF                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
1187+ F57D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1187+ F57D B7          >                        or a
1188+ F57E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1189+ F580 ED 5B FE EF                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (clip_xmax - x1)
1190+ F584 CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1191+ F587 ED 5B F8 EF                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;                   hl += delta_y
1192+ F58B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1192+ F58B B7          >                        or a
1193+ F58C ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1194+ F58E 22 DC EF                             ld      (temp),hl
1195+ F591 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
1196+ F593 ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta x step
1197+ F597 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1198+ F59A ED 43 06 F0                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1199+ F59E 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y_pos_end = y1 + msd;
1200+ F5A1                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1200+ F5A1 B7          >                        or a
1201+ F5A2 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
1202+ F5A4 22 ED EF                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1203+ F5A7 2A 06 F0                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_x_step) == 0) --y_pos_end
1204+ F5AA ED 5B FC EF                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               .
1205+ F5AE CD 34 93                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1206+ F5B1 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
1207+ F5B2 2A DC EF                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
1208+ F5B5                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1208+ F5B5 B7          >                        or a
1209+ F5B6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1210+ F5B8 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1211+ F5B9 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1212+ F5BA C2 C4 F5                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
1213+ F5BD 2A ED EF     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
1214+ F5C0 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
1215+ F5C1 22 ED EF                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
1216+ F5C4              .NotTheSame:
1217+ F5C4 2A ED EF     .x2LTEclipxmax:         ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           y_pos_end = min(y_pos_end, clip_ymax) + 1
1218+ F5C7 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
1219+ F5CA CD A3 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1220+ F5CD D2 DA F5                             jp      nc,.yposgteymax                 ;           .
1221+ F5D0 2A ED EF     .yposltymax:            ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           .
1222+ F5D3 23                                   inc     hl                              ;           .
1223+ F5D4 22 ED EF                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1224+ F5D7 C3 DF F5                             jp      .DoneYposAdjust                 ;           .
1225+ F5DA 13           .yposgteymax:           inc     de                              ;           .
1226+ F5DB ED 53 ED EF                          ld      (y_pos_end),de                  ;           .
1227+ F5DF 3A F3 EF     .DoneYposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1228+ F5E2 3C                                   inc     a
1229+ F5E3 C2 FE F5                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1230+ F5E6 2A E7 EF     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1231+ F5E9                                      macronegate16hl
1231+ F5E9 AF          >					xor 	a
1231+ F5EA 95          >					sub 	l
1231+ F5EB 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1231+ F5EC 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1231+ F5ED 94          >					sub 	h
1231+ F5EE 67          >					ld 		h,a
1232+ F5EF 22 E7 EF                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1233+ F5F2 2A EB EF                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1234+ F5F5                                      macronegate16hl
1234+ F5F5 AF          >					xor 	a

1362+ F701 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               return

1412+ F76E AF          >                        xor a

1422+ F784 C3 98 F7                             jp      .donedxdycheck                  ;       .

1443+ F7AD A7                                   and     a                               ;               .

1445+ F7AF C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if x1 high is not zero, x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1446+ F7B0 3A CF EF                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ;               . [a = x1 high]
1447+ F7B3 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1448+ F7B4 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 negative return]

1462+ F7CB A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1463+ F7CC F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if x1 negative return]
1464+ F7CD C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]

1466+ F7D1 A7                                   and     a                               ;
1467+ F7D2 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 negative return]
1468+ F7D3 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]

1470+ F7D7 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1471+ F7D8 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 low > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1472+ F7D9              .ClipComplete:
1473+ F7D9              .xx13is0or128Draw:      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX

1475+ F7DC                                      ENDIF

1481+ F7E2 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1482+ F7E4 CA 03 F8                             jp      z,.x1GTE0                       ; .
1483+ F7E7 3E FF        .x1LT0:                 ld      a,255                           ;       clip sign = -1
1484+ F7E9 32 DD F7                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1485+ F7EC CD 6B F8                             call    CalcLL120                       ;       calc ll120
1486+ F7EF 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       x1 = 0
1487+ F7F2 22 CC EF                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1488+ F7F5 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       y1 = y1 + result
1489+ F7F8 ED 5B 9D F6                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]

1491+ F7FD 22 CE EF                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .

1495+ F805 CA 20 F8                             jp      z,.checkY1IsNegative            ;       .

1496+ F808 AF          >                        xor a

1499+ F80F 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                          ;               x1 = 255

1507+ F823 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .

1509+ F828 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set sign to -1 for calc
1510+ F82A 32 DD F7                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1511+ F82D CD B8 F8                             call    CalcLL123                       ;       calc LL123
1512+ F830 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       x1 = x1 + result
1513+ F833 ED 5B 9D F6                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       .
1514+ F837 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1515+ F838 22 CC EF                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1516+ F83B 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       y1 = 0
1517+ F83E 22 CE EF                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1518+ F841 7C           .checkY1LT128:          ld      a,h                             ; finished if y < 128
1519+ F842 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1520+ F843 C2 49 F8                             jp      nz,.mopUpY1                     ; . [jump to mop up if y1 high <> 0, wehave already dealt with negatvies so don't need to consider that]
1521+ F846 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; . [now check y1 low and return if y1 low > 127]
1522+ F847 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1523+ F848 F0                                   ret     p                               ; . [ if y1 low was positive then we are done as it means y1 < 128]
1524+ F849 11 80 00     .mopUpY1:               ld      de,128                          ; y1 = y1 - 128
1525+ F84C                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1525+ F84C B7          >                        or a
1526+ F84D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1527+ F84F 22 CE EF                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1528+ F852                                      ZeroA                                   ; set clip sign to 0
1528+ F852 AF          >                        xor a
1529+ F853 32 DD F7                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ; to get to here if y1 < 0, y is set to 0, if its < 128 then it never reaches here, so y1 must be > 128 to get here
1530+ F856 CD B8 F8                             call    CalcLL123                       ; calc LL123
1531+ F859 2A CC EF                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1 = x1 + result
1532+ F85C ED 5B 9D F6                          ld      de,(result)                     ; .
1533+ F860 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; .
1534+ F861 22 CC EF                             ld      (x1),hl                         ; .
1535+ F864 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                          ; y1 = 127
1536+ F867 22 CE EF                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1537+ F86A C9                                   ret
1538+ F86B
1539+ F86B 2A CC EF     CalcLL120:              ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1= |x1|
1540+ F86E                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1540+ F86E CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1540+ F870 CA 79 F8    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1540+ F873 AF          >					xor 	a
1540+ F874 95          >					sub 	l
1540+ F875 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1540+ F876 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1540+ F877 94          >					sub 	h
1540+ F878 67          >					ld 		h,a
1540+ F879             >.alreadyABS:
1541+ F879 3A 04 F0                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if (tslope == 0)
1542+ F87C A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1543+ F87D C2 9C F8                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1544+ F880 55           .tSlopeZero:            ld      d,l                             ;       d = x1 & 255
1545+ F881 3A 02 F0                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1546+ F884 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;
1547+ F885 ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = x1 & 255 * gradient
1548+ F887 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = x1 * gradient /256
1549+ F888 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1550+ F88A 3A DD F7                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1551+ F88D A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1552+ F88E CA 97 F8                             jp      z,.tSlopeZeroDone               ;       .
1553+ F891              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16de                         ;               result = - result
1553+ F891 AF          >					xor 	a
1553+ F892 93          >                    sub 	e
1553+ F893 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1553+ F894 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1553+ F895 92          >                    sub 	d
1553+ F896 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1554+ F897 ED 53 9D F6  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),de                     ;
1555+ F89B C9                                   ret                                     ;
1556+ F89C              .tSlopeNonZero:         ;ld      a,(gradient)                    ; else  c = gradient
1557+ F89C                                      ;ld      c,a                             ;       .
1558+ F89C                                      ;ld      a,l                             ;       a = x1 & 255
1559+ F89C                                      ;call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = a * 256/c
1560+ F89C
1561+ F89C ED 5B 02 F0                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1562+ F8A0 45                                   ld      b,l
1563+ F8A1 0E 00                                ld      c,0
1564+ F8A3                                      ;; CORRECTED TO LADO INTO B ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1565+ F8A3 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
1566+ F8A6
1567+ F8A6 3A DD F7                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1568+ F8A9 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1569+ F8AA CA B3 F8                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;       .
1570+ F8AD              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16bc                         ;               result = - result
1570+ F8AD AF          >					xor 	a
1570+ F8AE 91          >                    sub 	c
1570+ F8AF 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1570+ F8B0 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1570+ F8B1 90          >                    sub 	b
1570+ F8B2 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1571+ F8B3 ED 43 9D F6  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),bc
1572+ F8B7 C9                                   ret
1573+ F8B8              ;.......................LL123
1574+ F8B8              CalcLL123:              ;break
1575+ F8B8 2A CE EF                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; hl = |y1|
1576+ F8BB                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1576+ F8BB CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1576+ F8BD CA C6 F8    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1576+ F8C0 AF          >					xor 	a
1576+ F8C1 95          >					sub 	l
1576+ F8C2 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1576+ F8C3 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1576+ F8C4 94          >					sub 	h
1576+ F8C5 67          >					ld 		h,a
1576+ F8C6             >.alreadyABS:
1577+ F8C6 3A 04 F0                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if tSlope = 0
1578+ F8C9 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1579+ F8CA C2 E8 F8                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1580+ F8CD              .tSlopeZero:           ; ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       c = gradient
1581+ F8CD              ;                        ld      c,a                             ;       .
1582+ F8CD              ;                        ld      a,l                             ;       hl = y1 (which is now abs and < 256)
1583+ F8CD              ;                        call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = A * 256 / c
1584+ F8CD ED 5B 02 F0                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1585+ F8D1 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1586+ F8D3 CD 6E 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
1587+ F8D6 3A DD F7                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1588+ F8D9 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1589+ F8DA CA E3 F8                             jp      z, .tSlopeZeroDone              ;       .
1590+ F8DD              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16bc                         ;               result = -result
1590+ F8DD AF          >					xor 	a
1590+ F8DE 91          >                    sub 	c
1590+ F8DF 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1590+ F8E0 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1590+ F8E1 90          >                    sub 	b
1590+ F8E2 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1591+ F8E3 ED 43 9D F6  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),bc                     ;       . save result in either case
1592+ F8E7 C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1593+ F8E8 55           .tSlopeNonZero:         ld      d,l                             ; else  d = |y1| low
1594+ F8E9 3A 02 F0                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1595+ F8EC 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;       .
1596+ F8ED ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = l * gradient
1597+ F8EF 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = l * gradient /256
1598+ F8F0 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1599+ F8F2 3A DD F7                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1600+ F8F5 A7                                   and     a                               ;
1601+ F8F6 CA FF F8                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;
1602+ F8F9              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16de                         ;               result = -result
1602+ F8F9 AF          >					xor 	a
1602+ F8FA 93          >                    sub 	e
1602+ F8FB 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1602+ F8FC 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1602+ F8FD 92          >                    sub 	d
1602+ F8FE 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1603+ F8FF ED 53 9D F6  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),de                     ;       . save result in either case
1604+ F903 C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1605+ F904
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
1425  F904              ;    INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
1426  F904                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ F904              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ F904              ;
   3+ F904              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
   4+ F904              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ F904              ;
   6+ F904              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ F904              ;
   8+ F904              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ F904              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ F904              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ F904              ;
  12+ F904              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ F904              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ F904              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ F904              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ F904              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ F904              ;
  18+ F904              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ F904              ;
  20+ F904              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ F904              ;
  22+ F904              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ F904              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ F904              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ F904              ;
  26+ F904              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ F904              ;
  28+ F904              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ F904              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ F904              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ F904              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ F904              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ F904              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ F904              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ F904              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ F904              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ F904              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ F904              ;
  39+ F904              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ F904              ;
  41+ F904              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ F904              ;
  43+ F904              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ F904              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ F904              ;
  46+ F904              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ F904              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ F904              ;		H = x
  49+ F904              ;		L = y
  50+ F904              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ F904              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ F904              ;	else
  53+ F904              ;		H = y
  54+ F904              ;		L = x
  55+ F904              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ F904              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ F904              ;	endif
  58+ F904              ;
  59+ F904              ;	B = H
  60+ F904              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ F904              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ F904              ;		i = i + L
  63+ F904              ;		if i	< H
  64+ F904              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ F904              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ F904              ;		else
  67+ F904              ;			i = i - H
  68+ F904              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ F904              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ F904              ;		endif
  71+ F904              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ F904              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ F904              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ F904              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ F904              ;
  76+ F904              ;
  77+ F904              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ F904              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ F904              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ F904              ;
  81+ F904 00 00        line_gfx_coords         dw  0
  82+ F906
  83+ F906              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ F906 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ F907 FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ F909 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ F90B 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ F90C FE C0                                cp	192
  89+ F90E 30 21                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y1	coordinate out	of range
  90+ F910 22 04 F9                             ld	(line_gfx_coords),hl		; the starting	point is now default
  91+ F913 E5                                   push	hl
  92+ F914 D5                                   push	de
  93+ F915 6C                                   ld	l,h				; L = x0
  94+ F916 62                                   ld	h,d				; H = x1
  95+ F917 7C           distanceX:		        ld	a,h
  96+ F918 95                                   sub	l
  97+ F919 6F                                   ld	l,a
  98+ F91A 26 00                                ld	h,0
  99+ F91C 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceXDone
 100+ F91E 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 101+ F920 D1           distanceXDone:          pop	de
 102+ F921 E3                                   ex	(sp),hl			; L = y0
 103+ F922 63                                   ld	h,e				; H = y1
 104+ F923 7C           distanceY:		        ld	a,h
 105+ F924 95                                   sub	l
 106+ F925 6F                                   ld	l,a
 107+ F926 26 00                                ld	h,0
 108+ F928 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceYDone
 109+ F92A 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 110+ F92C D1           distanceYDone:          pop	de
 111+ F92D EB                                   ex	de,hl			; h.dist.	= HL, v.dist. = DE
 112+ F92E CD 32 F9                             call	DrawLineRelative			; draw line...
 113+ F931 C9           exit_line:              ret
 114+ F932
 115+ F932              ; ***************************************************************************
 116+ F932              ;
 117+ F932              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
 118+ F932              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
 119+ F932              ;
 120+ F932              ; OUT: h - l distance in	HL
 121+ F932              ;
 122+ F932
 123+ F932 D5           DrawLineRelative:       push	de
 124+ F933 E5                                   push	hl
 125+ F934 D9                                   exx
 126+ F935 E1                                   pop	hl					; get relative	horisontal movement
 127+ F936 CD AD F9                             call	sgn
 128+ F939 57                                   ld	d,a					; direc_x	= SGN(x) installed d = +/-1 for horizontal update
 129+ F93A CD BA F9                             call	absValue
 130+ F93D 45                                   ld	b,l					; x = ABS(x)
 131+ F93E E1           DrawLineGetVertRelative:pop	hl					; get relative	vertical movement
 132+ F93F CD AD F9                             call	sgn
 133+ F942 5F                                   ld	e,a					; direc_y	= SGN(y) installed  = +/-1 for vertical update
 134+ F943 CD BA F9                             call	absValue
 135+ F946 4D                                   ld	c,l					; y = ABS(y) so now bc = dxdy
 136+ F947              ; so by here BC = dx dy HL in increment/decrement x y
 137+ F947 C5                                   push	bc
 138+ F948 D9                                   exx
 139+ F949 E1                                   pop	hl					; H = absolute	x dist., L = absolute y distance
 140+ F94A 7C                                   ld	a,h
 141+ F94B BD                                   cp	l
 142+ F94C 38 0A                                jr	c, x_smaller_y		; if	x >=	y
 143+ F94E B4           areXandYZero:           or	h					;	if x+y = 0
 144+ F94F 28 5B                                jr	z, exit_draw		;		return
 145+ F951 D9           y_lessorequal_x:        exx						;	else
 146+ F952 42                                   ld	b,d					;		ddx = direc_x
 147+ F953 0E 00                                ld	c,0					;		ddy = 0
 148+ F955 D9                                   exx
 149+ F956 18 08                                jr	init_drawloop		; else
 150+ F958 7C           x_smaller_y:	        ld	a,h
 151+ F959 65                                   ld	h,l					;	H = y
 152+ F95A 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	L = x
 153+ F95B D9                                   exx
 154+ F95C 06 00                                ld	b,0					;	ddx = 0
 155+ F95E 4B                                   ld	c,e					;	ddy = direc_y
 156+ F95F D9                                   exx
 157+ F960 44           init_drawloop:	        ld	b,h
 158+ F961 4C                                   ld	c,h					; B = H
 159+ F962 CB 39                                srl	c					; i = INT(B/2)
 160+ F964              										; FOR N=B	TO 1	STEP	-1
 161+ F964 79           drawloop:		        ld	a,c
 162+ F965 85                                   add	a,l
 163+ F966 38 09                                jr	c, i_greater		;	i + L > 255  (i > H)
 164+ F968 BC                                   cp	h
 165+ F969 30 06                                jr	nc, i_greater		;	if i	< H
 166+ F96B 4F                                   ld	c,a					;		i = i + L
 167+ F96C D9                                   exx
 168+ F96D C5                                   push	bc				;		ix =	ddx:	iy =	ddy
 169+ F96E D9                                   exx
 170+ F96F 18 05                                jr	check_plot			;	else
 171+ F971 94           i_greater:		        sub	h					;		i = i - H
 172+ F972 4F                                   ld	c,a
 173+ F973 D9                                   exx
 174+ F974 D5                                   push	de				;		ix =	direc_x: iy = direc_y
 175+ F975 D9                                   exx						;	endif
 176+ F976 E3           check_plot:		        ex	(sp),hl				;	preserve H,L distances on stack
 177+ F977 EB                                   ex	de,hl				;	D,E = ix,	iy
 178+ F978 2A 04 F9                             ld	hl,(line_gfx_coords)
 179+ F97B 7D                                   ld	a,l
 180+ F97C 83                                   add	a,e					;
 181+ F97D 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	y0 =	y0 +	iy (y0 is	checked by plot)
 182+ F97E 7A                                   ld	a,d
 183+ F97F 3C                                   inc	a
 184+ F980 84                                   add	a,h
 185+ F981 38 04                                jr	c, check_range		;	check out	of range
 186+ F983 28 26                                jr	z, range_error		;	Fz=1	& Fc=0 denotes	x0 <	0
 187+ F985 18 02                                jr	plot_point
 188+ F987 20 22        check_range:            jr	nz, range_error	;	Fz=0	& Fc=1 denotes	x0 >	255
 189+ F989
 190+ F989 3D           plot_point:             dec	a
 191+ F98A C5                                   push	bc
 192+ F98B F5                                   push	af
 193+ F98C 47                                   ld	    b,a					;	x0 =	x0 +	ix
 194+ F98D 4D                                   ld		c,l
 195+ F98E 3A B5 E2                             ld		a,(line_gfx_colour)
 196+ F991 ED 43 04 F9                          ld      (line_gfx_coords),bc
 197+ F995                                      l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel:
 197+ F995 78          >                        ld      a,b
 197+ F996             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 197+ F996 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 197+ F998 D2 A4 F9    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 197+ F99B 69          >                        ld      l,c
 197+ F99C CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 197+ F99F 67          >                        ld      h,a
 197+ F9A0 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 197+ F9A3 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 197+ F9A4             >.NoPlot:
 198+ F9A4 F1                                   pop		af
 199+ F9A5 C1                                   pop		bc
 200+ F9A6 E1           plot_RET:		        pop	hl					;	restore H,L distances...
 201+ F9A7 10 BB                                djnz	drawloop		; NEXT N
 202+ F9A9 18 01                                jr	exit_draw
 203+ F9AB
 204+ F9AB E1           range_error:	        pop	hl					; remove H,L distances...
 205+ F9AC C9           exit_draw:		        ret
 206+ F9AD
 207+ F9AD
 208+ F9AD              ; ******************************************************************************
 209+ F9AD              ;
 210+ F9AD              ;	SGN (Signum value) of 16	bit signed integer.
 211+ F9AD              ;
 212+ F9AD              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 213+ F9AD              ;	OUT:		A = result: 0,1,-1 (if zero, positive, negative)
 214+ F9AD              ;
 215+ F9AD              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 216+ F9AD              ;	..BCDEHL/IXIY	same
 217+ F9AD              ;	AF....../....	different
 218+ F9AD              ;
 219+ F9AD 7C           sgn:				    ld	a,h
 220+ F9AE B5                                   or	l
 221+ F9AF C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is zero, return 0...
 222+ F9B0 CB 7C                                bit	7,h
 223+ F9B2 20 03                                jr	nz, negative_int
 224+ F9B4 3E 01                                ld	a,1
 225+ F9B6 C9                                   ret
 226+ F9B7 3E FF        negative_int:		    ld	a,-1
 227+ F9B9 C9                                   ret
 228+ F9BA
 229+ F9BA
 230+ F9BA              ; ******************************************************************************
 231+ F9BA              ;
 232+ F9BA              ;	ABS (Absolute value) of 16 bit signed integer.
 233+ F9BA              ;
 234+ F9BA              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 235+ F9BA              ;	OUT:		HL =	converted	integer
 236+ F9BA              ;
 237+ F9BA              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 238+ F9BA              ;	A.BCDE../IXIY	same
 239+ F9BA              ;	.F....HL/....	different
 240+ F9BA              ;
 241+ F9BA CB 7C        absValue:			    bit	7,h
 242+ F9BC C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is positive...
 243+ F9BD D5                                   push	de
 244+ F9BE EB                                   ex	de,hl
 245+ F9BF 21 00 00                             ld	hl,0
 246+ F9C2 BF                                   cp	a				; Fc	= 0,	may not be used...
 247+ F9C3 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de			; convert	negative integer
 248+ F9C5 D1                                   pop	de
 249+ F9C6 C9                                   ret
 250+ F9C7
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm

   1+ E056 AF           l1_cls_top:             xor     a

1436  E0BA                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
   1+ E0BA              ; "l1 print char a = character, de = Ypixel Xchar of print"
   2+ E0BA D5 E5        l1_print_char:          push	de,,hl
   3+ E0BC ED 94                                pixelad								; hl = address of de
   4+ E0BE E5                                   push	hl							; save hl for loop
   5+ E0BF 26 00                                ld		h,0
   6+ E0C1 6F                                   ld		l,a
   7+ E0C2 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
   8+ E0C3 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
   9+ E0C4 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  10+ E0C5 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  11+ E0C9 EB                                   ex		de,hl						; save address into de
  12+ E0CA E1                                   pop		hl							; get back hl for loop
  13+ E0CB 06 08                                ld		b,8							; do 8 rows
  14+ E0CD 1A           .PrintCharLoop:         ld		a,(de)						; row byte
  15+ E0CE 13                                   inc		de							; next byte
  16+ E0CF 77                                   ld		(hl),a						; poke to screen
  17+ E0D0 ED 93                                pixeldn								; Down 1 row
  18+ E0D2 10 F9                                djnz	.PrintCharLoop				; loop for 8 bytes
  19+ E0D4 E1 D1                                pop		de,,hl					    ; restore hl
  20+ E0D6 C9                                   ret
  21+ E0D7
  22+ E0D7              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  23+ E0D7              ; now skips ascii code < 32 but moves on cursor by 1 char
  24+ E0D7              l1_print_at:
  25+ E0D7 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
  26+ E0D8 FE 00                                cp		0
  27+ E0DA C8                                   ret		z
  28+ E0DB                                      CallIfAGTENusng " ", l1_print_char
  28+ E0DB FE 20       >                        cp      " "
  28+ E0DD D4 BA E0    >                        call	nc,l1_print_char
  29+ E0E0 23                                   inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  30+ E0E1 7B                                   ld		a,e
  31+ E0E2 C6 08                                add		a,8
  32+ E0E4 5F                                   ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  33+ E0E5 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
  34+ E0E7                                                      DISPLAY "TODO: looks liek rogue popde"
  35+ E0E7              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;pop		de                      ; TODO LOOOKS TO BE A ROGUE POPDE
  36+ E0E7 C9                                   ret
  37+ E0E8
  38+ E0E8              ;l1_print_at_wrap:
  39+ E0E8              ;; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  40+ E0E8              ;	ld      iyh,e
  41+ E0E8              ;.PrintLoop:
  42+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  43+ E0E8              ;	cp		0
  44+ E0E8              ;	ret		z
  45+ E0E8              ;.CountWordCharLen
  46+ E0E8              ;; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
  47+ E0E8              ;; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
  48+ E0E8              ;; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
  49+ E0E8              ;
  50+ E0E8              ;
  51+ E0E8              ;    push    iy
  52+ E0E8              ;    call	l1_print_char
  53+ E0E8              ;    pop     iy
  54+ E0E8              ;	inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  55+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,e
  56+ E0E8              ;    cp      238
  57+ E0E8              ;    jr      nc,.NextLine
  58+ E0E8              ;	add		a,8
  59+ E0E8              ;	ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  60+ E0E8              ;	jr		.PrintLoop
  61+ E0E8              ;.Clearstackandfinish:
  62+ E0E8              ;	pop		de
  63+ E0E8              ;	ret
  64+ E0E8              ;.NextLine:
  65+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  66+ E0E8              ;    cp      " "
  67+ E0E8              ;    ld      e,iyh
  68+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,d
  69+ E0E8              ;    add     a,8
  70+ E0E8              ;    ld      d,a
  71+ E0E8              ;    jr		.PrintLoop
  72+ E0E8
  73+ E0E8              ; Counts next word at hl, uses e and forces a wrap if it would over flow puts value in c
  74+ E0E8 E5           L1LenWordAtHL:          push    hl
  75+ E0E9 D5                                   push    de
  76+ E0EA 7E           .CountLoop:             ld      a,(hl)
  77+ E0EB FE 00                                cp      0
  78+ E0ED 28 0F                                jr      z,.CountDone
  79+ E0EF FE 20                                cp      32
  80+ E0F1 28 0B                                jr      z,.CountDone
  81+ E0F3 7B                                   ld      a,e
  82+ E0F4 C6 08                                add     a,8
  83+ E0F6 5F                                   ld      e,a
  84+ E0F7 FE EE                                cp      238
  85+ E0F9 30 07                                jr      nc,.TooLong
  86+ E0FB 23                                   inc     hl
  87+ E0FC 18 EC                                jr      .CountLoop
  88+ E0FE D1           .CountDone:             pop     de
  89+ E0FF E1                                   pop     hl
  90+ E100 AF                                   xor     a
  91+ E101 C9                                   ret
  92+ E102 D1           .TooLong                pop     de
  93+ E103 E1                                   pop     hl
  94+ E104 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  95+ E106 C9                                   ret
  96+ E107
  97+ E107 7E           L1PrintWordAtHL:        ld      a,(hl)
  98+ E108 FE 00                                cp      0
  99+ E10A C8                                   ret     z
 100+ E10B FE 20                                cp      32
 101+ E10D 28 0F                                jr      z,.ItsASpace
 102+ E10F FD E5                                push    iy
 103+ E111 CD BA E0                             call	l1_print_char
 104+ E114 FD E1                                pop     iy
 105+ E116 7B                                   ld      a,e
 106+ E117 C6 08                                add     a,8
 107+ E119 5F                                   ld      e,a
 108+ E11A 23                                   inc     hl
 109+ E11B C3 07 E1                             jp      L1PrintWordAtHL
 110+ E11E 23           .ItsASpace:             inc     hl      ;  Just a bodge for now
 111+ E11F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 112+ E120 C6 08                                add     a,8
 113+ E122 5F                                   ld      e,a
 114+ E123 C9                                   ret
 115+ E124
 116+ E124
 117+ E124              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 118+ E124              ; Now has full word level wrapping
 119+ E124 FD 63        l1_print_at_wrap:       ld      iyh,e
 120+ E126 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
 121+ E127 FE 00                                cp		0
 122+ E129 C8                                   ret		z
 123+ E12A CD E8 E0     .CountWordCharLen:      call    L1LenWordAtHL
 124+ E12D FE FF                                cp      $FF
 125+ E12F 28 06                                jr      z,.WrapNextLine
 126+ E131 CD 07 E1     .NotTooLong:            call    L1PrintWordAtHL
 127+ E134              ; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
 128+ E134              ; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
 129+ E134              ; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
 130+ E134 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
 131+ E136              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;op		de
 132+ E136 C9                                   ret
 133+ E137              .WrapNextLine:
 134+ E137 FD 5C        .NextLine:              ld      e,iyh
 135+ E139 7A                                   ld      a,d
 136+ E13A C6 08                                add     a,8
 137+ E13C 57                                   ld      d,a
 138+ E13D 18 E7                                jr		.PrintLoop
 139+ E13F
 140+ E13F
# file closed: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
1437  E13F                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER1," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER1Addr), " - BankLAYER1"
1438  E13F              ; Bank 59  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1439  E13F              ; In the first copy of the banks the "Non number" labels exist. They will map directly in other banks
1440  E13F              ; as the is aligned and data tables are after that
1441  E13F              ; need to make the ship index tables same size in each to simplify further
1442  E13F                  SLOT    ShipModelsAddr
1443  E13F                  PAGE    BankShipModels1
1444  E13F              	ORG     ShipModelsAddr, BankShipModels1
1445  E000                  INCLUDE "./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm"
# file opened: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm
   1+ E000              MShipBankTable          MACRO
   2+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels1
   3+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels2
   4+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels3
   5+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels4
   6+ E000                                      ENDM
   7+ E000              ; For ship number A fetch
   8+ E000              ;           the adjusted ship number in B , C = original number
   9+ E000              ;           bank number in A for the respective ship based on the ship table
  10+ E000              MGetShipBankId:         MACRO   banktable
  11+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  12+ E000 ~                                    ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
  13+ E000 ~            .ShiftLoop:             srl     a
  14+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  15+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  16+ E000 ~                                    srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
  17+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
  18+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,c
  19+ E000 ~                                    ld      d,b
  20+ E000 ~                                    ld      e,16
  21+ E000 ~                                    mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
  22+ E000 ~                                    sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
  23+ E000 ~            .SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
  24+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
  25+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
  26+ E000 ~            ;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
  27+ E000 ~                                    ld      hl,banktable                        ; a= bank index
  28+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  29+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
  31+ E000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
  32+ E000 ~                                    ret
  33+ E000                                      ENDM
  34+ E000
  35+ E000              McopyVertsToUniverse:   MACRO
  36+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
  37+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
  38+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  39+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
  40+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  41+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  42+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  43+ E000 ~                                    ret
  44+ E000                                      ENDM
  45+ E000
  46+ E000              McopyEdgesToUniverse:   MACRO
  47+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
  48+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
  49+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  50+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
  51+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  52+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  53+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  54+ E000 ~                                    ret
  55+ E000                                      ENDM
  56+ E000
  57+ E000              McopyNormsToUniverse:   MACRO
  58+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
  59+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
  60+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  61+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
  62+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  63+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  64+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  65+ E000 ~                                    ret
  66+ E000                                      ENDM
  67+ E000
  68+ E000              ; Passes in ship nbr in A and bank is part of MACRO
  69+ E000              MCopyShipToUniverse:    MACRO       banklabel
  70+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
  71+ E000 ~                                    ld          (hl),banklabel
  72+ E000 ~                                    push        af
  73+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,iyl
  74+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnkShipModelId),a
  75+ E000 ~                                    pop         af
  76+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnkShipModelNbr),a
  77+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
  78+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  79+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
  80+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,(hl)
  81+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  82+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
  83+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
  84+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  85+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
  86+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(hl)
  87+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  88+ E000 ~                                    ld          h,(hl)
  89+ E000 ~                                    ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
  90+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
  91+ E000 ~                                    ld          bc,ShipDataLength
  92+ E000 ~                                    ldir
  93+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyVertsToUniv
  94+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyEdgesToUniv
  95+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyNormsToUniv
  96+ E000 ~            .ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
  97+ E000 ~                                    ld          a," "
  98+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
  99+ E000 ~            .fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
 100+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 101+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .fillLoop
 102+ E000 ~            .SetName:               ld          a,(UBnkShipModelId)
 103+ E000 ~                                    call        ShipIndexToAddress
 104+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 105+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
 106+ E000 ~            .CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 107+ E000 ~                                    cp          0
 108+ E000 ~                                    jr          z,.CopyDone
 109+ E000 ~                                    ld          (de),a
 110+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 111+ E000 ~                                    inc         de
 112+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .CopyLoop
 113+ E000 ~            .CopyDone:              ret
 114+ E000                                      ENDM
 115+ E000
 116+ E000              MCopyBodyToUniverse:    MACRO       copyRoutine
 117+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,13
 118+ E000 ~                                    call        copyRoutine
 119+ E000 ~                                    ret
 120+ E000                                      ENDM
 121+ E000
 122+ E000
 123+ E000              MCopyShipIdToUniverse:  MACRO
 124+ E000 ~                                    call        GetShipModelId
 125+ E000 ~                                    MMUSelectShipBankA
 126+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,b
 127+ E000 ~                                    jp          CopyShipToUniverse
 128+ E000                                      ENDM
# file closed: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm
