   1+ E000 53 68 69 70  ShipBank1Label:         DB  "ShipBank1      "
   1+ E004 42 61 6E 6B
   1+ E008 31 20 20 20
   1+ E00C 20 20 20
   2+ E00F
# file closed: ./Data/ShipBank1Label.asm
1447  E00F              GetShipBankId:
1448  E00F              GetShipBank1Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable
1448  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1448  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1448  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1448  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1448  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1448  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1448  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1448  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1448  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1448  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1448  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1448  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1448  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1448  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1448  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1448  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1448  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable                        ; a= bank index
1448  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1448  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1448  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1448  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1448  E02D B7          >                        or a
1448  E02E C9          >                        ret
1449  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv:
1450  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv1:       McopyVertsToUniverse
1450  E02F 2A 0C C4    >                        ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1450  E032 11 12 C4    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
1450  E035 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1450  E037 3A 00 C4    >                        ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
1450  E03A 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1450  E03B EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1450  E03C CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1450  E03F C9          >                        ret
1451  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv:
1452  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv1:       McopyEdgesToUniverse
1452  E040 2A FA C3    >                        ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1452  E043 11 02 C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
1452  E046 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1452  E048 3A FC C3    >                        ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
1452  E04B 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1452  E04C EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1452  E04D CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1452  E050 C9          >                        ret
1453  E051              CopyNormsToUniv:
1454  E051              CopyNormsToUniv1:       McopyNormsToUniverse
1454  E051 2A 08 C4    >                        ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1454  E054 11 CA C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
1454  E057 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1454  E059 3A 04 C4    >                        ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
1454  E05C 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1454  E05D EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1454  E05E CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1454  E061 C9          >                        ret
1455  E062              ShipBankTable:
1456  E062              ShipBankTable1:         MShipBankTable

1456  E064 43 00       >                        DW      BankShipModels2
1456  E066 44 00       >                        DW      BankShipModels3

1457  E06A              CopyShipToUniverse:
1458  E06A              CopyShipToUniverse1     MCopyShipToUniverse     BankShipModels1
1458  E06A 21 42 C0    >                        ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
1458  E06D 36 3B       >                        ld          (hl),BankShipModels1
1458  E06F F5          >                        push        af
1458  E070 FD 7D       >                        ld          a,iyl
1458  E072 32 44 C0    >                        ld          (UBnkShipModelId),a
1458  E075 F1          >                        pop         af
1458  E076 32 43 C0    >                        ld          (UBnkShipModelNbr),a
1458  E079 21 46 E1    >.GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
1458  E07C ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1458  E07E ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
1458  E080 4E          >                        ld          c,(hl)
1458  E081 23          >                        inc         hl
1458  E082 46          >                        ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
1458  E083 21 C6 E0    >.GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
1458  E086 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1458  E088 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
1458  E08A 7E          >                        ld          a,(hl)
1458  E08B 23          >                        inc         hl
1458  E08C 66          >                        ld          h,(hl)
1458  E08D 6F          >                        ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
1458  E08E 11 F7 C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
1458  E091 01 1B 00    >                        ld          bc,ShipDataLength
1458  E094 ED B0       >                        ldir
1458  E096 CD 2F E0    >                        call        CopyVertsToUniv
1458  E099 CD 40 E0    >                        call        CopyEdgesToUniv
1458  E09C CD 51 E0    >                        call        CopyNormsToUniv
1458  E09F 21 10 C0    >.ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
1458  E0A2 3E 20       >                        ld          a," "
1458  E0A4 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1458  E0A6 77          >.fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
1458  E0A7 23          >                        inc         hl
1458  E0A8 10 FC       >                        djnz        .fillLoop
1458  E0AA 3A 44 C0    >.SetName:               ld          a,(UBnkShipModelId)
1458  E0AD CD 08 8F    >                        call        ShipIndexToAddress
1458  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
1458  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1458  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
1458  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
1458  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
1458  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
1458  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
1458  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
1458  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
1458  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret
1459  E0C0              CopyBodyToUniverse:

1460  E0C0 3E 0D       >                        ld          a,13

  24++E5F8 8F E6                                DW CargoType5Traingles                  ;
  25++E5FA 21                                   DB CargoType5TrainglesSize
  26++E5FB              ; So cargo is               Edge offset $0050  Face Offset $008C, Verices will alwys be +20, LineMax 31 -> 4  EdgeCnt 15  VertexCnt 60 -> 10     FaceCn 28 -> 7
  27++E5FB              ;                                       Faces
  28++E5FB              ;                            X  Y    Z  12 34  Vis
  29++E5FB 18 10 00 1F  CargoType5Vertices		DB $18,$10,$00,$1F,$10,$55 	               ;00  Top Right
  29++E5FF 10 55
  30++E601 18 05 0F 1F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$1F,$10,$22                 ;01  Mid Right Near
  30++E605 10 22
  31++E607 18 0D 09 5F                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$5F,$20,$33                 ;02  Bottom right Near
  31++E60B 20 33
  32++E60D 18 0D 09 7F                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$7F,$30,$44                 ;03  Bottom Right Rear
  32++E611 30 44
  33++E613 18 05 0F 3F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$3F,$40,$55                 ;04  Mid Right Rear
  33++E617 40 55
  34++E619 18 10 00 9F                          DB $18,$10,$00,$9F,$51,$66                 ;05  Left versions
  34++E61D 51 66
  35++E61F 18 05 0F 9F                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$9F,$21,$66                 ;06
  35++E623 21 66
  36++E625 18 0D 09 DF                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$DF,$32,$66                 ;07
  36++E629 32 66
  37++E62B 18 0D 09 FF                          DB $18,$0D,$09,$FF,$43,$66                 ;08
  37++E62F 43 66
  38++E631 18 05 0F BF                          DB $18,$05,$0F,$BF,$54,$66                 ;09
  38++E635 54 66
  39++E637              CargoType5VertSize      equ $  - CargoType5Vertices
  40++E637              ;                          Vis  FacVert Offset (4 bytexVertnbr)
  41++E637              ;                               12  01 02
  42++E637 1F 10 00 04  CargoType5Edges			DB $1F,$10,$00,$04 	       ;00 Face  0,1
  43++E63B 1F 20 04 08                          DB $1F,$20,$04,$08         ;01
  44++E63F 1F 30 08 0C                          DB $1F,$30,$08,$0C         ;02
  45++E643 1F 40 0C 10                          DB $1F,$40,$0C,$10         ;03
  46++E647 1F 50 00 10                          DB $1F,$50,$00,$10         ;04
  47++E64B 1F 51 00 14                          DB $1F,$51,$00,$14         ;05
  48++E64F 1F 21 04 18                          DB $1F,$21,$04,$18         ;06
  49++E653 1F 32 08 1C                          DB $1F,$32,$08,$1C         ;07
  50++E657 1F 43 0C 20                          DB $1F,$43,$0C,$20         ;08
  51++E65B 1F 54 10 24                          DB $1F,$54,$10,$24         ;19
  52++E65F 1F 61 14 18                          DB $1F,$61,$14,$18         ;10
  53++E663 1F 62 18 1C                          DB $1F,$62,$18,$1C         ;11
  54++E667 1F 63 1C 20                          DB $1F,$63,$1C,$20         ;12
  55++E66B 1F 64 20 24                          DB $1F,$64,$20,$24         ;13
  56++E66F 1F 65 24 14                          DB $1F,$65,$24,$14         ;14
  57++E673              CargoType5EdgesSize     equ $  - CargoType5Edges
  58++E673              CargoType5EdgesCnt      equ CargoType5EdgesSize / 4
  59++E673              ;                           x  y    z   vis
  60++E673 1F 60 00 00  CargoType5Normals    	DB $1F,$60,$00,$00 			               ;00 Right side
  61++E677 1F 00 29 1E                          DB $1F,$00,$29,$1E                         ;01
  62++E67B 5F 00 12 30                          DB $5F,$00,$12,$30                         ;02
  63++E67F 5F 00 33 00                          DB $5F,$00,$33,$00                         ;03
  64++E683 7F 00 12 30                          DB $7F,$00,$12,$30                         ;04
  65++E687 3F 00 29 1E                          DB $3F,$00,$29,$1E                         ;05 Left
  66++E68B 9F 60 00 00                          DB $9F,$60,$00,$00   ; end Cargo cannister ;06 right side
  67++E68F              CargoType5NormalsSize   equ $  - CargoType5Normals
  68++E68F              CargoType5Len           equ $  - CargoType5
  69++E68F                                      ; Triangles is made of a list of edges
  70++E68F              ; Ideal is pointers have a DW at the end to the list of triangles and count
  71++E68F              ; for testing we will do a simple search
  72++E68F              ;                          Nrm NodeOffset X 1
  73++E68F              ;                                0    1    2
  74++E68F 00 00 04 10  CargoType5Traingles     DB $00,$00*4, $01*4, $04*4
  75++E693 00 04 08 10                          DB $00,$01*4, $02*4, $04*4
  76++E697 00 08 0C 10                          DB $00,$02*4, $03*4, $04*4
  77++E69B 01 00 10 14                          DB $01,$00*4, $04*4, $05*4
  78++E69F 01 10 14 18                          DB $01,$04*4, $05*4, $06*4
  79++E6A3                                  ;   DB $02,
  80++E6A3                                  ;   DB $03,
  81++E6A3                                  ;   DB $03,
  82++E6A3                                  ;   DB $04,
  83++E6A3                                  ;   DB $04,
  84++E6A3                                  ;   DB $01,
  85++E6A3                                  ;   DB $01,
  86++E6A3                                  ;   DB $01,
  87++E6A3                                  ;   DB $01,
  88++E6A3 06 14 18 24                          DB $06,$05*4, $06*4, $09*4 ; its we store UBnkNodeArray + this offset it will save one memroy ready
  89++E6A7 06 18 1C 24                          DB $06,$06*4, $07*4, $09*4
  90++E6AB 06 1C 20 24                          DB $06,$07*4, $08*4, $09*4
  91++E6AF FF                                   DB $FF ; Very important end of traingle list marker
  92++E6B0              CargoType5TrainglesSize:equ $  -  CargoType5Traingles
  93++E6B0
  94++E6B0
  95++E6B0

   1++E6B0 00           Boulder:	            DB $00                               ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   2++E6B1 84 03                                DW 30 * 30                           ; Ship's targetable area LoHi

 188+ C1F3              MPD_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C1F3
   2++C1F3              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C1F3 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C1F4 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C1F5 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C1F6 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C1F7 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C1F8 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C1F9 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C1FA 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C1FB 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C1FC E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C1FD EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C1FE 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C200 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C201 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C202                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C202 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C206 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C209 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C20A C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C20B 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C20D C9                                   ret
  23++C20E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

1475  E00F              GetShipBank2Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable2
1475  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1475  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1475  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1475  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1475  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1475  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1475  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1475  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1475  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1475  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1475  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1475  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1475  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1475  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1475  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1475  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1475  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable2                        ; a= bank index
1475  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1475  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1475  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1475  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1475  E02D B7          >                        or a
1475  E02E C9          >                        ret
1476  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv2:       McopyVertsToUniverse
1476  E02F 2A 0C C4    >                        ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1476  E032 11 12 C4    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
1476  E035 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1476  E037 3A 00 C4    >                        ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
1476  E03A 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1476  E03B EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1476  E03C CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1476  E03F C9          >                        ret
1477  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv2:       McopyEdgesToUniverse
1477  E040 2A FA C3    >                        ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1477  E043 11 02 C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
1477  E046 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1477  E048 3A FC C3    >                        ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
1477  E04B 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1477  E04C EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1477  E04D CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1477  E050 C9          >                        ret
1478  E051              CopyNormsToUniv2:       McopyNormsToUniverse
1478  E051 2A 08 C4    >                        ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1478  E054 11 CA C5    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
1478  E057 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1478  E059 3A 04 C4    >                        ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
1478  E05C 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1478  E05D EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1478  E05E CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1478  E061 C9          >                        ret

1480  E079 21 46 E1    >.GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
1480  E07C ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1480  E07E ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
1480  E080 4E          >                        ld          c,(hl)
1480  E081 23          >                        inc         hl
1480  E082 46          >                        ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
1480  E083 21 C6 E0    >.GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
1480  E086 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1480  E088 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
1480  E08A 7E          >                        ld          a,(hl)
1480  E08B 23          >                        inc         hl
1480  E08C 66          >                        ld          h,(hl)
1480  E08D 6F          >                        ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
1480  E08E 11 F7 C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
1480  E091 01 1B 00    >                        ld          bc,ShipDataLength
1480  E094 ED B0       >                        ldir

1480  E099 CD 40 E0    >                        call        CopyEdgesToUniv

1480  E0A2 3E 20       >                        ld          a," "
1480  E0A4 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1480  E0A6 77          >.fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
1480  E0A7 23          >                        inc         hl
1480  E0A8 10 FC       >                        djnz        .fillLoop
1480  E0AA 3A 44 C0    >.SetName:               ld          a,(UBnkShipModelId)
1480  E0AD CD 08 8F    >                        call        ShipIndexToAddress
1480  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
1480  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1480  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
1480  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
1480  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
1480  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
1480  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
1480  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
1480  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
1480  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret

   1++EA73              ;    DEFINE DEBUGMODEL 1
   2++EA73 00           Missile:	            DB $00                     ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   3++EA74 40 06                                DW $0640                   ; Ship's targetable area LoHi
   4++EA76 F8 EA                                DW MissileEdges            ; Edge Data
   5++EA78 60                                   DB MissileEdgesSize        ; Size of Edge Data
   6++EA79 00                                   DB $00                     ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   7++EA7A 0A                                   DB $0A                     ; Explosion Count
   8++EA7B 11                                   DB MissileVertSize /6      ; Vertex Count /6
   9++EA7C 66                                   DB MissileVertSize         ; Vertex Count
  10++EA7D 18                                   DB MissileEdgesCnt         ; Edges Count
  11++EA7E 00 00                                DW $0000                   ; Bounty LoHi
  12++EA80 24                                   DB MissileNormalsSize      ; Face (Normal) Count
  13++EA81 0E                                   DB $0E                     ; Range when it turns to a dot
  14++EA82 02                                   DB $02                     ; Energy Max
  15++EA83 2C                                   DB $2C                     ; Speed Max
  16++EA84 58 EB                                DW MissileNormals          ; Normals
  17++EA86 02                                   DB $02                     ; Q scaling
  18++EA87 00                                   DB $00                     ; Laser power and Nbr Missiles
  19++EA88 92 EA                                DW MissileVertices         ; Verticles Address
  20++EA8A 01                                   DB ShipTypeMissile         ; Ship Type
  21++EA8B 00                                   DB 0                       ; NewB Tactics
  22++EA8C 00                                   DB 0                       ; AI Flags
  23++EA8D 00                                   DB $00                     ; chance of ECM module
  24++EA8E FF                                   DB $FF                              ; Supports Solid Fill = false
  25++EA8F 00 00                                DW $0000                            ; no solid data
  26++EA91 00                                   DB $00                              ; no solid data
  27++EA92
  28++EA92              ;; Modifications for solid:
  29++EA92              ;; Need a list of triangles, triangle are linked to faces
  30++EA92              ;; so on the verticies we can have an additional link on faces to triangle nbr, we also have to draw in z furthest sequenvce
  31++EA92
  32++EA92              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  33++EA92              ;;;		Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  34++EA92              ;;;		Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
  35++EA92              ;;;		Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
  36++EA92              ;;;		Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
  37++EA92              ;;;		Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
  38++EA92              MissileVertices:    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
  39++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$50,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 00 00 Y Tip (Roof)
  40++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 01 04 Y base for all nodes
  41++EA92 ~                                    DB $50,$00,$00,$1F,$01,$01  ; 02 08 X Tip (Side)
  42++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$01,$01  ; 03 0C X Base
  43++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$30,$1F,$02,$02  ; 04 10 Z Tip (Nose1)
  44++EA92 ~                                    DB $00,$00,$00,$1F,$02,$03  ; 05 14 Z base
  45++EA92 ~                                    DB $04,$00,$25,$9F,$03,$03  ; 06 18 Z Trangle point 1
  46++EA92 ~                                    DB $04,$00,$25,$1F,$03,$03  ; 07 1C Z Trangle point 2
  47++EA92 ~                                    DB $05,$10,$00,$9F,$00,$00  ; 08 20 Y Cross Member 1
  48++EA92 ~                                    DB $05,$10,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 09 24 Y Cross Member 2
  49++EA92 ~                                    DB $10,$05,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 10 28 X Cross Member 1
  50++EA92 ~                                    DB $20,$00,$00,$1F,$00,$00  ; 11 2C X Cross Member 2
  51++EA92 ~                                    DB $10,$05,$00,$5F,$00,$00  ; 12 30 X Cross Member 3
  52++EA92                                  ELSE
  53++EA92 00 00 44 1F                          DB $00, $00, $44, $1F, $10, $32
  53++EA96 10 32
  54++EA98 08 08 24 5F                          DB $08, $08, $24, $5F, $21, $54
  54++EA9C 21 54

  55++EAA2 32 74

  56++EAA8 30 76

  69++EAF6 54 55
  70++EAF8                                  ENDIF
  71++EAF8              MissileVertSize: equ $ - MissileVertices
  72++EAF8
  73++EAF8              ;;;     Byte 0 = Edge visbility Distance if > XX4 distance then won't show
  74++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 1 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
  75++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 2 = Byte offset to Point 1 (divide by 4 for index)
  76++EAF8              ;;;		Byte 3 = Byte offset to Point 2 (divide by 4 for index)
  77++EAF8
  78++EAF8              MissileEdges:	    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
  79++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$04 ; Y
  80++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$08,$0C ; X
  81++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$14 ; Z
  82++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$18 ; Z Tip Traingle 1
  83++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$1C ; Z Tip Traingle 2
  84++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$1C,$18 ; Z Tip Traingle 2
  85++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$20,$24 ; Y Cross memeber
  86++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$28,$2C ; X Triangle
  87++EAF8 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$2C,$30 ; X Triangle
  88++EAF8 ~                                    ;DB $1F,$00,$18,$1C
  89++EAF8                                  ELSE
  90++EAF8 1F 21 00 04                          DB $1F, $21, $00, $04
  91++EAFC 1F 32 00 08                          DB $1F, $32, $00, $08
  92++EB00 1F 30 00 0C                          DB $1F, $30, $00, $0C

 114++EB58                                  ENDIF
 115++EB58              MissileEdgesSize: equ $ - MissileEdges
 116++EB58
 117++EB58
 118++EB58              MissileEdgesCnt: equ MissileEdgesSize/4
 119++EB58
 120++EB58              ;;;		Byte 0 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z, bits 4 to 0 are distance for always visible
 121++EB58              ;;;		Byte 1 = X Lo
 122++EB58              ;;;		Byte 2 = Y Lo
 123++EB58              ;;;		Byte 3 = Z Lo
 124++EB58              MissileNormals:	    IFDEF DEBUGMODEL
 125++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$10,$00
 126++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$10,$00,$00
 127++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$10
 128++EB58 ~                                    DB $1F,$00,$00,$10
 129++EB58                                  ELSE
 130++EB58 9F 40 00 10                          DB $9F, $40, $00, $10
 131++EB5C 5F 00 40 10                          DB $5F, $00, $40, $10
 132++EB60 1F 40 00 10                          DB $1F, $40, $00, $10
 133++EB64 1F 00 40 10                          DB $1F, $00, $40, $10
 134++EB68 1F 20 00 00                          DB $1F, $20, $00, $00
 135++EB6C 5F 00 20 00                          DB $5F, $00, $20, $00
 136++EB70 9F 20 00 00                          DB $9F, $20, $00, $00
 137++EB74 1F 00 20 00                          DB $1F, $00, $20, $00
 138++EB78 3F 00 00 B0                          DB $3F, $00, $00, $B0
 139++EB7C                                  ENDIF
 140++EB7C
 141++EB7C              MissileNormalsSize: equ $ - MissileNormals
 142++EB7C              MissileLen: equ $ - Missile

1491  E00F              GetShipBank3Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable3
1491  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1491  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1491  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1491  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1491  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1491  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1491  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1491  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1491  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1491  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1491  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1491  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1491  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1491  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1491  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1491  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1491  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable3                        ; a= bank index
1491  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1491  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1491  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1491  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1491  E02D B7          >                        or a
1491  E02E C9          >                        ret
1492  E02F              CopyVertsToUniv3:       McopyVertsToUniverse
1492  E02F 2A 0C C4    >                        ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
1492  E032 11 12 C4    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
1492  E035 06 00       >                        ld          b,0
1492  E037 3A 00 C4    >                        ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
1492  E03A 4F          >                        ld          c,a
1492  E03B EB          >                        ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
1492  E03C CD 39 7E    >                        call        memcopy_dma
1492  E03F C9          >                        ret
1493  E040              CopyEdgesToUniv3:       McopyEdgesToUniverse

1493  E050 C9          >                        ret
1494  E051              CopyNormsToUniv3:       McopyNormsToUniverse

1496  E079 21 46 E1    >.GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
1496  E07C ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1496  E07E ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
1496  E080 4E          >                        ld          c,(hl)
1496  E081 23          >                        inc         hl
1496  E082 46          >                        ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
1496  E083 21 C6 E0    >.GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
1496  E086 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a
1496  E088 ED 31       >                        add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
1496  E08A 7E          >                        ld          a,(hl)
1496  E08B 23          >                        inc         hl
1496  E08C 66          >                        ld          h,(hl)
1496  E08D 6F          >                        ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
1496  E08E 11 F7 C3    >                        ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
1496  E091 01 1B 00    >                        ld          bc,ShipDataLength

1496  E099 CD 40 E0    >                        call        CopyEdgesToUniv

1496  E09F 21 10 C0    >.ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
1496  E0A2 3E 20       >                        ld          a," "
1496  E0A4 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1496  E0A6 77          >.fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
1496  E0A7 23          >                        inc         hl
1496  E0A8 10 FC       >                        djnz        .fillLoop
1496  E0AA 3A 44 C0    >.SetName:               ld          a,(UBnkShipModelId)
1496  E0AD CD 08 8F    >                        call        ShipIndexToAddress
1496  E0B0 11 10 C0    >                        ld          de,StartOfUnivName
1496  E0B3 06 10       >                        ld          b,16
1496  E0B5 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
1496  E0B6 FE 00       >                        cp          0
1496  E0B8 28 05       >                        jr          z,.CopyDone
1496  E0BA 12          >                        ld          (de),a
1496  E0BB 23          >                        inc         hl
1496  E0BC 13          >                        inc         de
1496  E0BD 10 F6       >                        djnz        .CopyLoop
1496  E0BF C9          >.CopyDone:              ret

   1++EAD4 00           Worm:	                DB $00                      ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed

  96+ E000              spritecursoroffset					equ 17
  97+ E000              spriteborderoffset                  equ 32
  98+ E000
  99+ E000              HideSprite:                 MACRO   spritenbr
 100+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,spritenbr
 101+ E000 ~                                        nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,$00
 102+ E000                                          ENDM
 103+ E000
 104+ E000              ; " sprite_big BC = rowcol, D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
 105+ E000              sprite_big:
 106+ E000 7A           .SetAnchor:	                ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
 107+ E001 F5                                       push	af									; save id for next few
 108+ E002 D5                                       push	de
 109+ E003 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 110+ E006              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 111+ E006 79                                       ld		a,c
 112+ E007 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 113+ E00A ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 114+ E00C 7D                                       ld		a,l
 115+ E00D ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 116+ E010              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 117+ E010 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 118+ E011 78                                       ld		a,b
 119+ E012 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 120+ E015 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 121+ E017 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 122+ E018 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 123+ E01B              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 124+ E01B 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 125+ E01C ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 126+ E01F              ; write out sprite pattern
 127+ E01F D1                                       pop		de                                  ; de = pattern and sprite nbr
 128+ E020 7B                                       ld		a,e
 129+ E021 F6 C0                                    or		%11000000							;
 130+ E023 ED 92 38                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 131+ E026              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 132+ E026 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 133+ E028 B4                                       or		h									; MSB Y
 134+ E029 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 135+ E02C F1           .BigSprite1:                pop		af
 136+ E02D 3C                                       inc		a
 137+ E02E F5                                       push	af
 138+ E02F ED 92 34                                                       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 139+ E032 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 139+ E034 ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 140+ E037 AF                                       xor 	a
 140+ E038 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 141+ E03B ED 92 37                                                       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 142+ E03E 3E C1                                    ld		a,%11000001
 142+ E040
 143+ E040 ED 92 38                                 nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a					; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 1
 144+ E043 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001							; big unified composite
 145+ E045 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 146+ E048 F1           .BigSprite2:                pop		af
 147+ E049 3C                                       inc		a
 147+ E04A ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 148+ E04D AF                                       xor		a
 148+ E04E ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a	; lower x
 149+ E051 3E 10                                    ld		a,16
 149+ E053 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a	; lower y
 150+ E056 AF                                       xor		a
 150+ E057 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a	; relative setup
 151+ E05A 3E C2                                    ld		a,%11000010
 151+ E05C ED 92 38       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a	; relative and 4 bytes of data, pattern 2
 152+ E05F 3E 41                                    ld		a,%01000001
 152+ E061 ED 92 39       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a	; visible 5 bytes pattern e 					; big unified composite
 153+ E064 C9                                       ret
 154+ E065
 155+ E065              ; Creates a 32x32 sprite based on first sprite number and pattern, then goes:
 156+ E065              ;    Spr,   pattern     spr+1, pattern+1
 157+ E065              ;    Spr+1, pattern+2   spr+3, pattern+3
 158+ E065              ; " sprite_big BC = row, hl= col D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
 159+ E065              ; note, BC and HL must be in correct range else they will mess up other byte's attributes, not masked for speed
 160+ E065              ; note this is based on full screen sprites including writing to border
 161+ E065              ; Currently can not get realtive sprites to work so will brute force it.
 162+ E065 7B           sprite_4x4:                 ld      a,e                                                         ; prep upper 2 bits as we will
 163+ E066 F6 C0                                    or      %11000000                                                   ; Enable visible and 5th byte
 164+ E068 5F                                       ld      e,a                                                         ; a now holds value to use for anchor
 165+ E069                                          ;break
 166+ E069 7A           .SetAnchor:	                ld		a,d
 166+ E06A ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 167+ E06D 7D                                       ld		a,l
 167+ E06E ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 168+ E071 79                                       ld      a,c
 168+ E072 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 169+ E075 7C                                       ld      a,h
 169+ E076 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; MSB of X position
 170+ E079 7B                                       ld      a,e
 170+ E07A ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 171+ E07D 78                                       ld      a,b                                 ; get down MSB from b
 172+ E07E F6 20                                    or      %00100000
 172+ E080 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a		; its going to be a unified "Big sprite" to uses rotations & scaling from anchor
 173+ E083              ;-- now process unified sprites
 174+ E083              .TopRightRelative:         ; inc     d
 175+ E083                                         ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 176+ E083 7D                                       ld      a,l
 176+ E084 C6 10          add a,16
 176+ E086 ED 92 35       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 177+ E089 79                                       ld      a,c
 177+ E08A ED 92 36       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 178+ E08D 7C                                       ld      a,h
 178+ E08E ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 179+ E091 1C                                       inc     e
 180+ E092 7B                                       ld      a,e
 180+ E093 ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 1
 181+ E096 3E 20                                    ld      a,%0100000
 181+ E098 ED 92 79       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 182+ E09B              .BottomLeftRelative:       ; inc     d
 183+ E09B                                         ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 184+ E09B 7D                                       ld      a,l
 184+ E09C
 184+ E09C ED 92 35       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 185+ E09F 79                                       ld      a,c
 185+ E0A0 C6 10          add a,16
 185+ E0A2 ED 92 36       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 186+ E0A5                                          ZeroA
 186+ E0A5 AF          >                        xor a
 186+ E0A6 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 187+ E0A9 1C                                       inc     e
 188+ E0AA 7B                                       ld      a,e
 188+ E0AB ~             /*%1100010*/
 188+ E0AB ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 2
 189+ E0AE 3E 20                                    ld      a,%0100000
 189+ E0B0 ED 92 79       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 190+ E0B3              ;.BottomRightRelative:      ; inc     d
 191+ E0B3              ;                           ; inc     e
 192+ E0B3              ;                           ; ld      a,d         : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id + 1
 193+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,16        : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 194+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,16        : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 195+ E0B3              ;                            ZeroA               : nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a        ; clear MSB of X
 196+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,%1100011  : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible, 5 bytes pattern is achor + 3
 197+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,%0100001  : nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a        ; pattern is relative and relative pattern
 198+ E0B3              ;                            ld      a,e                                                         ; prep upper 2 bits as we will
 199+ E0B3              ;                            or      %11000000                                                   ; Enable visible and 5th byte
 200+ E0B3              ;                            ld      e,a                                                         ; a now holds value to use for anchor
 201+ E0B3              ;                            break
 202+ E0B3 7A           .BRAbs:	                    ld		a,d
 202+ E0B4 C6 03         add a,3
 202+ E0B6 ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 203+ E0B9 7D                                       ld		a,l
 203+ E0BA C6 10         add a,16
 203+ E0BC
 203+ E0BC ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 204+ E0BF 79                                       ld      a,c
 204+ E0C0 C6 10         add a,16
 204+ E0C2
 204+ E0C2 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower y cc
 205+ E0C5 7C                                       ld      a,h
 205+ E0C6 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; MSB of X position
 206+ E0C9 1C                                       inc     e
 207+ E0CA 7B                                       ld      a,e
 207+ E0CB ED 92 38       nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 208+ E0CE 78                                       ld      a,b                                 ; get down MSB from b
 209+ E0CF F6 20                                    or      %00100000
 209+ E0D1 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a
 210+ E0D4 C9                                       ret
 211+ E0D5
 212+ E0D5
 213+ E0D5              ; for a sinle sprite within 256x192 area
 214+ E0D5 7A           sprite_single:              ld		a,d                                 ; a = sprite nbr, bug fix?
 215+ E0D6 D5                                       push    de
 216+ E0D7 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 217+ E0DA              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 218+ E0DA 79                                       ld		a,c                                 ; a = column (c)
 219+ E0DB 21 20 00                                 ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 220+ E0DE ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 221+ E0E0 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 222+ E0E1 7B                                       ld		a,e
 223+ E0E2 ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 224+ E0E5              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 225+ E0E5 78                                       ld		a,b                                 ; a = row
 226+ E0E6 21 20 00                                 ld      hl,spriteborderoffset
 227+ E0E9 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 228+ E0EB 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 229+ E0EC ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 230+ E0EF              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 231+ E0EF 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 232+ E0F0 ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 233+ E0F3              ; write out sprite pattern
 234+ E0F3 D1                                       pop     de
 235+ E0F4 7B                                       ld		a,e
 236+ E0F5 F6 80                                    or		%10000000							;
 237+ E0F7 ED 92 38                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 238+ E0FA              ; write out extended attribute
 239+ E0FA 3E 00                                    ld      a,%00000000                         ; its a single sprite
 240+ E0FC B4                                       or      h
 241+ E0FD ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a
 242+ E100 C9                                       ret
 243+ E101              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 244+ E101              ; ">sprite_galactic_cursor BC = rowcol"
 245+ E101 16 00        sprite_galactic_cursor:     ld		d,galactic_cursor_sprite
 246+ E103 1E 00                                    ld		e,0
 247+ E105 78                                       ld		a,b
 248+ E106 C6 18                                    add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset
 249+ E108 47                                       ld		b,a
 250+ E109 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 251+ E10C C9                                       ret
 252+ E10D              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 253+ E10D              ; "> sprite_galactic_hyper_cursorBC = rowcol"
 254+ E10D 78           sprite_galactic_hyper_cursor:ld		a,b
 255+ E10E C6 04                                    add		a,galactic_chart_hyper_offset
 256+ E110 47                                       ld		b,a
 257+ E111 16 04                                    ld		d,galactic_hyper_sprite
 258+ E113 1E 03                                    ld		e,3
 259+ E115 CD D5 E0                                 call	sprite_single ; sprite_big:
 260+ E118 C9                                       ret
 261+ E119              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 262+ E119              ; moves hyperspace cursor to target system x position
 263+ E119 3E 04        sprite_ghc_move:            ld		a,galactic_hyper_sprite
 264+ E11B ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 265+ E11E              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 266+ E11E 79                                       ld		a,c
 267+ E11F 21 1C 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_x_offset
 268+ E122 ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 269+ E124 7D                                       ld		a,l
 270+ E125 ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 271+ E128              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 272+ E128 EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 273+ E129 CB 38                                    srl		b			    					; row is row / 2
 274+ E12B 78                                       ld      a,b
 275+ E12C 21 34 00                                 ld      hl,galactic_chart_hyper_y_offset
 276+ E12F ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 277+ E131 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 278+ E132 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 279+ E135              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 280+ E135 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 281+ E136 ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 282+ E139              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 283+ E139 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 284+ E13B B2                                       or		d									; MSB Y
 285+ E13C ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 286+ E13F C9                                       ret
 287+ E140              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 288+ E140 3E 08        sprite_lhc_move:            ld		a,local_hyper_sprite
 289+ E142 ED 92 34                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 290+ E145              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 291+ E145 79                                       ld		a,c
 292+ E146 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 293+ E149 ED 31                                    add		hl,a                                ; hl = full x position
 294+ E14B 7D                                       ld		a,l
 295+ E14C ED 92 35                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 296+ E14F              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 297+ E14F EB                                       ex		de,hl								; de = full x position
 298+ E150 78                                       ld		a,b
 299+ E151 21 11 00                                 ld      hl,spritecursoroffset
 300+ E154 ED 31                                    add		hl,a
 301+ E156 7D                                       ld		a,l                                 ; hl = full y position
 302+ E157 ED 92 36                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 303+ E15A              ; write out MSB of X as its an anchor
 304+ E15A 7A                                       ld		a,d									; de = MSB of X (hl bit 0)
 305+ E15B ED 92 37                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; lower y
 306+ E15E              ; write out msb of y in h must be bit 0 only
 307+ E15E 3E 00                                    ld		a,%00000000							; big unified composite
 308+ E160 B2                                       or		d									; MSB Y
 309+ E161 ED 92 39                                 nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR4_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern e
 310+ E164 C9                                       ret
 311+ E165              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 312+ E165              ; "sprite_local_cursor BC = rowcol"
 313+ E165 16 05        sprite_local_cursor:        ld		d,local_cursor_sprite
 314+ E167 1E 04                                    ld		e,local_present_cursor
 315+ E169 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 316+ E16C C9                                       ret
 317+ E16D              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 318+ E16D              ; "sprite_local_hyper_cursor BC = rowcol"
 319+ E16D 16 08        sprite_local_hyper_cursor:  ld		d,local_hyper_sprite
 320+ E16F 1E 07                                    ld		e,local_hyper_pattern
 321+ E171 CD 00 E0                                 call	sprite_big
 322+ E174 C9                                       ret
 323+ E175              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 324+ E175              SunCompassTLX               equ 0
 325+ E175              PlanetCompassTLX            equ 0
 326+ E175              StationCompassTLX           equ 0
 327+ E175              SunCompassTLY               equ 10
 328+ E175              PlanetCompassTLY            equ 60
 329+ E175              StationCompassTLY           equ 110
 330+ E175              RadarCentreX                equ 128
 331+ E175              RadarCentreY                equ 171
 332+ E175
 333+ E175              compass_offset              equ 2
 334+ E175              ScannerX                    equ RadarCentreX
 335+ E175              ScannerY                    equ RadarCentreY
 336+ E175              SunScanCenterX              equ SunCompassTLX + 17
 337+ E175              SunScanCenterY              equ SunCompassTLY + 17
 338+ E175              PlanetScanCenterX           equ PlanetCompassTLX + 17
 339+ E175              PlanetScanCenterY           equ PlanetCompassTLY + 17
 340+ E175              StationScanCenterX          equ StationCompassTLX + 17
 341+ E175              StationScanCenterY          equ StationCompassTLY + 17
 342+ E175
 343+ E175              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 344+ E175              ; ">sprite_galactic_cursor BC = rowcol"
 345+ E175                      DISPLAY "TODO : Compass positions, correct offsets for indicators, add in hide/show"
 346+ E175              ; " sprite_big BC = row, hl= col D = sprite nbr , E= , pattern"
 347+ E175 21 AC E1     sprite_sun_compass:         ld		hl,sunCompositeData
 348+ E178 06 04                                    ld      b,4
 349+ E17A 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 349+ E17B ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 349+ E17E 23             inc hl
 350+ E17F 7E           .Loop:                      ld      a,(hl)
 350+ E180 ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a
 350+ E183 23             inc hl
 351+ E184 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 351+ E185 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a
 351+ E188 23             inc hl
 352+ E189 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 352+ E18A ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a
 352+ E18D 23             inc hl
 353+ E18E 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 353+ E18F ED 92 38       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 353+ E192 23             inc hl
 354+ E193 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 354+ E194 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a
 354+ E197 23             inc hl
 355+ E198 10 E5                                    djnz    .Loop
 356+ E19A C9                                       ret
 357+ E19B 2A 00 0A 00  sunCompassData:             db      suncompass_sprite1, SunCompassTLX,     SunCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $80 | compass_sun_pattern
 357+ E19F 9D
 358+ E1A0 11 0A 08 9D                              db                          SunCompassTLX +17, SunCompassTLY,      %00001000 , $80 | compass_sun_pattern
 359+ E1A4 00 1B 04 9D                              db                          SunCompassTLX,     SunCompassTLY + 17, %00000100 , $80 | compass_sun_pattern
 360+ E1A8 11 1B 0C 9D                              db                          SunCompassTLX +17, SunCompassTLY + 17, %00001100 , $80 | compass_sun_pattern
 361+ E1AC 2A 00 0A 00  sunCompositeData:           db      suncompass_sprite1, SunCompassTLX,     SunCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $81 | compass_sun_pattern , %00000000
 361+ E1B0 9D 00
 362+ E1B2 11 0A 08 81                              db                          SunCompassTLX +17, SunCompassTLY,      %00001000 , $81                       , %01000001
 362+ E1B6 41
 363+ E1B7 00 1B 04 81                              db                          SunCompassTLX,     SunCompassTLY + 17, %00000100 , $81                       , %01000001
 363+ E1BB 41
 364+ E1BC 11 1B 0C 81                              db                          SunCompassTLX +17, SunCompassTLY + 17, %00001100 , $81                       , %01000001
 364+ E1C0 41
 365+ E1C1
 366+ E1C1              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 367+ E1C1 21 F8 E1     sprite_planet_compass:      ld		hl,planetCompositeData
 368+ E1C4 06 04                                    ld      b,4
 369+ E1C6 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 369+ E1C7 ED 92 34       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 369+ E1CA 23             inc hl
 370+ E1CB 7E           .Loop:                      ld      a,(hl)
 370+ E1CC ED 92 35       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a
 370+ E1CF 23             inc hl
 371+ E1D0 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 371+ E1D1 ED 92 36       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a
 371+ E1D4 23             inc hl
 372+ E1D5 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 372+ E1D6 ED 92 37       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a
 372+ E1D9 23             inc hl
 373+ E1DA 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 373+ E1DB ED 92 38       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 373+ E1DE 23             inc hl
 374+ E1DF 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 374+ E1E0 ED 92 79       nextreg   SPRITE_PORT_MIRROR_ATTRIBUTE_4_WITH_INC,a
 374+ E1E3 23             inc hl
 375+ E1E4 10 E5                                    djnz    .Loop
 376+ E1E6 C9                                       ret
 377+ E1E7 2E 00 3C 00  planetCompassData:          db      planetcompass_sprite1, PlanetCompassTLX,     PlanetCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $80 | compass_planet_pattern
 377+ E1EB 9E
 378+ E1EC 11 3C 08 9E                              db                             PlanetCompassTLX +17, PlanetCompassTLY,      %00001000 , $80 | compass_planet_pattern
 379+ E1F0 00 4D 04 9E                              db                             PlanetCompassTLX,     PlanetCompassTLY + 17, %00000100 , $80 | compass_planet_pattern
 380+ E1F4 11 4D 0C 9E                              db                             PlanetCompassTLX +17, PlanetCompassTLY + 17, %00001100 , $80 | compass_planet_pattern
 381+ E1F8 2E 00 3C 00  planetCompositeData:        db      planetcompass_sprite1, PlanetCompassTLX,     PlanetCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $81 | compass_planet_pattern , %00000000
 381+ E1FC 9F 00

 398+ E233 32 00 6E 00  stationCompassData:         db      stationcompass_sprite1, StationCompassTLX,     StationCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $80 | compass_station_pattern
 398+ E237 9F
 399+ E238 11 6E 08 9F                              db                              StationCompassTLX +17, StationCompassTLY,      %00001000 , $80 | compass_station_pattern
 400+ E23C 00 7F 04 9F                              db                              StationCompassTLX,     StationCompassTLY + 17, %00000100 , $80 | compass_station_pattern
 401+ E240 11 7F 0C 9F                              db                              StationCompassTLX +17, StationCompassTLY + 17, %00001100 , $80 | compass_station_pattern
 402+ E244 32 00 6E 00  stationCompositeData:       db      stationcompass_sprite1, StationCompassTLX,     StationCompassTLY,      %00000000 , $81 | compass_station_pattern , %00000000
 402+ E248 9F 00
 403+ E24A 11 6E 08 81                              db                              StationCompassTLX +17, StationCompassTLY,      %00001000 , $81                           , %01000001
 403+ E24E 41

 409+ E259              ; Put on compas based on bc = Y X position offset from compass center
 410+ E259 3E 20        compass_sun_move:       ld		a,compass_sun
 411+ E25B ED 92 34                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a		; set up sprite id
 412+ E25E              ; write out X position bits 1 to 8
 413+ E25E 3E 0F                                ld      a, SunScanCenterX - compass_offset ; adjust offset for effective centre of sprite
 414+ E260 81                                   add     a,c
 415+ E261                                      DISPLAY "TODO - Add min max on X and Y"
 416+ E261 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x cc
 417+ E264              ; write out Y position bits 1 to 8
 418+ E264 3E 19                                ld      a, SunScanCenterY - compass_offset ; adjust offset for effective centre of sprite
 419+ E266 90                                   sub     b
 420+ E267 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 421+ E26A C9                                   ret

 450+ E28F              ReticuleCentreX         EQU (256/2)+32 -1
 451+ E28F              ReticuleCentreY         EQU (192/2)+32 -1
 452+ E28F              ReticuleOffset          EQU 8
 453+ E28F
 454+ E28F              TargetetingCentreX1     EQU ReticuleCentreX -32
 455+ E28F              TargetetingCentreX2     EQU ReticuleCentreX +16
 456+ E28F              TargetetingCentreY      EQU ReticuleCentreY -7

 462+ E28F              sprite_ecm_y            EQU 192-15+32

 501+ E2D2 3E 0C        sprite_reticule:        ld      a,reticlule_sprite1                 ; LEFT ARM
 502+ E2D4 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 503+ E2D7 3E 87                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX -16 - ReticuleOffset
 504+ E2D9 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 505+ E2DC 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 506+ E2DE ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 507+ E2E1 AF                                   xor     a
 508+ E2E2 ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 509+ E2E5 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 510+ E2E7 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 511+ E2EA 3E 0D        .rightReticule          ld      a,reticlule_sprite2                 ; RIGHT ARM
 512+ E2EC ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 513+ E2EF 3E A7                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX + ReticuleOffset
 514+ E2F1 ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 515+ E2F4 3E 7F                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY
 516+ E2F6 ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 517+ E2F9 3E 08                                ld      a,%00001000
 518+ E2FB ED 92 37                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2 including mirroring horizontal
 519+ E2FE 3E 8B                                ld      a,reticule_pattern_2 | %10000000
 520+ E300 ED 92 38                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a		; visible 5 bytes pattern left reticule
 521+ E303 3E 0E        .topReticule            ld      a,reticlule_sprite3
 522+ E305 ED 92 34                             nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 523+ E308 3E 9F                                ld      a,ReticuleCentreX
 524+ E30A ED 92 35                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 525+ E30D 3E 67                                ld		a,ReticuleCentreY-16 - ReticuleOffset
 526+ E30F ED 92 36                             nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen

 543+ E335              laserbasex              equ 6
 544+ E335              laserbasey              equ 14
 545+ E335
 546+ E335              ShowSprite              MACRO   spritenbr, patternnbr
 547+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spritenbr
 548+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 549+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,patternnbr | %10000000
 550+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 551+ E335                                      ENDM
 552+ E335
 553+ E335              LeftLaser:              MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 554+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 555+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 556+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,((laserbasex + xoffset) *8) + 32
 557+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 558+ E335 ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 559+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 560+ E335 ~                                    xor     a
 561+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 562+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 563+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 564+ E335                                      ENDM
 565+ E335
 566+ E335              RightLaser:             MACRO   xoffset, yoffset, spriteL, patternL
 567+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, spriteL
 568+ E335 ~                                    nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a        ; select left hand side
 569+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,(((30-laserbasex) - xoffset) *8) + 32 -2
 570+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a		; Set up lower x pos as 136 (104 + 32 border)
 571+ E335 ~                                    ld		a,((laserbasey -yoffset) * 8) + 32 -1
 572+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a		; lower y coord on screen
 573+ E335 ~                                    ld      a,%00001000
 574+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a		; attribute 2
 575+ E335 ~                                    ld      a, patternL | %00000000             ; hidden by default
 576+ E335 ~                                    nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 577+ E335                                      ENDM
 578+ E335

 862+ E7B6 06 40        sprite_diagnostic_clear:ld      b,64
 863+ E7B8 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 864+ E7BA 79           .HideLoop:              ld      a,c
 865+ E7BB                                      HideSprite a
 865+ E7BB ED 92 34    >                            nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 865+ E7BE ED 91 38 00 >                            nextreg		SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,$00

 867+ E7C3 10 F5                                djnz    .HideLoop

 869+ E7C6
 870+ E7C6 3E 80        sprite_diagnostic:      ld      a,$80
 871+ E7C8 32 B5 E7                             ld      (diag_sprite_nbr),a
 872+ E7CB 3E 40                                ld      a,64
 873+ E7CD 32 B4 E7                             ld      (diag_y_pos),a
 874+ E7D0                                      ;break
 875+ E7D0 AF           .sprite_newline:        xor a
 876+ E7D1 32 B3 E7                             ld      (diag_x_pos),a
 877+ E7D4 3A B5 E7     .sprite_loop:           ld      a,(diag_sprite_nbr)
 877+ E7D7 E6 7F          and $7F
 877+ E7D9                 select_sprite_a
 877+ E7D9 ED 92 34    >                        nextreg SPRITE_PORT_INDEX_REGISTER,a
 878+ E7DC 3A B3 E7                             ld      a,(diag_x_pos)
 878+ E7DF                set_sprite_x_low_a
 878+ E7DF ED 92 35    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR0_REGISTER,a
 879+ E7E2 C6 10                                add     a,16
 880+ E7E4 32 B3 E7                             ld      (diag_x_pos),a
 881+ E7E7 3A B4 E7                             ld      a,(diag_y_pos)
 881+ E7EA                set_sprite_y_low_a
 881+ E7EA ED 92 36    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR1_REGISTER,a
 882+ E7ED 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 882+ E7EF                set_sprite_x_msb_anc
 882+ E7EF ED 92 37    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR2_REGISTER,a
 883+ E7F2 3A B5 E7                             ld      a,(diag_sprite_nbr)
 883+ E7F5                set_sprite_pat_a
 883+ E7F5 ED 92 38    >                        nextreg	SPRITE_PORT_ATTR3_REGISTER,a
 884+ E7F8 3C                                   inc     a
 885+ E7F9 32 B5 E7                             ld      (diag_sprite_nbr),a
 886+ E7FC E6 7F                                and     $7F
 887+ E7FE                                      JumpIfALTNusng  35,.cont
 887+ E7FE FE 23       >                        cp      35
 887+ E800 DA 10 E8    >                        jp		c, .cont
 888+ E803 11 1D 36     .drawBig:               ld      de,diagnostic_sprite*256 + compass_sun_pattern
 889+ E806 01 96 00                             ld      bc,150
 890+ E809 21 96 00                             ld      hl,150
 891+ E80C CD 65 E0                             call    sprite_4x4
 892+ E80F
 893+ E80F C9                                   ret
 894+ E810 3A B3 E7     .cont:                  ld      a,(diag_x_pos)
 895+ E813                                      JumpIfALTNusng 200,.sprite_loop
 895+ E813 FE C8       >                        cp      200
 895+ E815 DA D4 E7    >                        jp		c, .sprite_loop
 896+ E818 3A B4 E7                             ld      a,(diag_y_pos)
 897+ E81B C6 14                                add     a,20
 898+ E81D 32 B4 E7                             ld      (diag_y_pos),a
 899+ E820 18 AE                                jr      .sprite_newline
 900+ E822 C9                                   ret

  25+ E851 01 3B 30     load_pattern_files:     ld          bc,SPRITE_SLOT_PORT             ; select pattern 0

  26+ E854 AF          >                        xor a
  27+ E855 ED 79                                out         (c),a
  28+ E857 3E 01                                ld          a,$01
  29+ E859 32 2D E8                             ld          (FileNumber),a
  30+ E85C 06 26                                ld          b,SpriteCount
  31+ E85E C5           .ReadLoop:              push        bc
  32+ E85F CD 3A E8                             call        FileNbrA
  33+ E862 CD 71 E8                             call        load_a_pattern

  36+ E869 27                                   daa
  37+ E86A 32 2D E8                             ld          (FileNumber),a

  43+ E871 21 2E E8     load_a_pattern:         ld          hl,Filename
  44+ E874 DD 21 8E E8                          ld          ix,SpriteDatabuffer

  47+ E87E 1E FF                                ld          e,255
  48+ E880 01 5B 00     .streamPattern:         ld          bc, SPRITE_PATTERN_UPLOAD_PORT
  49+ E883 21 8E E8                             ld          hl, SpriteDatabuffer
  50+ E886 ED 90        .streamPatternLoop:     outinb                                      ; write byte of pattern
  51+ E888 1D                                   dec         e
  52+ E889 20 FB                                jr          nz, .streamPatternLoop          ; carry on writing for "e" iterations
  53+ E88B ED 90                                outinb
  54+ E88D C9                                   ret
