   4+ C010 47           draw_front_calc_alpha:  ld      b,a
   5+ C011 E6 80                                and     $80
   6+ C013 32 9D 7E                             ld      (ALP2),a                            ; set sign
   7+ C016 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
   8+ C017 EE 80                                xor     $80
   9+ C019 32 9E 7E                             ld      (ALP2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
  10+ C01C 3A 99 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)
  11+ C01F ED 27 80                             test    $80
  12+ C022 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositiveRoll
  13+ C024 ED 44        .NegativeRoll:          neg
  14+ C026 CB 3F        .PositiveRoll           srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
  15+ C028 CB 3F                                srl     a
  16+ C02A FE 08                                cp      8
  17+ C02C 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
  18+ C02E CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
  19+ C030 32 9C 7E     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (ALP1),a
  20+ C033 B1                                   or      c
  21+ C034 32 9B 7E                             ld      (ALPHA),a                           ; a = signed bit alph1
  22+ C037 21 FD C2     .RestartDampenRoll:     ld      hl,dampenRcounter
  23+ C03A 36 04                                ld      (hl),dampenRate
  24+ C03C C9                                   ret
  25+ C03D
  26+ C03D              ; Do the same for pitch
  27+ C03D 47           draw_front_calc_beta:   ld      b,a
  28+ C03E E6 80                                and     $80
  29+ C040 32 91 7E                             ld      (BET2),a                            ; set sign
  30+ C043 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
  31+ C044 EE 80                                xor     $80
  32+ C046 32 92 7E                             ld      (BET2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
  33+ C049 3A 8F 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)
  34+ C04C ED 27 80                             test    $80
  35+ C04F 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositivePitch
  36+ C051 ED 44        .NegativePitch:         neg
  37+ C053 CB 3F        .PositivePitch:         srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
  38+ C055 CB 3F                                srl     a
  39+ C057 FE 08                                cp      8
  40+ C059 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
  41+ C05B CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
  42+ C05D 32 90 7E     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (BET1),a
  43+ C060 B1                                   or      c
  44+ C061 32 8E 7E                             ld      (BETA),a                            ; a = signed bit bet1
  45+ C064 21 FE C2     .RestartDampenPitch:    ld      hl,dampenPcounter          ; TODO mach dampen rates ship properies by having teh $20 as a ship config
  46+ C067 36 04                                ld      (hl),dampenRate
  47+ C069 C9                                   ret

 126+ C23F E5 C5        DrawLighningLine:       push    hl,,bc
 127+ C241 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)
 128+ C242 23                                   inc     hl
 129+ C243 46                                   ld      b,(hl)
 130+ C244 23                                   inc     hl
 131+ C245 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 132+ C246 23                                   inc     hl

 134+ C248 23                                   inc     hl

 140+ C253 10 EA                                djnz    DrawLighningLine
 141+ C255 C9                                   ret
 142+ C256
 143+ C256              ;Loop though all lines
 144+ C256              ;   60$% chance of drawing a line, call draw line
 145+ C256              ;   go to next line
 146+ C256              ;repeat
 147+ C256 06 07        hyperspace_Lightning:   ld      b, 7                    ; total number of lightning bolts

 149+ C25B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 149+ C25B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 150+ C25F                                      ;break
 151+ C25F              ; above here select which lines table we will use
 152+ C25F C5 E5        .LineLoop:              push    bc,,hl
 153+ C261 CD 2F 85                             call    doRandom
 154+ C264 FE 1E                                cp      30
 155+ C266 30 0C                                jr      nc,.NextLine
 156+ C268 CD 2F 85                             call    doRandom
 157+ C26B E6 07                                and     $07
 158+ C26D 3C                                   inc     a
 159+ C26E 47                                   ld      b,a
 160+ C26F E1                                   pop     hl
 161+ C270 E5                                   push    hl
 162+ C271 CD 3F C2                             call    DrawLighningLine
 163+ C274 E1 C1        .NextLine:              pop     bc,,hl
 164+ C276 16 08                                ld      d,8
 165+ C278 1E 05                                ld      e,5
 166+ C27A ED 30                                mul
 167+ C27C 19                                   add     hl,de
 168+ C27D 10 E0                                djnz    .LineLoop

 170+ C282 57                                   ld      d,a
 171+ C283 01 80 40                             ld      bc, $4080
 172+ C286                                      ;break
 173+ C286 1E 00                                ld      e,$00
 174+ C288 CD 92 EB                             call    l2_draw_circle_fill; ; ">l2_draw_circle_fill BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"

 177+ C291 3C                                   inc     a

 199+ C2C1 21 00 50                             ld          hl,ScreenL1Bottom       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
 200+ C2C4 11 00 E0                             ld          de,ConsoleImageData
 201+ C2C7 01 00 08                             ld          bc, ScreenL1BottomLen
 202+ C2CA CD 39 7E                             call        memcopy_dma
 203+ C2CD 21 00 5A                             ld          hl,ScreenL1AttrBtm       ; now the pointers are in UBnk its easy to read
 204+ C2D0 11 00 E8                             ld          de,ConsoleAttributes
 205+ C2D3 01 00 01                             ld          bc, ScreenL1AttrBtmLen
 206+ C2D6 CD 39 7E                             call        memcopy_dma
 207+ C2D9 CD C6 7B                             call        InitialiseHyperStars
 208+ C2DC AF                                   xor         a
 209+ C2DD 32 44 81                             ld          (DockedFlag),a              ; we can never be docked if we hit a view screen
 210+ C2E0 3E 02                                ld          a,2
 211+ C2E2 32 4E 81                             ld          (HyperCircle),a
 212+ C2E5 3E FC                                ld          a,$FC
 213+ C2E7 32 44 81                             ld          (DockedFlag),a
 214+ C2EA C9                                   ret
 215+ C2EB
 216+ C2EB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 217+ C2EB              front_warp:             ;call        SaveCurrentDust                         ; save current dust positions
 218+ C2EB 06 AF                                ld          b,175                                    ; loop for x iterations
 219+ C2ED C5           .warploop:              push        bc
 220+ C2EE CD 1E 7C                             call        DustForward
 221+ C2F1                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 221+ C2F1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 222+ C2F5 CD 97 E2                             call        l2_flip_buffers
 223+ C2F8 C1                                   pop         bc
 224+ C2F9 10 F2                                djnz        .warploop
 225+ C2FB C9                                   ret
 226+ C2FC
 227+ C2FC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 228+ C2FC C9           loop_hyperspace         ret
 229+ C2FD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 230+ C2FD              dampenRate:             equ     $04
 231+ C2FD 04           dampenRcounter:         DB      dampenRate
 232+ C2FE 04           dampenPcounter:         DB      dampenRate
 233+ C2FF              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 234+ C2FF              input_front_view:       ;DEFUNCT ClearEngineSoundChanged
 235+ C2FF 2A 59 E0                             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Accellerate)
 236+ C302 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 237+ C303                                      JumpIfAIsZero     .TestDecellerate
 237+ C303 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 237+ C304 CA 20 C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestDecellerate
 238+ C307 3A 7B 7F                             ld      a,(SHIPMAXSPEED)
 239+ C30A 57                                   ld      d,a
 240+ C30B 3A 7C 7F                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 241+ C30E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d,.TestDecellerate
 241+ C30E BA          >                        cp     d
 241+ C30F D2 20 C3    >                        jp		nc,.TestDecellerate
 242+ C312 3C                                   inc     a
 243+ C313 32 7C 7F                             ld      (DELTA),a
 244+ C316 2A 7D 7F                             ld      hl,(DELT4Lo)
 245+ C319 ED 34 04 00                          add     hl,4
 246+ C31D 22 7D 7F                             ld      (DELT4Lo),hl
 247+ C320                                      ;DEFUNCT SetEngineSoundChanged
 248+ C320 2A 5B E0     .TestDecellerate:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Decellerate)
 249+ C323 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 250+ C324                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .TestLeftPressed
 250+ C324 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 250+ C325 CA 3D C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestLeftPressed
 251+ C328 3A 7C 7F                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 252+ C32B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .TestLeftPressed
 252+ C32B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 252+ C32C CA 3D C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestLeftPressed
 253+ C32F 3D                                   dec     a
 254+ C330 32 7C 7F                             ld      (DELTA),a
 255+ C333 2A 7D 7F                             ld      hl,(DELT4Lo)
 256+ C336 2B                                   dec     hl
 257+ C337 2B                                   dec     hl
 258+ C338 2B                                   dec     hl
 259+ C339 2B                                   dec     hl
 260+ C33A 22 7D 7F                             ld      (DELT4Lo),hl
 261+ C33D                                      ;DEFUNCT SetEngineSoundChanged
 262+ C33D 2A 51 E0     .TestLeftPressed:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 263+ C340 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 264+ C341                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .TestRightPressed
 264+ C341 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 264+ C342 CA 58 C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestRightPressed
 265+ C345 3A 99 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 266+ C348 21 A0 7E                             ld      hl,ALP1MAXL                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 267+ C34B BE                                   cp      (hl)
 268+ C34C 28 0A                                jr      z,.TestRightPressed
 269+ C34E                                      ;break
 270+ C34E 3D                                   dec     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 271+ C34F 32 99 7E                             ld      (JSTX),a
 272+ C352 CD 10 C0                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 273+ C355 C3 8D C3                             jp      .TestDivePressed                    ; when pressing ignore damper
 274+ C358 2A 53 E0     .TestRightPressed:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 275+ C35B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 276+ C35C                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .DampenRoll
 276+ C35C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 276+ C35D CA 73 C3    >                        jp	    z, .DampenRoll
 277+ C360 3A 99 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 278+ C363 21 9F 7E                             ld      hl,ALP1MAXR                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 279+ C366 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 280+ C367 28 24                                jr      z,.TestDivePressed                   ; if its held then we don't dampen
 281+ C369                                      ;break
 282+ C369 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 283+ C36A 32 99 7E     .UpdateAlphRoll:        ld      (JSTX),a
 284+ C36D CD 10 C0                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 285+ C370 C3 8D C3                             jp      .TestDivePressed                    ; when pressing ignore damper
 286+ C373 21 FD C2     .DampenRoll:            ld      hl,dampenRcounter
 287+ C376 35                                   dec     (hl)
 288+ C377 20 14                                jr      nz,.TestDivePressed
 289+ C379 3E 04                                ld      a,dampenRate
 290+ C37B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 291+ C37C 3A 99 7E                             ld      a,(JSTX)
 292+ C37F FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C381 28 0A                                jr      z, .TestDivePressed
 294+ C383 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 295+ C385 28 03                                jr      z,.PosRollDampen
 296+ C387 3C           .NegRollDampen:         inc     a
 297+ C388 18 01                                jr      .ApplyRollDampen
 298+ C38A 3D           .PosRollDampen:         dec     a
 299+ C38B 18 DD        .ApplyRollDampen:       jr      .UpdateAlphRoll
 300+ C38D              ; Dive and Climb input
 301+ C38D 2A 55 E0     .TestDivePressed:       ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 302+ C390 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 303+ C391                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .TestClimbPressed
 303+ C391 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 303+ C392 CA A8 C3    >                        jp	    z, .TestClimbPressed
 304+ C395 3A 8F 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 305+ C398 21 94 7E                             ld      hl,BET1MAXD                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 306+ C39B BE                                   cp      (hl)
 307+ C39C 28 0A                                jr      z,.TestClimbPressed
 308+ C39E                                      ;break
 309+ C39E 3D                                   dec     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 310+ C39F 32 8F 7E                             ld      (JSTY),a
 311+ C3A2 CD 3D C0                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 312+ C3A5 C3 DD C3                             jp      .ForwardCursorKeysDone
 313+ C3A8 2A 57 E0     .TestClimbPressed:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 314+ C3AB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 315+ C3AC                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .DampenPitch
 315+ C3AC A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 315+ C3AD CA C3 C3    >                        jp	    z, .DampenPitch
 316+ C3B0 3A 8F 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)                            ; have we maxed out Joystick?
 317+ C3B3 21 93 7E                             ld      hl,BET1MAXC                         ; currnet ship max left roll
 318+ C3B6 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 319+ C3B7 28 24                                jr      z,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 320+ C3B9 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; increase joystick roll
 321+ C3BA 32 8F 7E     .UpdateBetaPitch:       ld      (JSTY),a
 322+ C3BD CD 3D C0                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 323+ C3C0 C3 DD C3                             jp      .ForwardCursorKeysDone
 324+ C3C3 21 FE C2     .DampenPitch:           ld      hl,dampenPcounter          ; TODO mach dampen rates ship properies by having teh $20 as a ship config
 325+ C3C6 35                                   dec     (hl)
 326+ C3C7 20 14                                jr      nz,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 327+ C3C9 3E 04                                ld      a,dampenRate
 328+ C3CB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 329+ C3CC 3A 8F 7E                             ld      a,(JSTY)
 330+ C3CF FE 00                                cp      0
 331+ C3D1 28 0A                                jr      z,.ForwardCursorKeysDone
 332+ C3D3 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 333+ C3D5 28 03                                jr      z,.PosPitchDampen
 334+ C3D7 3C           .NegPitchDampen:        inc     a
 335+ C3D8 18 01                                jr      .ApplyPitchDampen
 336+ C3DA 3D           .PosPitchDampen:        dec     a
 337+ C3DB 18 DD        .ApplyPitchDampen:      jr      .UpdateBetaPitch
 338+ C3DD              ; Now test hyperpsace. We can't be docked as this is a view routine piece of logic but for say local charts we may
 339+ C3DD              ; be in flight and they have to force a forward view when hyperspace is pressed
 340+ C3DD              ; We won't do galatic here, but for other views force to forward view
 341+ C3DD              .ForwardCursorKeysDone: MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_Hyperspace              ; Check for hyperspace
 341+ C3DD 3E 24       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 341+ C3DF             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 341+ C3DF ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 341+ C3E3 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 342+ C3E6 20 48                                jr      nz,.NotHyperspace
 343+ C3E8              ; If we are in hyperspace countdown then test for hyperspace
 344+ C3E8 2A 4A 81                             ld      hl,(InnerHyperCount)                ; if hyperspace was enaged then cancel
 345+ C3EB 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; hyperspace
 346+ C3EC B5                                   or      l                                   ; .
 347+ C3ED 20 41                                jr      nz,.CancelHyperspace                ; .
 348+ C3EF              ; check selected target if we find one then after gettting galaxy at bc a=0 if not found
 349+ C3EF ED 5B 24 80                          ld      de,(PresentSystemX)
 350+ C3F3 2A 26 80                             ld      hl,(TargetSystemX)
 351+ C3F6 CD D1 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
 352+ C3F9 28 35                                jr      z,.NoTargetSelected                 ; can't jump to current system
 353+ C3FB 3A 11 80                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 354+ C3FE                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 354+ C3FE ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 355+ C401 ED 4B 26 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 356+ C405 CD BB FA                             call    galaxy_name_at_bc
 357+ C408 FE 00                                cp      0
 358+ C40A 28 24                                jr      z,.NotHyperspace
 359+ C40C              ; check fuel is sufficient
 360+ C40C ED 4B 24 80                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 361+ C410 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 362+ C414 ED 4B 26 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 363+ C418 ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 364+ C41C CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance            ; get distance into HL
 365+ C41F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 366+ C420 A7                                   and     a
 367+ C421 20 0D                                jr      nz,.InsufficientFuel            ; max jump capacity is 25 ly for any ship
 368+ C423 3A E6 84                             ld      a,(Fuel)
 369+ C426                                      JumpIfALTNusng    l, .InsufficientFuel
 369+ C426 BD          >                        cp      l
 369+ C427 DA 30 C4    >                        jp		c, .InsufficientFuel
 370+ C42A              ; set up timer countdown
 371+ C42A 21 0B 0B                             ld      hl,HyperSpaceTimers                 ; set both timers to 15
 372+ C42D 22 4A 81                             ld      (InnerHyperCount),hl                ; .
 373+ C430              .CancelHyperspace
 374+ C430              .NoTargetSelected
 375+ C430              .InsufficientFuel
 376+ C430              .NotHyperspace:
 377+ C430              ;--- Check for in system Jump---------------------------------------
 378+ C430 2A 4A 81     .CheckForWarpPressd:    ld      hl,(InnerHyperCount)                ; if hyperspace was enaged then cancel
 379+ C433 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; hyperspace
 380+ C434 B5                                   or      l                                   ; .
 381+ C435 20 0F                                jr      nz,.WarpNotPressed
 382+ C437 3E 54                                ld      a,c_Pressed_Warp
 383+ C439                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 383+ C439 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 384+ C43D CD AE E1                             call    is_key_up_state
 385+ C440 28 04                                jr      z, .WarpNotPressed
 386+ C442                                      SetMemTrue  WarpPressed                     ; This signals the event , teh main loop will cancel this as an acknowlege
 386+ C442 AF          >                        xor     a
 386+ C443 32 73 81    >                        ld      (WarpPressed),a
 387+ C446              .WarpNotPressed:
 388+ C446                              IFDEF   LASER_V2
 389+ C446 CD 41 83                             call    IsLaserUseable                      ; no laser or destroyed?
 390+ C449 28 3A                                jr      z,          .FireNotPressed
 391+ C44B 3E 14        .IsFirePressed:         ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ; else (beam type) if fire is pressed
 392+ C44D                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 392+ C44D ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 393+ C451 CD AE E1                             call    is_key_up_state
 394+ C454 28 2F                                jr      z,.FireNotPressed
 395+ C456              .FirePressed:           ;break
 396+ C456                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrentCooldown,     .LaserDone
 396+ C456 3A 23 82    >                        ld  a,(CurrentCooldown)
 396+ C459 A7          >                        and a
 396+ C45A C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 397+ C45D                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrentBurstPause,   .LaserDone
 397+ C45D 3A 22 82    >                        ld  a,(CurrentBurstPause)
 397+ C460 A7          >                        and a
 397+ C461 C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 398+ C464                                      JumpIfMemNotZero    CurrLaserBurstCount, .LaserDone
 398+ C464 3A 25 82    >                        ld  a,(CurrLaserBurstCount)
 398+ C467 A7          >                        and a
 398+ C468 C2 A7 C4    >                        jp  nz,.LaserDone
 399+ C46B                                      JumpIfMemTrue       LaserBeamOn,         .LaserDone
 399+ C46B 3A 20 82    >                        ld      a,(LaserBeamOn)
 399+ C46E A7          >                        and     a
 399+ C46F CA A7 C4    >                        jp      z, .LaserDone
 400+ C472                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseRate,   CurrLaserBurstCount
 400+ C472 3A 1C 82    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseRate)
 400+ C475 32 25 82    >                        ld       (CurrLaserBurstCount),a
 401+ C478                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseOnTime, CurrLaserDuration
 401+ C478 3A 1D 82    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseOnTime)
 401+ C47B 32 21 82    >                        ld       (CurrLaserDuration),a
 402+ C47E                                      SetMemTrue          LaserBeamOn
 402+ C47E AF          >                        xor     a
 402+ C47F 32 20 82    >                        ld      (LaserBeamOn),a
 403+ C482                                      ;call               TriggerLaserSound
 404+ C482 C3 A7 C4                             jp                  .LaserDone
 405+ C485              .FireNotPressed:        ReturnIfMemNotZero  CurrLaserBurstCount
 405+ C485 3A 25 82    >                        ld     a,(CurrLaserBurstCount)
 405+ C488 A7          >                        and     a
 405+ C489 C0          >                        ret    nz
 406+ C48A                                      ReturnIfMemNotZero  CurrLaserDuration
 406+ C48A 3A 21 82    >                        ld     a,(CurrLaserDuration)
 406+ C48D A7          >                        and     a
 406+ C48E C0          >                        ret    nz
 407+ C48F                                      ReturnIfMemFalse    LaserBeamOn
 407+ C48F 3A 20 82    >                        ld      a,(LaserBeamOn)
 407+ C492 A7          >                        and     a
 407+ C493 C0          >                        ret     nz
 408+ C494                                      ldCopyByte          CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrentCooldown
 408+ C494 3A 1F 82    >                        ld       a,(CurrLaserPulseRest)
 408+ C497 32 23 82    >                        ld       (CurrentCooldown),a
 409+ C49A                                      SetMemFalse         LaserBeamOn
 409+ C49A 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 409+ C49C 32 20 82    >                        ld      (LaserBeamOn),a
 410+ C49F                                      SetMemZero          CurrLaserBurstCount
 410+ C49F AF          >                        xor     a
 410+ C4A0 32 25 82    >                        ld      (CurrLaserBurstCount),a
 411+ C4A3                                      SetMemZero          CurrentBurstPause
 411+ C4A3 AF          >                        xor     a
 411+ C4A4 32 22 82    >                        ld      (CurrentBurstPause),a
 412+ C4A7              .LaserDone:
 413+ C4A7                              ELSE
 414+ C4A7 ~            .CheckForLaserPressed:  call    IsLaserUseable                      ; no laser or destroyed?
 415+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting
 416+ C4A7 ~            .CanLaserStillFire:     SetMemFalse FireLaserPressed                ; default to no laser
 417+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRate)              ; if not beam type
 418+ C4A7 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero .BeamType                     ; .
 419+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; and not run out of pulses
 420+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRateCount)         ;
 421+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseOnCount)           ;    if not already on
 422+ C4A7 ~                                    JumpIfAEqNusng  b, .PulseLimitReached       ;
 423+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      hl,CurrLaserPulseOffCount           ;       and not in off phase
 424+ C4A7 ~                                    or      (hl)                                ;
 425+ C4A7 ~                                    inc     hl  ; CurrLaserPulseRestCount       ;       and not in rest phase.
 426+ C4A7 ~                                    or      (hl)                                ;    .
 427+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      nz, .CheckTargetting                ;    .
 428+ C4A7 ~            .IsFirePressed:         ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ;       if fire is pressed
 429+ C4A7 ~                                    MMUSelectKeyboard
 430+ C4A7 ~                                    call    is_key_up_state                     ;       .
 431+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting                  ;       .
 432+ C4A7 ~            .CanProcesFire:         ld      a,(CurrLaserPulseRateCount)         ;            pulse rate count ++
 433+ C4A7 ~                                    inc     a                                   ;            .
 434+ C4A7 ~            .StillHavePulsesLeft:   ld      (CurrLaserPulseRateCount),a         ;            .
 435+ C4A7 ~                                    ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseOnTime, CurrLaserPulseOnCount  ; pulse on count = pulse on time
 436+ C4A7 ~                                 ;   ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseOffTime, CurrLaserPulseOffCount; pulse off count = pulse off time
 437+ C4A7 ~                                 ;   ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrLaserPulseRestCount  ; pulse rest count = pulse rest time
 438+ C4A7 ~                                    jp      .CheckTargetting
 439+ C4A7 ~            .BeamType:              ld      a,c_Pressed_FireLaser               ; else (beam type) if fire is pressed
 440+ C4A7 ~                                    MMUSelectKeyboard
 441+ C4A7 ~                                    call    is_key_up_state                     ;                   .
 442+ C4A7 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckTargetting                  ;                   .
 443+ C4A7 ~                                    SetMemTrue FireLaserPressed                 ;                   set pulse on to 1
 444+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      a,0
 445+ C4A7 ~                                    ld      (SoundFxToEnqueue),a
 446+ C4A7 ~                                    jp      .CheckTargetting
 447+ C4A7 ~            .PulseLimitReached:     ;ZeroA                                       ;
 448+ C4A7 ~                                    ;ld      (CurrLaserPulseRateCount),a         ;
 449+ C4A7 ~                                    ;ldCopyByte CurrLaserPulseRest, CurrLaserPulseRestCount   ; start the rest phase
 450+ C4A7                              ENDIF
 451+ C4A7              ; . Here we check to see if the target lock has been pressed
 452+ C4A7              .CheckTargetting:       MMUSelectKeyboard
 452+ C4A7 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 453+ C4AB CD 45 E3                             call    TargetMissileTest
 454+ C4AE              .CheckForMissile:       MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_FireMissile             ; launch pressed?
 454+ C4AE 3E 18       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_FireMissile
 454+ C4B0             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 454+ C4B0 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 454+ C4B4 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 455+ C4B7 20 13                                jr      nz,.NotMissileLaunch
 456+ C4B9                                      AnyMissilesLeft
 456+ C4B9 3A 31 80    >                        ld      a,(NbrMissiles)
 456+ C4BC A7          >                        and     a
 457+ C4BD 28 0D                                jr      z,.NotMissileLaunch                 ; no missiles in rack
 458+ C4BF CD E6 83                             call    IsMissileLockedOn
 459+ C4C2 28 08                                jr      z,.MissileNotLocked
 460+ C4C4              .MissileLaunch:         SetMissileLaunch
 460+ C4C4 3A 08 82    >                        ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 460+ C4C7 E6 0F       >                        and     $0F
 460+ C4C9 32 08 82    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 461+ C4CC              .MissileNotLocked:                       ; later on we need a "bing bong" nose for trying to launch an unlocked missile
 462+ C4CC              .NotMissileLaunch:
 463+ C4CC 3A 04 85     .CheckForECM:           ld      a,(ECMPresent)
 464+ C4CF                                      JumpIfAEqNusng EquipmentItemNotFitted,.NoECM
 464+ C4CF FE 00       >                        cp     EquipmentItemNotFitted
 464+ C4D1 CA F8 C4    >                        jp      z,.NoECM
 465+ C4D4 3A 32 80     .CheckECMActive:        ld      a,(PlayerECMActiveCount)
 466+ C4D7                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NoECM
 466+ C4D7 A7          >                        and     a
 466+ C4D8 C2 F8 C4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 467+ C4DB              .CheckForKeyPress:      MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_ECM
 467+ C4DB 3E 1C       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_ECM
 467+ C4DD             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 467+ C4DD ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 467+ C4E1 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 468+ C4E4 20 12                                jr      nz, .NoECM
 469+ C4E6              .FireECM:               SetMemToN      PlayerECMActiveCount, ECMCounterMax
 469+ C4E6 3E 80       >                        ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 469+ C4E8 32 32 80    >                        ld      (PlayerECMActiveCount),a
 470+ C4EB 3A 97 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 471+ C4EE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ECMCounterMax, .NoECM
 471+ C4EE FE 80       >                        cp     ECMCounterMax
 471+ C4F0 D2 F8 C4    >                        jp		nc,.NoECM
 472+ C4F3                                      SetMemToN      ECMCountDown, ECMCounterMax
 472+ C4F3 3E 80       >                        ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 472+ C4F5 32 97 7E    >                        ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 473+ C4F8 C9           .NoECM:                 ret

1525  C4F9                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankFrontView," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-ViewFrontAddr), " - BankFrontView"

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++CD3F
   2++CD3F              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++CD3F C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++CD40 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++CD41 23                                   inc			hl
   6++CD42 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++CD43 23                                   inc			hl
   8++CD44 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++CD45 23                                   inc			hl
  10++CD46 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++CD47 23                                   inc			hl
  12++CD48 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++CD49 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++CD4A 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++CD4C C5                                   push		bc
  16++CD4D D1                                   pop			de

  19++CD55 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++CD56 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++CD57 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++CD59 C9                                   ret

 133+ CE1D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 134+ CE1D 7E           STAT_expand_word:       ld      a,(hl)
 135+ CE1E FE 00                                cp      0
 136+ CE20 C8                                   ret     z
 137+ CE21 12                                   ld      (de),a
 138+ CE22 23                                   inc     hl
 139+ CE23 13                                   inc     de
 140+ CE24 18 F7                                jr      STAT_expand_word
 141+ CE26
 142+ CE26              ; hl = list of words
 143+ CE26              ; de = adress to expand to
 144+ CE26 7E           STAT_expand_name:       ld      a,(hl)
 145+ CE27 47                                   ld      b,a
 146+ CE28 23                                   inc     hl
 147+ CE29 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; its a 16 bit
 148+ CE2A 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back one for now, need to optimise laters
 149+ CE2B B0                                   or      b
 150+ CE2C 20 01                                jr      nz,.MoreToDo
 151+ CE2E              ;                        ld      (de),a we dont want the null marker now
 152+ CE2E C9                                   ret
 153+ CE2F E5 D5        .MoreToDo:              push    hl,,de
 154+ CE31 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; bodge for now no optimise
 155+ CE32 5F                                   ld      e,a
 156+ CE33 23                                   inc     hl
 157+ CE34 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 158+ CE35 57                                   ld      d,a
 159+ CE36 EB                                   ex      hl,de               ; hl is now Word... address
 160+ CE37 D1                                   pop     de                  ; de back to pointer to buffer
 161+ CE38 CD 1D CE     .ProcessWord:           call    STAT_expand_word
 162+ CE3B 3E 20                                ld      a," "               ; speculative space
 163+ CE3D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 164+ CE3E 13                                   inc     de
 165+ CE3F E1                                   pop     hl                  ; get string pointer back
 166+ CE40 23                                   inc     hl
 167+ CE41 23                                   inc     hl                  ; on to next word
 168+ CE42 18 E2                                jr      STAT_expand_name

 170+ CE44              STAT_First_Item         EQU     EQ_CARGO_BAY

 188+ CE6E 1E 02                                ld      e,STAT_First_Item
 189+ CE70 DD 7E 00     .ProcessRow:            ld      a,(ix+0)                                    ; Do we own one?
 190+ CE73                                      JumpIfAIsZero .NotFitted                            ; optimised check for EquipmentItemNotFitted
 190+ CE73 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags

 191+ CE77 D5 FD E5 DD  .OwnItem:               push    de,, iy,, ix,, bc

 195+ CE84 19                                   add     hl,de                                       ; hl = dword list of work pointers
 196+ CE85 FD 54 FD 5D                          ld      de,iy                                       ; de = 0 column at current display buffer row

 198+ CE8C C1 DD E1 FD                          pop     iy,,ix,,bc
 198+ CE90 E1
 199+ CE91 11 18 00                             ld      de,STAT_buffer_row_len
 200+ CE94 FD 19                                add     iy,de                                       ; now iy = start of next column
 201+ CE96 D1                                   pop     de
 202+ CE97 0C                                   inc     c
 203+ CE98              .NotFitted:

 205+ CE9A 1C                                   inc     e
 206+ CE9B 10 D3                                djnz    .ProcessRow

 298+ CFA6              draw_STAT_items:        MMUSelectLayer1
 298+ CFA6 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 299+ CFAA CD 8F E0                             call    l1_cls
 300+ CFAD                                      ; add in all the status stuff later
 301+ CFAD 3A E8 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)                    ; Move to correct top of stat list item
 302+ CFB0 16 18                                ld      d,STAT_buffer_row_len                       ; so de = offset to first item in display
 303+ CFB2 5F                                   ld      e,a
 304+ CFB3 ED 30                                mul
 305+ CFB5 21 EA C0                             ld      hl,STAT_display_buffer                      ; hl = pointer to first item in display
 306+ CFB8 19                                   add     hl,de                                       ;
 307+ CFB9 3A E8 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)                    ; set a to number of lines to display
 308+ CFBC 47                                   ld      b,a                                         ;
 309+ CFBD 3A E9 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_end)                        ;
 310+ CFC0 90                                   sub     b                                           ;
 311+ CFC1                                      JumpIfALTNusng  STAT_eqip_window_len, .FillScreen   ; if there are enough then just do a screen fill
 311+ CFC1 FE 0A       >                        cp      STAT_eqip_window_len
 311+ CFC3 DA CA CF    >                        jp		c, .FillScreen
 312+ CFC6 06 0A        .JustWindowing:         ld      b,STAT_eqip_window_len                      ; if its more than a screen then window
 313+ CFC8 18 01                                jr      .ReadyToPrint
 314+ CFCA 47           .FillScreen:            ld      b,a                                         ; b = the mumber of rows to display
 315+ CFCB 11 40 58     .ReadyToPrint:          ld      de,STAT_position
 316+ CFCE D5 E5 C5     .DrawARow:              push    de,, hl,, bc                                ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 317+ CFD1 CD D7 E0                             call    l1_print_at
 317+ CFD4
 318+ CFD4 C1 E1                                pop     hl,,bc                                      ; get mesage addr back and move down one line
 319+ CFD6 11 18 00                             ld      de,STAT_buffer_row_len
 320+ CFD9 19                                   add     hl,de
 321+ CFDA D1                                   pop     de                                           ; get output row back
 322+ CFDB 3E 08                                ld      a,8
 323+ CFDD 82                                   add     a,d
 324+ CFDE 57                                   ld      d,a
 325+ CFDF 10 ED                                djnz    .DrawARow
 326+ CFE1 C9                                   ret
 327+ CFE2
 328+ CFE2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 329+ CFE2
 330+ CFE2 3A 44 81     get_cmdr_condition:     ld			a,(DockedFlag)
 331+ CFE5 FE FF                                cp			StatePlayerDocked
 332+ CFE7 28 17                                jr			z,.PlayerIsDocked
 333+ CFE9              .PlayerNotDocked:	    ReturnIfMemTrue    SpaceStationSafeZone
 333+ CFE9 3A 2A 80    >                        ld      a,(SpaceStationSafeZone)
 333+ CFEC A7          >                        and     a
 333+ CFED C8          >                        ret     z
 334+ CFEE CD 9F 84                             call        AreShipsPresent
 335+ CFF1 38 03                                jr          c,.NoShipsAround
 336+ CFF3 3E 01                                ld          a,1
 337+ CFF5 C9                                   ret
 338+ CFF6 3A 05 82     .NoShipsAround:         ld			a,(PlayerEnergy)
 339+ CFF9 FE 80                                cp			$80
 340+ CFFB 3E 01                                ld          a,1
 341+ CFFD CE 01                                adc         1                                       ; add 1 + carry, if a < 128 then carry set so goes red
 342+ CFFF C9                                   ret
 343+ D000 AF           .PlayerIsDocked:        xor			a
 344+ D001 C9                                   ret
 345+ D002
 346+ D002              draw_status_menu:       InitNoDoubleBuffer
 346+ D002             >                            MMUSelectLayer1
 346+ D002 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 346+ D006 CD 8F E0    >                            call	l1_cls
 346+ D009 3E 07       >                            ld		a,7
 346+ D00B CD AA E0    >                            call	l1_attr_cls_to_a
 346+ D00E             >                            MMUSelectLayer2
 346+ D00E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 346+ D012 CD 0A E0    >                            call    asm_l2_double_buffer_off
 346+ D015 CD 0E E2    >                            call	l2_cls	; Get some space
 346+ D018             >                            MMUSelectSpriteBank
 346+ D018 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 346+ D01C CD 85 E7    >                            call    sprite_cls_cursors
 347+ D01F 3E 08                                ld		a,8
 348+ D021 32 8F 7F                             ld		(MenuIdMax),a
 349+ D024 01 01 01     .Drawbox:               ld		bc,$0101
 350+ D027 11 FD BE                             ld		de,$BEFD
 351+ D02A 3E C0                                ld		a,$C0
 352+ D02C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 352+ D02C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 353+ D030 CD F9 E3                             call	l2_draw_box
 354+ D033 01 01 0A                             ld		bc,$0A01
 355+ D036 11 C0 FE                             ld		de,$FEC0
 356+ D039                                      SetMemToN STAT_current_topItem, 0
 356+ D039 3E 00       >                        ld      a,0
 356+ D03B 32 E8 C0    >                        ld      (STAT_current_topItem),a
 357+ D03E CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 358+ D041 CD 44 CE     .equipment              call    STAT_buffer_list
 359+ D044 CD A6 CF                             call    draw_STAT_items
 360+ D047 CD D7 CE                             call    draw_STAT_maintext
 361+ D04A C9                                   ret
 362+ D04B
 363+ D04B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 364+ D04B              ; Handles all the input whilst in the market menu
 365+ D04B              loop_STAT_menu:         MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_CursorUp
 365+ D04B 3E 4A       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorUp
 365+ D04D             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 365+ D04D ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 365+ D051 CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 366+ D054 CC 64 D0                             call    z,STAT_UpPressed
 367+ D057                                      MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_CursorDown
 367+ D057 3E 4C       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorDown
 367+ D059             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 367+ D059 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 367+ D05D CD BB E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 368+ D060 CC 79 D0                             call    z,STAT_DownPressed
 369+ D063 C9                                   ret
 370+ D064
 371+ D064              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 372+ D064 AF           STAT_UpPressed:         xor     a
 373+ D065 32 E7 C0                             ld      (STAT_selected_row),a
 374+ D068 3A E8 C0     .check_scroll_up:       ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)
 375+ D06B FE 00                                cp      0
 376+ D06D C8                                   ret     z
 377+ D06E 3D                                   dec     a           ; chjange later to buffering step back 1
 378+ D06F 32 E8 C0                             ld      (STAT_current_topItem),a
 379+ D072 CD A6 CF                             call    draw_STAT_items
 380+ D075 CD A2 CE                             call    draw_STAT_boilertext
 381+ D078 C9                                   ret
 382+ D079              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 383+ D079 3E 09        STAT_DownPressed:       ld      a,STAT_eqip_window_len-1
 384+ D07B 32 E7 C0                             ld      (STAT_selected_row),a
 385+ D07E 3A E9 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_end)
 386+ D081 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; This check is if the current list is < one screen
 387+ D082 05                                   dec     b
 388+ D083 3A E7 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_selected_row)
 389+ D086 B8                                   cp      b
 390+ D087 C8                                   ret     z
 391+ D088 FE 09                                cp      STAT_eqip_window_len-1
 392+ D08A 28 05                                jr      z, .check_scroll_down
 393+ D08C 21 E7 C0                             ld      hl,STAT_selected_row
 394+ D08F 34                                   inc     (hl)
 395+ D090 C9                                   ret
 396+ D091 47           .check_scroll_down:     ld      b,a
 397+ D092 3A E8 C0                             ld      a,(STAT_current_topItem)
 398+ D095 80                                   add     b
 399+ D096 3C                                   inc     a
 400+ D097 21 E9 C0                             ld      hl,STAT_current_end
 401+ D09A                                      ReturnIfAGTEusng      (hl)
 401+ D09A BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 401+ D09B D0          >                        ret	 nc
 402+ D09C 21 E8 C0     .can_scroll_down:       ld      hl,STAT_current_topItem
 403+ D09F 34                                   inc     (hl)
 404+ D0A0 CD A6 CF                             call    draw_STAT_items
 405+ D0A3 CD A2 CE                             call    draw_STAT_boilertext
 406+ D0A6 C9                                   ret
 407+ D0A7
# file closed: ./Menus/status_menu.asm

 196+ D26E              EQSHP_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++D26E
   2++D26E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++D26E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++D26F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++D270 23                                   inc			hl
   6++D271 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++D272 23                                   inc			hl
   8++D273 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++D274 23                                   inc			hl
  10++D275 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++D276 23                                   inc			hl
  12++D277 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++D278 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++D279 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++D27B C5                                   push		bc
  16++D27C D1                                   pop			de
  17++D27D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++D27D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++D281 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++D284 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++D285 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++D286 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++D288 C9                                   ret
  23++D289
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
