 685++CBC8 ~                                    pop     bc
 686++CBC8 ~            ;                       y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 687++CBC8 ~            ;                       x1 = 255
 688++CBC8 ~            ;                       we can skip the test for negative Y direection
 689++CBC8 ~            .DoneX2Calc:            macronegate16hl
 690++CBC8 ~            .X2SkipNegate:          ex      de,hl
 691++CBC8 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 692++CBC8 ~                                    add     hl,de
 693++CBC8 ~                                    ld      bc,hl
 694++CBC8 ~                                    ld      hl,255
 695++CBC8 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi <> 0 or Y1 low >= 128 then y coordinate is good
 696++CBC8 ~            .DoneXCalc:             ld      a,b
 697++CBC8 ~                                    and     a
 698++CBC8 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockY1Test
 699++CBC8 ~                                    ld      a,c
 700++CBC8 ~                                    and     $80
 701++CBC8 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                  ; speculative clear of carry in case its good
 702++CBC8 ~                                    ret     z
 703++CBC8 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi bit 7 is set
 704++CBC8 ~            .X1NoClipNeeded:
 705++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockY1Test:       ld      a,b
 706++CBC8 ~                                    test    $80
 707++CBC8 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPos       ; if Y is positive jump forward
 708++CBC8 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(Y1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 709++CBC8 ~                                    break
 710++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 711++CBC8 ~                                    test    16
 712++CBC8 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockYNegMulGrad
 713++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockYNegDivGrad:  macronegate16bc
 714++CBC8 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 715++CBC8 ~                                    push    hl
 716++CBC8 ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 717++CBC8 ~                                    ld      l,0
 718++CBC8 ~                                    ld      c,a
 719++CBC8 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC;div_hl_c
 720++CBC8 ~                                    pop     de
 721++CBC8 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 722++CBC8 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY1
 723++CBC8 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = abs(Y1) * Gradient
 724++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockYNegMulGrad:  macronegate16bc
 725++CBC8 ~                                    push    hl
 726++CBC8 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 727++CBC8 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 728++CBC8 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 729++CBC8 ~                                    pop     de
 730++CBC8 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 731++CBC8 ~            ;                       x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 732++CBC8 ~            ;                       y1 = 0
 733++CBC8 ~            ;                       ret
 734++CBC8 ~            ;                       now we have done the adjustment, if y or x are off screen then the line spans screen in only 1 dimension so doesn't get drawn
 735++CBC8 ~            .DoneBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 736++CBC8 ~                                    test    4
 737++CBC8 ~                                    jr      z,.Y1SkipNegate
 738++CBC8 ~                                    macronegate16de
 739++CBC8 ~            .Y1SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 740++CBC8 ~                                    ld      bc,0
 741++CBC8 ~                                    ret
 742++CBC8 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = Y1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 743++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockYPos:         ld      a,iyh
 744++CBC8 ~                                    test    16
 745++CBC8 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPosMulGrad
 746++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockYPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 747++CBC8 ~                                    push    hl
 748++CBC8 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 749++CBC8 ~                                    ld      de,127
 750++CBC8 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 751++CBC8 ~                                    ld      h,l
 752++CBC8 ~                                    ld      l,0
 753++CBC8 ~                                    ld      c,a
 754++CBC8 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC
 755++CBC8 ~                                    pop     de
 756++CBC8 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 757++CBC8 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY2
 758++CBC8 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = Y1 lo * Gradient
 759++CBC8 ~            .CalcBlockYPosMulGrad:  push    hl
 760++CBC8 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 761++CBC8 ~                                    ld      de,127
 762++CBC8 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 763++CBC8 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 764++CBC8 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 765++CBC8 ~                                    pop     de
 766++CBC8 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 767++CBC8 ~            ;                x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 768++CBC8 ~            ;                y1 = 127
 769++CBC8 ~            .DoneBlockY2:           ld      a,iyh
 770++CBC8 ~                                    test    4
 771++CBC8 ~                                    jr      nz,.Y2SkipNegate
 772++CBC8 ~                                    macronegate16de
 773++CBC8 ~            .Y2SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 774++CBC8 ~                                    ld      bc,127
 775++CBC8 ~                                    ret
 776++CBC8                      ELSE
 777++CBC8 C9                       ret
 778++CBC9                      ENDIF
 779++CBC9              ; old code for on screen test
 780++CBC9              ;;;;;;; if y1 > 127 and y2 > 127 then same sing and exit
 781++CBC9              ;;;;;;
 782++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if y1hi y2hi are <> 0 and both same sign exit
 783++CBC9              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ; y1 and y2 high tests
 784++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh
 785++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jp      .CheckYLow
 786++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld
 787++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ; if either is zero then we can check for > 127
 788++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.YHighNegativeCheck               ;
 789++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ;
 790++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ;
 791++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 792++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if y1h bit 7 and y2h bit 7 set then exit as both -ve
 793++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 794++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 795++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 796++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 797++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if y1h > 0 and y2h > 0 then exit as both are +ve high
 798++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 799++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 800++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 801++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if y1h or y2h is not 0 then proceed to clip
 802++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b
 803++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        or      ixh
 804++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 805++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if (y1l bit 7 is set and y1h is clear ) or (y2l bit 7 is set and y2h is clear) the proceed to clip
 806++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c
 807++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        or      ixl
 808++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 809++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 810++CBC9              ;;;;;;
 811++CBC9              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ;
 812++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 813++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y1HighIsZero                     ;
 814++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ; if we get here Y1 high <> 0
 815++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 816++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y2HighIsZero                     ; if they are both non zero we can do a sign check
 817++CBC9              ;;;;;;.CheckYSameSign:        ld      a,b                                 ; if we get here Y1 high and Y2 high are not zero
 818++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        xor     ixh                                 ; so same sign then bail out if they are
 819++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 820++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 821++CBC9              ;;;;;;;if we get here either y1hi or y2 hi are 0, now check and y1 low > 127 & y2 low > 127, exit
 822++CBC9              ;;;;;;.Y1HighIsZero:          ld      a,ixh                               ; as y1h is zero, if y2h is zero we do y1 y2 test
 823++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 824++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.Startprocessing                 ;
 825++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c                                 ; so by here y1h and y2h must be zero
 826++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     ixl
 827++CBC9              ;;;;;;
 828++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        .CheckY2Lo                        ;
 829++CBC9              ;;;;;;.CheckY1Lo:             ld      a,c
 830++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 831++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 832++CBC9              ;;;;;;.CheckY2Lo:             ld      a,ixl
 833++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 834++CBC9              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz
 835++CBC9              ;;;;;;;clip = 0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm

 573+ CBC9                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CBC9              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CBC9              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CBC9              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CBC9              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CBC9              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CBC9              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CBC9
   8++CBC9              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CBC9 F3           CopyRotmatToTransMat:   di                                                          ; disable interrups to protect during copy
  10++CBCA DD 21 00 00                          ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  11++CBCE DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  12++CBD0 31 2A C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  13++CBD3 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  14++CBD4 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  15++CBD5 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  16++CBD6 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  17++CBD7 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  18++CBD8 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  19++CBD9 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  20++CBDA 31 6E C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  21++CBDD C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  22++CBDE D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  23++CBDF E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  24++CBE0 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  25++CBE1 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  26++CBE2 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  27++CBE3 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  28++CBE4 31 36 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  29++CBE7 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  30++CBE8 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  31++CBE9 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  32++CBEA 31 74 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  33++CBED C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  34++CBEE D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  35++CBEF E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  36++CBF0 DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  37++CBF2                                  IFNDEF INTERRUPS_DISABLE
  38++CBF2 FB                                   ei
  39++CBF3                                  ENDIF
  40++CBF3 C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  41++CBF4
  42++CBF4
  43++CBF4
  44++CBF4              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  45++CBF4              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  46++CBF4              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX

 574+ CBF4                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CBF4              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CBF4 2A AD C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CBF7 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CBF8 E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CBFA 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CBFB                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CBFB 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CBFC E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CBFE 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CBFF                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CBFF ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnkxlo)						;
  12++CC03 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CC06 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CC08 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CC09 CD 12 90     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CC0C B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CC0D 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CC0E 22 A7 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CC11              ; ..................................
  20++CC11 2A AF C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CC14 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CC15 E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CC17 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CC18                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CC18 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CC19 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CC1B 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CC1C                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CC1C ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnkylo)
  30++CC20 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkysgn)
  31++CC23 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CC25 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CC26 CD 12 90     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CC29 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CC2A 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CC2B 22 A9 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CC2E              ; ..................................
  38++CC2E 2A B1 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CC31 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CC32 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CC34 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CC35                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CC35 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CC36 E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CC38 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CC39                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CC39 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnkzlo)
  48++CC3D 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkzsgn)
  49++CC40 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CC42 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CC43 CD 12 90     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CC46 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CC47 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CC48 CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CC4A 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CC4C E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CC4E 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CC50 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CC51              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CC51 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CC53 DA 62 CC    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CC56              NoClampZto4:
  61++CC56 22 AB C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CC59 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CC5A 32 9E 7F             ld      (varT),a
  64++CC5D 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CC5E 32 81 7F             ld      (varU),a
  66++CC61 C9           		ret
  67++CC62              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CC62 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CC65 22 AB C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CC68 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CC69 32 9E 7F             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CC6C 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CC6D 32 81 7F             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CC70 C9           		ret
  75++CC71
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 575+ CC71                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CC71              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CC71 ED 4B AB C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CC75 2A A7 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CC78 ED 5B A9 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CC7C              SetABSbc:
   6++CC7C 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CC7D DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CC7F E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CC81 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CC82              SetABShl:
  11++CC82 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CC83 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CC85 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CC87 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CC88              SetABSde:
  16++CC88 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CC89 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CC8B E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CC8D 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CC8E              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CC8E 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CC8F B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CC90 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CC91 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CC93                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CC93 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CC95 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CC97                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CC97 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CC99 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CC9B              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CC9B CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CC9D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CC9F C3 8E CC         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CCA2              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CCA2 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CCA4 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CCA6 B0           	or			b
  33++CCA7 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CCA8              SignforHL:
  35++CCA8 DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CCAA E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CCAC B4           	or			h
  38++CCAD 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CCAE              SignforDE:
  40++CCAE FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CCB0 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CCB2 B2           	or			d
  43++CCB3 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CCB4              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CCB4 ED 43 AB C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CCB8 22 A7 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CCBB ED 53 A9 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CCBF 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CCC0 32 81 7F     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CCC3 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CCC4 32 9E 7F     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CCC7 C9           	ret
  53++CCC8
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 626+ CCFF                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CCFF              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CCFF 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CD00 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CD02 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CD04 3A 82 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CD07 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CD08              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CD08              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CD08 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CD0B 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CD0C 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CD0E CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CD10 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CD11 ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CD13 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CD15 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CD17 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CD18 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CD19 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CD1B 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CD1C 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CD1F C9                                   ret
  23++CD20
  24++CD20 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CD22                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CD22 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CD24 CD FF CC                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CD27 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CD29                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CD29 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CD2B B1                                   or      c
  30++CD2C 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CD2F C9                                   ret
  32++CD30
  33++CD30              ; Tested OK
  34++CD30              ;LL21
  35++CD30              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CD30                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CD30 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CD30 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CD30 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CD30 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CD30 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CD30 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CD30 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CD30 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CD30 ~                            push	hl
  46++CD30 ~                            push	bc
  47++CD30 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CD30 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CD30 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CD30 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CD30 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CD30 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CD30 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CD30 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CD30 ~                            ret
  56++CD30                      ELSE
  57++CD30 21 73 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CD33 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CD35 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CD36 32 82 7F                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CD39 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CD3B 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CD3C 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CD3D 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CD3E                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CD3E CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CD40 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CD42 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CD43 E5                           push	hl
  68++CD44 C5                           push	bc
  69++CD45 CD FF CC                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CD48                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CD48 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CD49 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CD4A E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CD4B 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CD4C 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CD4D 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CD4F C9                           ret
  78++CD50                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 627+ CD50              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"
 628+ CD50              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 629+ CD50
 630+ CD50              ; Now we have
 631+ CD50              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 632+ CD50              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 633+ CD50              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 634+ CD50              ;
 635+ CD50              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 636+ CD50                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CD50              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CD50
   3++CD50              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CD50              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CD50              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CD50              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CD50              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CD50              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CD50              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CD50              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CD50              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CD50              ;        sla      a
  13++CD50              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CD50              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CD50              ;        inc     hl
  16++CD50              ;        inc     hl
  17++CD50              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CD50              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CD50              ;        ret
  20++CD50
  21++CD50
  22++CD50              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CD50              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CD50              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CD50              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CD50              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CD50              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CD50              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CD50              ; OUTPUT
  30++CD50              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CD50              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CD50              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CD50              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CD50 2A 62 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CD53 ED 5B 68 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CD57 ED 4B 6E C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CD5B 22 7A C0             ld      (UBnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CD5E ED 53 7C C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CD62 ED 43 7E C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CD66 2A 64 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CD69 ED 5B 6A C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CD6D ED 4B 70 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CD71 22 82 C0             ld      (UBnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CD74 ED 53 84 C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CD78 ED 43 86 C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CD7C 2A 66 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CD7F ED 5B 6C C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CD83 ED 4B 72 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CD87 22 8A C0             ld      (UBnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CD8A ED 53 8C C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CD8E ED 43 8E C0          ld      (UBnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CD92 C9                   ret
  53++CD93
  54++CD93
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 637+ CD93              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 638+ CD93              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 639+ CD93              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 640+ CD93              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 641+ CD93              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 642+ CD93              ; Returns
 643+ CD93              ;
 644+ CD93              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 645+ CD93              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 646+ CD93              ;
 647+ CD93              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 648+ CD93              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 649+ CD93              ;
 650+ CD93              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 651+ CD93              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 652+ CD93              ; TESTEDOK
 653+ CD93              XX12DotOneRow:
 654+ CD93              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 654+ CD93 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 654+ CD96 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 654+ CD97 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 654+ CD98 57          >                        ld      d,a
 654+ CD99 ED 30       >                        mul
 654+ CD9B 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 654+ CD9C 32 9E 7F    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 655+ CD9F 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 656+ CDA0              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 656+ CDA0 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 656+ CDA3 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 657+ CDA4 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 658+ CDA7 23                                   inc     hl
 659+ CDA8              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 659+ CDA8 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 659+ CDAB 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 659+ CDAC 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 659+ CDAD 57          >                        ld      d,a
 659+ CDAE ED 30       >                        mul
 659+ CDB0 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 659+ CDB1 32 82 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 660+ CDB4                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 660+ CDB4 3A 9E 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 660+ CDB7 32 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 661+ CDBA 23                                   inc     hl
 662+ CDBB                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 662+ CDBB 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 662+ CDBE AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 663+ CDBF              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 664+ CDBF E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 665+ CDC0 CD 1A 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 666+ CDC3 E1                                   pop     hl
 667+ CDC4 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 668+ CDC7 23                                   inc     hl
 669+ CDC8              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 669+ CDC8 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 669+ CDCB 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 669+ CDCC 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 669+ CDCD 57          >                        ld      d,a
 669+ CDCE ED 30       >                        mul
 669+ CDD0 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 669+ CDD1 32 82 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 670+ CDD4                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 670+ CDD4 3A 9E 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 670+ CDD7 32 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 671+ CDDA 23                                   inc     hl
 672+ CDDB                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 672+ CDDB 3A AC C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 672+ CDDE AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 673+ CDDF              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 674+ CDDF CD 1A 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 675+ CDE2              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 676+ CDE2 C9                                   ret
 677+ CDE3
 678+ CDE3
 679+ CDE3                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 680+ CDE3
 681+ CDE3              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 682+ CDE3              ;TESTED OK
 683+ CDE3              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 684+ CDE3              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 685+ CDE3 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 686+ CDE6 21 62 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 687+ CDE9 CD 93 CD                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 688+ CDEC 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 689+ CDEF 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 690+ CDF2 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 691+ CDF5 21 68 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 692+ CDF8 CD 93 CD                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 693+ CDFB 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 694+ CDFE 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 695+ CE01 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 696+ CE04 21 6E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 697+ CE07 CD 93 CD                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 698+ CE0A 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 699+ CE0D 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 700+ CE10 32 B2 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 701+ CE13 C9                                   ret
 702+ CE14              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 703+ CE14                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CE14              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CE14              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++CE14                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++CE14 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12)
   3++CE17 32 9B C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a
   4++CE1A                      ldCopyByte XX12+1       ,XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++CE1A 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+1)
   4++CE1D 32 9D C0    >                        ld       (XX18+2),a
   5++CE20                      ldCopyByte XX12+2       ,XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++CE20 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   5++CE23 32 9E C0    >                        ld       (XX18+3),a
   6++CE26                      ldCopyByte XX12+3       ,XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++CE26 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++CE29 32 A0 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++CE2C                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++CE2C 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   7++CE2F 32 A1 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+6),a
   8++CE32                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++CE32 3A B2 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+5)
   8++CE35 32 A3 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+8),a
   9++CE38 C9                   ret
  10++CE39

   1++CE83 2A 20 C0     LoadCraftToCamera:      ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)            ; UBnkxlo, UBnkxhi
   2++CE86 ED 5B 22 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkxsgn)           ; UBnkxsgn, UBnkylo
   3++CE8A ED 4B 24 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkyhi)            ; UBnkyhi, UBnkysgn
   4++CE8E 22 9B C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl    ; UBnkDrawCam0xLo, UBnkDrawCam0xHi
   5++CE91 ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xSgn),de   ; UBnkDrawCam0xSgn,UBnkDrawCam0yLo
   6++CE95 ED 43 9F C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yHi),bc    ; UBnkDrawCam0yHi, UBnkDrawCam0ySgn
   7++CE99
   8++CE99 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)            ; UBnkzlo, UBnkzhi
   9++CE9C 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)             ; UBnkzlo
  10++CE9F 22 A1 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl    ; UBnkDrawCam0zLo, UBnkDrawCam0zHi

  16++CEA6 C9                                   ret
  17++CEA7
  18++CEA7 2A 9B C0     CopyCameraToXX15Signed: ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  19++CEAA 3A 9D C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
  20++CEAD B4                                   or  h
  21++CEAE 67                                   ld  h,a
  22++CEAF 22 A7 C0                             ld  (UBnkXScaled),hl
  23++CEB2 2A 9E C0                             ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  24++CEB5 3A A0 C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)

  26++CEB9 67                                   ld  h,a
  27++CEBA 22 A9 C0                             ld  (UBnkYScaled),hl
  28++CEBD 2A A1 C0                             ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  29++CEC0 3A A3 C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)
  30++CEC3 B4                                   or  h
  31++CEC4 67                                   ld  h,a
  32++CEC5 22 AB C0                             ld  (UBnkZScaled),hl
  33++CEC8 C9                                   ret
  34++CEC9
  35++CEC9              ;;;CopyXX18ScaledToXX15:
  36++CEC9              ;;;CopyDrawCamToScaledMatrix:
  37++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zSgn, UBnkZScaledSign   ; XX18+8 => XX15+5
  38++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo,  UBnkXScaled       ; XX18+0 => XX15+0
  39++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xSgn, UBnkXScaledSign   ; XX18+2 => XX15+1
  40++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo,  UBnkYScaled       ; XX18+3 => XX15+2
  41++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0ySgn, UBnkYScaledSign   ; XX18+5 => XX15+3
  42++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo,  UBnkZScaled       ; XX18+6 => XX15+4
  43++CEC9              ;;;        ret
  44++CEC9
  45++CEC9              ;;;CopyXX15ToXX18Scaled:
  46++CEC9              ;;;CopyScaledMatrixToDrawCam:
  47++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkZScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0zSgn  ; XX15+5 => XX18+8
  48++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  49++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  50++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  51++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  52++CEC9              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6
  53++CEC9              ;;;        ret
  54++CEC9
  55++CEC9
  56++CEC9              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  57++CEC9              LL94Z:
  58++CEC9 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++CECB 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++CECD 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++CED0 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++CED1 3A AC C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++CED4 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++CED5 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++CED8 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++CED9 3A A3 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++CEDC 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++CEDD CD 12 90             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++CEE0 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++CEE1 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++CEE2 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++CEE3 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++CEE6 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++CEE7 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  75++CEEA              LL94X:
  76++CEEA 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  77++CEEC 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  78++CEEE 3A A7 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  79++CEF1 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  80++CEF2 3A A8 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  81++CEF5 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++CEF6 3A 9B C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  83++CEF9 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  84++CEFA 3A 9D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  85++CEFD 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  86++CEFE CD 12 90             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  87++CF01 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  88++CF02 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  89++CF03 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  90++CF04 32 A8 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  91++CF07 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  92++CF08 32 A7 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  93++CF0B              LL94Y:
  94++CF0B 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  95++CF0D 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  96++CF0F 3A A9 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  97++CF12 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  98++CF13 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  99++CF16 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 100++CF17 3A 9E C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
 101++CF1A 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
 102++CF1B 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
 103++CF1E 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
 104++CF1F CD 12 90             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
 105++CF22 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 106++CF23 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
 107++CF24 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 108++CF25 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
 109++CF28 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
 110++CF29 32 A9 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 111++CF2C C9                   ret
 112++CF2D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 707+ CF2D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++CF2D              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++CF2D              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++CF2D                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++CF2D 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++CF30 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++CF33                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++CF33 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++CF36 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++CF39                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++CF39 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++CF3C 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++CF3F C9                   ret
   7++CF40
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 708+ CF40              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 709+ CF40                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++CF40              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++CF40              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++CF40              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++CF40              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++CF40              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++CF40              ;;; R = T
   7++CF40              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++CF40              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++CF40              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++CF40              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++CF40              ;;; R = T
  12++CF40              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++CF40
  14++CF40
  15++CF40
  16++CF40
  17++CF40
  18++CF40              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++CF40 ~            						mul
  20++CF40 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++CF40              						ENDM
  22++CF40              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++CF40 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++CF43                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++CF43 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++CF44 CA 61 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++CF47 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++CF48 3A A7 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++CF4B 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++CF4C                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++CF4C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++CF4D CA 61 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++CF50 ED 30        		mul
  30++CF52 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++CF53 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++CF56 21 A8 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++CF59 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++CF5A E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++CF5C FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++CF5E C3 65 CF             jp          dotmuly
  37++CF61              dotxskipzero:
  38++CF61 AF                   xor         a
  39++CF62 47                   ld          b,a
  40++CF63 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++CF65              dotmuly:
  42++CF65              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++CF65 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++CF68                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++CF68 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++CF69 CA 88 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++CF6C 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++CF6D 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++CF70                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++CF70 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++CF71 CA 88 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++CF74 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++CF75 ED 30                mul
  50++CF77 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++CF78 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++CF7A 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++CF7D 21 AA C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++CF80 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++CF81 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++CF83 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++CF85 C3 8C CF             jp          dotaddxy
  58++CF88              dotyskipzero:
  59++CF88 AF                   xor         a
  60++CF89 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++CF8A DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++CF8C              dotaddxy:
  63++CF8C              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++CF8C 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++CF8E 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++CF8F 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++CF91 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++CF92 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++CF94 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++CF95 CD 12 90             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++CF98 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++CF99 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++CF9C                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++CF9C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++CF9D CA C2 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++CFA0 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++CFA1 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++CFA4                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++CFA4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++CFA5 CA C2 CF    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++CFA8 57                   ld          d,a
  78++CFA9 ED 30                mul
  79++CFAB E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++CFAC 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++CFAF 21 B2 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++CFB2 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++CFB3 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++CFB5 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++CFB6 E1                   pop         hl
  86++CFB7 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++CFB8 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++CFBA CD 12 90             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++CFBD 32 84 7F             ld          (varS),a
  90++CFC0 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++CFC1 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++CFC2              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++CFC2 78                   ld          a,b
  94++CFC3 32 84 7F             ld          (varS),a
  95++CFC6 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++CFC7 C9                   ret
  97++CFC8              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++CFC8              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++CFC8              ;;;;		mul
 104++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++CFC8              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++CFC8              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++CFC8              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++CFC8              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++CFC8              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++CFC8              ;;;;       mul
 117++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++CFC8              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++CFC8              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++CFC8              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++CFC8              ;;;;       mul
 132++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++CFC8              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++CFC8              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++CFC8              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++CFC8              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++CFC8              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++CFC8              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++CFC8
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 710+ CFC8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 711+ CFC8              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 712+ CFC8              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 713+ CFC8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 714+ CFC8                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++CFC8              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++CFC8              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++CFC8 3A 0A C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++CFCB 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++CFCC              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++CFCC 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++CFCF 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++CFD0                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++CFD0 A7          >                        and     a
   8++CFD1 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++CFD2              LL90Loop:
  10++CFD2              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++CFD2 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++CFD3                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++CFD3 2A 9E C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++CFD6 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++CFD8 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++CFDA 22 9E C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++CFDD                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++CFDD 2A 9B C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++CFE0 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++CFE2 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++CFE4 22 9B C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++CFE7                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++CFE7 2A A1 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++CFEA CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++CFEC CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++CFEE 22 A1 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++CFF1 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++CFF2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++CFF2 A7          >                        and     a
  16++CFF3 C2 D2 CF    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++CFF6 C9                   ret
  18++CFF7
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 715+ CFF7              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 716+ CFF7
 717+ CFF7              ; Backface cull
 718+ CFF7              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 719+ CFF7              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 720+ CFF7              ;
 721+ CFF7                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++CFF7 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++CFF8 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++CFF9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++CFFB 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++CFFE 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++CFFF CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D001 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D002 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D004 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D007 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D008 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D00A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D00C 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D00F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D010 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D011 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D014 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D015 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D016 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D019 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D01A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D01B 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D01E C9                                   ret
  24++D01F
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 722+ D01F                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D01F 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D020 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D021 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D023 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D026 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D027 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D029 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D02A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D02C 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D02F 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D030 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D032 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D034 32 B2 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D037 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D038 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D039 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D03C 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
