  24++D047
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 723+ D047              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 724+ D047              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 725+ D047              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 726+ D047              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 727+ D047              ; return if no faces
 728+ D047              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 729+ D047              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 730+ D047              ; While Z hi <> 0
 731+ D047              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 732+ D047              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 733+ D047              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 734+ D047              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 735+ D047              ; Loop
 736+ D047              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 737+ D047              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 738+ D047              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 739+ D047              ; For each face
 740+ D047              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 741+ D047              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 742+ D047              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 743+ D047              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 744+ D047              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 745+ D047              ;        else
 746+ D047              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 747+ D047              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 748+ D047              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 749+ D047              ;           While X >= 0
 750+ D047              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 751+ D047              ;              if  x >= 0
 752+ D047              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 753+ D047              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 754+ D047              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 755+ D047              ;           loop
 756+ D047              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 757+ D047              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 758+ D047              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 759+ D047              ;               X = 1
 760+ D047              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 761+ D047              ;           else
 762+ D047              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 763+ D047              ;           endif
 764+ D047              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 765+ D047              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 766+ D047              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 767+ D047              ;               X = 1
 768+ D047              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 769+ D047              ;           else
 770+ D047              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 771+ D047              ;           endif
 772+ D047              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 773+ D047              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 774+ D047              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 775+ D047              ;               X = 1
 776+ D047              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 777+ D047              ;           else
 778+ D047              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 779+ D047              ;           endif
 780+ D047              ;        endif
 781+ D047              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 782+ D047              ;        if dot product < 0
 783+ D047              ;           set face visible
 784+ D047              ;        else
 785+ D047              ;           set face invisible
 786+ D047              ;        end if
 787+ D047              ;     else
 788+ D047              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 789+ D047              ;     end if
 790+ D047              ; Next Face
 791+ D047
 792+ D047              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 793+ D047
 794+ D047              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 795+ D047              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 796+ D047              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 797+ D047              ;
 798+ D047              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 799+ D047              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 800+ D047              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 801+ D047              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 802+ D047              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 803+ D047                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D047              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D047                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D047               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D047 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D048              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D048              ; EE29:
   7++D048
   8++D048              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D048              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D048              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D048              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D048              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D048              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D048              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D048              ;
  16++D048              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D048              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D048              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D048              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D048              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D048              ;
  22++D048              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D048              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D048              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D048              ;
  26++D048              ; so
  27++D048              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D048              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D048              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D048              ;
  31++D048              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D048              ;
  33++D048              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D048              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D048              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D048              ;
  37++D048
  38++D048
  39++D048
  40++D048 3A A2 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D04B                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D04B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D04C CA 78 D0    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D04F 2A 9B C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D052 ED 5B 9E C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D056 ED 4B A1 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D05A FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D05C                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D05C CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D05E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D060                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D060 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D062 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D064                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D064 CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D066 CB 19       >			   rr  c

  50++D069                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D069 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D06A C2 5A D0    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop

  54++D078 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl

  58++D07E 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D081 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative

  90++D0B6 ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  91++D0B6 ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D0B6 ~                                        srl     a
  93++D0B6 ~                                        srl     a

 180++D16B              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 181++D16B              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 182++D16B              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?

 201++D1B9                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 201++D1B9 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 201++D1BC 32 84 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 202++D1BF                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 202++D1BF 3A 9E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 202++D1C2 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 203++D1C5 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 204++D1C8 CD 1A 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 205++D1CB DA 16 D1                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 206++D1CE 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 207++D1D1                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 207++D1D1 3A 84 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 207++D1D4 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 208++D1D7              ; calculate dot product LL89
 209++D1D7              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 209++D1D7 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 209++D1DA 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D1DD 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 211++D1E0 CD 85 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 212++D1E3 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D1E6 3A AE C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 214++D1E9 21 A8 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 215++D1EC AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 216++D1ED 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 217++D1F0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 217++D1F0 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 217++D1F3 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 218++D1F6 3A A9 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 219++D1F9 CD 85 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 220++D1FC 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D1FF                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 221++D1FF 3A 9E 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 221++D202 32 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 222++D205 3A B0 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 223++D208 21 AA C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 224++D20B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 225++D20C CD 1A 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 226++D20F 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D212                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 227++D212 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 227++D215 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 228++D218 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 229++D21B CD 85 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 230++D21E 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D221                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 231++D221 3A 9E 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 231++D224 32 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 232++D227 3A AC C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 233++D22A 21 B2 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 234++D22D AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 235++D22E CD 1A 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 236++D231 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 237++D233 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 238++D235 3A 84 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 239++D238 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 240++D23B 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 241++D23D 3A 47 D0     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 242++D240 CD D1 CC                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 243++D243 C3 4C D2                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 244++D246 3A 47 D0     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 245++D249 CD C8 CC                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 246++D24C 21 47 D0     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 247++D24F 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 248++D250 C1                                   pop         bc
 249++D251 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 250++D252 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 251++D254 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 252++D256 22 88 7E                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 253++D259 05                                   dec         b
 254++D25A C2 F6 D0                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 255++D25D C9                                   ret
 256++D25E
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 804+ D25E              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 805+ D25E
 806+ D25E              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 807+ D25E                      ldCopyByte  UBnkxsgn,UBnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 807+ D25E 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkxsgn)
 807+ D261 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXPointSign),a
 808+ D264 ED 4B AD C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 809+ D268 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 810+ D269 FA 7F D2             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 811+ D26C              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 812+ D26C              NodeXPositiveX:
 813+ D26C 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 814+ D26D 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 815+ D26F 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnkxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBnkxLo
 816+ D272 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 817+ D274 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 818+ D275 22 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 819+ D278 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 820+ D279 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkXPointSign),a
 821+ D27C C3 9B D2             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 822+ D27F              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 823+ D27F              NodeNegativeX:
 824+ D27F              LL52X:                                                 ;
 825+ D27F 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnkxlo)                       ; Coord
 826+ D282 ED 4B AD C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
 827+ D286 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 828+ D288 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnkx - UBnkXX12xLo
 829+ D28A F2 98 D2             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 830+ D28D              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 831+ D28D              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 832+ D28D CD D4 94             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 833+ D290 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 834+ D293 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 835+ D295 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 836+ D298              SetAndMopX:
 837+ D298 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnkxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 838+ D29B              FinishedThisNodeX:
 839+ D29B
 840+ D29B              LL53:
 841+ D29B

 865+ D2CA              NodeXNegSignChangeY:

 902+ D308              LL56Overflow:

1037+ D3EE EB                   ex          de,hl
1038+ D3EF              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1039+ D3EF FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1040+ D3F2 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1041+ D3F5 FD 23                inc         iy
1042+ D3F7 FD 23                inc         iy
1043+ D3F9 C9                   ret
1044+ D3FA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1045+ D3FA              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1046+ D3FA              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1047+ D3FA              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1048+ D3FA              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1049+ D3FA              CopyNodeToXX15:
1050+ D3FA                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1050+ D3FA 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1050+ D3FB 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1051+ D3FE 23                   inc         hl
1052+ D3FF                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1052+ D3FF 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1052+ D400 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1053+ D403 23                   inc         hl
1054+ D404                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1054+ D404 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1054+ D405 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1055+ D408 23                   inc         hl
1056+ D409              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1057+ D409              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1058+ D409 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1059+ D40A 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1060+ D40B 47                   ld          b,a
1061+ D40C E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1062+ D40E 32 A8 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1063+ D411 78                   ld          a,b
1064+ D412 E6 40                and         $40
1065+ D414 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1066+ D416 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1067+ D419 78                   ld          a,b
1068+ D41A E6 20                and         $20
1069+ D41C CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1070+ D41E CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1071+ D420 32 AC C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1072+ D423 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1073+ D424 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1074+ D426 32 9E 7F             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1075+ D429 C9                   ret
1076+ D42A
1077+ D42A              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1078+ D42A              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1079+ D42A              ;..............................................................................................................................
1080+ D42A              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1081+ D42A              LL48GetScale:
1082+ D42A 3A 73 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1083+ D42D 5F                   ld          e,a
1084+ D42E CD FA D3             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1085+ D431              LL48GetVertices:
1086+ D431              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1087+ D431                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1087+ D431 BB          >                        cp      e
1087+ D432 DA 6F D4    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1088+ D435              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1089+ D435                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1089+ D435 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1089+ D436 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1089+ D437 32 82 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1090+ D43A 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1091+ D43B E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1092+ D43D E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1093+ D43E                      ldHLIdxAToA UBnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1093+ D43E 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UBnkFaceVisArray
1093+ D441 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1093+ D443 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1094+ D444 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1095+ D445                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1095+ D445 A7          >                        and     a
1095+ D446 C2 75 D4    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1096+ D449              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1097+ D449 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1098+ D44A ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1099+ D44C E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1100+ D44E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1100+ D44E A7          >                        and     a
1100+ D44F C2 75 D4    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1101+ D452              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1102+ D452                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1102+ D452 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1102+ D453 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1102+ D454 32 82 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1103+ D457 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1104+ D458 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1105+ D45A E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1106+ D45B                      ldHLIdxAToA UBnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1106+ D45B 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UBnkFaceVisArray
1106+ D45E ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1106+ D460 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1107+ D461 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1108+ D462                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1108+ D462 A7          >                        and     a
1108+ D463 C2 75 D4    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1109+ D466              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1110+ D466 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1111+ D467 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1112+ D469 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1113+ D46B                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1113+ D46B A7          >                        and     a
1113+ D46C C2 75 D4    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1114+ D46F              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1115+ D46F 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1116+ D472 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1117+ D474                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1118+ D474 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1119+ D475              NodeIsVisible:
1120+ D475              LL49:
1121+ D475 CD 1C D3             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1122+ D478 C9                   ret
1123+ D479
1124+ D479                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1125+ D479
1126+ D479              ProjectNodeToEye:
1127+ D479 ED 4B AB C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1128+ D47D 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1129+ D47E 32 82 7F         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1130+ D481 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1131+ D484 CD 3D 97         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1132+ D487 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1133+ D48A                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1133+ D48A CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1133+ D48C C2 97 D4    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1134+ D48F              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1135+ D48F 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1136+ D491 26 00            ld          h,0
1137+ D493 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1138+ D494 C3 9E D4         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1139+ D497              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1140+ D497 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1141+ D499 26 00            ld          h,0
1142+ D49B                  ClearCarryFlag
1142+ D49B B7          >                        or a
1143+ D49C ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1144+ D49E              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1145+ D49E EB               ex          de,hl
1146+ D49F FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1147+ D4A2 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1148+ D4A5              EyeProcessYPoint:
1149+ D4A5 ED 4B AB C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1150+ D4A9 79               ld          a,c
1151+ D4AA 32 82 7F         ld          (varQ),a
1152+ D4AD 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1153+ D4B0 CD 3D 97         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1154+ D4B3 3A AA C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1155+ D4B6                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1155+ D4B6 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1155+ D4B8 C2 C3 D4    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1156+ D4BB              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1157+ D4BB 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1158+ D4BD                  ClearCarryFlag
1158+ D4BD B7          >                        or a
1159+ D4BE ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1160+ D4C0 C3 C8 D4         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1161+ D4C3              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1162+ D4C3 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1163+ D4C5 26 00            ld          h,0
1164+ D4C7 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1165+ D4C8              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1166+ D4C8 EB               ex          de,hl
1167+ D4C9 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1168+ D4CC FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1169+ D4CF C9               ret
1170+ D4D0
1171+ D4D0
1172+ D4D0
1173+ D4D0              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1174+ D4D0              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1175+ D4D0              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1176+ D4D0              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1177+ D4D0              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1178+ D4D0              ; which can be simplified as:
1179+ D4D0              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1180+ D4D0              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1181+ D4D0              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1182+ D4D0              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1183+ D4D0              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1184+ D4D0              ;      Roll calculations:
1185+ D4D0              ;
1186+ D4D0              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1187+ D4D0              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1188+ D4D0              ;      Pitch calculations:
1189+ D4D0              ;
1190+ D4D0              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1191+ D4D0              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1192+ D4D0
1193+ D4D0
1194+ D4D0              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1195+ D4D0                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D4D0
   2++D4D0              ; Full version
   3++D4D0              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D4D0              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D4D0              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D4D0              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D4D0
   8++D4D0
   9++D4D0              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D4D0 ~                                    push    bc
  11++D4D0 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D4D0 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D4D0 ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D4D0 ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D4D0 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D4D0 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D4D0 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D4D0 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D4D0 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D4D0 ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D4D0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D4D0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D4D0 ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D4D0 ~                                    ret
  25++D4D0 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D4D0 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D4D0 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D4D0 ~                                    or      a
  29++D4D0 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D4D0 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D4D0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D4D0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D4D0 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D4D0 ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D4D0 ~                                    ret
  36++D4D0 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D4D0 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D4D0 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D4D0 ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D4D0 ~                                    ret
  41++D4D0                                      ENDM
  42++D4D0
  43++D4D0
  44++D4D0              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnkxlo, UBnkxsgn
  44++D4D0 C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D4D1 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D4D2 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkxsgn)
  44++D4D5 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D4D6 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D4D7 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D4D8 FA E9 D4    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D4DB             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D4DB ED 5B 83 7E >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D4DF 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)
  44++D4E2 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D4E3 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D4E6 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D4E7 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D4E8 C9          >                        ret
  44++D4E9             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D4E9 ED 5B 83 7E >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D4ED 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)
  44++D4F0 B7          >                        or      a
  44++D4F1 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D4F3 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D4F5 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D4F6 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D4F9 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D4FB C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D4FC C9          >                        ret
  44++D4FD             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D4FD AF          >                    xor a
  44++D4FE 95          >                    sub l
  44++D4FF 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D500 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D501 94          >                    sub h
  44++D502 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D503 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D506 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D507 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D508 C9          >                        ret
  45++D509
  46++D509              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnkylo, UBnkysgn
  46++D509 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D50A 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D50B 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkysgn)
  46++D50E 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D50F 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D510 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D511 FA 22 D5    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D514             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D514 ED 5B 83 7E >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D518 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkylo)
  46++D51B 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D51C 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D51F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D520 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D521 C9          >                        ret
  46++D522             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D522 ED 5B 83 7E >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D526 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkylo)
  46++D529 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D52A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D52C 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D52E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D52F 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D532 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D534 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D535 C9          >                        ret
  46++D536             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D536 AF          >                    xor a
  46++D537 95          >                    sub l
  46++D538 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D539 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D53A 94          >                    sub h
  46++D53B 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D53C 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D53F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D540 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D541 C9          >                        ret
  47++D542
  48++D542              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnkzlo, UBnkzsgn
  48++D542 C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D543 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D544 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)
  48++D547 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D548 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D549 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D54A FA 5B D5    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D54D             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D54D ED 5B 83 7E >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D551 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)
  48++D554 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D555 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D558 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D559 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D55A C9          >                        ret
  48++D55B             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D55B ED 5B 83 7E >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D55F 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)
  48++D562 B7          >                        or      a
  48++D563 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D565 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D567 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D568 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D56B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D56D C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D56E C9          >                        ret
  48++D56F             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D56F AF          >                    xor a
  48++D570 95          >                    sub l
  48++D571 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D572 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D573 94          >                    sub h
  48++D574 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D575 22 83 7E    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D578 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D579 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D57A C9          >                        ret
  49++D57B
  50++D57B              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D57B 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D57E              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D57E              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D57E              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D57E
  56++D57E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D57E              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D57E 3A 9C 7E     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D581 21 90 7E                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D584 B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D585 CA 41 D7                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D588                                      ;break
  63++D588              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  64++D588 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  65++D589 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  66++D58C CD 88 92                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UBnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  67++D58F 32 84 7E                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  68++D592 22 82 7E                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UBnkXlo * Alph1
  69++D595              ; A = Flip sign
  70++D595 3A 9D 7E                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  71++D598 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  72++D59B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  73++D59C              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  74++D59C CD 09 D5                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  75++D59F              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  76++D59F 32 7D D5                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  77++D5A2 22 7B D5                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  78++D5A5              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  79++D5A5 3A 90 7E                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  80++D5A8 5F                                   ld      e,a
  81++D5A9 CD 88 92                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UBnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  82++D5AC 32 84 7E                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  83++D5AF 22 82 7E                             ld      (varP),hl
  84++D5B2              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  85++D5B2 3A 7D D5                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  86++D5B5 5F                                   ld      e,a
  87++D5B6 3A 91 7E                             ld      a,(BET2)
  88++D5B9 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  89++D5BA              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  90++D5BA CD 42 D5                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
  91++D5BD 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnkzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
  92++D5C0 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnkzlo),hl
  93++D5C3              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
  94++D5C3 3A 90 7E                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
  95++D5C6 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D5C7 CD 88 92                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
  97++D5CA 32 84 7E                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
  98++D5CD 22 82 7E                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UBnkXlo & Alph1
  99++D5D0              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 100++D5D0 3A 7D D5                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 101++D5D3 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnkysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 102++D5D6 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 103++D5D7 3A 91 7E                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 104++D5DA AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 105++D5DB 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 106++D5DC 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)                ;
 107++D5DF AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 108++D5E0 F2 EF D5                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 109++D5E3 2A 83 7E                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 110++D5E6 ED 5B 7B D5                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 111++D5EA B7                                   or      a
 112++D5EB 19                                   add     hl,de
 113++D5EC C3 09 D6                             jp      .MV44
 114++D5EF 2A 7B D5     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 115++D5F2 ED 5B 83 7E                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 116++D5F6 B7                                   or      a
 117++D5F7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 118++D5F9 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 119++D5FB                                      NegHL
 119++D5FB AF          >                    xor a
 119++D5FC 95          >                    sub l
 119++D5FD 6F          >                    ld l,a
 119++D5FE 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 119++D5FF 94          >                    sub h
 119++D600 67          >                    ld h,a
 120++D601 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 121++D604 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122++D606 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnkysgn),a
 123++D609              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 124++D609 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnkylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 125++D60C 3A 9C 7E                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 126++D60F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 127++D610 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkylo)
 128++D613 CD 88 92                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 129++D616 32 84 7E                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 130++D619 22 82 7E                             ld      (varP),hl
 131++D61C 3A 9E 7E                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 132++D61F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 133++D620 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkysgn)
 134++D623 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 135++D624 CD D0 D4                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 136++D627 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnkxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 137++D62A 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnkxlo),hl
 138++D62D                                      ;break
 139++D62D                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 140++D62D                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 140++D62D             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 140++D62D 3A 9B 7E    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 140++D630 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 140++D633             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 140++D633 2A 38 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 140++D636 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D639             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 140++D639 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D63C 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 140++D63F 3A 37 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 140++D642 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 140++D644 CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 140++D647 ED 53 38 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 140++D64B             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 140++D64B 2A 36 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D64E 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D651 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 140++D654 CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 140++D657 ED 53 36 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 141++D65B                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 141++D65B             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 141++D65B 3A 9B 7E    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 141++D65E 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 141++D661             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 141++D661 2A 2C C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 141++D664 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D667             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 141++D667 3A 2A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D66A 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 141++D66D 3A 2B C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 141++D670 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 141++D672 CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 141++D675 ED 53 2C C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 141++D679             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 141++D679 2A 2A C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D67C 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D67F 3A 2D C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 141++D682 CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 141++D685 ED 53 2A C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 142++D689                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 142++D689             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 142++D689 3A 9B 7E    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 142++D68C 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 142++D68F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 142++D68F 2A 32 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 142++D692 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 142++D695             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 142++D695 3A 30 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 142++D698 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 142++D69B 3A 31 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 142++D69E EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 142++D6A0 CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 142++D6A3 ED 53 32 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 142++D6A7             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 142++D6A7 2A 30 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 142++D6AA 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 142++D6AD 3A 33 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 142++D6B0 CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 142++D6B3 ED 53 30 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 143++D6B7                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 143++D6B7             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 143++D6B7 3A 8E 7E    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 143++D6BA 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 143++D6BD             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 143++D6BD 2A 38 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 143++D6C0 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 143++D6C3             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 143++D6C3 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 143++D6C6 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 143++D6C9 3A 3B C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 143++D6CC EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 143++D6CE CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 143++D6D1 ED 53 38 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 143++D6D5             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 143++D6D5 2A 3A C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 143++D6D8 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 143++D6DB 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 143++D6DE CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 143++D6E1 ED 53 3A C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 144++D6E5                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 144++D6E5             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 144++D6E5 3A 8E 7E    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 144++D6E8 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 144++D6EB             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 144++D6EB 2A 2C C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 144++D6EE 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 144++D6F1             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 144++D6F1 3A 2E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 144++D6F4 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 144++D6F7 3A 2F C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 144++D6FA EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 144++D6FC CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 144++D6FF ED 53 2C C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 144++D703             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 144++D703 2A 2E C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 144++D706 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 144++D709 3A 2D C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 144++D70C CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 144++D70F ED 53 2E C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 145++D713                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY    ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 145++D713             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 145++D713 3A 8E 7E    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 145++D716 32 82 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 145++D719             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 145++D719 2A 32 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 145++D71C 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 145++D71F             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 145++D71F 3A 34 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 145++D722 32 82 7E    >                        ld       (varP),a
 145++D725 3A 35 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 145++D728 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 145++D72A CD 0D 92    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 145++D72D ED 53 32 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 145++D731             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 145++D731 2A 34 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 145++D734 22 83 7F    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 145++D737 3A 33 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 145++D73A CD 0D 92    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 145++D73D ED 53 34 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 146++D741 3A 7C 7F     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 147++D744 16 00                                ld      d,0
 148++D746 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 149++D747 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)                ; hl = z position
 150++D74A 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 151++D74D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 152++D74E 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 153++D750 CD 12 90                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 154++D753 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnkzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 155++D756 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnkzsgn),a                ;
 156++D759 C9                                   ret
