1196+ D75A                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D75A
   2++D75A              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D75A              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D75A              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D75A              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D75A ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D75A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D75A ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D75A ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D75A ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D75A ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D75A ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D75A ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D75A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D75A ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D75A ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D75A ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D75A ~                                    ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
  19++D75A                                      ENDM
  20++D75A
  21++D75A              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D75A ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D75A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D75A ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D75A ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D75A ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D75A ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D75A ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D75A ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D75A ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D75A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D75A ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D75A ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D75A ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D75A ~                                    ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
  36++D75A                                      ENDM
  37++D75A
  38++D75A
  39++D75A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D75A              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D75A              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D75A 3A 4A C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnkRotZCounter)
  43++D75D FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D75F 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D761                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D761 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D762 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D764 CA A6 D7    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D767 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D768 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D76A 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D76B 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D76E 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D76F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D771 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D772 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D775 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D776 32 4A C0    >                        ld      (UBnkRotZCounter),a
  46++D779                                      ;ld      a,(UBnkRotZCounter)
  47++D779 21 30 C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D77C 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D77F 21 36 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D782 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D785 CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D788 21 32 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D78B 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D78E 21 38 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D791 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D794 CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D797 21 34 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D79A 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D79D 21 3A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D7A0 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D7A3 CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D7A6 3A 49 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnkRotXCounter)
  63++D7A9 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D7AB 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D7AD                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D7AD 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D7AE E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D7B0 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D7B1 C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D7B2 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D7B3 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D7B5 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D7B6 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D7B9 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D7BA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D7BC 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++D7BD 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++D7C0 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D7C1 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnkRotXCounter),a
  66++D7C4 21 30 C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++D7C7 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D7CA 21 2A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D7CD 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D7D0 CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D7D3 21 32 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D7D6 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D7D9 21 2C C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D7DC 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D7DF CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D7E2 21 34 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D7E5 22 67 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D7E8 21 2E C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D7EB 22 69 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D7EE CD F2 D7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D7F1 C9                                   ret
  82++D7F2
  83++D7F2
  84++D7F2
  85++D7F2              ; Roate around axis
  86++D7F2              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D7F2              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D7F2              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D7F2              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D7F2              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D7F2              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D7F2              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D7F2              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D7F2              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D7F2 2A 67 7E     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D7F5 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D7F6 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D7F7 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D7F8 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D7F9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D7FA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D7FC FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D7FE 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D7FF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D801 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D803 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D804 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D806 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D807 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D808 CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D80B              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D80B E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D80C 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D80D 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D810 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D811 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D814              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D814 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D817 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D818 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D819 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D81A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D81B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D81D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D81F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D820 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D822 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D823                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D823 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D825 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D827                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D827 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D829 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D82B                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D82B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D82D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D82F                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D82F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D831 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D833 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D836 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D838 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D83A B2                                   or      d
 136++D83B 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D83C              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D83C              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D83C              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D83C              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D83C E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D83D                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D83D              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D83D CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D840 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D841              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D841              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D841 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D844 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D845 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D846 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D847 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D848 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D849 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D84B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D84D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D84E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D850 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D852 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D853 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D855 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D856 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D857 CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D85A              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D85A E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D85B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D85C 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D85F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D860 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D862 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D865              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D865 2A 67 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D868              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D868 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D869 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D86A 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D86B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D86C E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D86E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D870 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D871 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D873 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D874                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D874 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D876 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D878                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D878 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D87A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D87C                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D87C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D87E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D880                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D880 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D882 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D884 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D887 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D889 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D88B B2                                   or      d
 191++D88C 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D88D              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D88D              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D88D              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D88D E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D88E              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D88E CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D891              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D891 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D892 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D895 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D896 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D897 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D898              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D898 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D899 2A 67 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D89C 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D89D 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D89E 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D89F C9                                   ret
 211++D8A0
 212++D8A0
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1197+ D8A0                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm

   8++D8A0              ;                        ld      (vertex),hl
   9++D8A0              ;                        ld      (vertex+2),a
  10++D8A0              ;                        ENDM
  11++D8A0
  12++D8A0
  13++D8A0              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  15++D8A3 FE 00                                cp      0
  16++D8A5 C8                                   ret     z
  17++D8A6 CB 27                                sla     a
  18++D8A8 CB 27                                sla     a
  19++D8AA FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  20++D8AC              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  20++D8AC 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  20++D8AD 2A 36 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  20++D8B0 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D8B1             >                        ClearSignBitA
  20++D8B1 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20++D8B3 57          >                        ld      d,a
  20++D8B4 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  20++D8B6 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D8B7             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  20++D8B7 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  20++D8B9 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  20++D8BA 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  20++D8BB 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  21++D8BD              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert UBnkxlo
  21++D8BD ED 5B 21 C0 >                        ld      de,(UBnkxlo+1)
  21++D8C1 3A 20 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkxlo)
  21++D8C4 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  21++D8C5 CD 6F 90    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  21++D8C8 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  21++D8C9 32 20 C0    >                        ld      (UBnkxlo),a
  21++D8CC ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld      (UBnkxlo+1),de
  22++D8D0              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  22++D8D0 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl

  22++D8D6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit

  22++D8DC E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit

  22++D8DF 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  22++D8E0 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0

  23++D8F1 ED 53 24 C0 >                        ld      (UBnkylo+1),de
  24++D8F5              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevZ

   1++D91B

   4++D91B 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   5++D91C              ; Initial tests look OK
   6++D91C              LL155:;
   7++D91C              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   8++D91C                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:
   9++D91C 3E 65        DrawLines:              ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
  10++D91E FD 6F                                ld    iyl,a							; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
  11++D920 3A EB C3                             ld	a,(UBnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  12++D923                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   						; No lines then bail out.
  12++D923 A7          >                        and     a
  12++D924 C8          >                        ret     z
  13++D925 FD 67                                ld	iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw
  14++D927 21 31 C2                             ld	hl,UBnkLineArray
  15++D92A 4E           .DrawLinesLoop:         ld    c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  16++D92B 23                                   inc   hl
  17++D92C 46                                   ld    b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  18++D92D 23                                   inc   hl
  19++D92E 5E                                   ld    e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1
  20++D92F 23                                   inc   hl
  21++D930 56                                   ld    d,(hl)                          ; de = point2 Y,X
  22++D931 23                                   inc   hl

  66++D996 78           CheckHorz:              ld      a,b

  74++D9A6 CD 46 EF     .ItsVertical:           call    l2_drawVertClip
  75++D9A9 C3 AF D9                             jp      DrawnLine
  76++D9AC CD 9F F6     LateLine:               call    l2_draw_elite_line; l2_draw_diagonal ** NOTE DOESNT DO HORZ OR VERT
  77++D9AF FD E1 D1 C1  DrawnLine:              pop     hl,,bc,,de,,iy
  77++D9B3 E1
  78++D9B4 FD E1 E1     LateNoLineToDraw:       pop   hl,,iy
  79++D9B7 FD 25                                dec   iyh
  80++D9B9 20 A4                                jr	nz, LateDrawLinesLoop
  81++D9BB C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
# file closed: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
1199+ D9BC              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1200+ D9BC
1201+ D9BC              ; DIot seem to lawyas have Y = 0???
1202+ D9BC              ProcessDot:            ; break
1203+ D9BC CD C9 CB                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1204+ D9BF CD 11 7B                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1205+ D9C2 CD 83 CE                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1206+ D9C5 CD 50 CD                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1207+ D9C8 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
1208+ D9CB 22 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),hl
1209+ D9CE 22 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),hl
1210+ D9D1 22 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),hl
1211+ D9D4 AF                                   xor     a
1212+ D9D5 CD 73 7A                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1213+ D9D8 CD F4 CB                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1214+ D9DB CD 71 CC                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1215+ D9DE FD 21 F1 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1216+ D9E2 CD 79 D4                             call    ProjectNodeToEye

1221+ D9E6 3A 00 C4     PlotAllNodes:           ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1222+ D9E9 4F           .GetActualVertexCount:  ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1223+ D9EA 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1224+ D9EB 16 06                                ld      d,6
1225+ D9ED CD 6D 97                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1226+ D9F0 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1227+ D9F1 FD 21 F1 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1228+ D9F5 FD 5E 00     .PlotLoop:              ld      e,(iy)
1229+ D9F8 FD 56 01                             ld      d,(iy+1)
1230+ D9FB FD 6E 02                             ld      l,(iy+2)
1231+ D9FE FD 66 03                             ld      h,(iy+3)
1232+ DA01 C5 FD E5                             push    bc,,iy
1233+ DA04 CD 15 DA                             call    PlotAtDEHL
1234+ DA07 FD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,iy
1235+ DA0A FD 23                                inc     iy
1236+ DA0C FD 23                                inc     iy
1237+ DA0E FD 23                                inc     iy
1238+ DA10 FD 23                                inc     iy
1239+ DA12 10 E1                                djnz    .PlotLoop
1240+ DA14 C9                                   ret
1241+ DA15
1242+ DA15 7A           PlotAtDEHL:             ld      a,d
1243+ DA16 A7                                   and     a
1244+ DA17 C0                                   ret     nz
1245+ DA18 7C                                   ld      a,h
1246+ DA19 A7                                   and     a
1247+ DA1A C0                                   ret     nz
1248+ DA1B 7D                                   ld      a,l
1249+ DA1C E6 80                                and     $80
1250+ DA1E C0                                   ret     nz
1251+ DA1F                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1251+ DA1F ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2

1256+ DA2A C9                                   ret
1257+ DA2B
1258+ DA2B
1259+ DA2B              ; .....................................................
1260+ DA2B              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1261+ DA2B              ; for each node:
1262+ DA2B              ;     see if node >
1263+ DA2B 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1264+ DA2C 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1265+ DA2E 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1266+ DA30 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1267+ DA31              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1267+ DA31 AF          >                        xor a
1268+ DA32 32 EB C3                             ld      (UBnkLineArrayLen),a
1269+ DA35 CD C9 CB                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1270+ DA38 CD 11 7B                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1271+ DA3B CD 83 CE                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1272+ DA3E CD 50 CD                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1273+ DA41 21 12 C4                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1274+ DA44 3A 00 C4                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1275+ DA47 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1276+ DA48 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1277+ DA49 16 06                                ld      d,6
1278+ DA4B CD 6D 97                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1279+ DA4E 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1280+ DA4F FD 21 F1 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1281+ DA53              LL48:
1282+ DA53 C5           PointLoop:              push    bc                                  ; save counters
1283+ DA54 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1284+ DA55 FD E5                                push    iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1285+ DA57 78                                   ld      a,b
1286+ DA58                                      ;break
1287+ DA58 CD FA D3                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1288+ DA5B 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1289+ DA5E CD 73 7A                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1290+ DA61 CD F4 CB                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1291+ DA64 CD 71 CC                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1292+ DA67 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1293+ DA69 CD 79 D4                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1294+ DA6C                 ; ld      hl,UBnkLineArrayLen
1295+ DA6C                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1296+ DA6C FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push    iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1297+ DA6E E1                                   pop     hl
1298+ DA6F 3E 04                                ld      a,4
1299+ DA71 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1300+ DA73 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1301+ DA74 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
1302+ DA76 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1303+ DA77 3E 06                                ld      a,6
1304+ DA79 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1305+ DA7B C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back
1306+ DA7C 10 D5                                djnz    PointLoop
1307+ DA7E              ; ......................................................
1308+ DA7E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1308+ DA7E B7          >                        or a
1309+ DA7F C9                                   ret
1310+ DA80              ; ...........................................................
1311+ DA80 CD 7E D0     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1312+ DA83 3A 55 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1313+ DA86 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1314+ DA88 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1315+ DA89                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1315+ DA89 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1315+ DA8B C2 CC DA    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1316+ DA8E              ;............................................................
1317+ DA8E              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1317+ DA8E CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1317+ DA90 C8          >                        ret		z
1318+ DA91                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1318+ DA91 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1318+ DA93 CA BA DA    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1319+ DA96              ;............................................................
1320+ DA96 CD BC D9     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1321+ DA99                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1321+ DA99 21 55 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1321+ DA9C CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1322+ DA9E ED 4B F1 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1323+ DAA2 ED 5B F3 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1324+ DAA6 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1325+ DAA7 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1326+ DAA8 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1327+ DAA9 7B                                   ld      a,e
1328+ DAAA E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1329+ DAAC C0                                   ret     nz
1330+ DAAD 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1331+ DAAE 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1332+ DAB0 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1333+ DAB2                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1333+ DAB2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1334+ DAB6 CD F8 E2                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1335+ DAB9 C9                                   ret
1336+ DABA              ;............................................................
1337+ DABA CD 31 DA     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1338+ DABD                                     ; break
1339+ DABD                                  IFDEF PLOTPOINTSONLY
1340+ DABD ~                                    ld      a,$F6
1341+ DABD ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1342+ DABD ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1343+ DABD                                  ELSE
1344+ DABD 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
1345+ DABF 32 B5 E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1346+ DAC2 CD C5 D0                             call    CullV2
1347+ DAC5 CD 74 DC                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
1348+ DAC8 CD 48 D9                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
1349+ DACB                                  ENDIF
1350+ DACB                                  IFDEF OVERLAYNODES
1351+ DACB ~                                    ld      a,$CF
1352+ DACB ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1353+ DACB ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1354+ DACB                                  ENDIF
1355+ DACB                                  IFDEF FLIPBUFFERSTEST
1356+ DACB ~                                    DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Enabled"
1357+ DACB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1358+ DACB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1359+ DACB                                  ELSE
1360+ DACB                                      DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Disabled"
1361+ DACB                                  ENDIF
1362+ DACB C9                                   ret
1363+ DACC              ;............................................................
1364+ DACC CD 31 DA     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1365+ DACF                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1365+ DACF 21 55 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1365+ DAD2 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1366+ DAD4 3A 60 C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnkCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1367+ DAD7 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1368+ DAD9 DA 9B DB                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1369+ DADC 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnkCloudCounter),a        ; .
1370+ DADF              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1370+ DADF 3A 55 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1370+ DAE2 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1370+ DAE4 C8          >                        ret		z
1371+ DAE5              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1371+ DAE5 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1371+ DAE7 C2 96 DA    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1372+ DAEA 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnkzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1373+ DAED 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1374+ DAEE                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1374+ DAEE FE 20       >                        cp      32
1374+ DAF0 DA F8 DA    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1375+ DAF3 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1376+ DAF5 C3 03 DB                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1377+ DAF8              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1377+ DAF8 CB 25       >			   sla l
1377+ DAFA CB 14       >			   rl  h
1378+ DAFC                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1378+ DAFC CB 25       >			   sla l
1378+ DAFE CB 14       >			   rl  h
1379+ DB00                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1379+ DB00 37          >                        scf
1380+ DB01 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1381+ DB03 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1382+ DB05 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1383+ DB06 3A 60 C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnkCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1384+ DB09                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1385+ DB09 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1386+ DB09 ~                                    ld      b,h
1387+ DB09 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1388+ DB09 ~                                    ld      d,a
1389+ DB09 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1390+ DB09                      ELSE
1391+ DB09 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1392+ DB0A 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1393+ DB0C CD B1 96                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1394+ DB0F 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1395+ DB10                      ENDIF
1396+ DB10                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1396+ DB10 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1396+ DB12 DA 1A DB    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1397+ DB15 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1398+ DB17 C3 26 DB                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1399+ DB1A              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1399+ DB1A CB 23       >			   sla e
1399+ DB1C CB 12       >			   rl  d
1400+ DB1E                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1400+ DB1E CB 23       >			   sla e
1400+ DB20 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1401+ DB22                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1401+ DB22 CB 23       >			   sla e
1401+ DB24 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1402+ DB26 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1403+ DB27 32 61 C0                             ld      (UBnkCloudRadius),a         ; .
1404+ DB2A DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1405+ DB2C 3A 60 C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnkCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1406+ DB2F ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1407+ DB31 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1408+ DB33 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1409+ DB35 21 A7 DB                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1410+ DB38 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1411+ DB3A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1412+ DB3B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1413+ DB3D 3A 60 C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnkCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1414+ DB40                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1414+ DB40 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1414+ DB42 CA 47 DB    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1414+ DB45 ED 44       >                        neg
1414+ DB47             >.DoneABSa:
1415+ DB47 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1416+ DB49 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1417+ DB4B CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1418+ DB4D F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1419+ DB4F DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1420+ DB51 3A FF C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1421+ DB54 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1422+ DB55 21 F1 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1423+ DB58 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1424+ DB5A DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1425+ DB5C 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1426+ DB5D 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1427+ DB5E 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1428+ DB5F 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1429+ DB60 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1430+ DB61 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1431+ DB62 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1432+ DB63 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1433+ DB65 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1434+ DB67                                          ;break
1435+ DB67 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1436+ DB69 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1437+ DB6A DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1438+ DB6C CD AF DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1439+ DB6F 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1440+ DB70                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1440+ DB70 A7          >                        and     a
1440+ DB71 C2 8C DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1441+ DB74 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1442+ DB75 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1443+ DB76 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1444+ DB77 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1445+ DB78 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1446+ DB7A CD AF DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1447+ DB7D D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1448+ DB7E 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1449+ DB7F                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1449+ DB7F A7          >                        and     a
1449+ DB80 C2 8C DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1450+ DB83 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1451+ DB84 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1452+ DB85                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1452+ DB85 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1453+ DB89 CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1454+ DB8C C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1455+ DB8E FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1456+ DB90 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1457+ DB92 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1458+ DB94 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1459+ DB96 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1460+ DB98 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1461+ DB9A C9                                   ret
1462+ DB9B              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1463+ DB9B 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1464+ DB9E CD 4C 84                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1465+ DBA1                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1465+ DBA1 21 55 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1465+ DBA4 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1466+ DBA6 C9                                   ret
1467+ DBA7
1468+ DBA7
1469+ DBA7 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1469+ DBAB 6C 48 24 25
1470+ DBAF                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1471+ DBAF
1472+ DBAF              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1473+ DBAF              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1474+ DBAF              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1475+ DBAF              ; uses registers hl, de
1476+ DBAF E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1477+ DBB0 CD 2F 85                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1478+ DBB3 E1                                   pop     hl
1479+ DBB4 17                                   rla                                 ;
1480+ DBB5 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1481+ DBB7 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1482+ DBB8 ED 30                                mul
1483+ DBBA 5A                                   ld  e,d
1484+ DBBB 16 00                                ld  d,0
1485+ DBBD                                      ClearCarryFlag
1485+ DBBD B7          >                        or a
1486+ DBBE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1487+ DBC0 C9                                   ret
1488+ DBC1 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1489+ DBC2 ED 30                                mul
1490+ DBC4 5A                                   ld  e,d
1491+ DBC5 16 00                                ld  d,0
1492+ DBC7                                      ClearCarryFlag
1492+ DBC7 B7          >                        or a
1493+ DBC8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1494+ DBCA C9                                   ret
1495+ DBCB
1496+ DBCB              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1497+ DBCB                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1498+ DBCB C9                                   ret
1499+ DBCC
1500+ DBCC              ; ......................................................
1501+ DBCC 3A 0E C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1502+ DBCF FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1503+ DBD1 C8                                   ret     z
1504+ DBD2 3A 55 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1505+ DBD5 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1506+ DBD7 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1507+ DBD9 32 55 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1508+ DBDC                                      SetMemToN   UBnkexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1508+ DBDC 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1508+ DBDE 32 52 C0    >                        ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a
1509+ DBE1                                      ldWriteZero UBnkEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1509+ DBE1 AF          >                        xor      a
1509+ DBE2 32 59 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkEnergy),a
1510+ DBE5 32 61 C0                             ld      (UBnkCloudRadius),a
1511+ DBE8 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1512+ DBEA 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnkCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1513+ DBED                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1514+ DBED C9                                   ret
1515+ DBEE
1516+ DBEE              ; in a = damage
1517+ DBEE 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1518+ DBEF 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1519+ DBF2 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1520+ DBF4 C8                                   ret     z
1521+ DBF5 3A 59 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1522+ DBF8                                      ClearCarryFlag
1522+ DBF8 B7          >                        or a
1523+ DBF9 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1524+ DBFA D2 01 DC     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1525+ DBFD CD CC DB                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1526+ DC00 C9                                   ret
1527+ DC01 32 59 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnkEnergy),a
1528+ DC04 C9                                   ret
1529+ DC05              ; need recovery for energy too
1530+ DC05              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1531+ DC05
1532+ DC05              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1533+ DC05              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1534+ DC05              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1535+ DC05              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1536+ DC05              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1537+ DC05              ;
1538+ DC05              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1539+ DC05              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1540+ DC05              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1541+ DC05              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1542+ DC05              AddLaserBeamLine:
1543+ DC05              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1544+ DC05              GetGunVertexNode:
1545+ DC05 3A FD C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1546+ DC08 21 F1 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1547+ DC0B ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1548+ DC0D FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1549+ DC10              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1550+ DC10 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1551+ DC11 23                   inc         hl
1552+ DC12 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1553+ DC13 23                   inc         hl
1554+ DC14 ED 43 A7 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1555+ DC18 0C                   inc         c
1556+ DC19 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1557+ DC1A 04                   inc         b
1558+ DC1B C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1559+ DC1C              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1560+ DC1C 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1561+ DC1D 23                   inc         hl
1562+ DC1E 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1563+ DC1F 23                   inc         hl
1564+ DC20 ED 43 A9 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1565+ DC24              SetX2PointToXX15:
1566+ DC24 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1567+ DC27 ED 43 AB C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1568+ DC2B 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnkzlo)
1569+ DC2E 4F                   ld          c,a
1570+ DC2F              SetY2PointToXX15:
1571+ DC2F ED 43 AD C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1572+ DC33 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnkxsgn)
1573+ DC36                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1573+ DC36 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1573+ DC38 CA 40 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1574+ DC3B              LL74DecX2:
1575+ DC3B 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1576+ DC3D 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1577+ DC40              LL74SkipDec:
1578+ DC40 CD C8 CB             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1579+ DC43 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1580+ DC45              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1581+ DC45              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1582+ DC45 2A 85 7F             ld          hl,(varU16)
1583+ DC48 3A A7 C0             ld          a,(UBnkx1Lo)
1584+ DC4B 77                   ld          (hl),a
1585+ DC4C 23                   inc         hl
1586+ DC4D 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UBnky1Lo)
1587+ DC50 77                   ld          (hl),a
1588+ DC51 23                   inc         hl
1589+ DC52 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1590+ DC55 77                   ld          (hl),a
1591+ DC56 23                   inc         hl
1592+ DC57 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnky2Lo)
1593+ DC5A 77                   ld          (hl),a
1594+ DC5B FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1595+ DC5D 23                   inc         hl
1596+ DC5E FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1597+ DC60 22 85 7F             ld          (varU16),hl
1598+ DC63 C9                   ret
1599+ DC64
1600+ DC64                  DISPLAY "Tracing 7", $
1601+ DC64
1602+ DC64                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

   5++DC64                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DC64              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC64              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC64 21 F1 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC67 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC69 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC6A ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   7++DC6C ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   8++DC6E ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DC70 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DC72 C9                                   ret
  11++DC73

  10++DC73                      DISPLAY "Tracing 10", $
  11++DC73
  12++DC73                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DC73              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC73              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DC73 ~                                ld          hl,UBnkFaceVisArray
   4++DC73 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DC73 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DC73                                  ENDM
   7++DC73
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DC73                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DC73
  15++DC73              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DC73              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DC73               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DC73 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DC74
  20++DC74              PrepLines:
  21++DC74              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DC74
  23++DC74              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DC74              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DC74              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DC74              ;        or          8
  27++DC74              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DC74              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DC74              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DC74              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DC74              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DC74              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DC74              ;
  34++DC74              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DC74
  36++DC74              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DC74                      ;break
  38++DC74                      ldWriteZero UBnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DC74 AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DC75 32 EB C3    >                        ld       (UBnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DC78 32 EC C3             ld          (UBnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UBnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DC7B 32 73 DC             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DC7E 3A 01 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DC81 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DC83 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DC86 21 31 C2             ld          hl,UBnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DC89 22 85 7F             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DC8C                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DC8C 3A 01 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DC8F 32 89 7F    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DC92 3A 52 C0             ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DC95                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DC95 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DC97 CA 9F DC    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DC9A E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DC9C 32 52 C0             ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DC9F              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DC9F              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DC9F              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DC9F              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DC9F              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DC9F 21 02 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DCA2                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DCA2 22 88 7E             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DCA5 3A FC C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DCA8 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DCA9              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DCA9              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DCA9 2A 88 7E             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DCAC E5                   push        hl
  65++DCAD FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DCAF                     ; DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  67++DCAF                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  68++DCAF ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  69++DCAF                      ENDIF
  70++DCAF 3A 73 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  71++DCB2 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  72++DCB3              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  73++DCB3 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  74++DCB6                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  74++DCB6 BA          >                        cp      d
  74++DCB7 DA 12 DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  75++DCBA              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  76++DCBA              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  77++DCBA              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  78++DCBA FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  79++DCBD 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  80++DCBE E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  81++DCC0                      GetFaceAtA
  81++DCC0 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UBnkFaceVisArray
  81++DCC3 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  81++DCC5 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  82++DCC6              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  83++DCC6                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  83++DCC6 A7          >                        and     a
  83++DCC7 C2 DB DC    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  84++DCCA              IsFace2Visibile:
  85++DCCA 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  86++DCCB ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  87++DCCD E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  88++DCCF E5                   push        hl
  89++DCD0                      GetFaceAtA
  89++DCD0 21 D3 C0    >                    ld          hl,UBnkFaceVisArray
  89++DCD3 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  89++DCD5 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  90++DCD6 E1                   pop         hl
  91++DCD7                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  91++DCD7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  91++DCD8 CA 12 DD    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  92++DCDB              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  93++DCDB              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  94++DCDB              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  95++DCDB FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  96++DCDE 11 A7 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  97++DCE1 CD 64 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  98++DCE4 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  99++DCE7 11 AB C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
 100++DCEA CD 64 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 101++DCED
 102++DCED                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 103++DCED ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 104++DCED ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 105++DCED ~                        nop
 106++DCED ~                        nop
 107++DCED ~                        ;break
 108++DCED ~            .SkipBreak1:
 109++DCED ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 110++DCED ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 111++DCED ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 112++DCED ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 113++DCED                      ENDIF
 114++DCED              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 115++DCED                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 116++DCED ED 5B 85 7F                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 117++DCF1 21 A7 C0                     ld          hl,UBnkPreClipX1
 118++DCF4                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DCF4 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCF6 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCF8 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DCFA ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DCFC                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 119++DCFC ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DCFE ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD00 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DD02 ED A0       >                        ldi
 120++DD04 ED 53 85 7F                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 121++DD08                      ELSE
 122++DD08 ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 123++DD08 ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 124++DD08 ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 125++DD08 ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 126++DD08                      ENDIF
 127++DD08 21 EB C3             ld          hl,UBnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 128++DD0B 34                   inc         (hl)
 129++DD0C 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 130++DD0D                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 130++DD0D FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 130++DD0F D2 28 DD    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 131++DD12              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 132++DD12              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 133++DD12              LL78:
 134++DD12 2A 88 7E             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 135++DD15 3E 04                ld          a,4
 136++DD17 ED 31                add         hl,a
 137++DD19 22 88 7E             ld          (varV),hl
 138++DD1C 21 73 DC             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 139++DD1F 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 140++DD20 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 141++DD21                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 141++DD21 21 89 7F    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 141++DD24 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 141++DD25 C2 A9 DC    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 142++DD28              CompletedLineGeneration:
 143++DD28              LL81:
 144++DD28              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 145++DD28 3A EB C3             ld          a,(UBnkLineArrayLen)                ; UBnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 146++DD2B CB 27                sla         a
 147++DD2D CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 148++DD2F                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 149++DD2F CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 150++DD31                      ENDIF
 151++DD31 32 EC C3             ld          (UBnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UBnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 152++DD34              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 153++DD34 C9                   ret
 154++DD35
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
