 848+ C811 CD 99 C7                             call    SunCalculateRadius
 849+ C814              ; .........................................................................................................................
 850+ C814 2A 3F C6     .CheckIfSunOnScreen:    ld      hl,(SunScrnX)               ; get x pixel position
 851+ C817 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh,0                       ; iyh holds draw status, 0= OK
 852+ C81A 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; e still holds radius
 853+ C81C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 854+ C81D                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckXNegative
 854+ C81D 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 854+ C81E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 854+ C820 C2 36 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckXNegative
 855+ C823 7C           .CheckXPositive:        ld      a,h
 856+ C824                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero its definitly on screen
 856+ C824 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 856+ C825 CA 3F C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 857+ C828 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 858+ C82A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 858+ C82A B7          >                        or a
 859+ C82B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 860+ C82D FA 3F C8                             jp      m   ,.XOnScreen             ; if result was negative then it spans screen
 861+ C830 7C                                   ld      a,h
 862+ C831                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero then its partially on screen at least
 862+ C831 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 862+ C832 CA 3F C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 863+ C835 C9                                   ret                                 ; None of the X coordinates are on screen
 864+ C836 16 00        .CheckXNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 865+ C838                                      ClearCarryFlag
 865+ C838 B7          >                        or a
 866+ C839 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 867+ C83B F2 3F C8                             jp      p,.XOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 868+ C83E C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 869+ C83F              ; .........................................................................................................................
 870+ C83F 2A 41 C6     .XOnScreen:             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now Check Y coordinate
 871+ C842                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckYNegative
 871+ C842 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 871+ C843 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 871+ C845 C2 66 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckYNegative
 872+ C848 7C           .CheckYPositive:        ld      a,h
 873+ C849                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .PosYCheck2
 873+ C849 A7          >                        and     a
 873+ C84A C2 53 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.PosYCheck2
 874+ C84D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 875+ C84E E6 80                                and     %10000000
 876+ C850 CA 6F C8                             jp      z,YOnScreen                ; at least 1 row is on screen as > 128
 877+ C853 16 00        .PosYCheck2:            ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 878+ C855                                      ClearCarryFlag
 878+ C855 B7          >                        or a
 879+ C856 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 880+ C858 FA 6F C8                             jp      m,YOnScreen                ; so if its -ve then it spans screen
 881+ C85B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; if h > 0 then off screen so did not span
 882+ C85C                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 882+ C85C A7          >                        and     a
 882+ C85D C0          >                        ret     nz
 883+ C85E 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; if l > 128 then off screen so did not span
 884+ C85F E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; .
 885+ C861                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 885+ C861 A7          >                        and     a
 885+ C862 C0          >                        ret     nz
 886+ C863 C3 6F C8                             jp      YOnScreen                  ; so Y at least spans
 887+ C866 16 00        .CheckYNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 888+ C868                                      ClearCarryFlag
 888+ C868 B7          >                        or a
 889+ C869 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 890+ C86B F2 6F C8                             jp      p,YOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 891+ C86E C9                                   ret                                 ; else never gets above 0 so return
 892+ C86F              ; .........................................................................................................................
 893+ C86F 21 91 C0     YOnScreen:             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; we load start and end as 0
 894+ C872 11 00 01                             ld		de, SunLineArraySize        ; just if we get a 0,0 genuine we will not plot it
 895+ C875 3E 00                                ld		a,0
 896+ C877 CD 13 7E                             call	memfill_dma
 897+ C87A              ; .........................................................................................................................
 898+ C87A 11 00 00     .SetRaggedEdgeMax:      ld      de,0
 899+ C87D 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; get readius
 900+ C880 FE 60                                cp      96                          ; if > 96 then roll carry flag into e
 901+ C882                                      FlipCarryFlag
 901+ C882 3F          >                        ccf
 902+ C883 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; if > 40 then roll carry flag into e
 903+ C885 FE 28                                cp      40
 904+ C887                                      FlipCarryFlag
 904+ C887 3F          >                        ccf
 905+ C888 CB 13                                rl      e
 906+ C88A FE 10                                cp      16                          ; if > 16 then roll carry flag into e
 907+ C88C                                      FlipCarryFlag
 907+ C88C 3F          >                        ccf
 908+ C88D CB 13                                rl     e
 909+ C88F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; a = ragged size from %00000111 to %00000000
 910+ C890 32 3C C6                             ld      (RaggedSize),a
 911+ C893              ; .........................................................................................................................
 912+ C893 21 91 C0     .SkipSetK:              ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; prep line array details ready for filling
 913+ C896 22 91 C1                             ld      (LineArrayPtr),hl
 914+ C899 AF                                   xor     a
 915+ C89A 32 3B C6                             ld      (LineCount),a
 916+ C89D              ; .........................................................................................................................
 917+ C89D 2A 41 C6     .GetMinY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now calculate start Y position
 918+ C8A0 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
 919+ C8A3 5F                                   ld      e,a
 920+ C8A4 16 00                                ld      d,0
 921+ C8A6                                      ClearCarryFlag
 921+ C8A6 B7          >                        or a
 922+ C8A7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 923+ C8A9 F2 AF C8                             jp      p,.DoneMinY
 924+ C8AC 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; if its negative then we start with 0 as it can only go up screen after radius
 925+ C8AF              .DoneMinY:              ReturnIfRegNotZero h                ; if h > 0 then off the screen
 925+ C8AF 7C          >                        ld      a, h
 925+ C8B0 A7          >                        and     a
 925+ C8B1 C0          >                        ret     nz
 926+ C8B2 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; check if l > 127
 927+ C8B3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 928+ C8B5 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if bit is set then > 128
 929+ C8B6 7D           .SetMinY:               ld      a,l
 930+ C8B7 32 3D C6                             ld      (MinYOffset),a              ; so now we have Y top of screen
 931+ C8BA 2A 41 C6     .GetMaxY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; get hl = Y + radius, note if we got here then this can never be a negative result but can go from -ve hl to +ve result
 932+ C8BD 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; hl = hl + radius
 933+ C8C0 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; .
 934+ C8C2 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 935+ C8C3                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; .
 935+ C8C3 B7          >                        or a
 936+ C8C4 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; .
 937+ C8C6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 938+ C8C7 A7                                   and     a
 939+ C8C8 28 06                                jr      z,.YHiOK
 940+ C8CA 21 7F 00     .YHiGTE127:             ld      hl,127
 941+ C8CD C3 D9 C8                             jp      .SetMaxY
 942+ C8D0 7D           .YHiOK:                 ld      a,l                         ; clamp at 127
 943+ C8D1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 944+ C8D3 CA D9 C8                             jp      z,.SetMaxY
 945+ C8D6 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127
 946+ C8D9 7D           .SetMaxY                ld      a,l
 947+ C8DA 32 3E C6                             ld      (MaxYOffSet),a              ; so now we have min and max Y coordinates and SunScrnX & Y holds center
 948+ C8DD CD E4 C8                             call    SunDrawCircle
 949+ C8E0 CD D9 C1                             call    SunDraw
 950+ C8E3 C9                                   ret
 951+ C8E4                                      ; b8 04 00 02 00 00 60 01 00 gives a 0.5 so we have the cal wrong as its +-1 so should be * result of divide by 128
 952+ C8E4              ;.. Now we caluclate the circle of the star
 953+ C8E4              ;.. its from MinY down the screen to MaxY center ProjX,ProjY.
 954+ C8E4              ;.. We can use the circle draw logic gtom Bressenham's algorithm
 955+ C8E4              ; so now there are the following conditions to consider
 956+ C8E4              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius <= ABS (Y center)             => Don't draw
 957+ C8E4              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius > ABS (Y center)+1            => Draw bottom half only
 958+ C8E4              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius <= y center - 127             => Don't draw
 959+ C8E4              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius > y center - 127              => Draw top half only
 960+ C8E4              ; y min >= 0  y center > y min     we don't need to worry about radius  => Draw both halves
 961+ C8E4              ; x center + radius < 0                                                 => Don't draw
 962+ C8E4              ; x center - radius > 255                                               => Don't draw
 963+ C8E4              ; we won't consider x more here as the driver is the y coordinate but we will check if x is vaiable
 964+ C8E4              ; x point = max (x point, 0)   on left
 965+ C8E4              ; x point = min (x point, 255) on right
 966+ C8E4
 967+ C8E4              SetIYPlusOffset:        MACRO   reg
 968+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
 969+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 970+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 971+ C8E4 ~                                    add     hl,a
 972+ C8E4 ~                                    add     hl,a
 973+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl
 974+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     iy
 975+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl
 976+ C8E4                                      ENDM
 977+ C8E4
 978+ C8E4              SetIYMinusOffset:       MACRO   reg
 979+ C8E4 ~                                    push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
 980+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 981+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 982+ C8E4 ~                                    add     a,a
 983+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      e,a
 984+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      d,0
 985+ C8E4 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 986+ C8E4 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 987+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl
 988+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     iy
 989+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 990+ C8E4                                      ENDM
 991+ C8E4
 992+ C8E4
 993+ C8E4              ;;;-SunDrawCircle:          ld      a,(SunRadius)
 994+ C8E4              ;;;-.CheckRadius:           ReturnIfAIsZero                         ; elimiate zero or single pixel
 995+ C8E4              ;;;-                        JumpIfAEqNusng  1, SunCircleSinglePixel
 996+ C8E4              ;;;-                       ; JumpIfAGTENusng 127, SunFullScreen      ; if its covering whole then just make it yellow
 997+ C8E4              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreX2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnX                   ; convert 16 bit signed to 2's compliment
 998+ C8E4              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreY2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnY                   ; .
 999+ C8E4              ;;;-.BoundsCheck            ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1000+ C8E4              ;;;-                        push    hl
1001+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
1002+ C8E4              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
1003+ C8E4              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
1004+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
1005+ C8E4              ;;;-                        pop     hl
1006+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
1007+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
1008+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag
1009+ C8E4              ;;;-                        sbc     hl,de
1010+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
1011+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng  1                     ; really shoudl be signed TODO
1012+ C8E4              ;;;-
1013+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1014+ C8E4              ;;;-                        push    hl
1015+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
1016+ C8E4              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
1017+ C8E4              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
1018+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
1019+ C8E4              ;;;-                        pop     hl
1020+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
1021+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
1022+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag
1023+ C8E4              ;;;-                        sbc     hl,de
1024+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
1025+ C8E4              ;;;-
1026+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng 1                      ; really shoudl be signed TODO
1027+ C8E4              SunDrawCircle
1028+ C8E4                                      ; ** BNOTE Ptuichj abnd roll has a bug as piitch increases z axis value
1029+ C8E4              .PrepCircleData:       ; ld      ixl,0
1030+ C8E4                                     ; ld		(.Plot1+1),bc			        ; save origin into DE reg in code
1031+ C8E4 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
1032+ C8E7 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = radius
1033+ C8E9 DD 2E 00                             ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = delta (y)
1034+ C8EC 26 00        .calcd:	                ld		h,0                             ; de = radius * 2
1035+ C8EE 6F                                   ld		l,a                             ; .
1036+ C8EF 29                                   add		hl,hl							; .
1037+ C8F0 EB                                   ex		de,hl							; .
1038+ C8F1 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
1039+ C8F4 A7                                   and		a                               ; .
1040+ C8F5 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; .
1041+ C8F7 44                                   ld		b,h                             ; bc = 3 - (r * 2) : d = 3 - 2r
1042+ C8F8 4D                                   ld		c,l								; .
1043+ C8F9 21 01 00     .calcdelta:             ld		hl,1                            ; set hl to 1
1044+ C8FC 16 00                                ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl
1045+ C8FE DD 5D                                ld		e,ixl                           ;
1046+ C900                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1046+ C900 B7          >                        or a
1047+ C901 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - ixl
1048+ C903 11 01 00     .Setde1:                ld		de,1                            ; del = 1
1049+ C906 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:            ld		a,ixh                           ; if x = y then exit
1050+ C908 DD BD                                cp		ixl                             ;
1051+ C90A D8                                   ret		c                               ;
1052+ C90B D9           .ProcessLoop:	        exx                                     ; save out registers
1053+ C90C              ; Process CY+Y CX+X & CY+Y CX-X..................................
1054+ C90C 2A 41 C6     .Plot1:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1055+ C90F DD 7C        .Get1YRow:              ld      a,ixh
1056+ C911 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y (note is add hl ,a usginedf only??)
1057+ C913              .Check1YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTopPixelPair
1057+ C913 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1057+ C914 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1057+ C915 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1057+ C917 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1057+ C918 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1057+ C91A 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ;
1058+ C91C              .Write1YCoord:          SetIYPlusOffset ixh                     ; IY = IY + ixh
1058+ C91C E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1058+ C91F E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1058+ C920 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1058+ C922 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C924 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C926 E5          >                        push    hl
1058+ C927 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1058+ C929 E1          >                        pop     hl
1059+ C92A                                      IYEquRowN l                             ; IY = SBnkLineArray + (2 * l) - set up iy as target address
1059+ C92A 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1059+ C92B 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1059+ C92E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C930 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C932 E5          >                        push    hl
1059+ C933 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1060+ C935 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1061+ C937 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1062+ C93A C3 3D C9                             jp      .Plot2
1063+ C93D              .NoTopPixelPair:        ;break
1064+ C93D              ; Process CY-Y CX+X & CY-Y CX-X..................................
1065+ C93D 2A 41 C6     .Plot2:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1066+ C940 16 00        .Get2YRow:              ld      d,0
1067+ C942 DD 5C                                ld      e,ixh
1068+ C944                                      ClearCarryFlag
1068+ C944 B7          >                        or a
1069+ C945 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1070+ C947              .Check2YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottomPixelPair
1070+ C947 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1070+ C948 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1070+ C949 20 2B       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1070+ C94B 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1070+ C94C E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1070+ C94E 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ;
1071+ C950                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixh
1071+ C950 D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1071+ C954 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1071+ C955 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1071+ C957 87          >                        add     a,a
1071+ C958 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1071+ C959 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1071+ C95B             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1071+ C95B B7          >                        or a
1071+ C95C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1071+ C95E E5          >                        push    hl
1071+ C95F FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1071+ C961 E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1072+ C963              .Write2YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1072+ C963 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1072+ C964 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1072+ C967 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C969 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C96B E5          >                        push    hl
1072+ C96C FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1073+ C96E DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1074+ C970 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1075+ C973 C3 76 C9                             jp      .Plot3
1076+ C976              .NoBottomPixelPair:     ;break
1077+ C976              ; Process CY+X CX+Y & CY+X CX-Y..................................
1078+ C976 2A 41 C6     .Plot3:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1079+ C979 DD 7D        .Get3YRow:              ld      a,ixl
1080+ C97B ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y
1081+ C97D              .Check3YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTop3PixelPair
1081+ C97D 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1081+ C97E A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1081+ C97F 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1081+ C981 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1081+ C982 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1081+ C984 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ;
1082+ C986                                      SetIYPlusOffset ixl
1082+ C986 E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1082+ C989 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1082+ C98A DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl
1082+ C98C ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C98E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C990 E5          >                        push    hl
1082+ C991 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1082+ C993 E1          >                        pop     hl
1083+ C994              .Write3YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1083+ C994 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1083+ C995 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1083+ C998 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1083+ C99A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1083+ C99C E5          >                        push    hl
1083+ C99D FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1084+ C99F DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1085+ C9A1 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1086+ C9A4 C3 A7 C9                             jp      .Plot4
1087+ C9A7              .NoTop3PixelPair:       ;break
1088+ C9A7              ; Process CY-X CX+Y & CY-X CX-Y..................................
1089+ C9A7 2A 41 C6     .Plot4:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1090+ C9AA 16 00        .Get4YRow:              ld      d,0
1091+ C9AC DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl
1092+ C9AE                                      ClearCarryFlag
1092+ C9AE B7          >                        or a
1093+ C9AF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1094+ C9B1              .Check4YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottom4PixelPair
1094+ C9B1 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1094+ C9B2 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1094+ C9B3 20 28       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1094+ C9B5 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1094+ C9B6 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1094+ C9B8 20 23       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ;
1095+ C9BA                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixl
1095+ C9BA D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1095+ C9BE E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;

1096+ C9CD 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1096+ C9CE 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1096+ C9D1 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1096+ C9D3 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1096+ C9D5 E5          >                        push    hl
1096+ C9D6 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1097+ C9D8 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1098+ C9DA CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1099+ C9DD              .NoBottom4PixelPair:
1100+ C9DD              ; Completed one iteration........................................
1101+ C9DD D9                                   exx
1102+ C9DE CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
1103+ C9E0 28 03                                jr z,   .draw_circle_1
1104+ C9E2 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
1105+ C9E3 18 05                                jr      .draw_circle_2		;
1106+ C9E5 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
1107+ C9E6 03                                   inc     bc
1108+ C9E7 03                                   inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
1109+ C9E8 DD 25                                dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
1110+ C9EA 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				    ; D2=D2+2
1111+ C9EB 03                                   inc bc
1112+ C9EC 13                                   inc de				    ; D1=D1+2
1113+ C9ED 13                                   inc de
1114+ C9EE DD 2C                                inc ixl				    ; X=X+1
1115+ C9F0 C3 06 C9                             jp      .CircleLoop
1116+ C9F3 2A 3F C6     SunCircleSinglePixel:     ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1117+ C9F6 7C                                   ld      a,h
1118+ C9F7 A7                                   and     a
1119+ C9F8 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1120+ C9F9 4D                                   ld      c,l
1121+ C9FA 2A 41 C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1122+ C9FD 7C                                   ld      a,h
1123+ C9FE A7                                   and     a
1124+ C9FF C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1125+ CA00 7D                                   ld      a,l
1126+ CA01 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
1127+ CA03 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if l > 127 then no pixel
1128+ CA04 47                                   ld      b,a
1129+ CA05 7B                                   ld		a,e
1130+ CA06 CD 08 E3                             call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
1131+ CA09 C9                                   ret
1132+ CA0A
1133+ CA0A              ProcessXRowA:           ;break
1134+ CA0A 2A 3F C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; get X Center
1135+ CA0D F5                                   push    af                              ; save A (curent offset +/- value
1136+ CA0E ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Hl = HL + offset
1137+ CA10 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; is HL negative?, if so then set C to 0
1138+ CA11 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;
1139+ CA13 20 14                                jr      nz,.XCoordNegative              ; We can have this for non X + Radius i.e. the equater
1140+ CA15 A7                                   and     a                               ; if H <> 0? (why by here must be +ve), set c to $FF
1141+ CA16 20 16                                jr      nz,.XCoordMaxed                 ; .
1142+ CA18 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ; else set c to l and do the -ve offset
1143+ CA19 C5           .AddFuzz:               push    bc
1144+ CA1A CD 2F 85                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1145+ CA1D C1                                   pop     bc
1146+ CA1E 21 3C C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1147+ CA21 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1148+ CA22 81                                   add     c                               ;
1149+ CA23 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;
1150+ CA24 38 08                                jr      c,.XCoordMaxed                  ; has fuzz caused a carry, if so > 255 to make 255
1151+ CA26 C3 30 CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract                ;
1152+ CA29 0E 00        .XCoordNegative:        ld      c,0                             ; if it was negative then 0
1153+ CA2B C3 30 CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract
1154+ CA2E 0E FF        .XCoordMaxed:           ld      c,255                           ; if it was +ve then 255
1155+ CA30 F1           .ProcessSubtract:       pop     af                              ; get offset back
1156+ CA31 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; but goes into DE as its a subtract
1157+ CA32 16 00                                ld      d,0
1158+ CA34 2A 3F C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; so do subtract
1159+ CA37                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1159+ CA37 B7          >                        or a
1160+ CA38 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1161+ CA3A FA 57 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1162+ CA3D E5 C5        .AddFuzzSubtract:       push    hl,,bc
1163+ CA3F CD 2F 85                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1164+ CA42 C1                                   pop     bc
1165+ CA43 21 3C C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1166+ CA46 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1167+ CA47 5F                                   ld      e,a
1168+ CA48 E1                                   pop     hl
1169+ CA49 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1170+ CA4B FA 57 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1171+ CA4E 7C                                   ld      a,h
1172+ CA4F A7                                   and     a
1173+ CA50 C2 5C CA                             jp      nz,.XCordLeftMaxed
1174+ CA53 45                                   ld      b,l
1175+ CA54 C3 5E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1176+ CA57 06 00        .XCoordLeftNegative:    ld      b,0
1177+ CA59 C3 5E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1178+ CA5C 06 FF        .XCordLeftMaxed:        ld      b,255
1179+ CA5E 78           .CompletedXCoords:      ld      a,b
1180+ CA5F FD 77 00     .RowSaveIY1             ld      (iy+0),a                        ; iy holds current line array index
1181+ CA62 79                                   ld      a,c
1182+ CA63 FD 77 01     .RowSaveIY3             ld      (iy+1),a
1183+ CA66 C9                                   ret
1184+ CA67
1185+ CA67              ; .....................................................
1186+ CA67              ; if the universe object is a planet or sun then do that instead
1187+ CA67              ;;TODOProcessPlanet:          cp      129
1188+ CA67              ;;TODO                        jr      nz, .ItsAPlanet
1189+ CA67              ;;TODO.ItsAStar:              ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
1190+ CA67              ;;TODO                        cp      48                               ; if z > 48 (it must be positive to enter this routine)
1191+ CA67
1192+ CA67
1193+ CA67              ; Square Root using tables
1194+ CA67              ; DE = number to find
1195+ CA67 21 87 CC     SunLookupSqrtDE:        ld      hl,SunSquareRootTable
1196+ CA6A 7A           .LookupCorseJump:       ld      a,d
1197+ CA6B ED 31                                add     hl,a
1198+ CA6D ED 31                                add     hl,a
1199+ CA6F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1200+ CA70 23                                   inc     hl
1201+ CA71 66                                   ld      h,(hl)
1202+ CA72 6F                                   ld      l,a
1203+ CA73 7E           .FineSearchLoop:        ld      a,(hl)
1204+ CA74                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  e, .FoundByte
1204+ CA74 BB          >                        cp     e
1204+ CA75 CA 81 CA    >                        jp      z,.FoundByte
1205+ CA78                                      JumpIfAGTENusng e, .PreviousByte
1205+ CA78 BB          >                        cp     e
1205+ CA79 D2 84 CA    >                        jp		nc,.PreviousByte
1206+ CA7C 23           .NotFound:              inc     hl
1207+ CA7D 23                                   inc     hl
1208+ CA7E C3 73 CA                             jp      .FineSearchLoop
1209+ CA81 23           .FoundByte:             inc     hl
1210+ CA82 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1211+ CA83 C9                                   ret
1212+ CA84 2B           .PreviousByte:          dec     hl
1213+ CA85 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1214+ CA86 C9                                   ret
1215+ CA87

1657  D033                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankSunData," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-SunBankAddr), " - BankSunData"
1658  D033                                  ASSERT $-SunBankAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary
1659  D033              ; Bank 84  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1660  D033                                  SLOT    PlanetBankAddr
1661  D033                                  PAGE    BankPlanetData
1662  D033                                  ORG	    PlanetBankAddr,BankPlanetData
1663  C000                                  INCLUDE "./Universe/Planet/planet_data.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Planet/planet_data.asm
   1+ C000
   2+ C000              ;- DEBUG CODE
   3+ C000                                      IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
   4+ C000 ~            TestBLINE:              ld  a,$FF
   5+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKFlag),a
   6+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,5
   7+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKSTP),a
   8+ C000 ~                                    ZeroA
   9+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKCNT),a
  10+ C000 ~            .DebugLoop:             ld  ix,(DataPointer)
  11+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+0)
  12+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  13+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+1)
  14+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  15+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewXPos),hl
  16+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+2)
  17+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  18+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+3)
  19+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  20+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewYPos),hl
  21+ C000 ~                                    call    BLINE
  22+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,(DataPointCounter)
  23+ C000 ~                                    inc     a
  24+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,DataPointSize
  25+ C000 ~                                    cp      (hl)
  26+ C000 ~                                    ret     z
  27+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointCounter),a
  28+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,(DataPointer)
  29+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,4
  30+ C000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointer),hl
  32+ C000 ~                                    jp      .DebugLoop
  33+ C000 ~
  34+ C000 ~            DataPoints:             DW  10,10, 20,60, 30,20, 40,50, 100,90, 150, 30
  35+ C000 ~            DataPointSize           DB  6
  36+ C000 ~            DataPointCounter        DB  0
  37+ C000 ~            DataPointer:            DW  DataPoints
  38+ C000                                      ENDIF
  39+ C000
  40+ C000                                      IFDEF TESTMERIDIAN
  41+ C000 ~            TestMeridian:           ld      hl,20        ; 20
  42+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKVx),hl ; vx
  43+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,20        ; 20
  44+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKVy),hl ; vy
  45+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,20        ; 20
  46+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKUx),hl ; ux
  47+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl, $8014    ; -20
  48+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKUy),hl ; uy
  49+ C000 ~                                    ld      de,120       ; 120
  50+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCx),de ; cx
  51+ C000 ~                                    ld      de,69        ; 69
  52+ C000 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCy),de ; cy
  53+ C000 ~                                    call    DrawMeridian
  54+ C000                                      ENDIF
  55+ C000
  56+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  57+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  58+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  59+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
  60+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
  61+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
  62+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  63+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  64+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  65+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  66+ C000
  67+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  68+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  69+ C000 50 6C 61 6E  StartOfPlanet:     DB "Planet Data....."
  69+ C004 65 74 20 44
  69+ C008 61 74 61 2E
  69+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E

  96+ C0FA             >
  96+ C0FA 00 00 00 00 >P_varK3		 DS	4				; D2
  96+ C0FE             >P_centreX     equ P_varK3

  96+ C110             >P_varK6p2     equ P_varK6+2
  96+ C110             >
  96+ C110 00          >P_XX12p2      DB 0    ; The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
  96+ C111 00          >P_XX12p3      DB 0    ; The direction of slope ; + LT to BR; - TR to BL
  96+ C112 00          >P_XX12p4      DB 0
  96+ C113 00          >P_XX12p5      DB 0
  96+ C114             >P_Delta_x     EQU P_XX12p2
  96+ C114             >P_Delta_y     EQU P_XX12p4
  96+ C114 00          >P_Tvar        DB 0    ; The gradient of slope ; 0 if it's a shallow slope (DX > DY) ; &FF if it's a steep slope (DY > DX) Returns:  XX15        m         x1 as an 8-bit coordinate XX15+2               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
  96+ C115 00          >P_Qvar        DB 0
  96+ C116 00          >P_Rvar        DB 0    ; general purpose for calcs  Paired with S must be done this way round for SUBHeightFromY1 etc to work
  96+ C117 00          >P_Svar        DB 0    ; sign variable
  96+ C118             >P_SRvarPair   EQU P_Rvar
  96+ C118 00          >P_Xreg        DB 0
  96+ C119 00          >P_Yreg        DB 0
  96+ C11A             >P_YXregPair   EQU P_Xreg

 102+ C11A                                          ClippingCodeLL28Macro P
asm_linedraw.asm(45): error: Label not found: Qvar
planet_data.asm(102): ^ emitted from here
 102+ C11A 21 00 00    >P_LL28_6502:         ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
 102+ C11D 4E          >                            ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
 102+ C11E B9          >                            cp      c
 102+ C11F             >                            FlipCarryFlag
 102+ C11F 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C120 DA 48 C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL2_6502    ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
 102+ C123 06 FE       >                            ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
 102+ C125 CB 27       >P_LL31_6502:          sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
 102+ C127 DA 3C C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 102+ C12A             >                            FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
 102+ C12A 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C12B             >                            JumpIfALTNusng c, P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
 102+ C12B B9          >                        cp      c

 150+ C505              ; This uses UBnkNodeArray as the list
 151+ C505              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
 152+ C505              ; counter is current row y pos
 153+ C505              ; byte 1 is start x pos
 154+ C505              ; byte 2 is end x pos

 227+ C553              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 228+ C553              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
 229+ C553              ; we need to have variable size and color
 230+ C553              CalculatePlanetWarpPositon:
 231+ C553 3A 13 80     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; seed d & 7
 232+ C556 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 233+ C558 C6 07                                add     a,7                     ; + 7
 234+ C55A CB 2F                                sra     a                       ; / 2
 235+ C55C 32 18 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 236+ C55F 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 237+ C562 22 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl            ;
 238+ C565 3A 17 80     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 239+ C568 E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 240+ C56A C6 03                                add     a,3                     ; + 3
 241+ C56C 47                                   ld      b,a
 242+ C56D 3A 16 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 243+ C570 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 244+ C572 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bit 0 into bit 7
 245+ C573 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 246+ C574 32 12 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 247+ C577 32 15 C0                             ld      (P_BnKysgn),a            ; .
 248+ C57A 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 249+ C57B 32 11 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 250+ C57E 32 14 C0                             ld      (P_BnKyhi),a             ; .
 251+ C581                                      ZeroA
 251+ C581 AF          >                        xor a
 252+ C582 32 10 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxlo),a
 253+ C585 32 13 C0                             ld      (P_BnKylo),a
 254+ C588 C9                                   ret

 274+ C5BB              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
 275+ C5BB              ; we need to have variable size and color
 276+ C5BB CD EF C4     CreatePlanet:           call    ResetP_BnKData          ; Clear out planet block
 277+ C5BE 3A 41 80                             ld      a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 278+ C5C1 E6 02                                and     %00000010               ; Set A = 128 or 130 depending on bit 1 of the system's tech level
 279+ C5C3 F6 80                                or      %10000000
 280+ C5C5 32 6B C0                             ld      (P_BnKShipType),a       ; and load to ship type (synomous with planet type)
 281+ C5C8                                      ; PLanets don't have pitch and roll MaxUnivPitchAndRoll
 282+ C5C8 3A 13 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; a= bits 1 and 0 of working seed1 + 3 + carry
 283+ C5CB E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 284+ C5CD CE 03                                adc     3                       ; we also lauch planet side so its infront of us
 285+ C5CF 32 18 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a           ; set z sign to 3 + C + 0..3 bits
 286+ C5D2 CB 1F                                rr      a
 287+ C5D4 32 12 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 288+ C5D7 32 15 C0                             ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 289+ C5DA 3A 41 80     .SetColour:             ld      a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 290+ C5DD 21 42 80                             ld      hl,DisplayPopulation    ; add displaypopulation
 291+ C5E0 86                                   add     a, (hl)
 292+ C5E1 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; save for atmosphere level
 293+ C5E2 23                                   inc     hl                      ; move to DisplayProductivity
 294+ C5E3 86                                   add     a, (hl)
 295+ C5E4 E6 0F                                and     $0F                     ; limit to 0 to 16
 296+ C5E6 21 05 C5                             ld      hl,PlanetColour1Table
 297+ C5E9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 298+ C5EB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 299+ C5EC 32 E2 C0                             ld      (P_Colour1),a
 300+ C5EF 3E 10                                ld      a,$10
 301+ C5F1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 302+ C5F3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 303+ C5F4 32 E3 C0                             ld      (P_Colour2),a

 305+ C5F8 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; atmosphere can be 0 to  3 pixels thick
 306+ C5FA CB 3F                                srl     a                       ;
 307+ C5FC 32 E4 C0                             ld      (P_Colour2Thickness),a
 308+ C5FF              .SetOrientation:        ; Not needed as we don't do planet rotation call    P_InitRotMat

 329+ C626 ED 4B E9 C0  ScalePlanetTo8Bit:		ld			bc,(P_BnKZScaled)
 330+ C62A 2A E5 C0                             ld			hl,(P_BnKXScaled)
 331+ C62D ED 5B E7 C0                          ld			de,(P_BnKYScaled)
 332+ C631 78           .SetABSbc:              ld			a,b
 333+ C632 DD 67                                ld			ixh,a
 334+ C634 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 335+ C636 47                                   ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
 336+ C637 7C           .SetABShl:              ld			a,h
 337+ C638 DD 6F                                ld			ixl,a
 338+ C63A E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 339+ C63C 67                                   ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
 340+ C63D 7A           .SetABSde:              ld			a,d
 341+ C63E FD 67                                ld			iyh,a
 342+ C640 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 343+ C642 57                                   ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
 344+ C643 78           .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:   ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
 345+ C644 B4                                   or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
 346+ C645 B2                                   or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
 347+ C646 28 0F                                jr          z,.ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 348+ C648                                      ShiftHLRight1
 348+ C648 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348+ C64A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349+ C64C                                      ShiftDERight1
 349+ C64C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 349+ C64E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 350+ C650                                      ShiftBCRight1
 350+ C650 CB 38       >			   srl b
 350+ C652 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 351+ C654 C3 43 C6                             jp          .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
 352+ C657              ; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
 353+ C657 DD 7C        .ScaleNodeDone:          ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
 354+ C659 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 355+ C65B B0                                   or			b
 356+ C65C 47                                   ld			b,a
 357+ C65D DD 7D        .SignforHL:              ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
 358+ C65F E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 359+ C661 B4                                   or			h
 360+ C662 67                                   ld			h,a
 361+ C663 FD 7C        .SignforDE:              ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
 362+ C665 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 363+ C667 B2                                   or			d
 364+ C668 57                                   ld			d,a
 365+ C669 ED 43 E9 C0  .SignsDoneSaveResult:	ld			(P_BnKZScaled),bc
 366+ C66D 22 E5 C0                             ld			(P_BnKXScaled),hl
 367+ C670 ED 53 E7 C0                          ld			(P_BnKYScaled),de
 368+ C674 78                                   ld			a,b
 369+ C675 32 81 7F                             ld			(varU),a
 370+ C678 79                                   ld			a,c
 371+ C679 32 9E 7F                             ld			(varT),a
 372+ C67C C9                                   ret

 379+ C6C7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++C6C7
   2++C6C7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++C6C7              ; Planet version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
   4++C6C7              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
   5++C6C7 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulX            DS 4
   6++C6CB 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulY            DS 4
   7++C6CF 00 00 00 00  PlanetBetaMulZ             DS 4
   8++C6D3 00 00 00     PlanetK2                   DS 3
   9++C6D6
  10++C6D6
  11++C6D6              ; Roate around axis
  12++C6D6              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  13++C6D6              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  14++C6D6              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  15++C6D6              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  16++C6D6              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  17++C6D6              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  18++C6D6              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  19++C6D6              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  20++C6D6              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  21++C6D6 2A 67 7E     P_MVS5RotateAxis:       ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  22++C6D9 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  23++C6DA 23                                   inc     hl
  24++C6DB 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  25++C6DC EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  26++C6DD 7C                                   ld      a,h
  27++C6DE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  28++C6E0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
  29++C6E2 7C                                   ld      a,h
  30++C6E3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
  31++C6E5 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
  32++C6E7 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
  33++C6E8 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
  34++C6EA 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
  35++C6EB B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
  36++C6EC CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
  37++C6EF              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  38++C6EF E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
  39++C6F0 7D                                   ld      a,l
  40++C6F1 32 83 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  41++C6F4 7C                                   ld      a,h
  42++C6F5 32 84 7F                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
  43++C6F8              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
  44++C6F8 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
  45++C6FB 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  46++C6FC 23                                   inc     hl
  47++C6FD 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
  48++C6FE 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49++C6FF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  50++C701 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
  51++C703 7A                                   ld      a,d
  52++C704 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
  53++C706 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
  54++C707                                      ShiftDERight1
  54++C707 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  54++C709 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  55++C70B                                      ShiftDERight1
  55++C70B CB 3A       >			   srl d
  55++C70D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  56++C70F                                      ShiftDERight1
  56++C70F CB 3A       >			   srl d
  56++C711 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  57++C713                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
  57++C713 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  57++C715 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  58++C717 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
  59++C71A FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
  60++C71C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  61++C71E B2                                   or      d
  62++C71F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
  63++C720              ;;; ld      a,e
  64++C720              ;;;     or      iyh
  65++C720              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
  66++C720              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  67++C720 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
  68++C721                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
  69++C721              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70++C721 CD 35 90                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
  71++C724 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
  72++C725              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
  73++C725              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
  74++C725 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
  75++C728 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  76++C729 23                                   inc     hl
  77++C72A 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
  78++C72B EB                                   ex      de,hl
  79++C72C 7C                                   ld      a,h
  80++C72D E6 80                                and     $80
  81++C72F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  82++C731 7C                                   ld      a,h
  83++C732 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
  84++C734 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
  85++C736 5F                                   ld      e,a
  86++C737 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  87++C739 57                                   ld      d,a
  88++C73A B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
  89++C73B CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15
  90++C73E              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
  91++C73E E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
  92++C73F 7D                                   ld      a,l
  93++C740 32 82 7E                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
  94++C743 7C                                   ld      a,h
  95++C744 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
  96++C746 32 9E 7F                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
  97++C749              ;-- Set up TQ
  98++C749 2A 67 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
  99++C74C              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 100++C74C 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 101++C74D 23                                   inc     hl
 102++C74E 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 103++C74F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 104++C750 E6 80                                and     $80
 105++C752 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 106++C754 7A                                   ld      a,d
 107++C755 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 108++C757 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 109++C758                                      ShiftDERight1
 109++C758 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 109++C75A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 110++C75C                                      ShiftDERight1
 110++C75C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 110++C75E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 111++C760                                      ShiftDERight1
 111++C760 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 111++C762 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 112++C764                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 112++C764 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 112++C766 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 113++C768 3A 50 C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 114++C76B FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 115++C76D E6 80                                and     $80
 116++C76F B2                                   or      d
 117++C770 57                                   ld      d,a
 118++C771              ;;; ld      a,e
 119++C771              ;;;     or      iyh
 120++C771              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 121++C771 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 122++C772              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 123++C772 CD D0 90                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 124++C775              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 125++C775 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 126++C776 2A 69 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 127++C779 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 128++C77A 23                                   inc     hl
 129++C77B 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 130++C77C              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 131++C77C D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 132++C77D 2A 67 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 133++C780 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 134++C781 23                                   inc     hl
 135++C782 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 136++C783 C9                                   ret

 195++C81C 3A 9B 7E     PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch: ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed

 197++C822 B6                                   or      (hl)
 198++C823 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 199++C825 CA D6 C8                             jp      z,.NoRotation
 200++C828 3A 9B 7E     .CalcAlphaMulX:         ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll magnitude
 201++C82B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -alpha (Q value)
 202++C82D 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 203++C82E 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 204++C831 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 205++C832 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxhi)                ; .
 206++C835 CD 57 93                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * -alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
 207++C838              .SaveAlphaMulX:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 208++C838                                      ;ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                   ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 209++C838 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
 210++C839 32 C8 C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+1),a
 211++C83C 7B                                   ld      a,e
 212++C83D 32 C9 C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+2),a
 213++C840 7A                                   ld      a,d
 214++C841 32 CA C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+3),a          ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256
 215++C844 ED 5B 14 C0  .CalcK2:                ld      de,(P_BnKyhi)                ; DEL = Y
 216++C848 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                 ; .
 217++C84B 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 218++C84C ED 4B C9 C6                          ld      bc,(PlanetAlphaMulX+2)         ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result
 219++C850 3A C8 C6                             ld      a,(PlanetAlphaMulX+1)          ; Deal with sign in byte 4
 220++C853 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; .
 221++C854 CD 6F 90                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = y - (alpha * x)
 222++C857 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; K2  = DEA = DEL = y - (alpha * x)
 223++C858 32 D3 C6                             ld      (PlanetK2),a                   ; we also need to save l for teh beta k2 calc
 224++C85B ED 53 D4 C6                          ld      (PlanetK2+1),de                ;
 225++C85F EB           .CalcBetaMulK2:         ex      de,hl                       ; HLE == DEA
 226++C860 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 227++C861 3A 8E 7E                             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; D = BETA
 228++C864 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 229++C865 CD 57 93                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = Beta * K2, DEL = Beta/256 * K2
 230++C868 ED 4B 17 C0  .CalcZ:                 ld      bc,(P_BnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 231++C86C 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ;
 232++C86F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 233++C870 CD 6F 90                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL still = Beta * K2 so its z + Beta * K2
 234++C873 ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (P_BnKzhi),de                ; z = resuklt
 235++C877 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
 236++C878 32 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                 ; .
 237++C87B 3A 8E 7E     .CalcBetaZ:             ld      a,(BETA)
 238++C87E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -beta (Q value)
 239++C880 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 240++C881 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z
 241++C884 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 242++C885 2A 17 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKzhi)                ; .
 243++C888 CD 57 93                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * -beta, so DEL = Z * -beta / 256 where d = sign byte
 244++C88B              .SaveAlphaMulZ:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 245++C88B                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ),a             ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                 ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 246++C88B                                      ;ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 247++C88B                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+1),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 248++C88B                                      ;ld      a,e                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 249++C88B                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+2),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 250++C88B                                      ;ld      a,d                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 251++C88B                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+3),a           ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 252++C88B 42 4B        .CalcY:                 ld      bc,de                       ; bch = - Beta * z
 253++C88D 65                                   ld      h,l
 254++C88E ED 5B D4 C6                          ld      de,(PlanetK2+1)                ; DEL = k2
 255++C892 3A D3 C6                             ld      a,(PlanetK2)
 256++C895 6F                                   ld      l,a
 257++C896 CD 6F 90                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
 258++C899 ED 53 14 C0                          ld      (P_BnKyhi),de                ; y = DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
 259++C89D 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
 260++C89E 32 13 C0                             ld      (P_BnKylo),a                 ; .
 261++C8A1 3A 9B 7E     .CalcAlphaMulY:         ld      a,(ALPHA)
 262++C8A4 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha (Q value)
 263++C8A5 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 264++C8A8 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 265++C8A9 2A 14 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)                ; .
 266++C8AC CD 57 93                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
 267++C8AF 79           .SaveAlphaMulY:         ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign
 268++C8B0 32 CB C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result
 269++C8B3 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
 270++C8B4 32 CC C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+1),a
 271++C8B7 7B                                   ld      a,e
 272++C8B8 32 CD C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+2),a
 273++C8BB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 274++C8BC 32 CE C6                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+3),a
 275++C8BF 42 4B        .CalcxPLusAlphaY:       ld      bc,de                        ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result Deal with sign in byte 4
 276++C8C1 65                                   ld      h,l                         ; .
 277++C8C2 ED 5B 11 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKxhi)                ; DEL = Y
 278++C8C6 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                 ; .
 279++C8C9 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 280++C8CA CD 6F 90                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = x + alpha * Y
 281++C8CD 7A           .SaveResult1:           ld      a,d                         ; Result 1 (X) = AHL + DEL
 282++C8CE 63                                   ld      h,e                         ;
 283++C8CF 32 12 C0     .CopyResultTo2:         ld      (P_BnKxlo+2),a               ; .
 284++C8D2 22 10 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxlo) ,hl               ; .
 285++C8D5 C9                                   ret
 286++C8D6 3A 7C 7F     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 287++C8D9                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 287++C8D9 A7          >                        and     a
 287++C8DA C8          >                        ret     z
 288++C8DB 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ;
 289++C8DD 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 290++C8DE 06 80                                ld      b,$80                       ;
 291++C8E0 ED 5B 17 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 292++C8E4 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; .
 293++C8E7 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 294++C8E8 CD 6F 90                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 295++C8EB ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (P_BnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 296++C8EF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 297++C8F0 32 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                ;
 298++C8F3 C9                                   ret
