 474+ C968
 475+ C968              ; Drawing planets Subroutine: PL2 (Flight) Remove the planet or sun from the screen
 476+ C968              ;                             PLANET (Flight) Draw the planet or sun
 477+ C968              ;                             PL9 (Part 1 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet, with either an equator and meridian, or a crater
 478+ C968              ;                             PL9 (Part 2 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's equator and meridian
 479+ C968              ;                             PL9 (Part 3 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's crater
 480+ C968              ;                             PLS1 (Flight)  Calculate (Y A) = nosev_x / z
 481+ C968              ;                             PLS2 (Flight) Draw a half-ellipse
 482+ C968              ;                             PLS22 (Flight) Draw an ellipse or half-ellipse
 483+ C968
 484+ C968
 485+ C968              ; Drawing circles Subroutine: CIRCLE (Flight) Draw a circle for the planet
 486+ C968              ;                             CIRCLE2 (Flight) Draw a circle (for the planet or chart)
 487+ C968              ;                             WPLS2 (Flight) Remove the planet from the screen
 488+ C968              ;                             WP1 (Flight) Reset the ball line heap
 489+ C968              ; Drawing planets PL21 (Flight) Return from a planet/sun-drawing routine with a failure flag
 490+ C968              ;                 PLS3 (Flight) Calculate (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z
 491+ C968              ;                 PLS4 (Flight) Calculate CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 492+ C968              ;                 PLS5 (Flight) Calculate roofv_x / z and roofv_y / z
 493+ C968              ;                 PLS6 (Flight) Calculate (X K) = (A P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 494+ C968              ; SPS1 (Flight) Calculate the vector to the planet and store it in XX15
 495+ C968              ; MV40 rate planet by our pitch
 496+ C968              ;
 497+ C968              ;look at PL9
 498+ C968
 499+ C968
 500+ C968              ; Optimisation
 501+ C968              ; if a <> 0
 502+ C968              ;       divide AH by CD
 503+ C968              ; if h <> 0
 504+ C968              ;      if c <> 0 return 0
 505+ C968              ;      else
 506+ C968              ;        divide HL by DE
 507+ C968              ; if l <>0
 508+ C968              ;      if c or d <> 0 return 0
 509+ C968              ;      else
 510+ C968              ;        divide l by e
 511+ C968              ;
 512+ C968 47           PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE:  ld      b,a                         ; save a reg
 513+ C969 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; check for divide by zero
 514+ C96A B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 515+ C96B B3                                   or      e                           ; .
 516+ C96C                                      JumpIfZero      .divideByZero       ; .
 516+ C96C CA 85 C9    >                        jp	z,.divideByZero
 517+ C96F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; get a back
 518+ C970                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideAHLbyCDE
 518+ C970 A7          >                        and     a
 518+ C971 C2 8D C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideAHLbyCDE
 519+ C974 7C           .AIsZero:               ld      a,h
 520+ C975                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideHLbyDE
 520+ C975 A7          >                        and     a
 520+ C976 C2 94 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideHLbyDE
 521+ C979 7D           .HIsZero:               ld      a,l
 522+ C97A                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideLbyE
 522+ C97A A7          >                        and     a
 522+ C97B C2 A3 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideLbyE
 523+ C97E              .resultIsZero:          ZeroA
 523+ C97E AF          >                        xor a
 524+ C97F 67                                   ld      h,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 525+ C980 6F                                   ld      l,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 526+ C981 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 527+ C983                                      ClearCarryFlag
 527+ C983 B7          >                        or a
 528+ C984 C9                                   ret
 529+ C985 3E FF        .divideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 530+ C987 67                                   ld      h,a
 531+ C988 6F                                   ld      l,a
 532+ C989 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 533+ C98B                                      SetCarryFlag
 533+ C98B 37          >                        scf
 534+ C98C C9                                   ret
 535+ C98D              ; AHL = ahl/cde, this could be a genuine 24 bit divide
 536+ C98D              ; if AHL is large and cde small then the value will be big so will be off screen so we can risk 16 bit divide
 537+ C98D CD 53 91     .divideAHLbyCDE:        call    Div24by24
 538+ C990 EB                                   ex      hl,de                         ; ahl is result
 539+ C991 79                                   ld      a,c                           ; ahl is result
 540+ C992                                      ClearCarryFlag
 540+ C992 B7          >                        or a
 541+ C993 C9                                   ret
 542+ C994              ; AHL = 0hl/0de as A is zero
 543+ C994 79           .divideHLbyDE:          ld      a,c                         ;'if c = 0 then result must be zero
 544+ C995                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 544+ C995 A7          >                        and     a
 544+ C996 C2 7E C9    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 545+ C999 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 546+ C99B CD C9 97                             call    BC_Div_DE                   ; BC = HL/DE
 547+ C99E 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 548+ C9A0                                      ZeroA                               ; so we can set A to Zero
 548+ C9A0 AF          >                        xor a
 549+ C9A1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 549+ C9A1 B7          >                        or a
 550+ C9A2 C9                                   ret
 551+ C9A3              ; AHL = 00l/00e as A and H are zero
 552+ C9A3 79           .divideLbyE:            ld      a,c                         ; if d = 0 then result must be zero
 553+ C9A4 B2                                   or      d
 554+ C9A5                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 554+ C9A5 A7          >                        and     a
 554+ C9A6 C2 7E C9    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 555+ C9A9 4B                                   ld      c,e
 556+ C9AA 5D                                   ld      e,l
 557+ C9AB CD 8B 97                             call    E_Div_C
 558+ C9AE 6F                                   ld      l,a
 559+ C9AF                                      ZeroA
 559+ C9AF AF          >                        xor a
 560+ C9B0 67                                   ld      h,a
 561+ C9B1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 561+ C9B1 B7          >                        or a
 562+ C9B2 C9                                   ret
 563+ C9B3
 564+ C9B3              ; Project XY to screen location
 565+ C9B3 DD 26 00     ProjectPlanet:          ld      ixh,0
 566+ C9B6 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 567+ C9B9 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 568+ C9BC CD D1 C9                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 569+ C9BF 22 FA C0                             ld      (P_centreX),hl
 570+ C9C2 DD 24                                inc     ixh
 571+ C9C4 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 572+ C9C7 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 573+ C9CA CD D1 C9                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 574+ C9CD 22 00 C1                             ld      (P_centreY),hl
 575+ C9D0 C9                                   ret
 576+ C9D1
 577+ C9D1              ; PlanetProcessVertex AHL = X or Y position (sign in A)
 578+ C9D1              ;                     fetches z as this used in both calcs
 579+ C9D1 47           PlanetProcessVertex:    ld      b,a                         ; save sign/high byte
 580+ C9D2 ED 5B 16 C0  .PlanetProjectToEye:    ld      de,(P_BnKzlo)               ; B H L   = X or Y
 581+ C9D6 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)               ; IYH D E = z
 582+ C9D9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 583+ C9DB                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A D E   = | z |
 583+ C9DB E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 584+ C9DD                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 585+ C9DD 5A                                   ld      e,d                         ; C D E   = A D E * 256, i.e. 0 A D
 586+ C9DE 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 587+ C9DF 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ; .
 588+ C9E1                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256) to get +-256 rather than +- 1
 589+ C9E1 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; copy X or Y sign into iyl
 590+ C9E2 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; .
 591+ C9E4                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A H L = |X| (or |Y|)
 591+ C9E4 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 592+ C9E6 CD 68 C9                             call PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE          ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 593+ C9E9 DA 48 CA                             jp      c,.IsOffScreen              ; carry flag indicates failure
 594+ C9EC              .CheckPosOnScreen:      JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen       ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 594+ C9EC A7          >                        and     a
 594+ C9ED C2 48 CA    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 595+ C9F0                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen   ; or bit 7 set of h
 595+ C9F0 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 595+ C9F1 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 595+ C9F3 C2 48 CA    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 596+ C9F6 DD 7C        .CheckXorY:             ld      a,ixh
 597+ C9F8                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ProcessYCoord
 597+ C9F8 A7          >                        and     a
 597+ C9F9 C2 1F CA    >                        jp	    nz,.ProcessYCoord
 598+ C9FC              ; Handle X Coord offset
 599+ C9FC FD 7C        .ProcessXCoord:         ld      a,iyh                       ; determine if its + or - value of AHL/CDE
 600+ C9FE FD AD                                xor     iyl
 601+ CA00 E6 80                                and     $80
 602+ CA02 CA 0B CA                             jp      z,.ProcessXPositive
 603+ CA05              .ProcessXNegative:      macronegate16hl
 603+ CA05 AF          >					xor 	a
 603+ CA06 95          >					sub 	l
 603+ CA07 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 603+ CA08 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 603+ CA09 94          >					sub 	h
 603+ CA0A 67          >					ld 		h,a
 604+ CA0B 11 80 00     .ProcessXPositive:      ld      de,ScreenCenterX
 605+ CA0E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 605+ CA0E B7          >                        or a
 606+ CA0F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; now X position is CenterX+ (X / Z) in 2's c
 607+ CA11 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ; set de to | hl for +/- 1024 check
 608+ CA13 F2 40 CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 609+ CA16                                      macronegate16de                     ; .
 609+ CA16 AF          >					xor 	a
 609+ CA17 93          >                    sub 	e
 609+ CA18 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 609+ CA19 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 609+ CA1A 92          >                    sub 	d
 609+ CA1B 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 610+ CA1C C3 40 CA                             jp      .CheckBoundaries            ; .
 611+ CA1F              ; Handle Y Coord offset
 612+ CA1F FD 7C        .ProcessYCoord:         ld      a,iyh
 613+ CA21 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 614+ CA23 E6 80                                and     $80
 615+ CA25 CA 2E CA                             jp      z,.ProcessYPositive
 616+ CA28              .ProcessYNegative:      macronegate16hl
 616+ CA28 AF          >					xor 	a
 616+ CA29 95          >					sub 	l
 616+ CA2A 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 616+ CA2B 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 616+ CA2C 94          >					sub 	h
 616+ CA2D 67          >					ld 		h,a
 617+ CA2E 11 60 00     .ProcessYPositive:      ld      de,ScreenCenterY            ; set hl to center Y and de to 2s'c Y/Z
 618+ CA31 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 619+ CA32                                      ClearCarryFlag
 619+ CA32 B7          >                        or a
 620+ CA33 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now HL  position is CenterY - (Y / Z) in 2's c
 621+ CA35 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ;
 622+ CA37 F2 40 CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 623+ CA3A                                      macronegate16de                     ; load DE with | result to simplify +-1024 check|
 623+ CA3A AF          >					xor 	a
 623+ CA3B 93          >                    sub 	e
 623+ CA3C 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 623+ CA3D 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 623+ CA3E 92          >                    sub 	d
 623+ CA3F 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 624+ CA40 7A           .CheckBoundaries:       ld      a,d
 625+ CA41                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 4, .IsOffScreen     ; if |position| > 1024 then way to large
 625+ CA41 FE 04       >                        cp     4
 625+ CA43 D2 48 CA    >                        jp		nc,.IsOffScreen
 626+ CA46              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 626+ CA46 B7          >                        or a
 627+ CA47 C9                                   ret
 628+ CA48 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 629+ CA4B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 630+ CA4D FD AD                                xor     iyl
 631+ CA4F                                      SignBitOnlyA
 631+ CA4F E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 632+ CA51 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 633+ CA53 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 634+ CA54 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 635+ CA55              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 635+ CA55 37          >                        scf
 636+ CA56 C9                                   ret
 637+ CA57
 638+ CA57
 639+ CA57              ; .........................................................................................................................
 640+ CA57              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 641+ CA57              ; calculates 24576/z, maxes at 248
 642+ CA57 ED 4B 16 C0  PlanetCalculateRadius:  ld      bc,(P_BnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 643+ CA5B 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ;
 644+ CA5E 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 645+ CA5F 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 646+ CA62 CD 69 96                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 647+ CA65 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 648+ CA66                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 648+ CA66 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 648+ CA67 CA 6D CA    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 649+ CA6A 21 F8 00     .MaxRadius:             ld      hl,248                      ; set radius to 248 as maxed out
 650+ CA6D 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 651+ CA6E F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 652+ CA70                                      DISPLAY "DONE - Eliiminate the check to see if planet radius is > 255 as its already fixed in Planet Calculate Radius"
 653+ CA70                                      ;ld      l,a                        ;
 654+ CA70                                      ;ld      (P_Radius),hl              ; save a copy of radius now for later
 655+ CA70 32 D9 C0                             ld      (P_Radius),a
 656+ CA73 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 657+ CA74 16 08        .CalculateStep:         ld      d,8
 658+ CA76                                      JumpIfALTNusng 8, .DoneStepCalc
 658+ CA76 FE 08       >                        cp      8
 658+ CA78 DA 84 CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 659+ CA7B CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 660+ CA7D                                      JumpIfALTNusng 60, .DoneStepCalc
 660+ CA7D FE 3C       >                        cp      60
 660+ CA7F DA 84 CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 661+ CA82 CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 662+ CA84 7A           .DoneStepCalc:          ld      a,d
 663+ CA85 32 8F C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
 664+ CA88 C9                                   ret
 665+ CA89
 666+ CA89              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 667+ CA89 3A 12 C0     PlanetUpdateCompass:    ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 668+ CA8C 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 669+ CA8F CD D1 C9                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 670+ CA92 22 19 C0                             ld      (P_CompassX),hl
 671+ CA95 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 672+ CA98 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 673+ CA9B CD D1 C9                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 674+ CA9E 22 1B C0                             ld      (P_CompassY),hl
 675+ CAA1 C9                                   ret
 676+ CAA2
 677+ CAA2                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 678+ CAA2 CD 1C C8     PlanetUpdateAndRender:  call    PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch    ; not needed for solid as yet
 679+ CAA5 3A 18 C0     .DrawSolidPlanet:       ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 680+ CAA8 A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 681+ CAA9 FA F8 CA                             jp      m,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; if its negative then behind so exit
 682+ CAAC              .TooFarAway:            JumpIfAGTENusng   48,.SkipDrawPlanet  ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 682+ CAAC FE 30       >                        cp     48
 682+ CAAE D2 F8 CA    >                        jp		nc,.SkipDrawPlanet
 683+ CAB1 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 684+ CAB4 B6                                   or      (hl)                         ; .
 685+ CAB5 CA F8 CA                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; .
 686+ CAB8              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 687+ CAB8 CD B3 C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet                ; Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 688+ CABB CD 57 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 689+ CABE                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 690+ CABE                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 691+ CABE 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 692+ CAC1 ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 693+ CAC5 3A D9 C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 694+ CAC8 A7                                   and     a
 695+ CAC9 CA F8 CA                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; skip 0 size
 696+ CACC 4F                                   ld      c,a
 697+ CACD 3A E2 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour1)
 698+ CAD0 47                                   ld      b,a
 699+ CAD1                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 699+ CAD1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 700+ CAD5 CD 33 EC                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 701+ CAD8                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng P_Radius, 5, .SkipDrawPlanet
 701+ CAD8 3A D9 C0    >                        ld      a,(P_Radius)
 701+ CADB FE 05       >                        cp      5
 701+ CADD DA F8 CA    >                        jp	  c,.SkipDrawPlanet
 702+ CAE0 FE 05                                cp      5               ; radius < 3 means no atmosphere
 703+ CAE2 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; as a holds radius from Jump Macro
 704+ CAE3 CA F8 CA                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet
 705+ CAE6 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX) ; just to test putting a rim there
 706+ CAE9 ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 707+ CAED 3A E3 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour2)
 708+ CAF0 47                                   ld      b,a
 709+ CAF1                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 709+ CAF1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 710+ CAF5 CD 37 EA                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 711+ CAF8 CD 89 CA     .SkipDrawPlanet:        call    PlanetUpdateCompass
 712+ CAFB C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 713+ CAFC              ;
 714+ CAFC              ; (PLS4)
 715+ CAFC              ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 716+ CAFC              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 717+ CAFC              ;CalcNoseSideArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 718+ CAFC              ;                        xor     $80
 719+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP),a
 720+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ + 1)
 721+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcArcTanPiPA

 729+ CAFC              ;                        call    ARCTAN                      ; A = arctan(P / Q)
 730+ CAFC              ;                        ld      c,a                         ; save a
 731+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ+1)

 733+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,c                         ; restore a as it doesn't affect flags doing an ld
 734+ CAFC              ;                        jp      m,.SkipFlipSign             ; If nosev_z_hi is negativeleave the angle in A as a positive
 735+ CAFC              ;; Adds 128 to the result (rather than makes it negative)
 736+ CAFC              ;.FlipSign:              xor     $80                         ; If we get here then nosev_z_hi is positive, so flip bit 7 of the angle in A, which is the same as adding 128
 737+ CAFC              ;.SkipFlipSign:          srl     a                           ; Set CNT2 = A / 4
 738+ CAFC              ;                        srl     a                           ; .

 741+ CAFC
 742+ CAFC              ; (PSL1)
 743+ CAFC              ; XX16 K2) = nosev_x / z
 744+ CAFC              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 745+ CAFC              ;CalcNoseXDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevX)
 746+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 747+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 748+ CAFC              ;CalcNoseYDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevY)
 749+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 750+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 751+ CAFC              ;CalcRoofXDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 752+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 753+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 754+ CAFC              ;CalcRoofYDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 755+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 756+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 757+ CAFC              ;CalcSideXDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevX)
 758+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 759+ CAFC              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 760+ CAFC              ;CalcSideYDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevY)
 761+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 762+ CAFC              ; (PLS1) (Y A) = nosev_x / z where B = Y (also stores in regY), K+3 = sign of calculation
 763+ CAFC              ; stores result in BC now as well
 764+ CAFC              ; does not do increment of X as its not needed when directly loading verticies of rotation
 765+ CAFC              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 766+ CAFC              ;CalcRotMatDivide:

 768+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varQ),a                    ;

 770+ CAFC              ;                        and     $7F                         ;
 771+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varR),a                    ;
 772+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,d                         ;
 773+ CAFC              ;                        and     $80                         ;
 774+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varS),a                    ;
 775+ CAFC              ;.LoadHLtoP012:          ld      a,l                         ; set A P+1 P to (signnoseX) (|noseX|)
 776+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP),a                    ; set P to nosevX lo
 777+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,h                         ; set P_1 to |nosevX hi|
 778+ CAFC              ;                        ld      b,h                         ; .
 779+ CAFC              ;                        and     $7F                         ; .
 780+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP+1),a                  ; .
 781+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,b                         ; set a to sign nosevX
 782+ CAFC              ;                        and     $80
 783+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP+2),a
 784+ CAFC              ;                        call    DVID3B                      ; call DVI3B2 variane where z is in de as 16 bit and needs expanding to 32

 787+ CAFC              ;                        and     a                           ; zero

 790+ CAFC              ;                        jp      z,.Skip254

 792+ CAFC              ;                        ld      c,a
 793+ CAFC              ;.Skip254:               push    af

 795+ CAFC              ;                        and     a

 797+ CAFC              ;.ForceSignPositive:     ld      (regY),a

 799+ CAFC              ;                        pop     af
 800+ CAFC              ;                        ret

 802+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (regY),a
