 804+ CAFC              ;                        pop     af                          ; so c doesn't need to be pushed to stack
 805+ CAFC              ;                        ret
 806+ CAFC
 807+ CAFC              ; (PLS3)
 808+ CAFC              ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 809+ CAFC              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 810+ CAFC              ;Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 811+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 812+ CAFC              ;                        jp      Calc222MulHLDivDE
 813+ CAFC              ;; (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 814+ CAFC              ;Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 815+ CAFC              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 816+ CAFC              ;; Optimise, move result at the end into HL instead of YA (we can ignore P)
 817+ CAFC              ;Calc222MulHLDivDE:      call    CalcRotMatDivide            ; calculate (Y A) = nosev_x(orY) / z
 818+ CAFC              ;                        ld      d,a                         ; P = |roofv_x / z|
 819+ CAFC              ;                        ld      e,222                       ; LDA #222               \ Set Q = 222, the offset to the crater
 820+ CAFC              ;                        ; Not needed                        ; STA Q
 821+ CAFC              ;                        ; Not needed                        ; STX U                  \ Store the vector index X in U for retrieval after the  call to MULTU
 822+ CAFC              ;                        mul     de                          ; call MULTU (unsigned multiply) de = 222 * |roofv_x / z|
 823+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDY K+3                \ If the sign of the result in K+3 is positive, skip to
 824+ CAFC              ;                        and     a
 825+ CAFC              ;                        jp      p,.PL12                     ; BPL PL12               \ PL12 to return with Y = 0
 826+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,$FF                       ; LDY #&FF               \ Set Y = &FF to be a negative high byte
 827+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (regY),a                    ; .
 828+ CAFC              ;                        ld      b,a                         ; .
 829+ CAFC              ;                        macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise the result should be negative, so negate
 830+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,e                         ; now we have Y A P (with Y in b also)
 831+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP),a                    ; .
 832+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,d                         ; .
 833+ CAFC              ;                        and     a
 834+ CAFC              ;                        jp      z,.ForcePositive            ; if A is 0, special case to make +ve
 835+ CAFC              ;                        ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 836+ CAFC              ;.ForcePositive:         ZeroA                               ; set regY and b to 0
 837+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (regY),a
 838+ CAFC              ;                        ld      b,a
 839+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,d                         ; get d back into a again
 840+ CAFC              ;                        ret
 841+ CAFC              ;.PL12:                  ZeroA                               ; set Y A P to be 0 D E from mul
 842+ CAFC              ;                        ld      b,a
 843+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (regY),a
 844+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,e
 845+ CAFC              ;                        ld      (varP),a
 846+ CAFC              ;                        ld      a,d
 847+ CAFC              ;                        ret
 848+ CAFC
 849+ CAFC
 850+ CAFC              ; K3(1 0) = (Y A) + K3(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 851+ CAFC 6F           CalcCraterCenterX:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 852+ CAFD 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 853+ CB00 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 854+ CB01 ED 5B A9 7F                          ld      de,(varK3)                  ; de = K3 [ 1 0 ]
 855+ CB05                                      ClearCarryFlag
 855+ CB05 B7          >                        or a
 856+ CB06 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 857+ CB08 22 A9 7F                             ld      (varK3),hl                  ; K3[1 0] = hl + de
 858+ CB0B C9                                   ret
 859+ CB0C
 860+ CB0C              ; K4(1 0) = (Y A) - K4(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 861+ CB0C 6F           CalcCraterCenterY:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 862+ CB0D 3A 6C 7E                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 863+ CB10 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 864+ CB11 ED 5B AF 7F                          ld      de,(varK4)                  ; de = K4 [ 1 0 ]
 865+ CB15                                      ClearCarryFlag
 865+ CB15 B7          >                        or a
 866+ CB16 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 867+ CB18 22 AF 7F                             ld      (varK4),hl                  ; K4[1 0] = hl + de
 868+ CB1B C9                                   ret
 869+ CB1C
 870+ CB1C CB 7C        TwosCompToLeadingSign:  bit     7,h
 871+ CB1E C8                                   ret     z
 872+ CB1F                                      macronegate16hl
 872+ CB1F AF          >					xor 	a
 872+ CB20 95          >					sub 	l
 872+ CB21 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 872+ CB22 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 872+ CB23 94          >					sub 	h
 872+ CB24 67          >					ld 		h,a
 873+ CB25 7C                                   ld      a,h
 874+ CB26 F6 80                                or      $80
 875+ CB28 67                                   ld      h,a
 876+ CB29 C9                                   ret
 877+ CB2A
 878+ CB2A CB 7C        LeadingSignToTwosComp:  bit     7,h
 879+ CB2C C8                                   ret     z
 880+ CB2D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 881+ CB2E E6 7F                                and     $7F
 882+ CB30 67                                   ld      h,a
 883+ CB31                                      macronegate16hl
 883+ CB31 AF          >					xor 	a
 883+ CB32 95          >					sub 	l
 883+ CB33 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 883+ CB34 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 883+ CB35 94          >					sub 	h
 883+ CB36 67          >					ld 		h,a
 884+ CB37 C9                                   ret
 885+ CB38
 886+ CB38              ;-- bc = bc * P_radius where bc = S.Fraction ,e.g nosex/nosey
 887+ CB38 3A D9 C0     P_BCmulRadius:          ld      a,(P_Radius)                ; we probably don't have radius already
 888+ CB3B 57           P_BCmulRadiusInA:       ld      d,a                         ; d = radius already in a
 889+ CB3C 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; e = c (as we only hold 0.8 in bc, i.e. fractional +/- > 0)
 890+ CB3D ED 30                                mul     de                          ; mulitply raidus by c which will be fractional  generating a 8.X value)
 891+ CB3F 4A                                   ld      c,d                         ; we only want the whole number, preserving sign in b
 892+ CB40 C9                                   ret
 893+ CB41
 894+ CB41                 ; DEFINE  PlanetDebugLocal 1
 895+ CB41              PlanetDraw:             IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
 896+ CB41 ~                                            call    TestBLINE
 897+ CB41                                      ENDIF
 898+ CB41                                      IFDEF TESTMERIDIAN
 899+ CB41 ~                                            call    TestMeridian
 900+ CB41                                      ENDIF
 901+ CB41                                      IFDEF PlanetDebugLocal
 902+ CB41 ~                                            ZeroA
 903+ CB41 ~                                            ; x 500, y 50, z 2000: 500/7,50/7 =>71,7 => 199,71 Yes
 904+ CB41 ~                                            ; radius becomes 24576/2000 = 12 (13 is good enough yes)
 905+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 906+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 907+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a
 908+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl, 0
 909+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxlo),hl
 910+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,0
 911+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKylo),hl
 912+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl, 1500
 913+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl
 914+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,$C800
 915+ CB41 ~                                            ld      bc,6144
 916+ CB41 ~                                            ld      de,0
 917+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevX),bc
 918+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevY),de
 919+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ),hl
 920+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvX),de
 921+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvY),hl
 922+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ),bc
 923+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,18432
 924+ CB41 ~                                            ld      bc,$9800
 925+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevX),hl
 926+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevY),de
 927+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ),bc
 928+ CB41 ~            ;                                ld      hl, 230
 929+ CB41 ~            ;                                ld      de,100
 930+ CB41 ~            ;                                ld      c,200
 931+ CB41 ~            ;                                ld      b,$FF
 932+ CB41 ~                                            call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 933+ CB41 ~                                            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 934+ CB41 ~
 935+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 936+ CB41 ~                                            ld      de,(P_centreY)
 937+ CB41 ~                                            ld      a,(P_Radius)
 938+ CB41 ~                                            ld      c,a
 939+ CB41 ~                                            ld      b,$FF
 940+ CB41 ~                                            MMUSelectLayer2
 941+ CB41 ~                                            call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 942+ CB41 ~            .DebugMeridian1:                xor     a
 943+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
 944+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 944+ CB41 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 944+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 945+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)
 945+ CB41 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 945+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 946+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 947+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 947+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 947+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
 948+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
 948+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 948+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
 949+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcRoofXDivRoofZ
 949+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 949+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 950+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ
 950+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 950+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
 951+ CB41 ~
 952+ CB41 ~                                            call    DrawMeridian
 953+ CB41 ~
 954+ CB41 ~            .DebugMeridian2:                xor     a
 955+ CB41 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
 956+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 956+ CB41 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 956+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 957+ CB41 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)
 957+ CB41 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 957+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 958+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 959+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 959+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 959+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
 960+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
 960+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 960+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
 961+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
 961+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 961+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 962+ CB41 ~                                            call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
 962+ CB41 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 962+ CB41 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
 963+ CB41 ~
 964+ CB41 ~                                            call    DrawMeridian
 965+ CB41 ~
 966+ CB41 ~
 967+ CB41 ~
 968+ CB41                                      ENDIF
 969+ CB41 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 970+ CB44 A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 971+ CB45 F8                                   ret     m                           ; if its negative then behind so exit
 972+ CB46              .TooFarAway:            ReturnIfAGTEusng   48               ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 972+ CB46 FE 30       >                        cp    48
 972+ CB48 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 973+ CB49 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 974+ CB4C B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 975+ CB4D C8                                   ret     z                           ; .
 976+ CB4E              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 977+ CB4E CD B3 C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 978+ CB51 D8                                   ret     c                           ; If the C flag is set by PROJ then the planet/sun is  not visible on-screen, so return
 979+ CB52 CD 57 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 980+ CB55                              IFDEF   PLANETSARESOLID
 981+ CB55                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 982+ CB55                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 983+ CB55 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 984+ CB58 ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 985+ CB5C 3A D9 C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 986+ CB5F 4F                                   ld      c,a
 987+ CB60 06 CF                                ld      b,$CF
 988+ CB62                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 988+ CB62 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 989+ CB66 CD 33 EC                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 990+ CB69 C9                                   ret
 991+ CB6A
 992+ CB6A                              ELSE
 993+ CB6A ~
 994+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: calculate STP step based on planet size"
 995+ CB6A ~            ; Note we don't to the planet type check as hitting here its always a planet
 996+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:set color green"
 997+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:draw circle (do we draw solid??)"
 998+ CB6A ~                                    ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 999+ CB6A ~                                    ld      de,(P_centreY)
1000+ CB6A ~                                    ld      a,(P_Radius)
1001+ CB6A ~                                    ld      c,a
1002+ CB6A ~                                    ld      b,$FF
1003+ CB6A ~                                    MMUSelectLayer2
1004+ CB6A ~                                    call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
1005+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Add check to see if on screen rather than checkign clipped Circle"
1006+ CB6A ~                                    ;ret     c                           ; circle failure means exit
1007+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "DONE: REmoved check for Planet Radius high as its already done win calculate radius"
1008+ CB6A ~                                    ;ReturnIfMemNotZero    P_RadiusHigh   ; if planet raidus < 256 draw meridians or craters
1009+ CB6A ~            .DrawFeatures:          ;ld      a,(P_RadiusHigh)
1010+ CB6A ~                                    ;and     a
1011+ CB6A ~                                    ;ret     nz
1012+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Need logic to generate Planet Type"
1013+ CB6A ~            .DetermineFeature:      ld      a,(P_BnKShipType)
1014+ CB6A ~                                    cp      PlanetTypeMeridian
1015+ CB6A ~                                    jp      nz,DrawPlanetCrater
1016+ CB6A ~            DrawPlanetMeridian:     ld      a,(P_Radius)                 ; we only pull low byte as that is all we are interested in
1017+ CB6A ~            .MinSizeCheck:          ReturnIfALTNusng PlanetMinRadius
1018+ CB6A ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
1018+ CB6A ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1018+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1019+ CB6A ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1019+ CB6A ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1019+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1020+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1021+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1021+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1021+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1022+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1022+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1022+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1023+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcRoofXDivRoofZ
1023+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1023+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1024+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ
1024+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1024+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1025+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1026+ CB6A ~                                    xor     a
1027+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1028+ CB6A ~                                    call    DrawMeridian                ;--- Drawn first Meridian
1029+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Debug whilst sorting meridain"
1030+ CB6A ~                                    ret
1031+ CB6A ~            ;--- Start Second Meridian
1032+ CB6A ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)       ; Set P = -nosev_z_hi
1033+ CB6A ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
1034+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (varP),a                    ; .
1035+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseSideArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1036+ CB6A ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
1036+ CB6A ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1036+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1037+ CB6A ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1037+ CB6A ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1037+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1038+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1039+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1039+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1039+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1040+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1040+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1040+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1041+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
1041+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1041+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1042+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
1042+ CB6A ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1042+ CB6A ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1043+ CB6A ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1044+ CB6A ~                                    xor     a
1045+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1046+ CB6A ~                                    jp      DrawMeridian
1047+ CB6A ~                                    ; implicit ret
1048+ CB6A ~            DrawPlanetCrater:       ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ+1)      ; a= roofz hi
1049+ CB6A ~                                    and     a                           ; if its negative, crater is on far size of planet
1050+ CB6A ~                                    ret     m                           ; .
1051+ CB6A ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1052+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterX           ;  222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
1053+ CB6A ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1054+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterY           ;  222 * roofv_y / z - y-coordinate of planet centre
1055+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ           ;  (Y A) = nosev_x / z
1056+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ           ; (XX16+1 K2+1) = nosev_y / z
1057+ CB6A ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ           ;  (Y A) = sidev_y / z
1058+ CB6A ~                                    srl     a                           ; Set (XX16+3 K2+3) = (Y A) / 2
1059+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (varK2+3),a                 ; .
1060+ CB6A ~                                    ld      a,(regY)                    ; (which is also in b to optimise later)
1061+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (P_XX16+3),a                 ;
1062+ CB6A ~                                    ld      a,64                        ; Set TGT = 64, so we draw a full ellipse in the call to PLS22 below
1063+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (P_BnKTGT),a
1064+ CB6A ~                                    ZeroA
1065+ CB6A ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; Set CNT2 = 0 as we are drawing a full ellipse, so we don't need to apply an offset
1066+ CB6A ~                                    jp      DrawElipse
1067+ CB6A                              ENDIF
1068+ CB6A
1069+ CB6A
1070+ CB6A              ;PLS2                                                   Test
1071+ CB6A              ; K[10] = radius                                        $0000?
1072+ CB6A              ; k3[10], K4[10] X, y pixel of centre
1073+ CB6A              ; (XX16, K2), (XX16+1,K2+1) u_x , u_y                   $1F80  $FE80
1074+ CB6A              ; (XX16+2, K2+2), (XX16+3,K2+3) z_x , z_y               $0000  $0000
1075+ CB6A              ; TGT - target segment count                            $00
1076+ CB6A              ; CNT2 - starting segment                               $0D
1077+ CB6A              ; Now uses (Word) P_BnKCx, Cy, (Byte) Ux, Uy, Vx, Vy
1078+ CB6A                                      DISPLAY "TODO move code back in that was pulled outof BLINE"
1079+ CB6A 3E 3F        DrawMeridian:           ld      a,63                        ; Set TGT = 31, so we only draw half an ellipse
1080+ CB6C 32 8E C0                             ld      (P_BnKTGT),a                ; and fall into DrawElipse
1081+ CB6F                                      DISPLAY "TODO DEBUG STP Default of 1"
1082+ CB6F 3E 01                                ld      a,1
1083+ CB71 32 8F C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
1084+ CB74              ;PLS22
1085+ CB74                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Sort out sign byte for uxuy vxvy in calling code"
1086+ CB74              ; Set counter to 0 and reset flags--------------------------
1087+ CB74              DrawElipse:
1088+ CB74              .Initialise:            ZeroA
1088+ CB74 AF          >                        xor a
1089+ CB75 32 C2 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a                ; Set CNT = 0
1090+ CB78 32 7C C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a
1091+ CB7B 32 7E C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a
1092+ CB7E 32 80 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; for debugging later we will just use the cos and sin signs above
1093+ CB81 32 82 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; .
1094+ CB84 32 88 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; .
1095+ CB87 32 84 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; .
1096+ CB8A 32 86 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; .
1097+ CB8D 32 87 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; .
1098+ CB90 3D                                   dec     a
1099+ CB91 32 C5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a               ; Set FLAG = &FF to reset the ball line heap in the call to the BLINE routine below
1100+ CB94              .PLL4:                  ;break
1101+ CB94 3A C3 C0     .GetSinAngle:           ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set angle = CNT2 mod 32 (was regX)
1102+ CB97 E6 1F                                and     31                          ;
1103+ CB99              ; Caclulate Sin(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1104+ CB99 32 8D C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So P_BnKAngle is the starting segment, reduced to the range 0 to 32, so as there are 64 segments in the circle, this
1105+ CB9C CD EB 93     .CalculateSinCNT2:      call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(angle)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
1106+ CB9F 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1107+ CBA2 32 7B C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1108+ CBA5              ; calculate BnKVxSin = VX*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1109+ CBA5 3A 77 C0     .GetVxSin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVx)                 ; Set A = K2+2 = |v_x|
1110+ CBA8 CD F1 91                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; R = A * Q / 256 = |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1111+ CBAB 32 83 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSin),a              ; now varR = vx*sin(CNT2)
1112+ CBAE              ; calculate BnkVySin = Vy*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1113+ CBAE 3A 79 C0     .GetVySin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVy)                 ; Set A = K2+3 = |v_y|
1114+ CBB1 CD F1 91                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set varK = A * Q / 256 = |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1115+ CBB4 32 85 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySin),a              ;
1116+ CBB7              ; Now work sign of vx and vy * sin -------------------------; In 6502 below, in z80 C flag is reversed
1117+ CBB7 3A C3 C0     .CalcVxVyMulSinSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If CNT2 >= 33 then this sets the C flag, else clear : C is clear if the segment starts in the first half of the circle, 0 to 180 degrees
1118+ CBBA FE 21                                cp      33                          ;                                                       C is set if the segment starts in the second half of the circle, 180 to 360 degrees
1119+ CBBC DA CD CB                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeSin          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1120+ CBBF 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1121+ CBC1 32 7C C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1122+ CBC4 32 84 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1123+ CBC7 32 86 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1124+ CBCA 32 87 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; |v_x/y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1125+ CBCD              .NoSignChangeSin:
1126+ CBCD              ; calculate cos(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1127+ CBCD 3A C3 C0     .CalculateCosCNT2:      ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set X = (CNT2 + 16) mod 32
1128+ CBD0 C6 10                                add     a, 16                       ; .
1129+ CBD2 E6 1F                                and     31                          ; .
1130+ CBD4 32 8D C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So we can use X as a lookup index into the SNE table to get the cosine (as there are 16 segments in a  quarter-circle)
1131+ CBD7 CD EB 93                             call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin((CNT2 + 16) mod 32) = |cos(CNT2)|
1132+ CBDA 32 82 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1133+ CBDD 32 7D C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1134+ CBE0              ; calculate Uy*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1135+ CBE0 3A 75 C0     .GetUyCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUy)                 ; Set A = K2+1 = |u_y|
1136+ CBE3 CD F1 91                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUyCos(wasK+2) = A * Q / 256 = |u_y| * |cos(CNT2)|
1137+ CBE6 32 81 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCos),a              ; .
1138+ CBE9              ; calculate Ux*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1139+ CBE9 3A 73 C0     .GetUxCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUx)                 ; Set A = K2 = |u_x|
1140+ CBEC CD F1 91                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUxCos(wasP) = A * Q / 256 = |u_x| * |cos(CNT2)| also sets the C flag, so in the following, ADC #15 adds 16 rather than 15 (use use non carry add)
1141+ CBEF 32 7F C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCos),a              ; .
1142+ CBF2              ; now work out sign for cos CNT2----------------------------;
1143+ CBF2 3A C3 C0     .CalcUxUyMulCosSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If (CNT2 + 16) mod 64 >= 33 then this sets the C flag,
1144+ CBF5 C6 10                                add     a,16                        ; otherwise it's clear, so this means that:
1145+ CBF7 E6 3F                                and     63                          ; .
1146+ CBF9 FE 21                                cp      33                          ; c is clear if the segment is 0 to 90 or 270 to 360, we need
1147+ CBFB DA 0C CC                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeCos          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1148+ CBFE 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1149+ CC00 32 7E C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1150+ CC03 32 80 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1151+ CC06 32 82 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1152+ CC09 32 88 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1153+ CC0C              .NoSignChangeCos:
1154+ CC0C              ; calculate Ux*cos + vx*sin---------------------------------;
1155+ CC0C 3A 7C C0     .CalcSignOfVxMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1156+ CC0F 21 78 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVxSign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1157+ CC12 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1158+ CC13 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1159+ CC15 32 84 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1160+ CC18 3A 7E C0     .CalcSignOfUxMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1161+ CC1B 21 74 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUxSign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1162+ CC1E AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1163+ CC1F E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1164+ CC21 32 80 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1165+ CC24 2A 7F C0     .AddUxCosVxSin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUxCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1166+ CC27 ED 5B 83 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVxSin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1167+ CC2B CD E3 8F                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1168+ CC2E 22 89 C0     .DoneAddUxCosVxSin:     ld      (P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin),hl     ;
1169+ CC31              ; calculate -(Uy*cos - vy*sin)------------------------------;
1170+ CC31 3A 7C C0     .CalcSignOfVyMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1171+ CC34 21 7A C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVySign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1172+ CC37 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1173+ CC38 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1174+ CC3A 32 86 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1175+ CC3D 3A 7E C0     .CalcSignOfUyMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1176+ CC40 21 76 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUySign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1177+ CC43 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1178+ CC44 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1179+ CC46 32 82 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1180+ CC49 2A 81 C0     .AddUyCosVySin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUyCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1181+ CC4C ED 5B 85 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVySin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1182+ CC50 CD E3 8F                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1183+ CC53 22 8B C0     .DoneAddUyCosVySin:     ld      (P_BnKUyCosSubVySin),hl     ;
1184+ CC56              ; Calculate NewXPos = Centrey - Uy cos - vy cos (which we still have in hl)
1185+ CC56              .PL42:
1186+ CC56 ED 5B 71 C0  .CalcNewYPos:           ld      de, (P_BnKCy)               ; Hl is already in HL so de =  Cx
1187+ CC5A EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; swap round so we can do hl + de where de is already negated to effect a subtract (probabyl don't don't need this)
1188+ CC5B 7A                                   ld      a,d
1189+ CC5C EE 80                                xor     $80                         ; now flip bit as its a subtract not add
1190+ CC5E 57                                   ld      d,a
1191+ CC5F CD 8E CC                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1192+ CC62 CD E3 8F                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cy - ( uy Cos + vy sin)
1193+ CC65 22 E0 C0                             ld      (P_NewYPos),hl              ; load to new Y Pos
1194+ CC68 2A 6F C0     .CalcNewXPos:           ld      hl,(P_BnKCx)
1195+ CC6B ED 5B 89 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin)
1196+ CC6F CD 8E CC                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1197+ CC72 CD E3 8F                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cx - ( ux Cos + vx sin)
1198+ CC75 22 DE C0                             ld      (P_NewXPos),hl
1199+ CC78 CD B3 CC     .PL43:                  call    BLINE                       ; hl = TX  draw this segment, updates CNT in A
1200+ CC7B                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng P_BnKTGT        ; If CNT > TGT then jump to PL40 to stop drawing the ellipse (which is how we draw half-ellipses)
1200+ CC7B 21 8E C0    >                        ld      hl,P_BnKTGT
1200+ CC7E BE          >                        cp      (hl)
1200+ CC7F D0          >                        ret	    nc
1201+ CC80 3A C3 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set CNT2 = (CNT2 + STP) mod 64
1202+ CC83 21 8F C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP                 ; .
1203+ CC86 86                                   add     a,(hl)                      ; .
1204+ CC87 32 C3 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a               ; .
1205+ CC8A C3 94 CB                             jp      .PLL4                       ; Jump back to PLL4 to draw the next segment
1206+ CC8D C9           .PL40:                  ret
1207+ CC8E
1208+ CC8E
1209+ CC8E EB           ScaleDE75pct:           ex      de,hl
1210+ CC8F 7C                                   ld      a,h
1211+ CC90 A7                                   and     a
1212+ CC91 F5                                   push    af
1213+ CC92 F2 98 CC                             jp      p,.PositiveHL
1214+ CC95 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
1215+ CC97 67                                   ld      h,a
1216+ CC98 D5           .PositiveHL:            push    de
1217+ CC99 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
1218+ CC9B 29                                   add     hl,hl                       ; * 2
1219+ CC9C 19                                   add     hl,de
1220+ CC9D D1                                   pop     de
1221+ CC9E                                      ShiftHLRight1
1221+ CC9E CB 3C       >			   srl h
1221+ CCA0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1222+ CCA2                                      ShiftHLRight1
1222+ CCA2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1222+ CCA4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1223+ CCA6 EB           CheckSign:              ex      de,hl
1224+ CCA7 F1                                   pop     af
1225+ CCA8 A7                                   and     a
1226+ CCA9 F0                                   ret     p
1227+ CCAA 7C                                   ld      a,h
1228+ CCAB F6 80                                or      $80
1229+ CCAD 67                                   ld      h,a
1230+ CCAE C9                                   ret
1231+ CCAF
1232+ CCAF              ;  Draw a single segment of a circle, adding the point to the ball line heap.
1233+ CCAF              ;  Arguments:
1234+ CCAF              ;   CNT                  The number of this segment
1235+ CCAF              ;   STP                  The step size for the circle
1236+ CCAF              ;   K6(1 0)              The x-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as a screen coordinate
1237+ CCAF              ;   P_New Pos-- (T X)                The y-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as an offset from the centre of the circle
1238+ CCAF              ;   FLAG                 Set to &FF for the first call, so it sets up the first point in the heap but waits until the second call before drawing anything (as we need two points, i.e. two calls, before we can draw a line)
1239+ CCAF              ;   -- Not UsedK                    The circle's radius
1240+ CCAF              ;   -- Not UsedK3(1 0)              Pixel x-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1241+ CCAF              ;   -- Not UsedK4(1 0)              Pixel y-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1242+ CCAF              ;   P_PrevXPos--K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1243+ CCAF              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1244+ CCAF              ;   SWAP                 If non-zero, we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2)
1245+ CCAF              ; Returns:
1246+ CCAF              ;   CNT                  CNT is updated to CNT + STP
1247+ CCAF              ;   A                    The new value of CNT
1248+ CCAF              ;   P_PrevXPos --K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1249+ CCAF              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1250+ CCAF              ;   FLAG                 Set to 0`
1251+ CCAF              ; ** THIS NEEDS CHANGING TO IMMEDIATE DRAW and retain last line end pos) ;
1252+ CCAF              ; Flow of code
1253+ CCAF              ; Entry Bline, prepare T , X K4 etc
1254+ CCAF              ;       BL1
1255+ CCAF 00           PLINEx1                 DB 0
1256+ CCB0 00           PLINEy1                 DB 0
1257+ CCB1 00           PLINEx2                 DB 0
1258+ CCB2 00           PLINEy2                 DB 0
1259+ CCB3
1260+ CCB3                                      IFDEF MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1261+ CCB3 ~            ; Store X and Y on plot line (ball) heap, values bc = YX to save, a = offset
1262+ CCB3 ~            P_StoreXYOnHeap:        ld      hl,P_BnKPlotXHeap
1263+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      bc,(P_NewXPos)
1264+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      de,(P_NewYPos)      ; now save Y
1265+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get off set
1266+ CCB3 ~                                    add     hl,a                ; now we have x heap target
1267+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      (hl),b
1268+ CCB3 ~                                    inc     hl
1269+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      (hl),c
1270+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      a, $80 - 1          ; note its 2 bytes per coord element, we have already incremeted by 1 byte
1271+ CCB3 ~                                    add     hl,a
1272+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      (hl),d
1273+ CCB3 ~                                    inc     hl
1274+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      (hl),e
1275+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get index back
1276+ CCB3 ~                                    inc     a                   ; move on 2 bytes
1277+ CCB3 ~                                    inc     a                   ; .
1278+ CCB3 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; and save it
1279+ CCB3 ~                                    ret
1280+ CCB3                                      ENDIF
1281+ CCB3
1282+ CCB3              ; We'll move the calculation of absolute screen pos outside of bline so we expect screen pixel coordinates
1283+ CCB3              BLINE:                  ;ld      a,(P_Tvar)          ; entry point if we need to fetch TX
1284+ CCB3                                      ;ld      h,a
1285+ CCB3                                      ;ld      a,(P_Xreg)
1286+ CCB3                                      ;ld      l,a
1287+ CCB3              BLINE_HL:               ;ld      de,(P_varK4)        ; Set K6(3 2) = (T X) + K4(1 0) = y-coord of centre + y-coord of new point
1288+ CCB3                                      ;ex      de,hl               ;not really needed
1289+ CCB3                                      ;ClearCarryFlag              ; .
1290+ CCB3                                      ;adc     hl,de               ; .
1291+ CCB3                                      ;ld      a,h
1292+ CCB3                                      ;ld      (P_varK6p2),hl      ; so K6(3 2) now contains the y-coordinate of the new point on the circle but as a screen coordinate, to go along with the screen y-coordinate in K6(1 0)
1293+ CCB3 3A C5 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKFlag)       ; If FLAG = 0, jump down to BL1, else its FF so we save first point
1294+ CCB6 A7                                   and     a                   ; .
1295+ CCB7 CA C1 CC                             jp      z,.BL1              ; .
1296+ CCBA              .FirstPlot:
1297+ CCBA              ; This code now stores on line heap if debugging is enabled else it just stores in Prev X and Y for direct plotting
1298+ CCBA              ; First time in we are just establinshign first position point, then we can exit
1299+ CCBA 3C           .BL5:                   inc     a                   ; Flag is &FF so this is the first call to BLINE so increment FLAG to set it to 0
1300+ CCBB 32 C5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a       ; so we just save the first point and don't plot it
1301+ CCBE                                      DISPLAY "TODO, set up proper variables, hold variables for previous X Y, we don't need ball heap"
1302+ CCBE                                      DISPLAY "TODO, created a plot xy heap to store for debugging purposes, delete once not needed"
1303+ CCBE                                      DISPLAY "TODO, need flag for start which is probably CNT being 0?"
1304+ CCBE                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1305+ CCBE ~                                    ZeroA
1306+ CCBE ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; Initialise line list
1307+ CCBE                                      ENDIF
1308+ CCBE              ; We don't need to copy to prev here as we do it in BL7
1309+ CCBE C3 EF CC                             jp      .SkipFirstPlot      ; Jump to BL7 to tidy up and return from the subroutine
1310+ CCC1              ; This section performs teh clipping and draw of the line. it retrieves previous position and draws to new
1311+ CCC1              .BL1:
1312+ CCC1              ; note we still need the unclipped points for the next segment as we have to clip again
1313+ CCC1                                      ;ld      hl,(PLINEx1)        ; Otherwise the coordinates were swapped by the call to
1314+ CCC1                                      ;ld      de,(PLINEx2)        ; LL145 above, so we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2) back
1315+ CCC1                                      ;ld      (PLINEx1),de        ; again
1316+ CCC1                                      ;ld      (PLINEx2),hl        ; .
1317+ CCC1              .BL9:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1318+ CCC1              .BL8:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1319+ CCC1                                      ;ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex) ; Set Line Stack Pointer to be the same as Plot Index)
1320+ CCC1                                      ;ld      (P_BnKLSP),a
1321+ CCC1 2A DA C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevXPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1322+ CCC4 22 E5 C0                             ld      (P_XX1510),hl
1323+ CCC7 2A DC C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevYPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1324+ CCCA 22 E7 C0                             ld      (P_XX1532),hl
1325+ CCCD 2A DE C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1326+ CCD0 22 E9 C0                             ld      (P_XX1554),hl
1327+ CCD3 2A E0 C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewYPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1328+ CCD6 22 EB C0                             ld      (P_XX1210),hl
1329+ CCD9 CD F8 C2     .CLipLine:              call    P_LL145_6502        ; Clip  line from (X1, Y1) to (X2, Y2), loads to X1,Y1,X2,Y2 P_XX1510 as bytes                        ld      bc,(XX1510)
1330+ CCDC 38 11                                jr      c,.LineTotallyClipped
1331+ CCDE                                      DISPLAY "TODO what was the Ld de for?"
1332+ CCDE              ;                        ld      de,(XX1532)
1333+ CCDE                                      DISPLAY "TODO SORT OUT PROPER PLANET COLOR"
1334+ CCDE 3E CC        .DrawLine:              ld      a,$CC
1335+ CCE0 ED 4B E5 C0                          ld      bc,(P_XX15PlotX1)
1336+ CCE4 ED 5B E7 C0                          ld      de,(P_XX15PlotX2)
1337+ CCE8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1337+ CCE8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1338+ CCEC CD 9F EF                             call    l2_draw_any_line
1339+ CCEF                                      DISPLAY "TODO removed check for starting line segments again as we draw direct"
1340+ CCEF              ;                        ld      a,(P_XX13)          ; If XX13 is non-zero, jump up to BL5 to add a &FF marker to the end of the line heap. XX13 is non-zero
1341+ CCEF              ;                        and     a                   ; after the call to the clipping routine LL145 above if the end of the line was clipped, meaning the next line
1342+ CCEF              ;                        jp      z,.BL5              ; sent to BLINE can't join onto the end but has to start a new segment, and that's what inserting the &FF marker does
1343+ CCEF              ; if line was totally clipped just store new x and y as previous and continue from there
1344+ CCEF              .SkipFirstPlot:
1345+ CCEF              .LineTotallyClipped:
1346+ CCEF 2A DE C0     .BL7:                   ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)        ; Copy the data for this step point from K6(3 2 1 0)
1347+ CCF2 ED 5B E0 C0                          ld      de,(P_NewYPos)        ; into K5(3 2 1 0), for use in the next call to BLINE:
1348+ CCF6 22 DA C0                             ld      (P_PrevXPos),hl
1349+ CCF9 ED 53 DC C0                          ld      (P_PrevYPos),de
1350+ CCFD                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1351+ CCFD ~                                    call    P_StoreXYOnHeap
1352+ CCFD                                      ENDIF
1353+ CCFD              ;                        ld      (P_varK5),hl        ; * K5(1 0)(3 2) = x, y of previous point
1354+ CCFD              ;                        ld      (P_varK5p2),de      ;
1355+ CCFD 3A C2 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT)         ; CNT = CNT + STP
1356+ CD00 21 8F C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP
1357+ CD03                                      ClearCarryFlag
1357+ CD03 B7          >                        or a
1358+ CD04 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)
1359+ CD05 32 C2 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a
1360+ CD08 C9                                   ret
1361+ CD09
1362+ CD09              PlanetBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfPlanet
1363+ CD09
1364+ CD09
# file closed: ./Universe/Planet/planet_data.asm

 368+ F586 00 0B 01 03                          DB  0,11, 1, 3, low  4000, high  4000, EQ_REAR_PULSE    , 0     ,$01 , 1  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 368+ F58A A0 0F 0B 00
 368+ F58E 01 01 00 00
 368+ F592 00 00 00 00
 369+ F596 00 0C 01 03                          DB  0,12, 1, 3, low  4000, high  4000, EQ_LEFT_PULSE    , 0     ,$02 , 2  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 369+ F59A A0 0F 0C 00
 369+ F59E 02 02 00 00

 386+ F676              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 387+ F676 2B           GalaxyRandSeed			DB	43	            ; Just some start values
 388+ F677 20           GalaxyRandSeed1			DB	32	            ; Just some start values
 389+ F678 0C           GalaxyRandSeed2			DB	12	            ; Just some start values
 390+ F679 42           GalaxyRandSeed3			DB	66	            ; Just some start values
 391+ F67A              GalaxySeedRandom:
 392+ F67A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 393+ F67A CD 9D 85     GetDigramGalaxySeed:    call	copy_galaxy_to_working
 394+ F67D 18 03                                jr		GetDigramWorkingSeed
 395+ F67F CD B5 85     GetDigramSystemSeed:    call	copy_system_to_working
 396+ F682 11 A1 8F     GetDigramWorkingSeed:   ld		de,name_expanded    ; ">GetDigram a = digram seed"
 397+ F685 06 03                                ld		b,3
 398+ F687 3A 12 80                             ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)
 399+ F68A E6 40                                and		$40
 400+ F68C 28 03                                jr		z,.SmallSizeName
 401+ F68E CD C2 8F     .LargeSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 402+ F691 CD C2 8F     .SmallSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 403+ F694 CD C2 8F                             call	NamingLoop
 404+ F697 CD C2 8F                             call	NamingLoop
 405+ F69A EB           .DoneName:              ex		de,hl
 406+ F69B 36 00                                ld		(hl),0
 407+ F69D EB                                   ex		de,hl
 408+ F69E C9                                   ret
 409+ F69F
 410+ F69F 11 76 F6     GalaxySetSeedFromHL:    ld      de,GalaxyRandSeed
 411+ F6A2              ; Uses registers a,b and hl
 412+ F6A2 B7           GalaxyDoRandom:         or      a                                               ; in 6502 this is called after a bcc instruction to will always be clear (see .detok2 and .dt6)
 413+ F6A3 3A 76 F6                             ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed)
 414+ F6A6 CB 17        .Seed0Rolled:           rl      a                                               ; r0 << 1
 415+ F6A8 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = reg x in 6502 so x = r0 << 1
 416+ F6A9 21 78 F6     .AddSeed2               ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed2                              ;
 417+ F6AC 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; a = r0 << 1 + r2
 418+ F6AD 32 76 F6     .SetRandSeed0:          ld		(GalaxyRandSeed),a					            ; set r0' = (r0 << 1) +  r2 + (r0 bit 7)
 419+ F6B0 78                                   ld      a,b
 420+ F6B1 32 78 F6     .SetRandSeed2:          ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; set r2' =  r0 << 1
 421+ F6B4 3A 77 F6     .GetRandSeed1:          ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed1)
 422+ F6B7 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = r1
 423+ F6B8 21 79 F6                             ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed3
 424+ F6BB 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; Adc from before may have set carry flag or may not, will be set if r0 << 1 + r2 + carry > 256
 425+ F6BC 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; set r1' = r1 + r3 + carry
 426+ F6BF 4F                                   ld      c,a
 427+ F6C0 78                                   ld      a,b
 428+ F6C1 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; set r3 = r1
 429+ F6C4 79                                   ld      a,c
 430+ F6C5 C9                                   ret
 431+ F6C6
 432+ F6C6              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 433+ F6C6 ED 31        galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de:add     hl,a
 434+ F6C8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 435+ F6CA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch low byte
 436+ F6CB 47                                   ld      b,a
 437+ F6CC 23                                   inc     hl
 438+ F6CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch high byte
 439+ F6CE 68                                   ld      l,b
 440+ F6CF 67                                   ld      h,a
 441+ F6D0 7E           GalaxyCopyLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 442+ F6D1 FE 00                                cp      0
 443+ F6D3 28 05                                jr      z,.CopyDone
 444+ F6D5 12                                   ld      (de),a
 445+ F6D6 23                                   inc     hl
 446+ F6D7 13                                   inc     de
 447+ F6D8 18 F6                                jr      GalaxyCopyLoop
 448+ F6DA 12           .CopyDone:              ld      (de),a
 449+ F6DB C9                                   ret
 450+ F6DC              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451+ F6DC 11 64 F1     galaxy_get_species:     ld      de,GalaxySpecies
 452+ F6DF 3E 28                                ld      a,"("
 453+ F6E1 12                                   ld      (de),a
 454+ F6E2 13                                   inc     de
 455+ F6E3 3A FC E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+4)
 456+ F6E6 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 457+ F6E8 20 0A                                jr      nz,.NonHuman
 458+ F6EA 21 62 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantHumanIx
 459+ F6ED AF                                   xor     a
 460+ F6EE CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 461+ F6F1 C3 4F F7                             jp      .galaxy_species_exit
 462+ F6F4 3A FD E8     .NonHuman:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 463+ F6F7 CB 3F                                srl     a
 464+ F6F9 CB 3F                                srl     a
 465+ F6FB E6 07                                and     $07
 466+ F6FD FE 03                                cp      3
 467+ F6FF 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc1
 468+ F701 21 34 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc1Ix
 469+ F704 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 470+ F707 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 471+ F709 12                                   ld      (de),a
 472+ F70A 13                                   inc     de
 473+ F70B 3A FD E8     .NotDesc1:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 474+ F70E CB 3F                                srl     a
 475+ F710 CB 3F                                srl     a
 476+ F712 CB 3F                                srl     a
 477+ F714 CB 3F                                srl     a
 478+ F716 CB 3F                                srl     a
 479+ F718 FE 06                                cp      6
 480+ F71A 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc2
 481+ F71C 21 3A F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc2Ix
 482+ F71F CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 483+ F722 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 484+ F724 12                                   ld      (de),a
 485+ F725 13                                   inc     de
 486+ F726 3A F9 E8     .NotDesc2:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 487+ F729 47                                   ld      b,a
 488+ F72A 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 489+ F72D A8                                   xor     b
 490+ F72E E6 07                                and     $07
 491+ F730 F5                                   push    af
 492+ F731 FE 06                                cp      6
 493+ F733 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc3
 494+ F735 21 46 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc3Ix
 495+ F738 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 496+ F73B 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 497+ F73D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 498+ F73E 13                                   inc     de
 499+ F73F F1           .NotDesc3:              pop     af
 500+ F740 47                                   ld      b,a
 501+ F741 3A FD E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 502+ F744 E6 03                                and     $03
 503+ F746 80                                   add     a,b
 504+ F747 E6 07                                and     $07
 505+ F749 21 52 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc4Ix
 506+ F74C CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 507+ F74F 3E 73        .galaxy_species_exit:   ld      a,"s"
 508+ F751 12                                   ld      (de),a
 509+ F752 13                                   inc     de
 510+ F753 3E 29                                ld      a,")"
 511+ F755 12                                   ld      (de),a
 512+ F756 13                                   inc     de
 513+ F757 AF                                   xor     a
 514+ F758 12                                   ld      (de),a
 515+ F759 C9                                   ret

 518+ F75A              ; To copy seed, loops from 3 to 0
 519+ F75A              ; copy seed X + 2 to target X
 520+ F75A              ; x = x -1

 523+ F75A
 524+ F75A              GalaxyCapitaliseString: ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 525+ F75A 23                                   inc		hl
 526+ F75B 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 527+ F75C FE 00                                cp		0
 528+ F75E C8                                   ret		z
 529+ F75F FE 5B                                cp		'Z'+1
 530+ F761 30 F7                                jr		nc,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 531+ F763 FE 41                                cp		'A'
 532+ F765 38 F3                                jr		c,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 533+ F767 C6 20        .LowerCase:             add		a,'a'-'A'

 535+ F76A 18 EE                                jr		GalaxyCapitaliseString

 540+ F76C                                      ;cp      $FF

 542+ F76C 3A 14 80     .SeedGalaxy             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)                              ;
 543+ F76F 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed),a                              ; r0 = Seed C
 544+ F772 3A 15 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)                              ;
 545+ F775 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; r1 = Seeed D
 546+ F778 3A 16 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)                              ;
 547+ F77B 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; r2 = Seed E
 548+ F77E 3A 17 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)                              ;
 549+ F781 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; r3 = Seed F

 553+ F787 F5           .GalaxyExpandDesc:      push    af
 554+ F788 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = 6502 X reg
 555+ F789 C5                                   push    bc                                              ; save Y reg
 556+ F78A

 572+ F7AF 1E 00        ExpandAtHLToE:          ld      e,0
 573+ F7B1 7E           .ExpandTokenLoop:       ld      a,(hl)
 574+ F7B2 FE 3E                                cp      ">"
 575+ F7B4 C8                                   ret     z
 576+ F7B5 23                                   inc     hl
 577+ F7B6 16 0A                                ld      d,10
 578+ F7B8 ED 30                                mul
 579+ F7BA D6 30                                sub     "0"
 580+ F7BC 83                                   add     a,e

 583+ F7C0
 584+ F7C0 E5           SelectTokenToHL:        push    hl                                          ;+1
 585+ F7C1 C5                                   push    bc                                          ;+2
 586+ F7C2 CD A2 F6                             call    GalaxyDoRandom
 587+ F7C5 C1                                   pop     bc                                          ;+1
 588+ F7C6 E1                                   pop     hl                                          ;+0
 589+ F7C7 16 00        .CalcOptionAToD:        ld      d,0
 590+ F7C9 FE 33                                cp      $33
 591+ F7CB DA CF F7                             jp      c,.Check66
 592+ F7CE 14           .IsGTE33:               inc     d
 593+ F7CF FE 66        .Check66:               cp      $66
 594+ F7D1 DA D5 F7                             jp      c,.Check99
 595+ F7D4 14           .IsGTE66:               inc     d
 596+ F7D5 FE 99        .Check99:               cp      $99
 597+ F7D7 DA DB F7     .IsGTE99:               jp      c,.CheckCC
 598+ F7DA 14                                   inc     d
 599+ F7DB FE CC        .CheckCC:               cp      $CC
 600+ F7DD 38 01                                jr      c,.TokenIdToAddress
 601+ F7DF 14           .ItGETCC:               inc     d
 602+ F7E0 21 1B EF     .TokenIdToAddress:      ld      hl,GalaxyDescList
 603+ F7E3 7B                                   ld      a,e
 604+ F7E4 CB 27                                sla     a                                               ; x 2
 605+ F7E6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl + a * 2
 606+ F7E8 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl + a * 4
 607+ F7EA ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl + a * 6
 608+ F7EC ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl + a * 8
 609+ F7EE ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl + a * 10
 610+ F7F0 7A                                   ld      a,d
 611+ F7F1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 612+ F7F3 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                            ; hl = desc array [e][d]
 613+ F7F5 7E           .LookUpDataFromTable:   ld      a,(hl)
 614+ F7F6 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 615+ F7F8 23                                   inc     hl
 616+ F7F9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 617+ F7FA DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                                           ; ix = address at (hl)
 618+ F7FC DD E5                                push    ix                                              ;+2
 619+ F7FE E1                                   pop     hl                                              ;+1
 620+ F7FF C9                                   ret
 621+ F800              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 622+ F800 E5           ProcessHSymbol:         push    hl                                              ;+1
 623+ F801 D5                                   push    de                                              ;+2
 624+ F802 C5                                   push    bc                                              ;+3
 625+ F803 21 91 F7     .CopyInNameH:           ld      hl, GalaxyNameCopy
 626+ F806 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 627+ F808 FD 5D                                ld      e,iyl
 628+ F80A CD D0 F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 629+ F80D FD 62                                ld      iyh,d
 630+ F80F FD 6B                                ld      iyl,e
 631+ F811 C1                                   pop     bc                                              ;+2
 632+ F812 D1                                   pop     de                                              ;+1
 633+ F813 E1                                   pop     hl
 634+ F814 C9                                   ret
 635+ F815              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 636+ F815 E5           ProcessISymbol:         push    hl                                              ;+1
 637+ F816 D5                                   push    de                                              ;+2
 638+ F817 C5                                   push    bc                                              ;+3
 639+ F818 21 91 F7     .CopyInNameI:           ld      hl, GalaxyNameCopy
 640+ F81B FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 641+ F81D FD 5D                                ld      e,iyl
 642+ F81F CD D0 F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 643+ F822 FD 62                                ld      iyh,d
 644+ F824 FD 6B                                ld      iyl,e
 645+ F826 3E 69                                ld      a,"i"
 646+ F828 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 647+ F829 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 648+ F82A 23                                   inc     hl
 649+ F82B 3E 61                                ld      a,"a"
 650+ F82D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 651+ F82E 23                                   inc     hl
 652+ F82F 3E 6E                                ld      a,"n"
 653+ F831 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 654+ F832 23                                   inc     hl
 655+ F833 E5                                   push    hl
 656+ F834 FD E1                                pop     iy
 657+ F836 C1                                   pop     bc                                              ;+2
 658+ F837 D1                                   pop     de                                              ;+1
 659+ F838 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ;+0
 660+ F839 C9                                   ret
 661+ F83A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 662+ F83A E5           ProcessRSymbol:         push    hl                                              ;+1
 663+ F83B D5                                   push    de                                              ;+2
 664+ F83C CD A2 F6                             call    GalaxyDoRandom ;(Correct one or do we use teh clear carry version?)
 665+ F83F E6 03                                and     $03
 666+ F841 47                                   ld      b,a
 667+ F842 04                                   inc     b
 668+ F843 AF                                   xor     a
 669+ F844 4F                                   ld      c,a
 670+ F845 C5           .RLoop:                 push    bc                                              ;+3
 671+ F846 CD A2 F6                             call    GalaxyDoRandom
 672+ F849 C1                                   pop     bc                                              ;+2
 673+ F84A E6 3E                                and     $3E
 674+ F84C 21 A0 E8                             ld      hl,GalaxyName_digrams
 675+ F84F ED 31                                add     hl,a
 676+ F851 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 677+ F852 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 678+ F854 38 01                                jr      c,.NotLowercase
 679+ F856 81                                   add     a,c
 680+ F857 FD 77 00     .NotLowercase:          ld      (iy+0),a
 681+ F85A 23                                   inc     hl
 682+ F85B FD 23                                inc     iy
 683+ F85D 0E 20                                ld      c,$20               ; fixed force to lower case
 684+ F85F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 685+ F860 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 686+ F862 38 01                                jr      c,.NotLowercase2
 687+ F864 81                                   add     a,c
 688+ F865 FD 77 00     .NotLowercase2:         ld      (iy+0),a
 689+ F868 FD 23                                inc     iy
 690+ F86A 10 D9                                djnz    .RLoop
 691+ F86C D1                                   pop     de                                              ;+1
 692+ F86D E1                                   pop     hl                                              ;+0
 693+ F86E C9                                   ret
 694+ F86F              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 695+ F86F ED 43 5B E8  GalaxyGenerateDesc:     ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable

 704+ F888 21 DE F3     .InitDescription:       ld      hl,GalaxyPlanetDescStarter                      ; Initialise galaxy description to  <14> is <22>
 705+ F88B 11 B2 F2                             ld      de,GalaxyPlanetSource

 708+ F892 21 85 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyPlanetDescription
 709+ F895 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 710+ F896 11 86 F1                             ld      de,GalaxyPlanetDescription+1
